椎釜鬲瓮盎盈道上	1	zhui fu ge weng ang ying dao shang
祖臂徐去	1	zu bi xu qu
至撞杀孕妇人	1	zhi zhuang sha yun fu ren
宁节度使白孝德以王故	1	bin ning jie du shi bai xiao de yi wang gu
戚不敢言	1	qi bu gan yan
太尉自州以状白府	1	tai wei zi zhou yi zhuang bai fu
天子以生人付公理	1	tian zi yi sheng ren fu gong li
公见人被暴害	1	gong jian ren bei bao hai
某为泾州	1	mou wei jing zhou
今不忍人无冠暴死	1	jin bu ren ren wu guan bao si
以乱天子边事	1	yi luan tian zi bian shi
公诚以都虞候命某者	1	gong cheng yi dou yu hou ming mou zhe
能为公已乱	1	neng wei gong yi luan
使公之人不得害	1	shi gong zhi ren bu de hai
如太尉请	1	ru tai wei qing
既署一月	1	ji shu yi yue
军士十七人入市取酒	1	xi jun shi shi qi ren ru shi qu jiu
又以刃刺酒翁	1	you yi ren ci jiu weng
酒流沟中	1	jiu liu gou zhong
太尉列卒取十七人	1	tai wei lie zu qu shi qi ren
皆断头注槊上	1	jie duan tou zhu shuo shang
植市门外	1	zhi shi men wai
一营大噪	1	xi yi ying da zao
孝德震恐	1	xiao de zhen kong
召太尉曰	1	zhao tai wei yue
请辞于军	1	qing ci yu jun
孝德使数十人从太尉	1	xiao de shi shu shi ren cong tai wei
太尉尽辞去	1	tai wei jin ci qu
选老L者一人持马	1	xuan lao bi zhe yi ren chi ma
至门下	1	zhi xi men xia
太尉笑且入	1	tai wei xiao qie ru
杀一老卒	1	sha yi lao zu
吾戴吾头来矣	1	wu dai wu tou lai yi
尚书固负若属耶	1	shang shu gu fu ruo shu ye
副元帅固负若属耶	1	fu yuan shuai gu fu ruo shu ye
奈何欲以乱败郭氏	1	nai he yu yi luan bai guo shi
为白尚书	1	wei bai shang shu
出听我言	1	chu ting wo yan
出见太尉	1	xi chu jian tai wei
副元师勋塞天地	1	fu yuan shi xun sai tian di
当务始终	1	dang wu shi zhong
今尚书恣卒为暴	1	jin shang shu zi zu wei bao
乱天子边	1	luan tian zi bian
欲谁归罪	1	yu shui gui zui
罪且及副元师	1	zui qie ji fu yuan shi
今人恶子弟以货窜名军籍中	1	jin bin ren e zi di yi huo cuan ming jun ji zhong
如是不止	1	ru shi bu zhi
几日不大乱	1	ji ri bu da luan
大乱由尚书出	1	da luan you shang shu chu
人皆曰尚书倚副元帅	1	ren jie yue shang shu yi fu yuan shuai
然则郭氏功名	1	ran ze guo shi gong ming
其与存者几何	1	qi yu cun zhe ji he
再拜曰	1	xi zai bai yue
公幸教以道	1	gong xing jiao xi yi dao
愿奉军以从	1	yuan feng jun yi cong
顾叱左右曰	1	gu chi zuo you yue
皆解甲散还火伍中	1	jie jie jia san hai huo wu zhong
敢哗者死	1	gan hua zhe si
吾未哺食	1	wu wei bu shi
请假设草具	1	qing jia she cao ju
愿留宿门下	1	yuan liu su men xia
命持马者去	1	ming chi ma zhe qu
遂卧军中	1	sui wo jun zhong
不解衣	1	xi bu jie yi
戒候卒击柝卫太尉	1	jie hou zu ji tuo wei tai wei
俱至孝德所	1	ju zhi xiao de suo
州由是无祸	1	bin zhou you shi wu huo
太尉在泾州	1	tai wei zai jing zhou
为营田官	1	wei ying tian guan
泾大将焦令谌取人田	1	jing da jiang jiao ling chen qu ren tian
自占数十顷	1	zi zhan shu shi qing
是岁大旱	1	shi sui da han
农以告谌	1	nong yi gao chen
我知入数而已	1	wo zhi ru shu er yi
不知旱也	1	bu zhi han ye
督责益急	1	du ze yi ji
农且饥死	1	nong qie ji si
即告太尉	1	ji gao tai wei
太尉判状	1	tai wei pan zhuang
使人求谕谌	1	shi ren qiu yu chen
召农者曰	1	zhao nong zhe yue
我畏段某耶	1	wo wei duan mou ye
何敢言我	1	he gan yan wo
取判铺背上	1	qu pan pu bei shang
以大杖击二十	1	yi da zhang ji er shi
舆来庭中	1	yu lai ting zhong
太尉大泣曰	1	tai wei da qi yue
乃我困汝	1	nai wo kun ru
即自取水洗去血	1	ji zi qu shui xi qu xue
裂裳衣疮	1	lie shang yi chuang
手注善药	1	shou zhu shan yao
旦夕自哺农者	1	dan xi zi bu nong zhe
取骑马卖	1	qu qi ma mai
市谷代偿	1	shi gu dai chang
淮西寓军帅尹少荣	1	huai xi yu jun shuai yin shao rong
刚直士也	1	gang zhi shi ye
汝诚人耶	1	ru cheng ren ye
泾州野如赭	1	jing zhou ye ru zhe
人且饥死	1	ren qie ji si
而必得谷	1	er bi de gu
又用大杖击无罪者	1	you yong da zhang ji wu zui zhe
仁信大人也	1	ren xin da ren ye
而汝不知敬	1	er ru bu zhi jing
今段公唯一马	1	jin duan gong wei yi ma
贱卖市谷入汝	1	jian mai shi gu ru ru
汝又取不耻	1	ru you qu bu chi
凡为人傲天灾	1	fan wei ren ao tian zai
击无罪者	1	ji wu zui zhe
又取仁者谷	1	you qu ren zhe gu
使主人出无马	1	shi zhu ren chu wu ma
汝将何以视天地	1	ru jiang he yi shi tian di
尚不愧奴隶耶	1	shang bu kui nu li ye
谌虽暴抗	1	chen sui bao kang
然闻言则大愧流汗	1	ran wen yan ze da kui liu han
吾终不可以见段公	1	wu zhong bu ke yi jian duan gong
及太尉自泾州以司农征	1	ji tai wei zi jing zhou yi si nong zheng
朱幸致货币	1	zhu ci xing zhi huo bi
固致大绫三百匹	1	ci gu zhi da ling san bai pi
太尉婿韦晤坚拒	1	tai wei xu wei wu jian ju
太尉怒曰	1	tai wei nu yue
果不用吾言	1	guo bu yong wu yan
处贱无以拒也	1	chu jian wu yi ju ye
然终不以在吾第	1	ran zhong bu yi zai wu di
以如司农治事堂	1	yi ru si nong zhi shi tang
栖之梁木上	1	qi zhi liang mu shang
吏以告	1	li yi gao ci
其故封识具存	1	qi gu feng shi ju cun
太尉逸事如右	1	tai wei yi shi ru you
元和九年月日	1	yuan he jiu nian yue ri
永州司马员外置同正员柳宗元谨上史馆	1	yong zhou si ma yuan wai zhi tong zheng yuan liu zong yuan jin shang shi guan
今之称太尉大节者	1	jin zhi cheng tai wei da jie zhe
出入以为武人一时奋不虑死	1	chu ru yi wei wu ren yi shi fen bu lv si
以取名天下	1	yi qu ming tian xia
不知太尉之所立如是	1	bu zhi tai wei zhi suo li ru shi
宗元尝出入岐周良	1	zong yuan chang chu ru qi zhou bin li jian
北上马岭	1	bei shang ma ling
历亭障堡戍	1	li ting zhang bao shu
窃好问老校退卒	1	qie hao wen lao xiao tui zu
能言其事	1	neng yan qi shi
太尉为人	1	tai wei wei ren xu xu
常低首拱手行步	1	chang di shou gong shou hang bu
言气卑弱	1	yan qi bei ruo
未尝以色待物	1	wei chang yi se dai wu
必达其志	1	bi da qi zhi
决非偶然者	1	jue fei ou ran zhe
会州刺史崔公来	1	hui zhou ci shi cui gong lai
言信行直	1	yan xin hang zhi
备得太尉遗事	1	bei de tai wei yi shi
复校无疑	1	fu xiao wu yi
或恐尚逸坠	1	huo kong shang yi zhui
未集太史氏	1	wei ji tai shi shi
敢以状私于执事	1	gan yi zhuang si yu zhi shi
游褒禅山记	1	you bao chan shan ji
褒禅山亦谓之华山	1	bao chan shan yi wei zhi hua shan
唐浮图慧褒始舍於其址	1	tang fu tu hui bao shi she yu qi zhi
而卒葬之	1	er zu zang zhi
以故其後名之曰褒禅	1	yi gu qi hou ming zhi yue bao chan
今所谓慧空禅院者	1	jin suo wei hui kong chan yuan zhe
褒之庐冢也	1	bao zhi lu zhong ye
距其院东五里	1	ju qi yuan dong wu li
所谓华阳洞者	1	suo wei hua yang dong zhe
以其乃华山之阳名之也	1	yi qi nai hua shan zhi yang ming zhi ye
距洞百馀步	1	ju dong bai yu bu
有碑仆道	1	you bei pu dao
其文漫灭	1	qi wen man mie
独其为文犹可识曰花山	1	du qi wei wen you ke shi yue hua shan
今言华如华实之华者	1	jin yan hua ru hua shi zhi hua zhe
盖音谬也	1	gai yin miu ye
其下平旷	1	qi xia ping kuang
有泉侧出	1	you quan ce chu
而记游者甚众	1	er ji you zhe shen zhong
所谓前洞也	1	suo wei qian dong ye
由山以上五六里	1	you shan yi shang wu liu li
有穴窈然	1	you xue yao ran
入之甚寒	1	ru zhi shen han
则其虽好游者不能穷也	1	ze qi sui hao you zhe bu neng qiong ye
谓之後洞	1	wei zhi hou dong
余与四人拥火以入	1	yu yu si ren yong huo yi ru
入之愈深	1	ru zhi yu shen
其进愈难	1	qi jin yu nan
而其见愈奇	1	er qi jian yu qi
有怠而欲出者	1	you dai er yu chu zhe
遂与之俱出	1	sui yu zhi ju chu
盖余所至	1	gai yu suo zhi
比好游者尚不能十一	1	bi hao you zhe shang bu neng shi yi
然视其左右	1	ran shi qi zuo you
来而记之者已少	1	lai er ji zhi zhe yi shao
盖其又深	1	gai qi you shen
则其至又加少矣	1	ze qi zhi you jia shao yi
予之力尚足以入	1	yu zhi li shang zu yi ru
火尚足以明也	1	huo shang zu yi ming ye
则或咎其欲出者	1	ze huo jiu qi yu chu zhe
而余亦悔其随之	1	er yu yi hui qi sui zhi
而不得极夫游之乐也	1	er bu de ji fu you zhi le ye
於是余有叹焉	1	yu shi yu you tan yan
古人之观於天地	1	gu ren zhi guan yu tian di
往往有得	1	wang wang you de
以其求思之深	1	yi qi qiu si zhi shen
而无不在也	1	er wu bu zai ye
夫夷以近	1	fu yi yi jin
则游者众	1	ze you zhe zhong
则至者少	1	ze zhi zhe shao
而世之奇伟	1	er shi zhi qi wei
非常之观	1	fei chang zhi guan
常在於险远	1	chang zai yu xian yuan
而人之所罕至焉	1	er ren zhi suo han zhi yan
故非有志者不能至也	1	gu fei you zhi zhe bu neng zhi ye
不随以止也	1	bu sui yi zhi ye
然力不足者亦不能至也	1	ran li bu zu zhe yi bu neng zhi ye
有志与力	1	you zhi yu li
而又不随以怠	1	er you bu sui yi dai
至於幽暗昏惑而无物以相之	1	zhi yu you an hun huo er wu wu yi xiang zhi
亦不能至也	1	yi bu neng zhi ye
然力足以至焉而不至	1	ran li zu yi zhi yan er bu zhi
於人为可讥	1	yu ren wei ke ji
而在己为有悔	1	er zai ji wei you hui
尽吾志也	1	jin wu zhi ye
而不能至者	1	er bu neng zhi zhe
可以无悔矣	1	ke yi wu hui yi
其孰能讥之乎	1	qi shu neng ji zhi hu
此余之所得也	1	ci yu zhi suo de ye
余於仆碑	1	yu yu pu bei
又以悲夫古书之不存	1	you yi bei fu gu shu zhi bu cun
后世之谬其传而莫能名者	1	hou shi zhi miu qi chuan er mo neng ming zhe
何可胜道也哉	1	he ke sheng dao ye zai
此所以学者不可以不深思而慎取之也	1	ci suo yi xue zhe bu ke yi bu shen si er shen qu zhi ye
庐陵萧君圭君玉	1	lu ling xiao jun gui jun yu
长乐王回深父	1	zhang le wang hui shen fu
余弟安国平父	1	yu di an guo ping fu
安上纯父	1	an shang chun fu
至和元年七月某日	1	zhi he yuan nian qi yue mou ri
临川王某记	1	lin chuan wang mou ji
报任安书节选	1	bao ren an shu jie xuan
太史公牛马走司马迁再拜言	1	tai shi gong niu ma zou si ma qian zai bai yan
少卿足下	1	shao qing zu xia
曩者辱赐书	1	nang zhe ru ci shu
教以慎于接物	1	jiao yi shen yu jie wu
推贤进士为务	1	tui xian jin shi wei wu
意气勤勤恳恳	1	yi qi qin qin ken ken
若望仆不相师	1	ruo wang pu bu xiang shi
而用流俗人之言	1	er yong liu su ren zhi yan
仆非敢如是也	1	pu fei gan ru shi ye
请略陈固陋	1	qing lue chen gu lou
阙然久不报	1	que ran jiu bu bao
幸勿为过	1	xing wu wei guo
仆之先人	1	pu zhi xian ren
非有剖符丹书之功	1	fei you pou fu dan shu zhi gong
文史星历	1	wen shi xing li
近乎卜祝之间	1	jin hu bo zhu zhi jian
固主上所戏弄	1	gu zhu shang suo xi nong
倡优畜之	1	chang you chu zhi
流俗之所轻也	1	liu su zhi suo qing ye
假令仆伏法受诛	1	jia ling pu fu fa shou zhu
若九牛亡一毛	1	ruo jiu niu wang yi mao
与蝼蚁何以异	1	yu lou yi he yi yi
而世又不与能死节者比	1	er shi you bu yu neng si jie zhe bi
特以为智穷罪极	1	te yi wei zhi qiong zui ji
不能自免	1	bu neng zi mian
卒就死耳	1	zu jiu si er
素所自树立使然	1	su suo zi shu li shi ran
人固有一死	1	ren gu you yi si
或重于泰山	1	huo zhong yu tai shan
或轻于鸿毛	1	huo qing yu hong mao
用之所趋异也	1	yong zhi suo qu yi ye
太上不辱先	1	tai shang bu ru xian
其次不辱身	1	qi ci bu ru shen
其次不辱理色	1	qi ci bu ru li se
其次不辱辞令	1	qi ci bu ru ci ling
其次诎体受辱	1	qi ci qu ti shou ru
其次易服受辱	1	qi ci yi fu shou ru
其次关木索	1	qi ci guan mu suo
被楚受辱	1	bei chui chu shou ru
其次剔毛发	1	qi ci ti mao fa
婴金铁受辱	1	ying jin tie shou ru
其次毁肌肤	1	qi ci hui ji fu
断肢体受辱	1	duan zhi ti shou ru
最下腐刑极矣	1	zui xia fu xing ji yi
刑不上大夫	1	xing bu shang da fu
此言士节不可不勉励也	1	ci yan shi jie bu ke bu mian li ye
猛虎处深山	1	meng hu chu shen shan
百兽震恐	1	bai shou zhen kong
及在槛之中	1	ji zai jing kan zhi zhong
摇尾而求食	1	yao wei er qiu shi
积威约之渐也	1	ji wei yue zhi jian ye
故士有画地为牢	1	gu shi you hua di wei lao
削木为吏	1	xue mu wei li
定计于鲜也	1	ding ji yu xian ye
今交手足	1	jin jiao shou zu
幽于圜墙之中	1	you yu huan qiang zhi zhong
当此之时	1	dang ci zhi shi
见狱吏则头枪地	1	jian yu li ze tou qiang di
视徒隶则心惕息	1	shi tu li ze xin ti xi
积威约之势也	1	ji wei yue zhi shi ye
及以至是	1	ji yi zhi shi
言不辱者	1	yan bu ru zhe
所谓强颜耳	1	suo wei qiang yan er
曷足贵乎	1	he zu gui hu
拘于h里	1	ju yu you li
具于五刑	1	ju yu wu xing
受械于陈	1	shou xie yu chen
南向称孤	1	nan xiang cheng gu
系狱具罪	1	xi yu ju zui
绛侯诛诸吕	1	jiang hou zhu zhu lv
权倾五伯	1	quan qing wu bo
囚于请室	1	qiu yu qing shi
季布为朱家钳奴	1	ji bu wei zhu jia qian nu
灌夫受辱居室	1	guan fu shou ru ju shi
此人皆身至王侯将相	1	ci ren jie shen zhi wang hou jiang xiang
声闻邻国	1	sheng wen lin guo
及罪至罔加	1	ji zui zhi wang jia
不能引决自裁	1	bu neng yin jue zi cai
在尘埃之中	1	zai chen ai zhi zhong
古今一体	1	gu jin yi ti
安在其不辱也	1	an zai qi bu ru ye
何足怪乎	1	he zu guai hu
且人不能早自裁绳墨之外	1	qie ren bu neng zao zi cai sheng mo zhi wai
已稍陵迟	1	yi shao ling chi
至于鞭之间	1	zhi yu bian chui zhi jian
乃欲引节	1	nai yu yin jie
斯不亦远乎	1	si bu yi yuan hu
古人所以重施刑于大夫者	1	gu ren suo yi zhong shi xing yu da fu zhe
殆为此也	1	dai wei ci ye
夫人情莫不贪生恶死	1	fu ren qing mo bu tan sheng e si
至激于义理者不然	1	zhi ji yu yi li zhe bu ran
乃有所不得已也	1	nai you suo bu de yi ye
今仆不幸	1	jin pu bu xing
早失父母	1	zao shi fu mu
无兄弟之亲	1	wu xiong di zhi qin
独身孤立	1	du shen gu li
少卿视仆于妻子何如哉	1	shao qing shi pu yu qi zi he ru zai
且勇者不必死节	1	qie yong zhe bu bi si jie
怯夫慕义	1	qie fu mu yi
何处不勉焉	1	he chu bu mian yan
仆虽怯懦	1	pu sui qie nuo
亦颇识去就之分矣	1	yi po shi qu jiu zhi fen yi
何至自沉溺累绁之辱哉	1	he zhi zi chen ni lei xie zhi ru zai
且夫臧获婢妾	1	qie fu zang huo bi qie
犹能引决	1	you neng yin jue
况若仆之不得已乎	1	kuang ruo pu zhi bu de yi hu
所以隐忍苟活	1	suo yi yin ren gou huo
幽于粪土之中而不辞者	1	you yu fen tu zhi zhong er bu ci zhe
恨私心有所不尽	1	hen si xin you suo bu jin
鄙陋没世	1	bi lou mei shi
而文采不表于后也	1	er wen cai bu biao yu hou ye
古者富贵而名摩灭	1	gu zhe fu gui er ming mo mie

述诸小妹语曰	1	shu zhu xiao mei yu yue
闻姊家有阁子	1	wen zi jia you ge zi
且何谓阁子也	1	qie he wei ge zi ye
其后六年	1	qi hou liu nian
室坏不修	1	shi huai bu xiu
其后二年	1	qi hou er nian
余久卧病无聊	1	yu jiu wo bing wu liao
乃使人复葺南阁子	1	nai shi ren fu qi nan ge zi
其制稍异于前	1	qi zhi shao yi yu qian
然自后余多在外	1	ran zi hou yu duo zai wai
庭有枇杷树	1	ting you pi pa shu
吾妻死之年所手植也	1	wu qi si zhi nian suo shou zhi ye
今已亭亭如盖矣	1	jin yi ting ting ru gai yi
与妻书清林觉民	1	yu qi shu qing lin jiao min
意映卿卿如晤	1	yi ying qing qing ru wu
吾今以此书与汝永别矣	1	wu jin yi ci shu yu ru yong bie yi
吾作此书时	1	wu zuo ci shu shi
尚是世中一人	1	shang shi shi zhong yi ren
汝看此书时	1	ru kan ci shu shi
吾已成为阴间一鬼	1	wu yi cheng wei yin jian yi gui
吾作此书	1	wu zuo ci shu
泪珠和笔墨齐下	1	lei zhu he bi mo qi xia
不能竟书而欲搁笔	1	bu neng jing shu er yu ge bi
又恐汝不察吾衷	1	you kong ru bu cha wu zhong
谓吾忍舍汝而死	1	wei wu ren she ru er si
谓吾不知汝之不欲吾死也	1	wei wu bu zhi ru zhi bu yu wu si ye
故遂忍悲为汝言之	1	gu sui ren bei wei ru yan zhi
吾至爱汝	1	wu zhi ai ru
即此爱汝一念	1	ji ci ai ru yi nian
使吾勇于就死也	1	shi wu yong yu jiu si ye
吾自遇汝以来	1	wu zi yu ru yi lai
常愿天下有情人都成眷属	1	chang yuan tian xia you qing ren dou cheng juan shu
然遍地腥云	1	ran bian di xing yun
满街狼犬	1	man jie lang quan
称心快意	1	chen xin kuai yi
几家能彀	1	ji jia neng gou
司马春衫	1	si ma chun shan
吾不能学太上之忘情也	1	wu bu neng xue tai shang zhi wang qing ye
仁者老吾老以及人之老	1	ren zhe lao wu lao yi ji ren zhi lao
幼吾幼以及人之幼	1	you wu you yi ji ren zhi you
吾充吾爱汝之心	1	wu chong wu ai ru zhi xin
助天下人爱其所爱	1	zhu tian xia ren ai qi suo ai
所以敢先汝而死	1	suo yi gan xian ru er si
不顾汝也	1	bu gu ru ye
汝体吾此心	1	ru ti wu ci xin
于啼泣之余	1	yu ti qi zhi yu
亦以天下人为念	1	yi yi tian xia ren wei nian
当亦天下人为念	1	dang yi tian xia ren wei nian
当亦乐牺牲吾身与汝身之福利	1	dang yi le xi sheng wu shen yu ru shen zhi fu li
为天下人谋永福也	1	wei tian xia ren mou yong fu ye
汝其勿悲	1	ru qi wu bei
四五年前某夕	1	si wu nian qian mou xi
吾尝语曰	1	wu chang yu yue
与使吾先死也	1	yu shi wu xian si ye
无宁汝先吾而死	1	wu ning ru xian wu er si
汝初闻言而怒	1	ru chu wen yan er nu
后经吾婉解	1	hou jing wu wan jie
虽不谓吾言为是	1	sui bu wei wu yan wei shi
而崖亦无词相答	1	er ya yi wu ci xiang da
吾之意盖谓以汝之弱	1	wu zhi yi gai wei yi ru zhi ruo
必不能禁失吾之悲	1	bi bu neng jin shi wu zhi bei
吾先死留苦与汝	1	wu xian si liu ku yu ru
吾心不忍	1	wu xin bu ren
故宁请汝先死吾担悲也	1	gu ning qing ru xian si wu dan bei ye
谁知吾卒先汝而死乎	1	shui zhi wu zu xian ru er si hu
吾真真不能忘汝也	1	wu zhen zhen bu neng wang ru ye
忆后街之屋	1	hui yi hou jie zhi wu
入门穿廊	1	ru men chuan lang
过前后厅	1	guo qian hou ting
又三四折	1	you san si zhe
厅旁一室	1	ting pang yi shi
为吾与汝双栖之所	1	wei wu yu ru shuang qi zhi suo
初婚三四个月	1	chu hun san si ge yue
适冬之望日前后	1	shi dong zhi wang ri qian hou
窗外疏梅筛月影	1	chuang wai shu mei shai yue ying
依稀掩映	1	yi xi yan ying
吾与汝并肩携手	1	wu yu ru bing jian xie shou
底底切切	1	di di qie qie
何事不语	1	he shi bu yu
何情不诉	1	he qing bu su
及今思之	1	ji jin si zhi
空余泪痕	1	kong yu lei hen
又忆六七年前	1	you hui yi liu qi nian qian
吾之逃家复归也	1	wu zhi tao jia fu gui ye
汝泣告我	1	ru qi gao wo
望今后有远行	1	wang jin hou you yuan xing
必以告妾	1	bi yi gao qie
妾愿随君行	1	qie yuan sui jun hang
吾亦既许汝矣	1	wu yi ji xu ru yi
前十余日回家	1	qian shi yu ri hui jia
即欲乘便以此行之事语汝	1	ji yu cheng bian yi ci xing zhi shi yu ru
及与汝相对	1	ji yu ru xiang dui
又不能启口	1	you bu neng qi kou
且以汝之有身也	1	qie yi ru zhi you shen ye
更恐不胜悲	1	geng kong bu sheng bei
故惟日日呼酒买醉	1	gu wei ri ri hu jiu mai zui
当时余心之悲	1	dang shi yu xin zhi bei
盖不能以寸管形容之	1	gai bu neng yi cun guan xing rong zhi
吾诚愿与汝相守以死	1	wu cheng yuan yu ru xiang shou yi si
第以今日事势观之	1	di yi jin ri shi shi guan zhi
天灾可以死	1	tian zai ke yi si
盗贼可以死	1	dao zei ke yi si
瓜分之日可以死	1	gua fen zhi ri ke yi si
奸官污吏虐民可以死	1	jian guan wu li nue min ke yi si
吾辈处今日之中国	1	wu bei chu jin ri zhi zhong guo
国中无地无时不可以死	1	guo zhong wu di wu shi bu ke yi si
到那时使吾眼睁睁看汝死	1	dao na shi shi wu yan zheng zheng kan ru si
或使汝眼睁睁看我死	1	huo shi ru yan zheng zheng kan wo si
吾能之乎	1	wu neng zhi hu
抑汝能之乎	1	yi ru neng zhi hu
即可不死	1	ji ke bu si
而离散不相见	1	er li san bu xiang jian
徒使两地眼成穿而骨化石	1	tu shi liang di yan cheng chuan er gu hua shi
试问古来几曾见破镜能重圆	1	shi wen gu lai ji ceng jian po jing neng zhong yuan
则较死为苦也	1	ze jiao si wei ku ye
将奈之何	1	jiang nai zhi he
今日吾与汝幸双健	1	jin ri wu yu ru xing shuang jian
天下人人不当死而死与不愿离而离者	1	tian xia ren ren bu dang si er si yu bu yuan li er li zhe
不可数计	1	bu ke shu ji
钟情如吾辈者	1	zhong qing ru wu bei zhe
能忍之乎	1	neng ren zhi hu
此吾所以敢率性就不顾汝也	1	ci wu suo yi gan lv xing jiu bu gu ru ye
吾今死无余撼	1	wu jin si wu yu han
国事成不成	1	guo shi cheng bu cheng
自有同志者在	1	zi you tong zhi zhe zai
依新已五岁	1	yi xin yi wu sui
转眼成人	1	zhuan yan cheng ren
汝其善抚之使之肖我	1	ru qi shan fu zhi shi zhi xiao wo
汝腹中之物	1	ru fu zhong zhi wu
吾疑其女也	1	wu yi qi nv ye
女必像汝	1	nv bi xiang ru
吾心甚慰	1	wu xin shen wei
或又是勇	1	huo you shi yong
则亦教其以父志为志	1	ze yi jiao qi yi fu zhi wei zhi
则我死后尚有二意洞在也	1	ze wo si hou shang you er yi dong zai ye
吾家后日当甚贫	1	wu jia hou ri dang shen pin
贫无所苦	1	pin wu suo ku
清静过日而已	1	qing jing guo ri er yi
吾今与汝无言矣	1	wu jin yu ru wu yan yi
吾居九泉之下遥闻汝哭声	1	wu ju jiu quan zhi xia yao wen ru ku sheng
当哭相和也	1	dang ku xiang he ye
吾平日不信有鬼	1	wu ping ri bu xin you gui
今则又望其真有	1	jin ze you wang qi zhen you
今人又言心电感应有道	1	jin ren you yan xin dian gan ying you dao
吾亦望其言是实	1	wu yi wang qi yan shi shi
则吾之死	1	ze wu zhi si
吾灵尚依依旁汝也	1	wu ling shang yi yi pang ru ye
汝不必以无侣悲	1	ru bu bi yi wu lv bei
吾平生未尝以吾所志语汝	1	wu ping sheng wei chang yi wu suo zhi yu ru
是吾不是处	1	shi wu bu shi chu
又恐汝日日为吾担忧	1	you kong ru ri ri wei wu dan you
吾牺牲百死而不辞	1	wu xi sheng bai si er bu ci
而使汝担忧	1	er shi ru dan you
的的非吾所忍	1	de de fei wu suo ren
吾爱汝至	1	wu ai ru zhi
所以为汝谋者惟恐未尽	1	suo yi wei ru mou zhe wei kong wei jin
汝幸而偶我	1	ru xing er ou wo
又何不幸而生今日之中国	1	you he bu xing er sheng jin ri zhi zhong guo
吾幸而得汝	1	wu xing er de ru
卒不忍独善其身	1	zu bu ren du shan qi shen
巾短情长	1	jin duan qing zhang
所未尽者	1	suo wei jin zhe
尚有万千	1	shang you wan qian
汝可以模拟得之	1	ru ke yi mo ni de zhi
吾今不能见汝矣	1	wu jin bu neng jian ru yi
汝不能舍吾	1	ru bu neng she wu
其时时于梦中得我乎	1	qi shi shi yu meng zhong de wo hu
辛未三月念六夜四鼓	1	xin wei san yue nian liu ye si gu
意洞手书	1	yi dong shou shu
家中诸母皆通文	1	jia zhong zhu mu jie tong wen
有不解处	1	you bu jie chu
望请其指教	1	wang qing qi zhi jiao
当尽吾意为幸	1	dang jin wu yi wei xing
逍遥游先秦庄子	1	xiao yao you xian qin zhuang zi
北冥有鱼	1	bei ming you yu
其名为鲲	1	qi ming wei kun
不知其几千里也	1	bu zhi qi ji qian li ye
化而为鸟	1	hua er wei niao
其名为鹏	1	qi ming wei peng
其翼若垂天之云	1	qi yi ruo chui tian zhi yun
海运则将徙于南冥	1	hai yun ze jiang xi yu nan ming
志怪者也	1	zhi guai zhe ye
谐之言曰	1	xie zhi yan yue
鹏之徙于南冥也	1	peng zhi xi yu nan ming ye
水击三千里	1	shui ji san qian li
抟扶摇而上者九万里	1	tuan fu yao er shang zhe jiu wan li
去以六月息者也	1	qu yi liu yue xi zhe ye
生物之以息相吹也	1	sheng wu zhi yi xi xiang chui ye
天之苍苍	1	tian zhi cang cang
其正色邪	1	qi zheng se xie
其远而无所至极邪	1	qi yuan er wu suo zhi ji xie
其视下也	1	qi shi xia ye
亦若是则已矣	1	yi ruo shi ze yi yi
且夫水之积也不厚	1	qie fu shui zhi ji ye bu hou
则其负大舟也无力	1	ze qi fu da zhou ye wu li
覆杯水于坳堂之上	1	fu bei shui yu ao tang zhi shang
则芥为之舟	1	ze jie wei zhi zhou
置杯焉则胶	1	zhi bei yan ze jiao
水浅而舟大也	1	shui qian er zhou da ye
风之积也不厚	1	feng zhi ji ye bu hou
则其负大翼也无力	1	ze qi fu da yi ye wu li
故九万里	1	gu jiu wan li
则风斯在下矣	1	ze feng si zai xia yi
而后乃今培风	1	er hou nai jin pei feng
背负青天而莫之夭阏者	1	bei fu qing tian er mo zhi yao e zhe
而后乃今将图南	1	er hou nai jin jiang tu nan
蜩与学鸠笑之曰	1	tiao yu xue jiu xiao zhi yue
我决起而飞	1	wo jue qi er fei
枪榆枋而止	1	qiang yu fang er zhi
时则不至	1	shi ze bu zhi
而控于地而已矣	1	er kong yu di er yi yi
奚以之九万里而南为	1	xi yi zhi jiu wan li er nan wei
适莽苍者	1	shi mang cang zhe
三餐而反	1	san can er fan
腹犹果然	1	fu you guo ran
适百里者	1	shi bai li zhe
适千里者	1	shi qian li zhe
三月聚粮	1	san yue ju liang
之二虫又何知	1	zhi er chong you he zhi
小知不及大知	1	xiao zhi bu ji da zhi
小年不及大年	1	xiao nian bu ji da nian
奚以知其然也	1	xi yi zhi qi ran ye
朝菌不知晦朔	1	chao jun bu zhi hui shuo
蟪蛄不知春秋	1	hui gu bu zhi chun qiu
此小年也	1	ci xiao nian ye
楚之南有冥灵者	1	chu zhi nan you ming ling zhe
以五百岁为春	1	yi wu bai sui wei chun
五百岁为秋	1	wu bai sui wei qiu
上古有大椿者	1	shang gu you da chun zhe
以八千岁为春	1	yi ba qian sui wei chun
八千岁为秋	1	ba qian sui wei qiu
此大年也	1	ci da nian ye
而彭祖乃今以久特闻	1	er peng zu nai jin yi jiu te wen
众人匹之	1	zhong ren pi zhi
不亦悲乎	1	bu yi bei hu
汤之问棘也是已	1	tang zhi wen ji ye shi yi
汤问棘曰	1	tang wen ji yue
上下四方有极乎	1	shang xia si fang you ji hu
无极之外	1	wu ji zhi wai
复无极也	1	fu wu ji ye
穷发之北	1	qiong fa zhi bei
有冥海者	1	you ming hai zhe
其广数千里	1	qi guang shu qian li
未有知其修者	1	wei you zhi qi xiu zhe
背若泰山	1	bei ruo tai shan
翼若垂天之云	1	yi ruo chui tian zhi yun
抟扶摇羊角而上者九万里	1	tuan fu yao yang jiao er shang zhe jiu wan li
然后图南	1	ran hou tu nan
且适南冥也	1	qie shi nan ming ye
斥笑之曰	1	chi yan xiao zhi yue
彼且奚适也	1	bi qie xi shi ye
我腾跃而上	1	wo teng yue er shang
不过数仞而下	1	bu guo shu ren er xia
翱翔蓬蒿之间	1	ao xiang peng hao zhi jian
此亦飞之至也	1	ci yi fei zhi zhi ye
而彼且奚适也	1	er bi qie xi shi ye
此小大之辩也	1	ci xiao da zhi bian ye
故夫知效一官	1	gu fu zhi xiao yi guan
行比一乡	1	hang bi yi xiang
德合一君	1	de he yi jun
而徵一国者	1	er zheng yi guo zhe
其自视也	1	qi zi shi ye
亦若此矣	1	yi ruo ci yi
而宋荣子犹然笑之	1	er song rong zi you ran xiao zhi
且举世而誉之而不加劝	1	qie ju shi er yu zhi er bu jia quan
举世而非之而不加沮	1	ju shi er fei zhi er bu jia ju
定乎内外之分	1	ding hu nei wai zhi fen
辩乎荣辱之境	1	bian hu rong ru zhi jing
彼其于世	1	bi qi yu shi
未数数然也	1	wei shu shu ran ye
犹有未树也	1	you you wei shu ye
夫列子御风而行	1	fu lie zi yu feng er xing
泠然善也	1	ling ran shan ye
旬有五日而后反	1	xun you wu ri er hou fan
彼于致福者	1	bi yu zhi fu zhe
此虽免乎行	1	ci sui mian hu hang
犹有所待者也	1	you you suo dai zhe ye
若夫乘天地之正	1	ruo fu cheng tian di zhi zheng
而御六气之辩	1	er yu liu qi zhi bian
以游无穷者	1	yi you wu qiong zhe
彼且恶乎待哉	1	bi qie e hu dai zai
至人无己	1	zhi ren wu ji
神人无功	1	shen ren wu gong
圣人无名	1	sheng ren wu ming
尧让天下于许由	1	yao rang tian xia yu xu you
日月出矣	1	ri yue chu yi
而爝火不息	1	er jue huo bu xi
其于光也	1	qi yu guang ye
不亦难乎	1	bu yi nan hu
时雨降矣	1	shi yu jiang yi
而犹浸灌	1	er you jin guan
其于泽也	1	qi yu ze ye
不亦劳乎	1	bu yi lao hu
夫子立而天下治	1	fu zi li er tian xia zhi
而我犹尸之	1	er wo you shi zhi
吾自视缺然	1	wu zi shi que ran
请致天下	1	qing zhi tian xia
子治天下	1	zi zhi tian xia
天下既已治也	1	tian xia ji yi zhi ye
而我犹代子	1	er wo you dai zi
吾将为名乎	1	wu jiang wei ming hu
实之宾也	1	shi zhi bin ye
吾将为宾乎	1	wu jiang wei bin hu
鹪鹩巢于深林	1	jiao liao chao yu shen lin
不过一枝	1	bu guo yi zhi
偃鼠饮河	1	yan shu yin he
不过满腹	1	bu guo man fu
归休乎君	1	gui xiu hu jun
予无所用天下为	1	yu wu suo yong tian xia wei
庖人虽不治庖	1	pao ren sui bu zhi pao
尸祝不越樽俎而代之矣	1	shi zhu bu yue zun zu er dai zhi yi
肩吾问于连叔曰	1	jian wu wen yu lian shu yue
吾闻言于接舆	1	wu wen yan yu jie yu
大而无当	1	da er wu dang
往而不返	1	wang er bu fan
吾惊怖其言	1	wu jing bu qi yan
犹河汉而无极也	1	you he han er wu ji ye
大有径庭	1	da you jing ting
不近人情焉	1	bu jin ren qing yan
其言谓何哉	1	qi yan wei he zai
藐姑射之山	1	miao gu she zhi shan
有神人居焉	1	you shen ren ju yan
肌肤若冰雪	1	ji fu ruo bing xue
淖约若处子	1	nao yue ruo chu zi
不食五谷	1	bu shi wu gu
吸风饮露	1	xi feng yin lu
而游乎四海之外	1	er you hu si hai zhi wai
使物不疵疠	1	shi wu bu ci li
而年谷熟	1	er nian gu shu
吾以是狂而不信也	1	wu yi shi kuang er bu xin ye
瞽者无以与乎文章之观	1	gu zhe wu yi yu hu wen zhang zhi guan
聋者无以与乎钟鼓之声	1	long zhe wu yi yu hu zhong gu zhi sheng
岂唯形骸有聋盲哉	1	qi wei xing hai you long mang zai
夫知亦有之	1	fu zhi yi you zhi
是其言也	1	shi qi yan ye
犹时女也	1	you shi nv ye
将旁礴万物以为一	1	jiang pang bo wan wu yi wei yi
世蕲乎乱	1	shi qi hu luan
孰弊弊焉以天下为事	1	shu bi bi yan yi tian xia wei shi
物莫之伤	1	wu mo zhi shang
大浸稽天而不溺	1	da jin ji tian er bu ni
大旱金石流	1	da han jin shi liu
土山焦而不热	1	tu shan jiao er bu re

非至强之人	1	fei zhi qiang zhi ren

则小逆之后必有小顺	1	ze xiao ni zhi hou bi you xiao shun
大逆之后必有大顺	1	da ni zhi hou bi you da shun
盘根错节之既破	1	pan gen cuo jie zhi ji po
而遂有应刃而解之一日	1	er sui you ying ren er jie zhi yi ri
旁观者徒艳羡其功之成	1	pang guan zhe tu yan xian qi gong zhi cheng
以为是殆幸运儿	1	yi wei shi dai xing yun er
而天有以宠彼也	1	er tian you yi chong bi ye
又以为我蹇于遭逢	1	you yi wei wo jian yu zao feng
故所就不彼若也	1	gu suo jiu bu bi ruo ye
庸讵知所谓蹇焉幸焉者	1	yong ju zhi suo wei jian yan xing yan zhe
彼皆与我之所同	1	bi jie yu wo zhi suo tong
而其能征服此蹇焉	1	er qi neng zheng fu ci jian yan
利用此幸焉与否	1	li yong ci xing yan yu fou
即彼成我败所由判也	1	ji bi cheng wo bai suo you pan ye
更譬诸操舟	1	geng pi zhu cao zhou

常相参伍	1	chang xiang can wu

我则或一日而返焉	1	wo ze huo yi ri er fan yan

盖阙如也	1	gai que ru ye
名不正则言不顺	1	ming bu zheng ze yan bu shun
言不顺则事不成	1	yan bu shun ze shi bu cheng
事不成则礼乐不兴	1	shi bu cheng ze li le bu xing
礼乐不兴则刑罚不中	1	li le bu xing ze xing fa bu zhong
刑罚不中则民无所措手足	1	xing fa bu zhong ze min wu suo cuo shou zu
故君子名之必可言也	1	gu jun zi ming zhi bi ke yan ye
言之必可行也	1	yan zhi bi ke xing ye
君子于其言	1	jun zi yu qi yan
无所苟而已矣	1	wu suo gou er yi yi
樊迟请学稼	1	fan chi qing xue jia
吾不如老农	1	wu bu ru lao nong
请学为圃	1	qing xue wei pu
吾不如老圃	1	wu bu ru lao pu
则民莫敢不敬	1	ze min mo gan bu jing
则民莫敢不服	1	ze min mo gan bu fu

授之以政	1	shou zhi yi zheng
使于四方	1	shi yu si fang
不能专对	1	bu neng zhuan dui
亦奚以为	1	yi xi yi wei
不令而行	1	bu ling er xing
其身不正	1	qi shen bu zheng

如有王者	1	ru you wang zhe
必世而后仁	1	bi shi er hou ren

如正人何	1	ru zheng ren he
冉子退朝	1	ran zi tui chao
其事也如有政	1	qi shi ye ru you zheng
虽不吾以	1	sui bu wu yi
吾其与闻之	1	wu qi yu wen zhi

言不可以若是其几也	1	yan bu ke yi ruo shi qi ji ye
人之言曰	1	ren zhi yan yue
为臣不易	1	wei chen bu yi
如知为君之难也	1	ru zhi wei jun zhi nan ye
不几乎一言而兴邦乎	1	bu ji hu yi yan er xing bang hu
一言而丧邦	1	yi yan er sang bang
予无乐乎为君	1	yu wu le hu wei jun
唯其言而莫予违也	1	wei qi yan er mo yu wei ye
如其善而莫之违也	1	ru qi shan er mo zhi wei ye
不亦善乎	1	bu yi shan hu

不几乎一言而丧邦乎	1	bu ji hu yi yan er sang bang hu

而子证之	1	er zi zheng zhi

孰为此者	1	shu wei ci zhe
天地尚不能久	1	tian di shang bu neng jiu
而况于人乎	1	er kuang yu ren hu
故从事于道者	1	gu cong shi yu dao zhe
同于道者	1	tong yu dao zhe
道亦乐得之	1	dao yi le de zhi
同于德者	1	tong yu de zhe
德亦乐得之	1	de yi le de zhi
同于失者	1	tong yu shi zhe
第二十四章	1	di er shi si zhang
企者不立	1	qi zhe bu li
跨者不行	1	kua zhe bu xing
自见者不明	1	zi jian zhe bu ming
自是者不彰	1	zi shi zhe bu zhang
自伐者无功	1	zi fa zhe wu gong
自矜者不长	1	zi jin zhe bu zhang
其在道也	1	qi zai dao ye
馀食赘形	1	yu shi zhui xing
物或恶之	1	wu huo e zhi
故有道者不处	1	gu you dao zhe bu chu
第二十五章	1	di er shi wu zhang
有物混成	1	you wu hun cheng
先天地生	1	xian tian di sheng
寂兮寥兮	1	ji xi liao xi
独立而不改	1	du li er bu gai
周行而不殆	1	zhou hang er bu dai
吾不知其名	1	wu bu zhi qi ming
强字之曰道	1	qiang zi zhi yue dao
强为之名曰大	1	qiang wei zhi ming yue da
域中有四大	1	yu zhong you si da
而人居其一焉	1	er ren ju qi yi yan
道法自然	1	dao fa zi ran
第二十六章	1	di er shi liu zhang
重为轻根	1	zhong wei qing gen
静为躁君	1	jing wei zao jun

第二十七章	1	di er shi qi zhang

善数不用筹策	1	shan shu bu yong chou ce

善结无绳约而不可解	1	shan jie wu sheng yue er bu ke jie
是以圣人常善救人	1	shi yi sheng ren chang shan jiu ren
故无弃人	1	gu wu qi ren

故无弃物	1	gu wu qi wu
是谓袭明	1	shi wei xi ming
故善人者	1	gu shan ren zhe

不贵其师	1	bu gui qi shi
虽智大迷	1	sui zhi da mi
是谓要妙	1	shi wei yao miao
第二十八章	1	di er shi ba zhang
为天下溪	1	wei tian xia xi
常德不离	1	chang de bu li

常德乃足	1	chang de nai zu
复归于朴	1	fu gui yu pu

常德不忒	1	chang de bu te

圣人用之	1	sheng ren yong zhi
则为官长	1	ze wei guan zhang
故大智不割	1	gu da zhi bu ge

不可为也	1	bu ke wei ye

第三十章	1	di san shi zhang

第三十一章	1	di san shi yi zhang

第三十四章	1	di san shi si zhang
大道泛兮	1	da dao fan xi
其可左右	1	qi ke zuo you
万物恃之以生而不辞	1	wan wu shi zhi yi sheng er bu ci

下德无为而有以为	1	xia de wu wei er you yi wei

入以事其父兄	1	ru yi shi qi fu xiong
出以事其长上	1	chu yi shi qi zhang shang
可使制梃以挞秦楚之坚甲利兵矣	1	ke shi zhi ting yi ta qin chu zhi jian jia li bing yi
彼夺其民时	1	bi duo qi min shi
使不得耕耨以养其父母	1	shi bu de geng nou yi yang qi fu mu
父母冻饿	1	fu mu dong e
兄弟妻子离散	1	xiong di qi zi li san
彼陷溺其民	1	bi xian ni qi min
王往而征之	1	wang wang er zheng zhi
夫谁与王敌	1	fu shui yu wang di
仁者无敌	1	ren zhe wu di
王请勿疑	1	wang qing wu yi
孟子见梁襄王	1	meng zi jian liang xiang wang
出语人曰	1	chu yu ren yue
望之不似人君	1	wang zhi bu shi ren jun
就之而不见所畏焉	1	jiu zhi er bu jian suo wei yan
卒然问曰	1	zu ran wen yue
天下恶乎定	1	tian xia e hu ding
孰能一之	1	shu neng yi zhi
不嗜杀人者能一之	1	bu shi sha ren zhe neng yi zhi
孰能与之	1	shu neng yu zhi
天下莫不与也	1	tian xia mo bu yu ye
王知夫苗乎	1	wang zhi fu miao hu
七八月之间旱	1	qi ba yue zhi jian han
则苗槁矣	1	ze miao gao yi
天油然作云	1	tian you ran zuo yun
沛然下雨	1	pei ran xia yu
则苗然兴之矣	1	ze miao ran xing zhi yi
孰能御之	1	shu neng yu zhi
今夫天下之人牧	1	jin fu tian xia zhi ren mu
未有不嗜杀人者也	1	wei you bu shi sha ren zhe ye
如有不嗜杀人者	1	ru you bu shi sha ren zhe
则天下之民皆引领而望之矣	1	ze tian xia zhi min jie yin ling er wang zhi yi
试如是也	1	shi ru shi ye
由水之就下	1	you shui zhi jiu xia
沛然谁能御之	1	pei ran shui neng yu zhi
齐宣王问曰	1	qi xuan wang wen yue
齐桓普文之事	1	qi huan pu wen zhi shi
可得闻乎	1	ke dei wen hu
仲尼之徒	1	zhong ni zhi tu
无道桓文之事者	1	wu dao huan wen zhi shi zhe
是以後世无传焉	1	shi yi hou shi wu chuan yan
臣未之闻也	1	chen wei zhi wen ye
德何如则可以王矣	1	de he ru ze ke yi wang yi
而王莫之能御也	1	er wang mo zhi neng yu ye
若寡人者	1	ruo gua ren zhe
可以保民乎哉	1	ke yi bao min hu zai
何由知吾可也	1	he you zhi wu ke ye
臣闻之胡	1	chen wen zhi hu
王坐於堂上	1	wang zuo yu tang shang
有牵牛而过堂下者	1	you qian niu er guo tang xia zhe
吾不忍其觳觫	1	wu bu ren qi hu su
若无罪而就死地	1	ruo wu zui er jiu si di
然则废钟与	1	ran ze fei zhong yu
何可废也	1	he ke fei ye
以羊易之	1	yi yang yi zhi
不识有诸	1	bu shi you zhu
是心足以王矣	1	shi xin zu yi wang yi
百姓皆以王为爱也	1	bai xing jie yi wang wei ai ye
臣固知王之不忍也	1	chen gu zhi wang zhi bu ren ye
诚有百姓者	1	cheng you bai xing zhe
齐国虽褊小	1	qi guo sui bian xiao
吾何爱一牛	1	wu he ai yi niu
即不忍其觳觫	1	ji bu ren qi hu su
故以羊易之也	1	gu yi yang yi zhi ye
王无异於百姓之以王为爱也	1	wang wu yi yu bai xing zhi yi wang wei ai ye
以小易大	1	yi xiao yi da
彼恶知之	1	bi e zhi zhi
王若隐其无罪而就死地	1	wang ruo yin qi wu zui er jiu si di
则牛羊何择焉	1	ze niu yang he ze yan
是诚何心哉	1	shi cheng he xin zai
我非爱其财而易之以羊也	1	wo fei ai qi cai er yi zhi yi yang ye
宜乎百姓之谓我爱也	1	yi hu bai xing zhi wei wo ai ye
是乃仁术也	1	shi nai ren shu ye
见牛未见羊也	1	jian niu wei jian yang ye
君子之於禽兽也	1	jun zi zhi yu qin shou ye
不忍见其死	1	bu ren jian qi si
不忍食其肉	1	bu ren shi qi rou
是以君子远庖厨也	1	shi yi jun zi yuan pao chu ye
他人有心	1	ta ren you xin
子忖度之	1	zi cun duo zhi
夫子之谓也	1	fu zi zhi wei ye
夫我乃行之	1	fu wo nai hang zhi
反而求之	1	fan er qiu zhi
不得吾心	1	bu de wu xin
夫子言之	1	fu zi yan zhi
於我心有戚戚焉	1	yu wo xin you qi qi yan
此心之所以合宜王者	1	ci xin zhi suo yi he yi wang zhe
有复於王者曰	1	you fu yu wang zhe yue
吾力足以举百钧	1	wu li zu yi ju bai jun
而不足以举一羽	1	er bu zu yi ju yi yu
明足以察秋毫之末	1	ming zu yi cha qiu hao zhi mo
而不见舆薪	1	er bu jian yu xin
则王许之乎	1	ze wang xu zhi hu
今因足以及禽兽	1	jin yin zu yi ji qin shou
而功不至於百姓者	1	er gong bu zhi yu bai xing zhe
然则一羽之不举	1	ran ze yi yu zhi bu ju
为不用力焉	1	wei bu yong li yan
舆薪之不见	1	yu xin zhi bu jian
为不用明焉	1	wei bu yong ming yan
百姓之不见保	1	bai xing zhi bu jian bao
为不用恩焉	1	wei bu yong en yan
故王之不王	1	gu wang zhi bu wang
非不能也	1	fei bu neng ye
不为者与不能者之形何以异	1	bu wei zhe yu bu neng zhe zhi xing he yi yi
挟太山以超北海	1	jia tai shan yi chao bei hai
是诚不能也	1	shi cheng bu neng ye
为长者折枝语人曰	1	wei zhang zhe zhe zhi yu ren yue
是不为也	1	shi bu wei ye
非挟太山以超北海之类也	1	fei jia tai shan yi chao bei hai zhi lei ye
王之不王	1	wang zhi bu wang
是折枝之类也	1	shi zhe zhi zhi lei ye
以及人之老	1	yi ji ren zhi lao
以及人之幼	1	yi ji ren zhi you
天下可运於掌	1	tian xia ke yun yu zhang
刑於寡妻	1	xing yu gua qi
至于兄弟	1	zhi yu xiong di
以御於家邦	1	yi yu yu jia bang
言举斯心加诸彼而已	1	yan ju si xin jia zhu bi er yi
故推恩足以保四海	1	gu tui en zu yi bao si hai
不推恩无以保妻子	1	bu tui en wu yi bao qi zi
古之人所以大过人者无他焉	1	gu zhi ren suo yi da guo ren zhe wu ta yan
善推其所为而已矣	1	shan tui qi suo wei er yi yi
今恩足以及禽兽	1	jin en zu yi ji qin shou
然後知轻重	1	ran hou zhi qing zhong
然後知长短	1	ran hou zhi chang duan
王请度之	1	wang qing du zhi
抑王兴甲兵	1	yi wang xing jia bing
构怨於诸侯	1	gou yuan yu zhu hou
然後快於心与	1	ran hou kuai yu xin yu
吾何快於是	1	wu he kuai yu shi
将以求吾所大欲也	1	jiang yi qiu wu suo da yu ye
王之所大欲	1	wang zhi suo da yu
可得闻与	1	ke dei wen yu
王笑而不言	1	wang xiao er bu yan
为肥甘不足以口与	1	wei fei gan bu zu yi kou yu
轻不足於礼与	1	qing bu zu yu li yu
抑为采色不足视於目与	1	yi wei cai se bu zu shi yu mu yu
声音不足听於耳与	1	sheng yin bu zu ting yu er yu
便嬖不足使令於前与	1	bian bi bu zu shi ling yu qian yu
王之诸臣	1	wang zhi zhu chen
皆足以供之	1	jie zu yi gong zhi
而王岂为是哉	1	er wang qi wei shi zai
吾不为是也	1	wu bu wei shi ye
然则王之所大欲	1	ran ze wang zhi suo da yu
欲辟土地	1	yu pi tu di
而抚四夷也	1	er fu si yi ye
以若所为	1	yi ruo suo wei
求若所欲	1	qiu ruo suo yu
犹缘木而求鱼也	1	you yuan mu er qiu yu ye
若是其甚与	1	ruo shi qi shen yu
殆有甚焉	1	dai you shen yan
缘木求鱼	1	yuan mu qiu yu
虽不得鱼	1	sui bu de yu
尽心力而为之	1	jin xin li er wei zhi
後必有灾	1	hou bi you zai
邹人与楚人战	1	zou ren yu chu ren zhan
则王以为孰胜	1	ze wang yi wei shu sheng
然则小固不可以敌大	1	ran ze xiao gu bu ke yi di da
寡固不可以敌众	1	gua gu bu ke yi di zhong
弱固不可以敌	1	ruo gu bu ke yi di
海内之地	1	hai nei zhi di
方千里者九	1	fang qian li zhe jiu
齐集有其一	1	qi ji you qi yi
以一服八	1	yi yi fu ba
何以异於邹敌楚哉	1	he yi yi yu zou di chu zai
盖亦反其本矣	1	gai yi fan qi ben yi
今王发政施仁	1	jin wang fa zheng shi ren
使天下仕者皆欲立於王之朝	1	shi tian xia shi zhe jie yu li yu wang zhi chao
耕者皆欲耕於王之野	1	geng zhe jie yu geng yu wang zhi ye
商贾皆欲藏於王之市	1	shang jia jie yu cang yu wang zhi shi
行旅皆欲出於王之涂	1	xing lv jie yu chu yu wang zhi tu
天下之欲疾其君者	1	tian xia zhi yu ji qi jun zhe
皆欲赴於王	1	jie yu fu yu wang
不能进於是矣	1	bu neng jin yu shi yi
愿夫子辅吾志	1	yuan fu zi fu wu zhi
明以教我	1	ming yi jiao wo
我虽不敏	1	wo sui bu min
请尝试之	1	qing chang shi zhi
无恒产而有恒心者	1	wu heng chan er you heng xin zhe
惟士为能	1	wei shi wei neng
则无恒产	1	ze wu heng chan
因无恒心	1	yin wu heng xin
苟无恒心	1	gou wu heng xin
放辟邪侈	1	fang pi xie chi
无不为已	1	wu bu wei yi
及陷於罪	1	ji xian yu zui
然後从而刑之	1	ran hou cong er xing zhi
是罔民也	1	shi wang min ye
焉有仁人在位	1	yan you ren ren zai wei
罔民而可为也	1	wang min er ke wei ye
明君制民之产	1	ming jun zhi min zhi chan
必使仰足以事父母	1	bi shi yang zu yi shi fu mu
俯足以畜妻子	1	fu zu yi chu qi zi
乐岁终身饱	1	le sui zhong shen bao
凶年免於死亡	1	xiong nian mian yu si wang
然後驱而之善	1	ran hou qu er zhi shan
故民之从之也轻	1	gu min zhi cong zhi ye qing
今也制民之产	1	jin ye zhi min zhi chan
仰不足以事父母	1	yang bu zu yi shi fu mu
俯不足以畜妻子	1	fu bu zu yi chu qi zi
乐岁终身苦	1	le sui zhong shen ku
凶年不免於死亡	1	xiong nian bu mian yu si wang
此惟救死而恐不赡	1	ci wei jiu si er kong bu shan
奚暇治礼义哉	1	xi xia zhi li yi zai
王欲行之	1	wang yu xing zhi
则盍反其本矣	1	ze he fan qi ben yi
八口之家可以无饥矣	1	ba kou zhi jia ke yi wu ji yi
老者衣帛食肉	1	lao zhe yi bo shi rou
梁惠王章句下	1	liang hui wang zhang ju xia
庄暴见孟子曰	1	zhuang bao jian meng zi yue
暴见於王	1	bao jian yu wang
王语暴以好乐	1	wang yu bao yi hao le
暴未有以对也	1	bao wei you yi dui ye
好乐何如	1	hao le he ru
王之好乐甚	1	wang zhi hao le shen
则齐国其庶几乎	1	ze qi guo qi shu ji hu
见於王曰	1	jian yu wang yue
王尝语庄子以好乐	1	wang chang yu zhuang zi yi hao le
王变乎色	1	wang bian hu se
寡人非能好先王之乐也	1	gua ren fei neng hao xian wang zhi le ye
直好世俗之乐耳	1	zhi hao shi su zhi le er
则齐其庶几乎	1	ze qi qi shu ji hu
由古之乐也	1	you gu zhi le ye
与人乐乐	1	yu ren le le
不若与人	1	bu ruo yu ren
与少乐乐	1	yu shao le le
与众乐乐	1	yu zhong le le
不若与众	1	bu ruo yu zhong
臣请为王言乐	1	chen qing wei wang yan le
今王鼓乐於此	1	jin wang gu le yu ci
百姓闻王钟鼓之声	1	bai xing wen wang zhong gu zhi sheng
举疾首蹙而相告曰	1	ju ji shou cu er xiang gao yue
吾王之好鼓乐	1	wu wang zhi hao gu le
夫何使我至於此极也	1	fu he shi wo zhi yu ci ji ye
父子不相见	1	fu zi bu xiang jian
今王田猎於此	1	jin wang tian lie yu ci
百姓闻王车马之音	1	bai xing wen wang che ma zhi yin
见弱旄之美	1	jian ruo mao zhi mei
吾王之好田猎	1	wu wang zhi hao tian lie
不与民同乐也	1	bu yu min tong le ye
举欣欣然有喜色而相告曰	1	ju xin xin ran you xi se er xiang gao yue
吾王庶几无疾病与	1	wu wang shu ji wu ji bing yu
何以能鼓乐也	1	he yi neng gu le ye
何以能田猎也	1	he yi neng tian lie ye
与民同乐也	1	yu min tong le ye
今王与百姓同乐	1	jin wang yu bai xing tong le
文王之囿	1	wen wang zhi you
方七十里	1	fang qi shi li
於传有之	1	yu chuan you zhi
若是其大乎	1	ruo shi qi da hu
民犹以为小也	1	min you yi wei xiao ye
寡人之囿	1	gua ren zhi you
方四十里	1	fang si shi li
民犹以为大	1	min you yi wei da
刍荛者往焉	1	chu rao zhe wang yan
雉兔者往焉	1	zhi tu zhe wang yan
与民同之	1	yu min tong zhi
民以为小	1	min yi wei xiao
臣始至於境	1	chen shi zhi yu jing
问国之大禁	1	wen guo zhi da jin
然後敢入	1	ran hou gan ru
臣闻郊关之内	1	chen wen jiao guan zhi nei
有囿方四十里	1	you you fang si shi li
杀其麋鹿者	1	sha qi mi lu zhe
如杀人之罪	1	ru sha ren zhi zui
则是方四十里	1	ze shi fang si shi li
为阱於国中	1	wei jing yu guo zhong
民以为大	1	min yi wei da
惟仁者能以大事小	1	wei ren zhe neng yi da shi xiao
文王事昆夷	1	wen wang shi kun yi
惟智者为能以小事大	1	wei zhi zhe wei neng yi xiao shi da
故大王事獯鬻	1	gu da wang shi xun yu
句践事吴	1	ju jian shi wu
以大事小者	1	yi da shi xiao zhe
乐天者也	1	le tian zhe ye
以小事大者	1	yi xiao shi da zhe
畏天者也	1	wei tian zhe ye
乐天者保天下	1	le tian zhe bao tian xia
畏天者保其国	1	wei tian zhe bao qi guo
畏天之威	1	wei tian zhi wei
於时保之	1	yu shi bao zhi
大哉言矣	1	da zai yan yi
寡人有疾	1	gua ren you ji
寡人好勇	1	gua ren hao yong
王请无好小勇	1	wang qing wu hao xiao yong
夫抚剑疾视曰	1	fu fu jian ji shi yue
彼恶敢当我哉	1	bi e gan dang wo zai
此匹夫之勇	1	ci pi fu zhi yong
敌一人者也	1	di yi ren zhe ye
王请大之	1	wang qing da zhi
王赫斯怒	1	wang he si nu
爰整其旅	1	yuan zheng qi lv
以遏徂莒	1	yi e cu ju
以笃周祜	1	yi du zhou hu
以对於天下	1	yi dui yu tian xia
此文王之勇也	1	ci wen wang zhi yong ye
文王一怒而安天下之民	1	wen wang yi nu er an tian xia zhi min
天降下民	1	tian jiang xia min
其助上帝	1	qi zhu shang di
宠之四方	1	chong zhi si fang
有罪无罪	1	you zui wu zui
天下曷敢有越厥志	1	tian xia he gan you yue jue zhi
一人横行於天下	1	yi ren heng xing yu tian xia
武王耻之	1	wu wang chi zhi
此武王之勇也	1	ci wu wang zhi yong ye
而武王亦一怒而安天下之民	1	er wu wang yi yi nu er an tian xia zhi min
今王亦一怒而安天下之民	1	jin wang yi yi nu er an tian xia zhi min
民惟恐王之不好勇也	1	min wei kong wang zhi bu hao yong ye
齐宣王见孟子於雪宫	1	qi xuan wang jian meng zi yu xue gong
贤者亦有此乐乎	1	xian zhe yi you ci le hu
则非其上矣	1	ze fei qi shang yi
不得而非上者	1	bu de er fei shang zhe
为民上而不与民同乐者	1	wei min shang er bu yu min tong le zhe
乐民之乐者	1	le min zhi le zhe
民亦乐其乐	1	min yi le qi le
忧民之忧者	1	you min zhi you zhe
民亦忧其忧	1	min yi you qi you
乐以天下	1	le yi tian xia
忧以天下	1	you yi tian xia
昔者齐景公问於晏子曰	1	xi zhe qi jing gong wen yu yan zi yue
吾欲观於转附朝	1	wu yu guan yu zhuan fu chao
遵海而南	1	zun hai er nan
放於琅邪	1	fang yu lang xie
吾何修而可以比於先王观也	1	wu he xiu er ke yi bi yu xian wang guan ye
善哉问也	1	shan zai wen ye
天子适诸侯曰巡狩	1	tian zi shi zhu hou yue xun shou
巡所守也	1	xun suo shou ye
诸侯朝於天子曰述职	1	zhu hou chao yu tian zi yue shu zhi
述所职也	1	shu suo zhi ye
无非事者	1	wu fei shi zhe
春省耕而补不足	1	chun sheng geng er bu bu zu
秋省而助不给	1	qiu sheng er zhu bu gei
吾王不游	1	wu wang bu you
吾何以休	1	wu he yi xiu
吾王不豫	1	wu wang bu yu
吾何以助	1	wu he yi zhu
一游一豫	1	yi you yi yu
为诸侯度	1	wei zhu hou du
今也不然	1	jin ye bu ran
师行而粮食	1	shi hang er liang shi
饥者弗食	1	ji zhe fu shi
劳者弗息	1	lao zhe fu xi
民乃作慝	1	min nai zuo te
方命虐民	1	fang ming nue min
饮食若流	1	yin shi ruo liu
流连荒亡	1	liu lian huang wang
为诸侯忧	1	wei zhu hou you
从流下而忘反谓之流	1	cong liu xia er wang fan wei zhi liu
从流上而忘反	1	cong liu shang er wang fan
从兽无厌	1	cong shou wu yan
乐酒无厌	1	le jiu wu yan
先王无流连之乐	1	xian wang wu liu lian zhi le
荒亡之行	1	huang wang zhi hang
惟君所行也	1	wei jun suo hang ye
大戒於国	1	da jie yu guo
出舍於郊	1	chu she yu jiao
於是始兴发补不足	1	yu shi shi xing fa bu bu zu
召太师曰	1	zhao tai shi yue
为我作君臣相说之乐	1	wei wo zuo jun chen xiang shuo zhi le
盖微招角招是也	1	gai wei zhao jiao zhao shi ye
畜君何尤	1	chu jun he you
人皆谓我毁明堂	1	ren jie wei wo hui ming tang
夫明堂者	1	fu ming tang zhe
王者之堂也	1	wang zhe zhi tang ye
王欲行王政	1	wang yu xing wang zheng
则勿毁之矣	1	ze wu hui zhi yi
王政可得闻与	1	wang zheng ke dei wen yu
昔者文王之治其岐也	1	xi zhe wen wang zhi zhi qi qi ye
耕者九一	1	geng zhe jiu yi
仕者世禄	1	shi zhe shi lu
关市讥而不征	1	guan shi ji er bu zheng
泽梁无禁	1	ze liang wu jin
罪人不孥	1	zui ren bu nu
老而无妻曰鳏	1	lao er wu qi yue guan
老而无夫曰寡	1	lao er wu fu yue gua
老而无子曰独	1	lao er wu zi yue du
幼而无父曰孤	1	you er wu fu yue gu
天下之穷民而无告者	1	tian xia zhi qiong min er wu gao zhe
文王发政施仁	1	wen wang fa zheng shi ren
必先斯四者	1	bi xian si si zhe
哿矣富人	1	ge yi fu ren
哀此茕独	1	ai ci qiong du
善哉言乎	1	shan zai yan hu
王如善之	1	wang ru shan zhi
则何为不行	1	ze he wei bu xing
寡人好货	1	gua ren hao huo
昔者公刘好货	1	xi zhe gong liu hao huo
乃积乃食	1	nai ji nai shi
於橐於囊	1	yu tuo yu nang
思戢用光	1	si ji yong guang
弓矢斯张	1	gong shi si zhang
干戈戚扬	1	gan ge qi yang
爰方启行	1	yuan fang qi hang
故居者有积食	1	gu ju zhe you ji shi
行者有裹粮也	1	xing zhe you guo liang ye
然後可以爰方启行	1	ran hou ke yi yuan fang qi hang
王如好货	1	wang ru hao huo
与百姓同之	1	yu bai xing tong zhi
於王何有	1	yu wang he you
寡人好色	1	gua ren hao se
昔者大王好色	1	xi zhe da wang hao se
来朝走马	1	lai chao zou ma
率西水浒	1	lv xi shui hu
至於岐下	1	zhi yu qi xia
爰及姜女	1	yuan ji jiang nv
聿来胥宇	1	yu lai xu yu
内无怨女	1	nei wu yuan nv
外无旷夫	1	wai wu kuang fu
王如好色	1	wang ru hao se
孟子谓齐宣王曰	1	meng zi wei qi xuan wang yue
有托其妻子於其友	1	you tuo qi qi zi yu qi you
而之楚游者	1	er zhi chu you zhe
比其反也	1	bi qi fan ye
则冻馁其妻子	1	ze dong nei qi qi zi
则如之何	1	ze ru zhi he
士师不能治士	1	shi shi bu neng zhi shi
四境之内不治	1	si jing zhi nei bu zhi
王顾左右而言他	1	wang gu zuo you er yan ta
孟子见齐宣王曰	1	meng zi jian qi xuan wang yue
所谓故国者	1	suo wei gu guo zhe
非谓有乔木之谓也	1	fei wei you qiao mu zhi wei ye
有世臣之谓也	1	you shi chen zhi wei ye
王无亲臣矣	1	wang wu qin chen yi
昔者所进	1	xi zhe suo jin
今日不知其亡也	1	jin ri bu zhi qi wang ye
吾何以识其不才而舍之	1	wu he yi shi qi bu cai er she zhi
国君进贤	1	guo jun jin xian
如不得已	1	ru bu de yi
将子卑逾尊	1	jiang zi bei yu zun
可不慎与	1	ke bu shen yu
左右皆曰贤	1	zuo you jie yue xian
诸大夫皆曰贤	1	zhu da fu jie yue xian
国人皆曰贤然後察之	1	guo ren jie yue xian ran hou cha zhi
然後用之	1	ran hou yong zhi
左右皆曰不可	1	zuo you jie yue bu ke
诸大夫皆曰不可	1	zhu da fu jie yue bu ke
国人皆曰不可	1	guo ren jie yue bu ke
然後察之	1	ran hou cha zhi
见不可焉	1	jian bu ke yan
然後去之	1	ran hou qu zhi
左右皆曰可杀	1	zuo you jie yue ke sha
诸大夫皆曰可杀	1	zhu da fu jie yue ke sha
国人皆曰可杀	1	guo ren jie yue ke sha
见可杀焉	1	jian ke sha yan
然後杀之	1	ran hou sha zhi
国人杀之也	1	guo ren sha zhi ye
然後可以为民父母	1	ran hou ke yi wei min fu mu
武王伐纣	1	wu wang fa zhou
臣弑其君可乎	1	chen shi qi jun ke hu
贼仁者谓之贼	1	zei ren zhe wei zhi zei
贼义者谓之残	1	zei yi zhe wei zhi can
残贼之人	1	can zei zhi ren
谓之一夫	1	wei zhi yi fu
闻诛一夫纣矣	1	wen zhu yi fu zhou yi
未闻弑君也	1	wei wen shi jun ye
则必使工师求大木	1	ze bi shi gong shi qiu da mu
工师得大木	1	gong shi de da mu
以为能胜其任也	1	yi wei neng sheng qi ren ye
匠人而小之	1	jiang ren er xiao zhi
以为不胜其任矣	1	yi wei bu sheng qi ren yi
夫人幼而学之	1	fu ren you er xue zhi
壮而欲行之	1	zhuang er yu xing zhi
姑舍女所学而从我	1	gu she nv suo xue er cong wo
今有璞玉於此	1	jin you pu yu yu ci
必使玉人雕琢之	1	bi shi yu ren diao zhuo zhi
至於治国家	1	zhi yu zhi guo jia
则何以异於教玉人雕琢哉	1	ze he yi yi yu jiao yu ren diao zhuo zai
齐人伐燕	1	qi ren fa yan
宣王问曰	1	xuan wang wen yue
或谓寡人勿取	1	huo wei gua ren wu qu
或谓寡人取之	1	huo wei gua ren qu zhi
以万乘之国	1	yi wan cheng zhi guo
伐万乘之	1	fa wan cheng zhi
五旬而举之	1	wu xun er ju zhi
人力不至於此	1	ren li bu zhi yu ci
不取必有天殃	1	bu qu bi you tian yang
取之何如	1	qu zhi he ru
取之而燕民悦	1	qu zhi er yan min yue
古之人有行之者	1	gu zhi ren you hang zhi zhe
武王是也	1	wu wang shi ye
取之而燕民不悦	1	qu zhi er yan min bu yue
文王是也	1	wen wang shi ye
伐万乘之国	1	fa wan cheng zhi guo
箪食壶浆以迎王师	1	dan shi hu jiang yi ying wang shi
岂有他哉	1	qi you ta zai
避水火也	1	bi shui huo ye
如水益深	1	ru shui yi shen
如火益热	1	ru huo yi re
亦运而已矣	1	yi yun er yi yi
诸侯将谋救燕	1	zhu hou jiang mou jiu yan
诸侯多谋伐寡人者	1	zhu hou duo mou fa gua ren zhe
何以待之	1	he yi dai zhi
臣闻七十里为政於天下者	1	chen wen qi shi li wei zheng yu tian xia zhe
未闻以千里畏人者也	1	wei wen yi qian li wei ren zhe ye
汤一征自葛始	1	tang yi zheng zi ge shi
天下信之	1	tian xia xin zhi
东面而征西夷怨	1	dong mian er zheng xi yi yuan
南面而征北狄怨	1	nan mian er zheng bei di yuan
奚为後我	1	xi wei hou wo
若大旱之望云霓也	1	ruo da han zhi wang yun ni ye
归市者不止	1	gui shi zhe bu zhi
耕者不变	1	geng zhe bu bian
诛其君而吊其民	1	zhu qi jun er diao qi min
若时雨降	1	ruo shi yu jiang
后来其苏	1	hou lai qi su
今燕虐其民	1	jin yan nue qi min
民以为将拯己於水火之中也	1	min yi wei jiang zheng ji yu shui huo zhi zhong ye
若杀其父兄	1	ruo sha qi fu xiong
系累其子弟	1	xi lei qi zi di
毁其宗庙	1	hui qi zong miao
迁其重器	1	qian qi zhong qi
如之其可也	1	ru zhi qi ke ye
天下固畏齐之也	1	tian xia gu wei qi zhi ye
今又倍地而不行仁政	1	jin you bei di er bu xing ren zheng
是动天下之兵也	1	shi dong tian xia zhi bing ye
王速出令	1	wang su chu ling
反其旄倪	1	fan qi mao ni
止其重器	1	zhi qi zhong qi
谋於燕众	1	mou yu yan zhong
置君而後去之	1	zhi jun er hou qu zhi
则犹可及止也	1	ze you ke ji zhi ye
邹与鲁哄	1	zou yu lu hong
穆公问曰	1	mu gong wen yue
吾有司死者三十三人	1	wu you si si zhe san shi san ren
而民莫之死也	1	er min mo zhi si ye
则不可胜诛	1	ze bu ke sheng zhu
则疾视其长上之死而不救	1	ze ji shi qi zhang shang zhi si er bu jiu
如之何则可也	1	ru zhi he ze ke ye
老弱转乎沟壑	1	lao ruo zhuan hu gou he
壮者散而之四方者	1	zhuang zhe san er zhi si fang zhe
几千人矣	1	ji qian ren yi
而君之食廪实	1	er jun zhi shi lin shi
有司莫以告	1	you si mo yi gao
是上慢而残下也	1	shi shang man er can xia ye
戒之戒之	1	jie zhi jie zhi
出乎尔者	1	chu hu er zhe
反乎尔者也	1	fan hu er zhe ye
夫民今而後得反之也	1	fu min jin er hou de fan zhi ye
君无尤焉	1	jun wu you yan
君行仁政	1	jun hang ren zheng
斯民亲其上	1	si min qin qi shang
死其长矣	1	si qi zhang yi
滕文公问曰	1	teng wen gong wen yue
间於齐楚	1	jian yu qi chu
事齐乎事楚乎	1	shi qi hu shi chu hu
是谋非吾所能及也	1	shi mou fei wu suo neng ji ye
则有一焉	1	ze you yi yan
凿斯池也	1	zao si chi ye
与民守之	1	yu min shou zhi
效死而弗去	1	xiao si er fu qu
则是可为也	1	ze shi ke wei ye
齐人将薛	1	qi ren jiang xue
昔者大王居	1	xi zhe da wang ju
狄人侵之	1	di ren qin zhi
去之岐山之下居焉	1	qu zhi qi shan zhi xia ju yan
非择而取之	1	fei ze er qu zhi
不得已也	1	bu de yi ye
後世子孙必有王者矣	1	hou shi zi sun bi you wang zhe yi
君子创业垂统	1	jun zi chuang ye chui tong
为可继也	1	wei ke ji ye
若夫成功	1	ruo fu cheng gong
君如彼何哉	1	jun ru bi he zai
为善而已矣	1	wei shan er yi yi
竭力以事大国	1	jie li yi shi da guo
则不得免焉	1	ze bu de mian yan
事之以皮币	1	shi zhi yi pi bi
不得免焉	1	bu de mian yan
事之以犬马	1	shi zhi yi quan ma
事之以珠玉	1	shi zhi yi zhu yu
乃属其耆老而告之曰	1	nai shu qi qi lao er gao zhi yue
狄人之所欲者	1	di ren zhi suo yu zhe
吾土地也	1	wu tu di ye
君子不以其所以养人者害人	1	jun zi bu yi qi suo yi yang ren zhe hai ren
二三子何患乎无君	1	er san zi he huan hu wu jun
我将去之	1	wo jiang qu zhi
邑于岐山之下居焉	1	yi yu qi shan zhi xia ju yan
不可失也	1	bu ke shi ye
从之者如归市	1	cong zhi zhe ru gui shi
非身之所能为也	1	fei shen zhi suo neng wei ye
效死勿去	1	xiao si wu qu
君请择於斯二者	1	jun qing ze yu si er zhe
鲁平公将出	1	lu ping gong jiang chu
嬖人臧仓者请曰	1	bi ren zang cang zhe qing yue
他日君出	1	ta ri jun chu
则必命有司所之	1	ze bi ming you si suo zhi
今乘舆已驾矣	1	jin cheng yu yi jia yi
有司未知所之	1	you si wei zhi suo zhi
将见孟子	1	jiang jian meng zi
何哉君所为轻身以先於匹夫者	1	he zai jun suo wei qing shen yi xian yu pi fu zhe
以为贤乎	1	yi wei xian hu
礼义由贤者出	1	li yi you xian zhe chu
而孟子之後丧逾前丧	1	er meng zi zhi hou sang yu qian sang
君无见焉	1	jun wu jian yan
乐正子入见	1	le zheng zi ru jian
君奚为不见孟轲也	1	jun xi wei bu jian meng ke ye
或告寡人曰	1	huo gao gua ren yue
孟子之後丧逾前丧	1	meng zi zhi hou sang yu qian sang
是以不往见也	1	shi yi bu wang jian ye
何哉君所谓逾者	1	he zai jun suo wei yu zhe
後以大夫	1	hou yi da fu
前以三鼎	1	qian yi san ding
而後以五鼎与	1	er hou yi wu ding yu
谓棺椁衣衾之美也	1	wei guan guo yi qin zhi mei ye
非所谓逾也	1	fei suo wei yu ye
贫富不同也	1	pin fu bu tong ye
乐正子见孟子曰	1	le zheng zi jian meng zi yue
克告於君	1	ke gao yu jun
君为来见也	1	jun wei lai jian ye
嬖人有臧仓者沮君	1	bi ren you zang cang zhe ju jun
君是以不果来也	1	jun shi yi bu guo lai ye
行或使之	1	hang huo shi zhi
止或尼之	1	zhi huo ni zhi
行止非人所能也	1	xing zhi fei ren suo neng ye
吾之不遇鲁侯	1	wu zhi bu yu lu hou
臧氏之子	1	zang shi zhi zi
焉能使子不遇哉	1	yan neng shi zi bu yu zai
公孙丑上	1	gong sun chou shang
公孙丑问曰	1	gong sun chou wen yue
夫子当路於齐	1	fu zi dang lu yu qi
晏子之功	1	yan zi zhi gong
可复许乎	1	ke fu xu hu
子诚齐人也	1	zi cheng qi ren ye
晏子而已矣	1	yan zi er yi yi
或问乎曾西曰	1	huo wen hu ceng xi yue
吾子与子路孰贤	1	wu zi yu zi lu shu xian
曾西蹴然曰	1	ceng xi cu ran yue
吾先子之所畏也	1	wu xian zi zhi suo wei ye
然则吾子与管仲孰贤	1	ran ze wu zi yu guan zhong shu xian
曾西艴然不悦	1	ceng xi fu ran bu yue
尔何曾比予於管仲	1	er he ceng bi yu yu guan zhong
管仲得君如彼其专也	1	guan zhong de jun ru bi qi zhuan ye
行乎国政如彼其久也	1	hang hu guo zheng ru bi qi jiu ye
功烈如彼其卑也	1	gong lie ru bi qi bei ye
尔何曾比予於是	1	er he ceng bi yu yu shi
曾西之所不为也	1	ceng xi zhi suo bu wei ye
而子为我愿之乎	1	er zi wei wo yuan zhi hu
管仲以其君霸	1	guan zhong yi qi jun ba
晏子以其君显	1	yan zi yi qi jun xian
晏子犹不足为与	1	yan zi you bu zu wei yu
以齐王由反手也	1	yi qi wang you fan shou ye
则弟子之感滋甚	1	ze di zi zhi gan zi shen
且以文王之德	1	qie yi wen wang zhi de
百年而後崩	1	bai nian er hou beng
犹未洽於天下	1	you wei qia yu tian xia
周公继之	1	zhou gong ji zhi
然後大行	1	ran hou da hang
今言王若易然	1	jin yan wang ruo yi ran
则文王不足法与	1	ze wen wang bu zu fa yu
文王何可当也	1	wen wang he ke dang ye
由汤至於武丁	1	you tang zhi yu wu ding
贤圣之君六七作	1	xian sheng zhi jun liu qi zuo
天下归殷久矣	1	tian xia gui yin jiu yi
久则难变也	1	jiu ze nan bian ye
武丁朝诸侯	1	wu ding chao zhu hou
犹运之掌也	1	you yun zhi zhang ye
纣之去武丁	1	zhou zhi qu wu ding
其故家遗俗	1	qi gu jia yi su
流风善政	1	liu feng shan zheng
犹有存者	1	you you cun zhe
又有微子	1	you you wei zi
王子比干	1	wang zi bi gan
皆贤人也	1	jie xian ren ye
相与辅相之	1	xiang yu fu xiang zhi
故久而後失之也	1	gu jiu er hou shi zhi ye
尺地莫非其有也	1	chi di mo fei qi you ye
一民莫非其臣也	1	yi min mo fei qi chen ye
然而文王犹方百里起	1	ran er wen wang you fang bai li qi
是以难也	1	shi yi nan ye
齐人有言曰	1	qi ren you yan yue
虽有智慧	1	sui you zhi hui
不如乘势	1	bu ru cheng shi
不如待时	1	bu ru dai shi
今时则易然也	1	jin shi ze yi ran ye
地未有过千里者也	1	di wei you guo qian li zhe ye
而齐有其地矣	1	er qi you qi di yi
鸡鸣狗吠相闻	1	ji ming gou fei xiang wen
而达乎四境	1	er da hu si jing
而齐有其民矣	1	er qi you qi min yi
地不改辟矣	1	di bu gai pi yi
民不改聚矣	1	min bu gai ju yi
行仁政而王	1	hang ren zheng er wang
莫之能御也	1	mo zhi neng yu ye
且王者之不作	1	qie wang zhe zhi bu zuo
未有疏於此时者也	1	wei you shu yu ci shi zhe ye
民之憔悴於虐政	1	min zhi qiao cui yu nue zheng
未有甚於此时者也	1	wei you shen yu ci shi zhe ye
饥者易为食	1	ji zhe yi wei shi
渴者易为饮	1	ke zhe yi wei yin
德之流行	1	de zhi liu xing
速於置邮而传命	1	su yu zhi you er chuan ming
当今之时	1	dang jin zhi shi
万乘之国	1	wan cheng zhi guo
民之悦之	1	min zhi yue zhi
犹解倒悬也	1	you jie dao xuan ye
故事半古之倍之人	1	gu shi ban gu zhi bei zhi ren
功必倍之	1	gong bi bei zhi
惟此时为然	1	wei ci shi wei ran
夫子加齐之卿相	1	fu zi jia qi zhi qing xiang
得行道焉	1	de hang dao yan
虽由此霸王不异矣	1	sui you ci ba wang bu yi yi
则动心否乎	1	ze dong xin fou hu
我四十不动心	1	wo si shi bu dong xin
则夫子过孟贲远矣	1	ze fu zi guo meng ben yuan yi
告子先我不动心	1	gao zi xian wo bu dong xin
不动心有道乎	1	bu dong xin you dao hu
北宫黝之养勇也	1	bei gong you zhi yang yong ye
思以一毫挫於人	1	si yi yi hao cuo yu ren
若挞之於市朝	1	ruo ta zhi yu shi chao
不受於褐宽博	1	bu shou yu he kuan bo
亦不受於万乘之君	1	yi bu shou yu wan cheng zhi jun
视刺万乘之君	1	shi ci wan cheng zhi jun
若刺褐夫	1	ruo ci he fu
无严诸侯	1	wu yan zhu hou
孟施舍之所养勇也	1	meng shi she zhi suo yang yong ye
视不胜犹胜也	1	shi bu sheng you sheng ye
量敌而後进	1	liang di er hou jin
虑胜而後会	1	lv sheng er hou hui
是畏三军者也	1	shi wei san jun zhe ye
舍岂能为必胜哉	1	she qi neng wei bi sheng zai
能无惧而已矣	1	neng wu ju er yi yi
孟施舍似曾子	1	meng shi she shi ceng zi
北宫黝似子夏	1	bei gong you shi zi xia
夫二子之勇	1	fu er zi zhi yong
未知其孰贤	1	wei zhi qi shu xian
然而孟施舍守约也	1	ran er meng shi she shou yue ye
昔者曾子谓子让子襄曰	1	xi zhe ceng zi wei zi rang zi xiang yue
子好勇乎	1	zi hao yong hu
吾尝闻大勇於夫子矣	1	wu chang wen da yong yu fu zi yi

吾不惴焉	1	wu bu zhui yan
自反而缩	1	zi fan er suo
虽千万人吾往矣	1	sui qian wan ren wu wang yi
孟施舍之守气	1	meng shi she zhi shou qi
又不如曾子之守约也	1	you bu ru ceng zi zhi shou yue ye
敢问夫子之动心	1	gan wen fu zi zhi dong xin
与告子之不动心	1	yu gao zi zhi bu dong xin
不得於言	1	bu de yu yan
勿求於心	1	wu qiu yu xin
不得於心	1	bu de yu xin
勿求於气	1	wu qiu yu qi
气之帅也	1	qi zhi shuai ye
体之充也	1	ti zhi chong ye
夫志至焉	1	fu zhi zhi yan
无暴其气	1	wu bao qi qi

志壹则动气	1	zhi yi ze dong qi

今有蹶者趋者	1	jin you jue zhe qu zhe
而反动其心	1	er fan dong qi xin
敢问夫子恶乎长	1	gan wen fu zi e hu zhang

其为气也	1	qi wei qi ye
至大至刚	1	zhi da zhi gang
以直养而无害	1	yi zhi yang er wu hai
则塞于天地之间	1	ze sai yu tian di zhi jian
配义与道	1	pei yi yu dao
是集义所生者	1	shi ji yi suo sheng zhe
非义袭而取之也	1	fei yi xi er qu zhi ye
行有不慊於心	1	hang you bu qian yu xin
告子未尝知义	1	gao zi wei chang zhi yi
以其外之也	1	yi qi wai zhi ye
必有事焉而勿正	1	bi you shi yan er wu zheng
勿助长也	1	wu zhu zhang ye
无若宋人然	1	wu ruo song ren ran

芒芒然归	1	mang mang ran gui

今日病矣	1	jin ri bing yi

以为无益而舍之者	1	yi wei wu yi er she zhi zhe

非徒无益	1	fei tu wu yi
而又害之	1	er you hai zhi

圣则吾不能	1	sheng ze wu bu neng

则不敬莫大乎是	1	ze bu jing mo da hu shi

父召无诺	1	fu zhao wu nuo

宜与夫礼若不相似然	1	yi yu fu li ruo bu xiang shi ran
岂谓是与	1	qi wei shi yu
普楚之富	1	pu chu zhi fu
不可及也	1	bu ke ji ye
彼以其富	1	bi yi qi fu
我以吾仁	1	wo yi wu ren
彼以其爵	1	bi yi qi jue
我以吾义	1	wo yi wu yi
吾何慊乎哉	1	wu he qian hu zai
夫岂不义而曾子言之	1	fu qi bu yi er ceng zi yan zhi
是或一道也	1	shi huo yi dao ye
天下有达尊三	1	tian xia you da zun san
朝廷莫如爵	1	chao ting mo ru jue
乡党莫如齿	1	xiang dang mo ru chi
辅世长民莫如德	1	fu shi zhang min mo ru de
恶得有其一	1	e dei you qi yi
以慢其二哉	1	yi man qi er zai
故将大有为之君	1	gu jiang da you wei zhi jun
必有不召之臣	1	bi you bu zhao zhi chen
欲有谋焉	1	yu you mou yan
其尊德乐道	1	qi zun de le dao
不足与有为也	1	bu zu yu you wei ye
故汤之於依尹	1	gu tang zhi yu yi yin
学焉而後臣之	1	xue yan er hou chen zhi
故不劳而王	1	gu bu lao er wang
桓公之於管仲	1	huan gong zhi yu guan zhong
故不劳而霸	1	gu bu lao er ba
今天下地丑德齐	1	jin tian xia di chou de qi
莫能相尚	1	mo neng xiang shang
好臣所教	1	hao chen suo jiao
而不好臣其所受教	1	er bu hao chen qi suo shou jiao
汤之於伊尹	1	tang zhi yu yi yin
则不敢召	1	ze bu gan zhao
管仲且犹不可召	1	guan zhong qie you bu ke zhao
而况不为管仲者乎	1	er kuang bu wei guan zhong zhe hu
陈臻问曰	1	chen zhen wen yue
前日於齐	1	qian ri yu qi
王兼金一百而不受	1	wang jian jin yi bai er bu shou
七十镒而受	1	qi shi yi er shou
五十镒而受	1	wu shi yi er shou
前日之不受是	1	qian ri zhi bu shou shi
则今日之受非也	1	ze jin ri zhi shou fei ye
今日之受是	1	jin ri zhi shou shi
则前日之不受非也	1	ze qian ri zhi bu shou fei ye
夫子必居一於此矣	1	fu zi bi ju yi yu ci yi
当在宋也	1	dang zai song ye
予将有远行	1	yu jiang you yuan xing
行者必以赆	1	xing zhe bi yi jin
予何为不受	1	yu he wei bu shou
当在薜也	1	dang zai bi ye
予有戒心	1	yu you jie xin
故为兵之	1	gu wei bing zhi
则未有处也	1	ze wei you chu ye
无处而之	1	wu chu er zhi
是货之也	1	shi huo zhi ye
焉有君子而可以货取乎	1	yan you jun zi er ke yi huo qu hu
孟子之平陆	1	meng zi zhi ping lu
谓其大夫曰	1	wei qi da fu yue
子之持戟之士	1	zi zhi chi ji zhi shi
一日而三失伍	1	yi ri er san shi wu
则去之否乎	1	ze qu zhi fou hu
然则子之失伍也亦多矣	1	ran ze zi zhi shi wu ye yi duo yi
老羸转於沟壑	1	lao lei zhuan yu gou he
此非距心之所得为也	1	ci fei ju xin zhi suo de wei ye
今有受人之牛羊而为之牧之者	1	jin you shou ren zhi niu yang er wei zhi mu zhi zhe
则必为之求牧与刍矣	1	ze bi wei zhi qiu mu yu chu yi
求牧与刍而不得	1	qiu mu yu chu er bu de
则反诸其入乎	1	ze fan zhu qi ru hu
抑亦立而视其死与	1	yi yi li er shi qi si yu
此则距心之罪也	1	ci ze ju xin zhi zui ye
王之为都者	1	wang zhi wei dou zhe
臣知五人焉	1	chen zhi wu ren yan
知其罪者	1	zhi qi zui zhe
惟孔距心	1	wei kong ju xin
为王诵之	1	wei wang song zhi
此则寡人之罪也	1	ci ze gua ren zhi zui ye
孟子谓曰	1	meng zi wei yue
子之辞灵丘而请士师	1	zi zhi ci ling qiu er qing shi shi
为其可以言也	1	wei qi ke yi yan ye
今既数月以	1	jin ji shu yue yi
未可以言与	1	wei ke yi yan yu
谏於王而不用	1	jian yu wang er bu yong
致为臣而去	1	zhi wei chen er qu
所以为则善矣	1	suo yi wei ze shan yi
所以自为	1	suo yi zi wei
公都子以告	1	gong dou zi yi gao
有官守者	1	you guan shou zhe
不得其职则去	1	bu de qi zhi ze qu
有言责者	1	you yan ze zhe
不得其言则去	1	bu de qi yan ze qu
我无官守	1	wo wu guan shou
我无言责也	1	wo wu yan ze ye
则吾进退	1	ze wu jin tui
岂不绰绰然有馀裕哉	1	qi bu chao chao ran you yu yu zai
孟子卿於齐	1	meng zi qing yu qi
出吊於滕	1	chu diao yu teng
王使盖大夫王为辅行	1	wang shi gai da fu wang wei fu hang
王朝暮见	1	wang chao mu jian
反齐滕之路	1	fan qi teng zhi lu
未尝与之言行事也	1	wei chang yu zhi yan xing shi ye
齐卿之位	1	qi qing zhi wei
不为小矣	1	bu wei xiao yi
齐滕之路	1	qi teng zhi lu
不为近矣	1	bu wei jin yi
反之而未尝与言行事	1	fan zhi er wei chang yu yan xing shi
夫既或治之	1	fu ji huo zhi zhi
予何言哉	1	yu he yan zai
孟子自齐葬於鲁	1	meng zi zi qi zang yu lu
充虞请曰	1	chong yu qing yue
前日不知虞之不肖	1	qian ri bu zhi yu zhi bu xiao
使虞敦匠事	1	shi yu dun jiang shi
虞不敢请	1	yu bu gan qing
今愿窃有请也	1	jin yuan qie you qing ye
木若以美然	1	mu ruo yi mei ran
古者棺椁无度	1	gu zhe guan guo wu du
中古棺七寸	1	zhong gu guan qi cun
自天子达於庶人	1	zi tian zi da yu shu ren
非直为观美也	1	fei zhi wei guan mei ye
然後尽於人心	1	ran hou jin yu ren xin
不可以为悦	1	bu ke yi wei yue
得之为有财	1	de zhi wei you cai
古之人皆用之	1	gu zhi ren jie yong zhi
吾何为独不然	1	wu he wei du bu ran
且比化者	1	qie bi hua zhe
无使土亲肤	1	wu shi tu qin fu
於人心独无乎	1	yu ren xin du wu hu
君子不以天下俭其亲	1	jun zi bu yi tian xia jian qi qin
沈同以其私问曰	1	shen tong yi qi si wen yue
燕可伐与	1	yan ke fa yu
子哙不得与人燕	1	zi kuai bu de yu ren yan
子之不得受燕於子哙	1	zi zhi bu de shou yan yu zi kuai
有仕於此	1	you shi yu ci
而子悦之	1	er zi yue zhi
不告於王	1	bu gao yu wang
而私与之吾子之禄爵	1	er si yu zhi wu zi zhi lu jue
亦无王命而私受之於子	1	yi wu wang ming er si shou zhi yu zi
何以异於是	1	he yi yi yu shi
劝其伐燕	1	quan qi fa yan
吾应之曰	1	wu ying zhi yue
彼然而伐之也	1	bi ran er fa zhi ye
孰可以伐之	1	shu ke yi fa zhi
则将应之曰	1	ze jiang ying zhi yue
为天吏则可以伐之	1	wei tian li ze ke yi fa zhi
今有杀人者	1	jin you sha ren zhe
人可杀与	1	ren ke sha yu
孰可以杀之	1	shu ke yi sha zhi
为士师则可以杀之	1	wei shi shi ze ke yi sha zhi
今以燕伐燕	1	jin yi yan fa yan
何为劝之哉	1	he wei quan zhi zai
吾甚惭於孟子	1	wu shen can yu meng zi
王无患焉	1	wang wu huan yan
王自以为与周公	1	wang zi yi wei yu zhou gong
孰仁且智	1	shu ren qie zhi
周公使管叔监殷	1	zhou gong shi guan shu jian yin
管叔以殷畔	1	guan shu yi yin pan
知而使之	1	zhi er shi zhi
是不仁也	1	shi bu ren ye
不知而使之	1	bu zhi er shi zhi
周公未之尽也	1	zhou gong wei zhi jin ye
而况於王乎	1	er kuang yu wang hu
贾请见而解之	1	jia qing jian er jie zhi
古圣人也	1	gu sheng ren ye
使管叔监殷	1	shi guan shu jian yin
管叔以殷畔也	1	guan shu yi yin pan ye
周公知其将畔而使之与	1	zhou gong zhi qi jiang pan er shi zhi yu
然则圣人且有过与	1	ran ze sheng ren qie you guo yu
周公弟也	1	zhou gong di ye
管叔兄也	1	guan shu xiong ye
周公之过	1	zhou gong zhi guo
且古之君子	1	qie gu zhi jun zi
过则改之	1	guo ze gai zhi
今之君子	1	jin zhi jun zi
过则顺之	1	guo ze shun zhi
古之君子	1	gu zhi jun zi
如日月之食	1	ru ri yue zhi shi
民皆见之	1	min jie jian zhi
及其更也	1	ji qi geng ye
民皆仰之	1	min jie yang zhi
岂徒顺之	1	qi tu shun zhi
又从为之辞	1	you cong wei zhi ci
孟子致为臣而归	1	meng zi zhi wei chen er gui
王就见孟子曰	1	wang jiu jian meng zi yue
前日愿见而不可得	1	qian ri yuan jian er bu ke dei
同朝甚喜	1	tong chao shen xi
今又弃寡人而归	1	jin you qi gua ren er gui
不识可以继此而得见乎	1	bu shi ke yi ji ci er dei jian hu
不敢请耳	1	bu gan qing er
固所愿也	1	gu suo yuan ye
王谓时子曰	1	wang wei shi zi yue
我欲中国而授孟子室	1	wo yu zhong guo er shou meng zi shi
养弟子以万钟	1	yang di zi yi wan zhong
使诸大夫国人皆有所矜式	1	shi zhu da fu guo ren jie you suo jin shi
子盍为我言之	1	zi he wei wo yan zhi
时子因陈子而以告孟子	1	shi zi yin chen zi er yi gao meng zi
陈子以时子之言告孟子	1	chen zi yi shi zi zhi yan gao meng zi
夫时子恶知其不可也	1	fu shi zi e zhi qi bu ke ye
如使予欲富	1	ru shi yu yu fu
辞十万而受万	1	ci shi wan er shou wan
是为欲富乎	1	shi wei yu fu hu
异哉子叔疑	1	yi zai zi shu yi
使己为政	1	shi ji wei zheng
不用则亦已矣	1	bu yong ze yi yi yi
又使其子弟为卿	1	you shi qi zi di wei qing
人亦孰不欲富贵	1	ren yi shu bu yu fu gui
而独於富贵之中	1	er du yu fu gui zhi zhong
有私龙断焉	1	you si long duan yan
古之为市者	1	gu zhi wei shi zhe
以其所有易其所无者	1	yi qi suo you yi qi suo wu zhe
有司者治之耳	1	you si zhe zhi zhi er
有贱丈夫焉	1	you jian zhang fu yan
必求龙断而登之	1	bi qiu long duan er deng zhi
以左右望而罔市利	1	yi zuo you wang er wang shi li
人皆以为贱	1	ren jie yi wei jian
故从而征之	1	gu cong er zheng zhi
征商自此贱丈夫始矣	1	zheng shang zi ci jian zhang fu shi yi
孟子去齐	1	meng zi qu qi
有欲为王留行者	1	you yu wei wang liu xing zhe
隐几而卧	1	yin ji er wo
客不悦曰	1	ke bu yue yue
弟子齐宿而後敢言	1	di zi qi xiu er hou gan yan
夫子卧而不听	1	fu zi wo er bu ting
请勿复敢见矣	1	qing wu fu gan jian yi
我明语子	1	wo ming yu zi
昔者鲁缪公无人乎子思之侧	1	xi zhe lu miu gong wu ren hu zi si zhi ce
则不能安子思	1	ze bu neng an zi si
泄柳申详	1	xie liu shen xiang
无人乎缪公之侧	1	wu ren hu miu gong zhi ce
则不能安其身	1	ze bu neng an qi shen
子为长者虑	1	zi wei zhang zhe lv
而不及子思	1	er bu ji zi si
子绝长者乎	1	zi jue zhang zhe hu
长者绝子乎	1	zhang zhe jue zi hu
尹士语人曰	1	yin shi yu ren yue
不识王之不可以为汤武	1	bu shi wang zhi bu ke yi wei tang wu
则是不明也	1	ze shi bu ming ye
识其不可	1	shi qi bu ke
则是干泽也	1	ze shi gan ze ye
千里而见王	1	qian li er jian wang
不遇故去	1	bu yu gu qu
三宿而後出昼	1	san xiu er hou chu zhou
是何濡滞也	1	shi he ru zhi ye
士则兹不悦	1	shi ze zi bu yue
高子以告	1	gao zi yi gao
夫尹士恶知予哉	1	fu yin shi e zhi yu zai
是予所欲也	1	shi yu suo yu ye
岂予所欲哉	1	qi yu suo yu zai
予不得已也	1	yu bu de yi ye
予三宿而出昼	1	yu san xiu er chu zhou
於予心犹以为速	1	yu yu xin you yi wei su
王庶几改之	1	wang shu ji gai zhi
王如改诸则必反予	1	wang ru gai zhu ze bi fan yu
夫出昼而王不予追也	1	fu chu zhou er wang bu yu zhui ye
予然後浩然有归志	1	yu ran hou hao ran you gui zhi
岂舍王哉	1	qi she wang zai
王由足用为善	1	wang you zu yong wei shan
王如用予	1	wang ru yong yu
则岂徒齐民安	1	ze qi tu qi min an
天下之民举安	1	tian xia zhi min ju an
予日望之	1	yu ri wang zhi
予岂若是小丈夫然哉	1	yu qi ruo shi xiao zhang fu ran zai
谏於其君而不受	1	jian yu qi jun er bu shou
悻悻然见於其面	1	xing xing ran jian yu qi mian
去则穷日之力而後宿哉	1	qu ze qiong ri zhi li er hou xiu zai
尹士闻之曰	1	yin shi wen zhi yue
士诚小人也	1	shi cheng xiao ren ye
充虞路问曰	1	chong yu lu wen yue
夫子若有不豫色然	1	fu zi ruo you bu yu se ran
前日虞闻诸夫子曰	1	qian ri yu wen zhu fu zi yue
君子不怨天	1	jun zi bu yuan tian
此一时也	1	ci yi shi ye
五百年必有王者兴	1	wu bai nian bi you wang zhe xing
其间必有名世者	1	qi jian bi you ming shi zhe
由周而来	1	you zhou er lai
七百有馀岁矣	1	qi bai you yu sui yi
以其数则过矣	1	yi qi shu ze guo yi
以其时考之	1	yi qi shi kao zhi
夫天未欲平治天下也	1	fu tian wei yu ping zhi tian xia ye
如欲平治天下	1	ru yu ping zhi tian xia
当今之世	1	dang jin zhi shi
舍我其谁也	1	she wo qi shui ye
吾何为不豫哉	1	wu he wei bu yu zai
仕而不受禄	1	shi er bu shou lu
古之道乎	1	gu zhi dao hu

退而有去志	1	tui er you qu zhi
故不受也	1	gu bu shou ye
继而有师命	1	ji er you shi ming
不可以请	1	bu ke yi qing
非我志也	1	fei wo zhi ye
滕文公上	1	teng wen gong shang

言必称尧	1	yan bi cheng yao

世子疑吾言乎	1	shi zi yi wu yan hu
夫道一而已矣	1	fu dao yi er yi yi
成谓齐景公曰	1	cheng wei qi jing gong yue
彼丈夫也	1	bi zhang fu ye
我丈夫也	1	wo zhang fu ye
吾何畏彼哉	1	wu he wei bi zai
舜何人也	1	shun he ren ye
予何人也	1	yu he ren ye
有为者亦若是	1	you wei zhe yi ruo shi
公明仪曰	1	gong ming yi yue
文王我师也	1	wen wang wo shi ye
周公岂欺我哉	1	zhou gong qi qi wo zai
今滕绝长补短	1	jin teng jue zhang bu duan
将五十里也	1	jiang wu shi li ye
犹可以为善国	1	you ke yi wei shan guo
若药不暝眩	1	ruo yao bu ming xuan
厥疾不瘳	1	jue ji bu chou
滕定公薨	1	teng ding gong hong
世子谓然友曰	1	shi zi wei ran you yue
昔者孟子尝与我言於宋	1	xi zhe meng zi chang yu wo yan yu song
於心终不忘	1	yu xin zhong bu wang
今也不幸至於大故	1	jin ye bu xing zhi yu da gu
吾欲使子问於孟子	1	wu yu shi zi wen yu meng zi
然後行事	1	ran hou xing shi
然友之邹	1	ran you zhi zou
问於孟子	1	wen yu meng zi
固所自尽也	1	gu suo zi jin ye

吾尝闻之矣	1	wu chang wen zhi yi

然友反命	1	ran you fan ming
定为三年之丧	1	ding wei san nian zhi sang
父兄百官皆不欲	1	fu xiong bai guan jie bu yu

丧祭从先祖	1	sang ji cong xian zu
吾有所受之也	1	wu you suo shou zhi ye
谓然友曰	1	wei ran you yue
吾他日未尝学问	1	wu ta ri wei chang xue wen
好驰马试剑	1	hao chi ma shi jian
今也父兄百官不我足也	1	jin ye fu xiong bai guan bu wo zu ye
恐其不能尽於大事	1	kong qi bu neng jin yu da shi
子为我问孟子	1	zi wei wo wen meng zi
然友复之邹	1	ran you fu zhi zou

粥面深墨	1	zhou mian shen mo
即位而哭	1	ji wei er ku
百官有司	1	bai guan you si
莫敢不哀	1	mo gan bu ai
上有好者	1	shang you hao zhe
下必有甚焉者矣	1	xia bi you shen yan zhe yi

是诚在我	1	shi cheng zai wo
五月居庐	1	wu yue ju lu

百官族人	1	bai guan zu ren

颜色之戚	1	yan se zhi qi
哭泣之哀	1	ku qi zhi ai
吊者大悦	1	diao zhe da yue
滕文公问	1	teng wen gong wen
民事不可缓也	1	min shi bu ke huan ye
昼尔于茅	1	zhou er yu mao
亟其乘屋	1	ji qi cheng wu

君子深造之以道	1	jun zi shen zao zhi yi dao
欲其自得之也	1	yu qi zi de zhi ye
则居之安	1	ze ju zhi an
则资之深	1	ze zi zhi shen
则取之左右逢其原	1	ze qu zhi zuo you feng qi yuan
故君子欲其自得之也	1	gu jun zi yu qi zi de zhi ye
博学而详说之	1	bo xue er xiang shuo zhi
将以反说约也	1	jiang yi fan shuo yue ye
以善服人者	1	yi shan fu ren zhe
未有能服人者也	1	wei you neng fu ren zhe ye
以善养人	1	yi shan yang ren
然後能服天下	1	ran hou neng fu tian xia
天下不心服而王者	1	tian xia bu xin fu er wang zhe
言无实不祥	1	yan wu shi bu xiang
不祥之实	1	bu xiang zhi shi
蔽贤者当之	1	bi xian zhe dang zhi
仲尼亟称於水曰	1	zhong ni ji cheng yu shui yue
水哉水哉	1	shui zai shui zai
何取於水也	1	he qu yu shui ye
原泉混混	1	yuan quan hun hun
盈科而後进	1	ying ke er hou jin
放乎四海	1	fang hu si hai
有本者如是	1	you ben zhe ru shi
是之取尔	1	shi zhi qu er
七八月之间雨集	1	qi ba yue zhi jian yu ji
沟浍皆盈	1	gou hui jie ying
可立而待也	1	ke li er dai ye
故声闻过情	1	gu sheng wen guo qing
君子耻之	1	jun zi chi zhi
人之所以异於禽兽者几希	1	ren zhi suo yi yi yu qin shou zhe ji xi
庶民去之	1	shu min qu zhi
君子传之	1	jun zi chuan zhi
舜明於庶物	1	shun ming yu shu wu
察於人伦	1	cha yu ren lun
由仁义行	1	you ren yi hang
非行仁义也	1	fei hang ren yi ye
禹恶旨酒	1	yu e zhi jiu
而好善言	1	er hao shan yan
立贤无方	1	li xian wu fang
文王视民如伤	1	wen wang shi min ru shang
望道而未之见	1	wang dao er wei zhi jian
武王不泄迩	1	wu wang bu xie er
周公思兼三王以施四事	1	zhou gong si jian san wang yi shi si shi
其有不合者	1	qi you bu he zhe
仰而思之	1	yang er si zhi
夜以继日	1	ye yi ji ri
幸而得之	1	xing er de zhi
坐以待旦	1	zuo yi dai dan
王者之熄而诗亡	1	wang zhe zhi xi er shi wang
然後春秋作	1	ran hou chun qiu zuo
鲁之春秋	1	lu zhi chun qiu
其事则齐桓	1	qi shi ze qi huan
其文则史	1	qi wen ze shi
其义则丘窃取之矣	1	qi yi ze qiu qie qu zhi yi
君子之泽	1	jun zi zhi ze
五世而斩	1	wu shi er zhan
小人之泽	1	xiao ren zhi ze
予未得为孔子徒也	1	yu wei de wei kong zi tu ye
予私淑诸人也	1	yu si shu zhu ren ye
可以无取	1	ke yi wu qu
可以无与	1	ke yi wu yu
可以无死	1	ke yi wu si
逢蒙学射於羿	1	feng meng xue she yu yi
尽羿之道	1	jin yi zhi dao
思天下惟羿为愈己	1	si tian xia wei yi wei yu ji
於是杀羿	1	yu shi sha yi
是亦羿有罪焉	1	shi yi yi you zui yan
宜若无罪焉	1	yi ruo wu zui yan
薄乎云尔	1	bao hu yun er
恶得无罪	1	e de wu zui
郑人使子濯孺子侵卫	1	zheng ren shi zi zhuo ru zi qin wei
卫使庾公之斯追之	1	wei shi yu gong zhi si zhui zhi
子濯孺子曰	1	zi zhuo ru zi yue
今日我疾作	1	jin ri wo ji zuo
不可以执弓	1	bu ke yi zhi gong
吾死矣夫	1	wu si yi fu
问其仆曰	1	wen qi pu yue
追我者谁也	1	zhui wo zhe shui ye

庾公之斯至	1	yu gong zhi si zhi
夫子何为不执弓	1	fu zi he wei bu zhi gong

尹公之他学射於夫子	1	yin gong zhi ta xue she yu fu zi
我不忍以夫子之道	1	wo bu ren yi fu zi zhi dao
反害夫子	1	fan hai fu zi
今日之事	1	jin ri zhi shi
我不敢废	1	wo bu gan fei
抽矢扣轮	1	chou shi kou lun
发乘矢而後反	1	fa cheng shi er hou fan
西子蒙不洁	1	xi zi meng bu jie
则人皆掩鼻而过之	1	ze ren jie yan bi er guo zhi
虽有恶人	1	sui you e ren
齐戒沐浴	1	qi jie mu yu

天下之言性也	1	tian xia zhi yan xing ye
则故而已矣	1	ze gu er yi yi
以利为本	1	yi li wei ben

有进而与右师言者	1	you jin er yu you shi yan zhe

孟子不与右师言	1	meng zi bu yu you shi yan

孟子闻之	1	meng zi wen zhi
朝廷不历位而相与言	1	chao ting bu li wei er xiang yu yan

我欲行礼	1	wo yu xing li
子敖以我为简	1	zi ao yi wo wei jian
不亦异乎	1	bu yi yi hu
君子所以异於人者	1	jun zi suo yi yi yu ren zhe
以其存心也	1	yi qi cun xin ye
君子以仁存心	1	jun zi yi ren cun xin
以礼存心	1	yi li cun xin
仁者爱人	1	ren zhe ai ren
有礼者敬人	1	you li zhe jing ren
人恒爱之	1	ren heng ai zhi
人恒敬之	1	ren heng jing zhi
其待我以横逆则君子必自反也	1	qi dai wo yi heng ni ze jun zi bi zi fan ye
我必不仁也	1	wo bi bu ren ye
必无礼也	1	bi wu li ye
此物奚宜至哉	1	ci wu xi yi zhi zai
其自反而仁矣	1	qi zi fan er ren yi
自反而有礼矣	1	zi fan er you li yi
其横逆由是也	1	qi heng ni you shi ye
君子必自反也	1	jun zi bi zi fan ye
我必不忠	1	wo bi bu zhong
自反而忠矣	1	zi fan er zhong yi
此亦妄人也已矣	1	ci yi wang ren ye yi yi
如此则与禽兽奚择哉	1	ru ci ze yu qin shou xi ze zai
於禽兽又何难焉	1	yu qin shou you he nan yan

是则可忧也	1	shi ze ke you ye
忧之如何	1	you zhi ru he
如舜而已矣	1	ru shun er yi yi
若夫君子所患	1	ruo fu jun zi suo huan

非礼无行也	1	fei li wu hang ye

则君子不患矣	1	ze jun zi bu huan yi

由己饥之也	1	you ji ji zhi ye

易地则皆然	1	yi di ze jie ran
今有同室之人者	1	jin you tong shi zhi ren zhe

故源源而来	1	gu yuan yuan er lai

尧以天下与舜	1	yao yi tian xia yu shun
天子不能以天下与人	1	tian zi bu neng yi tian xia yu ren
然则舜有天下也	1	ran ze shun you tian xia ye
天与之者	1	tian yu zhi zhe
谆谆然命之乎	1	zhun zhun ran ming zhi hu
以行与事示之而已矣	1	yi hang yu shi shi zhi er yi yi

天子能荐人於天	1	tian zi neng jian ren yu tian

费惠公曰	1	fei hui gong yue
吾於子思	1	wu yu zi si
则师之矣	1	ze shi zhi yi
吾於颜般	1	wu yu yan ban
则友之矣	1	ze you zhi yi
则事我者也	1	ze shi wo zhe ye
非惟小国之君为然也	1	fei wei xiao guo zhi jun wei ran ye
虽大国之君亦有之	1	sui da guo zhi jun yi you zhi
晋平公之於亥唐也	1	jin ping gong zhi yu hai tang ye
入元则入	1	ru yuan ze ru
坐元则坐	1	zuo yuan ze zuo
食元则食	1	shi yuan ze shi
虽疏食菜羹	1	sui shu shi cai geng
未尝不饱	1	wei chang bu bao
盖不敢不饱也	1	gai bu gan bu bao ye
然终於此而已矣	1	ran zhong yu ci er yi yi
弗与共天位也	1	fu yu gong tian wei ye
弗与治天职也	1	fu yu zhi tian zhi ye
弗与食天禄也	1	fu yu shi tian lu ye
士之尊贤者也	1	shi zhi zun xian zhe ye
非王公之尊贤也	1	fei wang gong zhi zun xian ye
舜尚见帝	1	shun shang jian di
帝馆甥于贰室	1	di guan sheng yu er shi
迭为宾主	1	die wei bin zhu
是天子而反匹夫也	1	shi tian zi er fan pi fu ye
用下敬上	1	yong xia jing shang
谓之贵贵	1	wei zhi gui gui
用上敬下	1	yong shang jing xia
谓之尊贤	1	wei zhi zun xian
贵贵尊贤	1	gui gui zun xian
敢问交际	1	gan wen jiao ji
尊者赐之	1	zun zhe ci zhi
其所取之者	1	qi suo qu zhi zhe
而後受之	1	er hou shou zhi
以是为不恭	1	yi shi wei bu gong
故弗却也	1	gu fu que ye
请无以辞却之	1	qing wu yi ci que zhi
以心却之	1	yi xin que zhi
其取诸民之不义也	1	qi qu zhu min zhi bu yi ye
而以他辞无受	1	er yi ta ci wu shou
其交也以道	1	qi jiao ye yi dao
其接也以礼	1	qi jie ye yi li
斯孔子受之矣	1	si kong zi shou zhi yi
今有御人於国门之外者	1	jin you yu ren yu guo men zhi wai zhe
其也以礼	1	qi ye yi li
斯可受御与	1	si ke shou yu yu
杀越人于货	1	sha yue ren yu huo
闵不畏死	1	min bu wei si
凡民罔不	1	fan min wang bu
是不待教而诛者也	1	shi bu dai jiao er zhu zhe ye
所不辞也	1	suo bu ci ye
於今为烈	1	yu jin wei lie
如之何其受之	1	ru zhi he qi shou zhi
今之诸侯取之於民也	1	jin zhi zhu hou qu zhi yu min ye
善其礼际矣	1	shan qi li ji yi
斯君子受之	1	si jun zi shou zhi
敢问何说也	1	gan wen he shuo ye
子以为有王者作	1	zi yi wei you wang zhe zuo
将比今之诸侯而诛之乎	1	jiang bi jin zhi zhu hou er zhu zhi hu
其教之不改而後诛之乎	1	qi jiao zhi bu gai er hou zhu zhi hu
夫谓非其有而取之者	1	fu wei fei qi you er qu zhi zhe
充类至义之尽也	1	chong lei zhi yi zhi jin ye
孔子之仕於鲁也	1	kong zi zhi shi yu lu ye
鲁人猎较	1	lu ren lie jiao
孔子亦猎较	1	kong zi yi lie jiao
猎较犹可	1	lie jiao you ke
而况受其赐乎	1	er kuang shou qi ci hu
然则孔子之仕也	1	ran ze kong zi zhi shi ye
非事道与	1	fei shi dao yu
事道奚猎较也	1	shi dao xi lie jiao ye
孔子先簿正祭器	1	kong zi xian bu zheng ji qi
不以四方之食供簿正	1	bu yi si fang zhi shi gong bu zheng
奚不去也	1	xi bu qu ye
为之兆也	1	wei zhi zhao ye
兆足以行矣而不行	1	zhao zu yi hang yi er bu xing
是以未尝有所终三年淹也	1	shi yi wei chang you suo zhong san nian yan ye
孔子有见行可之仕	1	kong zi you jian hang ke zhi shi
有际可之仕	1	you ji ke zhi shi
有公养之仕	1	you gong yang zhi shi
於季桓子	1	yu ji huan zi
见行可之仕也	1	jian hang ke zhi shi ye
於卫灵公	1	yu wei ling gong
际可之仕也	1	ji ke zhi shi ye
於卫孝公	1	yu wei xiao gong
公养之仕也	1	gong yang zhi shi ye
仕非为贫也	1	shi fei wei pin ye
而有时乎为贫	1	er you shi hu wei pin
娶妻非为养也	1	qu qi fei wei yang ye
而有时乎为养	1	er you shi hu wei yang
辞尊居卑	1	ci zun ju bei
辞富居贫	1	ci fu ju pin
恶乎宜乎	1	e hu yi hu
抱关击柝	1	bao guan ji tuo
孔子尝为委吏矣	1	kong zi chang wei wei li yi
会计当而已矣	1	hui ji dang er yi yi
尝为承田矣	1	chang wei cheng tian yi
牛羊茁壮长而已矣	1	niu yang zhuo zhuang zhang er yi yi
位卑而言高	1	wei bei er yan gao
立乎人之本朝而道不行	1	li hu ren zhi ben chao er dao bu xing
士之不托诸侯	1	shi zhi bu tuo zhu hou
诸侯失国而後托於诸侯	1	zhu hou shi guo er hou tuo yu zhu hou
士之托於诸侯	1	shi zhi tuo yu zhu hou
则受之乎	1	ze shou zhi hu
君之於氓也	1	jun zhi yu mang ye
周之则受	1	zhou zhi ze shou
赐之则不受	1	ci zhi ze bu shou
不敢何也	1	bu gan he ye
抱关击柝者	1	bao guan ji tuo zhe
皆有常职以食於上	1	jie you chang zhi yi shi yu shang
无常职而赐於上者	1	wu chang zhi er ci yu shang zhe
以为不恭也	1	yi wei bu gong ye
不识可常继乎	1	bu shi ke chang ji hu
缪公之於子思也	1	miu gong zhi yu zi si ye
亟问亟鼎肉	1	ji wen ji ding rou
子思不悦	1	zi si bu yue
使者出诸大门之外	1	shi zhe chu zhu da men zhi wai
北面稽首再拜而不受	1	bei mian qi shou zai bai er bu shou
知君之犬马畜	1	zhi jun zhi quan ma chu
盖自是台无也	1	gai zi shi tai wu ye
悦贤不能举	1	yue xian bu neng ju
又不能养也	1	you bu neng yang ye
可谓悦贤乎	1	ke wei yue xian hu
敢问国君欲养君子	1	gan wen guo jun yu yang jun zi
如何斯可谓养矣	1	ru he si ke wei yang yi
以君命将之	1	yi jun ming jiang zhi
再拜稽首而受	1	zai bai qi shou er shou
其後廪人继粟	1	qi hou lin ren ji su
庖人继肉	1	pao ren ji rou
不以君命将之	1	bu yi jun ming jiang zhi
子思以为鼎肉使己仆仆尔亟拜也	1	zi si yi wei ding rou shi ji pu pu er ji bai ye
非养君子之道也	1	fei yang jun zi zhi dao ye
尧之於舜也	1	yao zhi yu shun ye
使其子九男事之	1	shi qi zi jiu nan shi zhi
二女女焉	1	er nv nv yan
以养舜於畎亩之中	1	yi yang shun yu quan mu zhi zhong
後举而加诸上位	1	hou ju er jia zhu shang wei
王公之尊贤者也	1	wang gong zhi zun xian zhe ye
敢问不见诸侯	1	gan wen bu jian zhu hou
在国曰市井之臣	1	zai guo yue shi jing zhi chen
在野曰草莽之臣	1	zai ye yue cao mang zhi chen
皆谓庶人	1	jie wei shu ren
庶人不传质为臣	1	shu ren bu chuan zhi wei chen
不敢见於诸侯	1	bu gan jian yu zhu hou
召之役则往役	1	zhao zhi yi ze wang yi
君欲见之	1	jun yu jian zhi
召之则不往见之	1	zhao zhi ze bu wang jian zhi
且君之欲见之也	1	qie jun zhi yu jian zhi ye
何为也哉	1	he wei ye zai
为其多闻也	1	wei qi duo wen ye
为其贤也	1	wei qi xian ye
则天子不召师	1	ze tian zi bu zhao shi
而况诸侯乎	1	er kuang zhu hou hu
则吾未闻欲见贤而召之也	1	ze wu wei wen yu jian xian er zhao zhi ye
缪公亟见於子思曰	1	miu gong ji jian yu zi si yue
古千乘之国以友士	1	gu qian cheng zhi guo yi you shi
子思不悦曰	1	zi si bu yue yue
古之人有言曰	1	gu zhi ren you yan yue
子思之不悦也	1	zi si zhi bu yue ye
则子君也	1	ze zi jun ye
何敢与君友也	1	he gan yu jun you ye
则子事我者也	1	ze zi shi wo zhe ye
奚可以与我友	1	xi ke yi yu wo you
千乘之君	1	qian cheng zhi jun
求与之友而不可得也	1	qiu yu zhi you er bu ke dei ye
而况可召与	1	er kuang ke zhao yu
齐景公田	1	qi jing gong tian
非其招不往也	1	fei qi zhao bu wang ye
敢问招虞人何以	1	gan wen zhao yu ren he yi
庶人以旃	1	shu ren yi zhan
大夫以旌	1	da fu yi jing
以大夫之招招虞人	1	yi da fu zhi zhao zhao yu ren
虞人死不敢往	1	yu ren si bu gan wang
以士之招招庶人	1	yi shi zhi zhao zhao shu ren
庶人岂敢往哉	1	shu ren qi gan wang zai
况乎以不贤人之招招贤人乎	1	kuang hu yi bu xian ren zhi zhao zhao xian ren hu
欲见贤人而不以其道	1	yu jian xian ren er bu yi qi dao
犹欲其入而闭之门也	1	you yu qi ru er bi zhi men ye
惟君子能由是路	1	wei jun zi neng you shi lu
出入是门也	1	chu ru shi men ye
周道如底	1	zhou dao ru di
其直如矢	1	qi zhi ru shi
君之所履	1	jun zhi suo lv
小人所视	1	xiao ren suo shi
不俟驾而行	1	bu si jia er xing
然则孔子非与	1	ran ze kong zi fei yu
孔子当仕有官职	1	kong zi dang shi you guan zhi
而以其官召之也	1	er yi qi guan zhao zhi ye
孟子谓万章曰	1	meng zi wei wan zhang yue
一乡之善士	1	yi xiang zhi shan shi
斯友一乡之善士	1	si you yi xiang zhi shan shi

斯友一国之善士	1	si you yi guo zhi shan shi
天下之善士	1	tian xia zhi shan shi

以友天下之善士为未足	1	yi you tian xia zhi shan shi wei wei zu
又尚论古之人	1	you shang lun gu zhi ren
不知其人可乎	1	bu zhi qi ren ke hu
是以论其世也	1	shi yi lun qi shi ye
是尚友也	1	shi shang you ye
齐宣王问	1	qi xuan wang wen

有贵戚之卿	1	you gui qi zhi qing

贵戚之卿	1	gui qi zhi qing
君有大过则谏	1	jun you da guo ze jian
反覆之而不听	1	fan fu zhi er bu ting
王勃然变乎色	1	wang bo ran bian hu se
王勿异也	1	wang wu yi ye

然後请问	1	ran hou qing wen

君有过则谏	1	jun you guo ze jian

苔焉似丧其耦	1	tai yan shi sang qi ou
