形固可使如槁木	1	xing gu ke shi ru gao mu
而心固可使如死灰乎	1	er xin gu ke shi ru si hui hu
今之隐机者	1	jin zhi yin ji zhe
非昔之隐机者也	1	fei xi zhi yin ji zhe ye
不亦善乎而问之也	1	bu yi shan hu er wen zhi ye
今者吾丧我	1	jin zhe wu sang wo
汝知之乎	1	ru zhi zhi hu
女闻人籁而未闻地籁	1	nv wen ren lai er wei wen di lai
女闻地籁而不闻天籁夫	1	nv wen di lai er bu wen tian lai fu
敢问其方	1	gan wen qi fang
夫大块噫气	1	fu da kuai yi qi
其名为风	1	qi ming wei feng
是唯无作	1	shi wei wu zuo
作则万窍怒	1	zuo ze wan qiao nu
而独不闻之	1	er du bu wen zhi
山林之畏佳	1	shan lin zhi wei jia
大木百围之窍穴	1	da mu bai wei zhi qiao xue
前者唱于而随者唱喁	1	qian zhe chang yu er sui zhe chang yong
泠风则小和	1	ling feng ze xiao he
飘风则大和	1	piao feng ze da he
厉风济则众窍为虚	1	li feng ji ze zhong qiao wei xu
而独不见之调调之刁刁乎	1	er du bu jian zhi tiao tiao zhi diao diao hu
地籁则众窍是已	1	di lai ze zhong qiao shi yi
人籁则比竹是已	1	ren lai ze bi zhu shi yi
敢问天籁	1	gan wen tian lai
夫吹万不同	1	fu chui wan bu tong
而使其自己也	1	er shi qi zi ji ye
咸其自取	1	xian qi zi qu
怒者其谁邪	1	nu zhe qi shui xie
大知闲闲	1	da zhi xian xian
小知间间	1	xiao zhi jian jian
大言炎炎	1	da yan yan yan
小言詹詹	1	xiao yan zhan zhan
其寐也魂交	1	qi mei ye hun jiao
其觉也形开	1	qi jiao ye xing kai
与接为构	1	yu jie wei gou
日以心斗	1	ri yi xin dou
小恐惴惴	1	xiao kong zhui zhui
大恐缦缦	1	da kong man man
其发若机栝	1	qi fa ruo ji kuo
其司是非之谓也	1	qi si shi fei zhi wei ye
其留如诅盟	1	qi liu ru zu meng
其守胜之谓也	1	qi shou sheng zhi wei ye
其杀如秋冬	1	qi sha ru qiu dong
以言其日消也	1	yi yan qi ri xiao ye
其溺之所为之	1	qi ni zhi suo wei zhi
不可使复之也	1	bu ke shi fu zhi ye
其厌也如缄	1	qi yan ye ru jian
以言其老洫也	1	yi yan qi lao xu ye
近死之心	1	jin si zhi xin
莫使复阳也	1	mo shi fu yang ye
喜怒哀乐	1	xi nu ai le
虑叹变蜇	1	lv tan bian zhe
姚佚启态	1	yao yi qi tai
日夜相代乎前而莫知其所萌	1	ri ye xiang dai hu qian er mo zhi qi suo meng
旦暮得此	1	dan mu de ci
其所由以生乎	1	qi suo you yi sheng hu
非彼无我	1	fei bi wu wo
非我无所取	1	fei wo wu suo qu
是亦近矣	1	shi yi jin yi
而不知其所为使	1	er bu zhi qi suo wei shi
若有真宰	1	ruo you zhen zai
而特不得其	1	er te bu de qi
可行己信	1	ke xing ji xin
而不见其形	1	er bu jian qi xing
有情而无形	1	you qing er wu xing
赅而存焉	1	gai er cun yan
吾谁与为亲	1	wu shui yu wei qin
汝皆说之乎	1	ru jie shuo zhi hu
其有私焉	1	qi you si yan
如是皆有为臣妾乎	1	ru shi jie you wei chen qie hu
其臣妾不足以相治乎	1	qi chen qie bu zu yi xiang zhi hu
其递相为君臣乎	1	qi di xiang wei jun chen hu
其有真君存焉	1	qi you zhen jun cun yan
如求得其情与不得	1	ru qiu de qi qing yu bu de
无益损乎其真	1	wu yi sun hu qi zhen
一受其成形	1	yi shou qi cheng xing
不亡以待尽	1	bu wang yi dai jin
与物相刃相靡	1	yu wu xiang ren xiang mi
其行尽如驰而莫之能止	1	qi hang jin ru chi er mo zhi neng zhi
终身役役而不见其成功	1	zhong shen yi yi er bu jian qi cheng gong
然疲役而不知其所归	1	ran pi yi er bu zhi qi suo gui
可不哀邪	1	ke bu ai xie
人谓之不死	1	ren wei zhi bu si
其心与之然	1	qi xin yu zhi ran
可不谓大哀乎	1	ke bu wei da ai hu
人之生也	1	ren zhi sheng ye
固若是芒乎	1	gu ruo shi mang hu
其我独芒	1	qi wo du mang
而人亦有不芒者乎	1	er ren yi you bu mang zhe hu
夫随其成心而师之	1	fu sui qi cheng xin er shi zhi
谁独且无师乎	1	shui du qie wu shi hu
奚必知代而自取者有之	1	xi bi zhi dai er zi qu zhe you zhi
愚者与有焉	1	yu zhe yu you yan
未成乎心而有是非	1	wei cheng hu xin er you shi fei
是今日适越而昔至也	1	shi jin ri shi yue er xi zhi ye
是以无有为有	1	shi yi wu you wei you
无有为有	1	wu you wei you
虽有神禹且不能知	1	sui you shen yu qie bu neng zhi
吾独且奈何哉	1	wu du qie nai he zai
夫言非吹也	1	fu yan fei chui ye
言者有言	1	yan zhe you yan
其所言者特未定也	1	qi suo yan zhe te wei ding ye
果有言邪	1	guo you yan xie
其未尝有言邪	1	qi wei chang you yan xie
其以为异于	1	qi yi wei yi yu
亦有辩乎	1	yi you bian hu
其无辩乎	1	qi wu bian hu
道恶乎隐而有真伪	1	dao e hu yin er you zhen wei
言恶乎隐而有是非	1	yan e hu yin er you shi fei
道恶乎往而不存	1	dao e hu wang er bu cun
言恶乎存而不可	1	yan e hu cun er bu ke
道隐于小成	1	dao yin yu xiao cheng
言隐于荣华	1	yan yin yu rong hua
故有儒墨之是非	1	gu you ru mo zhi shi fei
以是其所非而非其所是	1	yi shi qi suo fei er fei qi suo shi
欲是其所非而非其所是	1	yu shi qi suo fei er fei qi suo shi
则莫若以明	1	ze mo ruo yi ming
物无非彼	1	wu wu fei bi
物无非是	1	wu wu fei shi
自彼则不见	1	zi bi ze bu jian
自知则知之	1	zi zhi ze zhi zhi
彼出于是	1	bi chu yu shi
是亦因彼	1	shi yi yin bi
彼是方生之说也	1	bi shi fang sheng zhi shuo ye
方生方死	1	fang sheng fang si
方死方生	1	fang si fang sheng
方可方不可	1	fang ke fang bu ke
方不可方可	1	fang bu ke fang ke
因是因非	1	yin shi yin fei
因非因是	1	yin fei yin shi
是以圣人不由而照之于天	1	shi yi sheng ren bu you er zhao zhi yu tian
亦因是也	1	yi yin shi ye
是亦彼也	1	shi yi bi ye
彼亦是也	1	bi yi shi ye
彼亦一是非	1	bi yi yi shi fei
此亦一是非	1	ci yi yi shi fei
果且有彼是乎哉	1	guo qie you bi shi hu zai
果且无彼是乎哉	1	guo qie wu bi shi hu zai
彼是莫得其偶	1	bi shi mo de qi ou
谓之道枢	1	wei zhi dao shu
枢始得其环中	1	shu shi de qi huan zhong
以应无穷	1	yi ying wu qiong
是亦一无穷	1	shi yi yi wu qiong
非亦一无穷也	1	fei yi yi wu qiong ye
莫若以明	1	mo ruo yi ming
以指喻指之非指	1	yi zhi yu zhi zhi fei zhi
不若以非指喻指之非指也	1	bu ruo yi fei zhi yu zhi zhi fei zhi ye
以马喻马之非马	1	yi ma yu ma zhi fei ma
不若以非马喻马之非马也	1	bu ruo yi fei ma yu ma zhi fei ma ye
天地一指也	1	tian di yi zhi ye
万物一马也	1	wan wu yi ma ye
不可乎不可	1	bu ke hu bu ke
道行之而成	1	dao hang zhi er cheng
物谓之而然	1	wu wei zhi er ran
恶乎不然	1	e hu bu ran
不然于不然	1	bu ran yu bu ran
物固有所然	1	wu gu you suo ran
物固有所可	1	wu gu you suo ke
无物不然	1	wu wu bu ran
无物不可	1	wu wu bu ke
故为是举莛与楹	1	gu wei shi ju ting yu ying
厉与西施	1	li yu xi shi
恢诡谲怪	1	hui gui jue guai
道通为一	1	dao tong wei yi
凡物无成与毁	1	fan wu wu cheng yu hui
复通为一	1	fu tong wei yi
唯达者知通为一	1	wei da zhe zhi tong wei yi
为是不用而寓诸庸	1	wei shi bu yong er yu zhu yong
适得而几矣	1	shi de er ji yi
已而不知其然谓之道	1	yi er bu zhi qi ran wei zhi dao
劳神明为一而不知其同也	1	lao shen ming wei yi er bu zhi qi tong ye
朝三而暮四	1	chao san er mu si
众狙皆怒	1	zhong ju jie nu
然则朝四而暮三	1	ran ze chao si er mu san
众狙皆悦	1	zhong ju jie yue
名实未亏而喜怒为用	1	ming shi wei kui er xi nu wei yong
是以圣人和之以是非而休乎天钧	1	shi yi sheng ren he zhi yi shi fei er xiu hu tian jun
是之谓两行	1	shi zhi wei liang hang
其知有所至矣	1	qi zhi you suo zhi yi
有以为未始有物者	1	you yi wei wei shi you wu zhe
不可以加矣	1	bu ke yi jia yi
其次以为有物矣	1	qi ci yi wei you wu yi
而未始有封也	1	er wei shi you feng ye
其次以为有封焉	1	qi ci yi wei you feng yan
而未始有是非也	1	er wei shi you shi fei ye
是非之彰也	1	shi fei zhi zhang ye
道之所以亏也	1	dao zhi suo yi kui ye
道之所以亏	1	dao zhi suo yi kui
爱之所以成	1	ai zhi suo yi cheng
果且有成与亏乎哉	1	guo qie you cheng yu kui hu zai
果且无成与亏乎哉	1	guo qie wu cheng yu kui hu zai
有成与亏	1	you cheng yu kui
故昭氏之鼓琴也	1	gu zhao shi zhi gu qin ye
无成与亏	1	wu cheng yu kui
故昭氏之不鼓琴也	1	gu zhao shi zhi bu gu qin ye
昭文之鼓琴也	1	zhao wen zhi gu qin ye
师旷之枝策也	1	shi kuang zhi zhi ce ye
惠子之据梧也	1	hui zi zhi ju wu ye
三子之知几乎皆其盛者也	1	san zi zhi zhi ji hu jie qi sheng zhe ye
故载之末年	1	gu zai zhi mo nian
唯其好之也以异于彼	1	wei qi hao zhi ye yi yi yu bi
其好之也欲以明之	1	qi hao zhi ye yu yi ming zhi
彼非所明而明之	1	bi fei suo ming er ming zhi
故以坚白之昧终	1	gu yi jian bai zhi mei zhong
而其子又以文之纶终	1	er qi zi you yi wen zhi lun zhong
终身无成	1	zhong shen wu cheng
若是而可谓成乎	1	ruo shi er ke wei cheng hu
虽我亦成也	1	sui wo yi cheng ye
若是而不可谓成乎	1	ruo shi er bu ke wei cheng hu
物与我无成也	1	wu yu wo wu cheng ye
是故滑疑之耀	1	shi gu hua yi zhi yao
圣人之所图也	1	sheng ren zhi suo tu ye
今且有言于此	1	jin qie you yan yu ci
不知其与是类乎	1	bu zhi qi yu shi lei hu
其与是不类乎	1	qi yu shi bu lei hu
类与不类	1	lei yu bu lei
相与为类	1	xiang yu wei lei
则与彼无以异矣	1	ze yu bi wu yi yi yi
请尝言之	1	qing chang yan zhi
有始也者	1	you shi ye zhe
有未始有始也者	1	you wei shi you shi ye zhe
有未始有夫未始有始也者	1	you wei shi you fu wei shi you shi ye zhe
有有也者	1	you you ye zhe
有无也者	1	you wu ye zhe
有未始有无也者	1	you wei shi you wu ye zhe
有未始有夫未始有无也者	1	you wei shi you fu wei shi you wu ye zhe
俄而有无矣	1	e er you wu yi
而未知有无之果孰有孰无也	1	er wei zhi you wu zhi guo shu you shu wu ye
今我则已有有谓矣	1	jin wo ze yi you you wei yi
而未知吾所谓之其果有谓乎	1	er wei zhi wu suo wei zhi qi guo you wei hu
其果无谓乎	1	qi guo wu wei hu
夫天下莫大于秋豪之末	1	fu tian xia mo da yu qiu hao zhi mo
而太山为小	1	er tai shan wei xiao
莫寿乎殇子	1	mo shou hu shang zi
而彭祖为夭	1	er peng zu wei yao
天地与我并生	1	tian di yu wo bing sheng
而万物与我为一	1	er wan wu yu wo wei yi
既已为一矣	1	ji yi wei yi yi
且得有言乎	1	qie dei you yan hu
既已谓之一矣	1	ji yi wei zhi yi yi
且得无言乎	1	qie de wu yan hu
一与言为二	1	yi yu yan wei er
二与一为三	1	er yu yi wei san
自此以往	1	zi ci yi wang
巧历不能得	1	qiao li bu neng de
而况其凡乎	1	er kuang qi fan hu
故自无适有	1	gu zi wu shi you
以至于三	1	yi zhi yu san
而况自有适有乎	1	er kuang zi you shi you hu
夫道未始有封	1	fu dao wei shi you feng
言未始有常	1	yan wei shi you chang
为是而有畛也	1	wei shi er you zhen ye
请言其畛	1	qing yan qi zhen
有左有右	1	you zuo you you
有伦有义	1	you lun you yi
有分有辩	1	you fen you bian
有竞有争	1	you jing you zheng
此之谓八德	1	ci zhi wei ba de
圣人存而不论	1	sheng ren cun er bu lun
圣人论而不议	1	sheng ren lun er bu yi
春秋经世先王之志	1	chun qiu jing shi xian wang zhi zhi
圣人议而不辩	1	sheng ren yi er bu bian
故分也者	1	gu fen ye zhe
有不分也	1	you bu fen ye
有不辩也	1	you bu bian ye
圣人怀之	1	sheng ren huai zhi
众人辩之以相示也	1	zhong ren bian zhi yi xiang shi ye
有不见也	1	you bu jian ye
夫大道不称	1	fu da dao bu cheng
大辩不言	1	da bian bu yan
大仁不仁	1	da ren bu ren
大廉不谦	1	da lian bu qian
大勇不忮	1	da yong bu zhi
道昭而不道	1	dao zhao er bu dao
言辩而不及	1	yan bian er bu ji
仁常而不成	1	ren chang er bu cheng
廉清而不信	1	lian qing er bu xin
勇忮而不成	1	yong zhi er bu cheng
五者圆而几向方矣	1	wu zhe yuan er ji xiang fang yi
故知止其所不知	1	gu zhi zhi qi suo bu zhi
孰知不言之辩	1	shu zhi bu yan zhi bian
不道之道	1	bu dao zhi dao
若有能知	1	ruo you neng zhi
此之谓天府	1	ci zhi wei tian fu
注焉而不满	1	zhu yan er bu man
酌焉而不竭	1	zhuo yan er bu jie
而不知其所由来	1	er bu zhi qi suo you lai
此之谓葆光	1	ci zhi wei bao guang
故昔者尧问于舜曰	1	gu xi zhe yao wen yu shun yue
我欲伐宗脍	1	wo yu fa zong kuai
南面而不释然	1	nan mian er bu shi ran
其故何也	1	qi gu he ye
夫三子者	1	fu san zi zhe
犹存乎蓬艾之间	1	you cun hu peng ai zhi jian
若不释然何哉	1	ruo bu shi ran he zai
昔者十日并出	1	xi zhe shi ri bing chu
万物皆照	1	wan wu jie zhao
而况德之进乎日者乎	1	er kuang de zhi jin hu ri zhe hu
啮缺问乎王倪曰	1	nie que wen hu wang ni yue
子知物之所同是乎	1	zi zhi wu zhi suo tong shi hu
吾恶乎知之	1	wu e hu zhi zhi
子知子之所不知邪	1	zi zhi zi zhi suo bu zhi xie
然则物无知邪	1	ran ze wu wu zhi xie
尝试言之	1	chang shi yan zhi
庸讵知吾所谓知之非不知邪	1	yong ju zhi wu suo wei zhi zhi fei bu zhi xie
庸讵知吾所谓不知之非知邪	1	yong ju zhi wu suo wei bu zhi zhi fei zhi xie
且吾尝试问乎女	1	qie wu chang shi wen hu nv
民湿寝则腰疾偏死	1	min shi qin ze yao ji pian si
鳅然乎哉	1	qiu ran hu zai
木处则惴栗恂惧	1	mu chu ze zhui li xun ju
鸱鸦耆鼠	1	chi ya qi shu
四者孰知正味	1	si zhe shu zhi zheng wei
狙以为雌	1	ju yi wei ci
麋与鹿交	1	mi yu lu jiao
鳅与鱼游	1	qiu yu yu you
毛嫱丽姬	1	mao qiang li ji
人之所美也	1	ren zhi suo mei ye
鱼见之深入	1	yu jian zhi shen ru
鸟见之高飞	1	niao jian zhi gao fei
麋鹿见之决骤	1	mi lu jian zhi jue zhou
四者孰知天下之正色哉	1	si zhe shu zhi tian xia zhi zheng se zai
自我观之	1	zi wo guan zhi
仁义之端	1	ren yi zhi duan
是非之涂	1	shi fei zhi tu
樊然淆乱	1	fan ran xiao luan
吾恶能知其辩	1	wu e neng zhi qi bian
子不利害	1	zi bu li hai
则至人固不知利害乎	1	ze zhi ren gu bu zhi li hai hu
至人神矣	1	zhi ren shen yi
大泽焚而不能热	1	da ze fen er bu neng re
河汉冱而不能寒	1	he han hu er bu neng han
疾雷破山	1	ji lei po shan
飘风振海而不能惊	1	piao feng zhen hai er bu neng jing
死生无变于己	1	si sheng wu bian yu ji
而况利害之端乎	1	er kuang li hai zhi duan hu
瞿鹊子问乎长梧子曰	1	qu que zi wen hu zhang wu zi yue
圣人不从事于务	1	sheng ren bu cong shi yu wu
无谓有谓	1	wu wei you wei
有谓无谓	1	you wei wu wei
而游乎尘垢之外	1	er you hu chen gou zhi wai
夫子以为孟浪之言	1	fu zi yi wei meng lang zhi yan
而我以为妙道之行也	1	er wo yi wei miao dao zhi hang ye
吾子以为奚若	1	wu zi yi wei xi ruo
长梧子曰	1	zhang wu zi yue
是皇帝之所听荧也	1	shi huang di zhi suo ting ying ye
而丘也何足以知之	1	er qiu ye he zu yi zhi zhi
且女亦大早计	1	qie nv yi da zao ji
见卵而求时夜	1	jian luan er qiu shi ye
见弹而求	1	jian dan er qiu
予尝为女妄言之	1	yu chang wei nv wang yan zhi
女以妄听之	1	nv yi wang ting zhi
奚旁日月	1	xi pang ri yue
为其吻合	1	wei qi wen he
以隶相尊	1	yi li xiang zun
众人役役	1	zhong ren yi yi
圣人愚钝	1	sheng ren yu dun
参万岁而一成纯	1	can wan sui er yi cheng chun
万物尽然	1	wan wu jin ran
而以是相蕴	1	er yi shi xiang yun
予恶乎知说生之非惑邪	1	yu e hu zhi shuo sheng zhi fei huo xie
予恶乎知恶死之非弱丧而不知归者邪	1	yu e hu zhi e si zhi fei ruo sang er bu zhi gui zhe xie
艾封人之子也	1	ai feng ren zhi zi ye
晋国之始得之也	1	jin guo zhi shi de zhi ye
涕泣沾襟	1	ti qi zhan jin
及其至于王所	1	ji qi zhi yu wang suo
与王同筐床	1	yu wang tong kuang chuang
而后悔其泣也	1	er hou hui qi qi ye
予恶乎知夫死者不悔其始之蕲生乎	1	yu e hu zhi fu si zhe bu hui qi shi zhi qi sheng hu
梦饮酒者	1	meng yin jiu zhe
旦而哭泣	1	dan er ku qi
梦哭泣者	1	meng ku qi zhe
旦而田猎	1	dan er tian lie
方其梦也	1	fang qi meng ye
不知其梦也	1	bu zhi qi meng ye
梦之中又占其梦焉	1	meng zhi zhong you zhan qi meng yan
觉而后知其梦也	1	jiao er hou zhi qi meng ye
且有大觉而后知此其大梦也	1	qie you da jiao er hou zhi ci qi da meng ye
而愚者自以为觉	1	er yu zhe zi yi wei jiao
窃窃然知之	1	qie qie ran zhi zhi
丘也与女皆梦也	1	qiu ye yu nv jie meng ye
予谓女梦亦梦也	1	yu wei nv meng yi meng ye
其名为吊诡	1	qi ming wei diao gui
万世之后而一遇大圣知其解者	1	wan shi zhi hou er yi yu da sheng zhi qi jie zhe
是旦暮遇之也	1	shi dan mu yu zhi ye
既使我与若辩矣	1	ji shi wo yu ruo bian yi
我不若胜	1	wo bu ruo sheng
若果是也	1	ruo guo shi ye
我果非也邪	1	wo guo fei ye xie
若不吾胜	1	ruo bu wu sheng
我果是也	1	wo guo shi ye
而果非也邪	1	er guo fei ye xie
其或是也	1	qi huo shi ye
其或非也邪	1	qi huo fei ye xie
其俱是也	1	qi ju shi ye
其俱非也邪	1	qi ju fei ye xie
我与若不能相知也	1	wo yu ruo bu neng xiang zhi ye
则人固受其	1	ze ren gu shou qi
吾谁使正之	1	wu shui shi zheng zhi
使同乎若者正之	1	shi tong hu ruo zhe zheng zhi
既与若同矣	1	ji yu ruo tong yi
恶能正之	1	e neng zheng zhi
使同乎我者正之	1	shi tong hu wo zhe zheng zhi
既同乎我矣	1	ji tong hu wo yi
使异乎我与若者正之	1	shi yi hu wo yu ruo zhe zheng zhi
既异乎我与若矣	1	ji yi hu wo yu ruo yi
使同乎我与若者正之	1	shi tong hu wo yu ruo zhe zheng zhi
既同乎我与若矣	1	ji tong hu wo yu ruo yi
然则我与若与人俱不能相知也	1	ran ze wo yu ruo yu ren ju bu neng xiang zhi ye
而待彼也邪	1	er dai bi ye xie
何谓和之以天倪	1	he wei he zhi yi tian ni
是若果是也	1	shi ruo guo shi ye
则是之异乎不是也亦无辩	1	ze shi zhi yi hu bu shi ye yi wu bian
然若果然也	1	ran ruo guo ran ye
则然之异乎不然也亦无辩	1	ze ran zhi yi hu bu ran ye yi wu bian
化声之相待	1	hua sheng zhi xiang dai
若其不相待	1	ruo qi bu xiang dai
和之以天倪	1	he zhi yi tian ni
因之以曼衍	1	yin zhi yi man yan
所以穷年也	1	suo yi qiong nian ye
忘年忘义	1	wang nian wang yi
振于无竟	1	zhen yu wu jing
故寓诸无竟	1	gu yu zhu wu jing
罔两问景曰	1	wang liang wen jing yue
何其无特操与	1	he qi wu te cao yu
吾有待而然者邪	1	wu you dai er ran zhe xie
吾所待又有待而然者邪	1	wu suo dai you you dai er ran zhe xie
恶识所以然	1	e shi suo yi ran
恶识所以不然	1	e shi suo yi bu ran
昔者庄周梦为胡蝶	1	xi zhe zhuang zhou meng wei hu die
栩栩然胡蝶也	1	xu xu ran hu die ye
自喻适志与	1	zi yu shi zhi yu
不知周也	1	bu zhi zhou ye
则蘧蘧然周也	1	ze qu qu ran zhou ye
不知周之梦为胡蝶与	1	bu zhi zhou zhi meng wei hu die yu
胡蝶之梦为周与	1	hu die zhi meng wei zhou yu
周与胡蝶则必有分矣	1	zhou yu hu die ze bi you fen yi
此之谓物化	1	ci zhi wei wu hua
庄子内篇养生主第三吾生也有涯	1	zhuang zi nei pian yang sheng zhu di san wu sheng ye you ya
以有涯随无涯	1	yi you ya sui wu ya
已而为知者	1	yi er wei zhi zhe
殆而已矣	1	dai er yi yi
为善无近名	1	wei shan wu jin ming
为恶无近刑	1	wei e wu jin xing
缘督以为经	1	yuan du yi wei jing
可以保身	1	ke yi bao shen
可以全生	1	ke yi quan sheng
可以养亲	1	ke yi yang qin
可以尽年	1	ke yi jin nian
庖丁为文惠君解牛	1	pao ding wei wen hui jun jie niu
手之所触	1	shou zhi suo chu
肩之所倚	1	jian zhi suo yi
足之所履	1	zu zhi suo lv
膝之所倚	1	xi zhi suo yi
莫不中音	1	mo bu zhong yin
合于桑林之舞	1	he yu sang lin zhi wu
乃中经首之会	1	nai zhong jing shou zhi hui
文惠君曰	1	wen hui jun yue
技盖至此乎	1	ji gai zhi ci hu
庖丁释刀对曰	1	pao ding shi dao dui yue
臣之所好者道也	1	chen zhi suo hao zhe dao ye
进乎技矣	1	jin hu ji yi
始臣之解牛之时	1	shi chen zhi jie niu zhi shi
所见无非全牛者	1	suo jian wu fei quan niu zhe
三年之后	1	san nian zhi hou
未尝见全牛也	1	wei chang jian quan niu ye
方今之时	1	fang jin zhi shi
臣以神遇而不以目视	1	chen yi shen yu er bu yi mu shi
官知止而神欲行	1	guan zhi zhi er shen yu xing
依乎天理	1	yi hu tian li
因其固然	1	yin qi gu ran
技经肯綮之未尝	1	ji jing ken qi zhi wei chang
良庖岁更刀	1	liang pao sui geng dao
族庖月更刀	1	zu pao yue geng dao
今臣之刀十九年矣	1	jin chen zhi dao shi jiu nian yi
所解数千牛矣	1	suo xie shu qian niu yi
而刀刃若新发于硎	1	er dao ren ruo xin fa yu xing
彼节者有间而刀刃者无厚	1	bi jie zhe you jian er dao ren zhe wu hou
以无厚入有间	1	yi wu hou ru you jian
恢恢乎其于游刃必有余地矣	1	hui hui hu qi yu you ren bi you yu di yi
是以十九年而刀刃若新发于硎	1	shi yi shi jiu nian er dao ren ruo xin fa yu xing
每至于族	1	mei zhi yu zu
吾见其难为	1	wu jian qi nan wei
怵然为戒	1	chu ran wei jie
动刀甚微	1	dong dao shen wei
如土委地	1	ru tu wei di
提刀而立	1	ti dao er li
为之而四顾	1	wei zhi er si gu
为之踌躇满志	1	wei zhi chou chu man zhi
善刀而藏之	1	shan dao er cang zhi
吾闻庖丁之言	1	wu wen pao ding zhi yan
得养生焉	1	de yang sheng yan
公文轩见右师而惊曰	1	gong wen xuan jian you shi er jing yue
是何人也	1	shi he ren ye
恶乎介也	1	e hu jie ye
天之生是使独也	1	tian zhi sheng shi shi du ye
人之貌有与也	1	ren zhi mao you yu ye
以是知其天也	1	yi shi zhi qi tian ye
泽雉十步一啄	1	ze zhi shi bu yi zhuo
百步一饮	1	bai bu yi yin
不蕲畜乎樊中	1	bu qi chu hu fan zhong
秦失吊之	1	qin shi diao zhi
三号而出	1	san hao er chu
非夫子之友邪	1	fei fu zi zhi you xie
然则吊焉若此可乎	1	ran ze diao yan ruo ci ke hu
始也吾以为其人也	1	shi ye wu yi wei qi ren ye
而今非也	1	er jin fei ye
向吾入而吊焉	1	xiang wu ru er diao yan
有老者哭之	1	you lao zhe ku zhi
如哭其子	1	ru ku qi zi
少者哭之	1	shao zhe ku zhi
如哭其母	1	ru ku qi mu
彼其所以会之	1	bi qi suo yi hui zhi
必有不蕲言而言	1	bi you bu qi yan er yan
不蕲哭而哭者	1	bu qi ku er ku zhe
是遁天倍情	1	shi dun tian bei qing
忘其所受	1	wang qi suo shou
古者谓之遁天之刑	1	gu zhe wei zhi dun tian zhi xing
夫子时也	1	fu zi shi ye
夫子顺也	1	fu zi shun ye
安时而处顺	1	an shi er chu shun
哀乐不能入也	1	ai le bu neng ru ye
古者谓是帝之县解	1	gu zhe wei shi di zhi xian jie
指穷于为薪	1	zhi qiong yu wei xin
不知其尽也	1	bu zhi qi jin ye
庄子内篇人间世第四颜回见仲尼	1	zhuang zi nei pian ren jian shi di si yan hui jian zhong ni
回闻卫君	1	hui wen wei jun
轻用其国而不见其过	1	qing yong qi guo er bu jian qi guo
轻用民死	1	qing yong min si
死者以国量	1	si zhe yi guo liang
乎泽若蕉	1	hu ze ruo jiao
民其无如矣	1	min qi wu ru yi
回尝闻之夫子曰	1	hui chang wen zhi fu zi yue
治国去之	1	zhi guo qu zhi
乱国就之	1	luan guo jiu zhi
医门多疾	1	yi men duo ji
愿以所闻思其则	1	yuan yi suo wen si qi ze
庶几其国有瘳乎	1	shu ji qi guo you chou hu
若殆往而刑耳	1	ruo dai wang er xing er
夫道不欲杂	1	fu dao bu yu za
忧而不救	1	you er bu jiu
古之至人	1	gu zhi zhi ren
先存诸己而后存诸人	1	xian cun zhu ji er hou cun zhu ren
所存于己者未定	1	suo cun yu ji zhe wei ding
何暇至于暴人之所行	1	he xia zhi yu bao ren zhi suo hang
且若亦知夫德之所荡而知之所为出乎哉	1	qie ruo yi zhi fu de zhi suo dang er zhi zhi suo wei chu hu zai
德荡乎名	1	de dang hu ming
知出乎争	1	zhi chu hu zheng
知也者争之器也	1	zhi ye zhe zheng zhi qi ye
二者凶器	1	er zhe xiong qi
非所以尽行也	1	fei suo yi jin hang ye
且德厚信	1	qie de hou xin
未达人气	1	wei da ren qi
名闻不争	1	ming wen bu zheng
未达人心	1	wei da ren xin
而强以仁义绳墨之言	1	er qiang yi ren yi sheng mo zhi yan
暴人之前者	1	bao ren zhi qian zhe
是以人恶有其美也	1	shi yi ren e you qi mei ye
命之曰灾人	1	ming zhi yue zai ren
人必反灾之	1	ren bi fan zai zhi
若殆为人灾夫	1	ruo dai wei ren zai fu
且苟为人悦贤而恶不肖	1	qie gou wei ren yue xian er e bu xiao
恶用而求有以异	1	e yong er qiu you yi yi
若唯无诏	1	ruo wei wu zhao
王公必将乘人而斗其捷	1	wang gong bi jiang cheng ren er dou qi jie
而目将荧之	1	er mu jiang ying zhi
而色将平之	1	er se jiang ping zhi
口将营之	1	kou jiang ying zhi
容将形之	1	rong jiang xing zhi
心且成之	1	xin qie cheng zhi
是以火救火	1	shi yi huo jiu huo
以水救水	1	yi shui jiu shui
名之曰益多	1	ming zhi yue yi duo
顺始无穷	1	shun shi wu qiong
若殆以不信厚言	1	ruo dai yi bu xin hou yan
必死于暴人之前矣	1	bi si yu bao ren zhi qian yi
且昔者桀杀关龙逢	1	qie xi zhe jie sha guan long feng
纣杀王子比干	1	zhou sha wang zi bi gan
是皆修其身以下伛拊人之民	1	shi jie xiu qi shen yi xia yu fu ren zhi min
以下拂其上者也	1	yi xia fu qi shang zhe ye
故其君因其修以挤之	1	gu qi jun yin qi xiu yi ji zhi
是好名者也	1	shi hao ming zhe ye
昔者尧攻丛枝	1	xi zhe yao gong cong zhi
禹攻有扈	1	yu gong you hu
国为虚厉	1	guo wei xu li
身为刑戮	1	shen wei xing lu
其用兵不止	1	qi yong bing bu zhi
其求实无已	1	qi qiu shi wu yi
是皆求名实者也	1	shi jie qiu ming shi zhe ye
而独不闻之乎	1	er du bu wen zhi hu
圣人之所不能胜也	1	sheng ren zhi suo bu neng sheng ye
而况若乎	1	er kuang ruo hu
若必有以也	1	ruo bi you yi ye
尝以语我来	1	chang yi yu wo lai
夫以阳为充孔扬	1	fu yi yang wei chong kong yang
采色不定	1	cai se bu ding
常人之所不违	1	chang ren zhi suo bu wei
因案人之所感	1	yin an ren zhi suo gan
以求容与其心	1	yi qiu rong yu qi xin
名之曰日渐之德不成	1	ming zhi yue ri jian zhi de bu cheng
而况大德乎	1	er kuang da de hu
将执而不化	1	jiang zhi er bu hua
外合而内不訾	1	wai he er nei bu zi
其庸讵可乎	1	qi yong ju ke hu
然则我内直而外曲	1	ran ze wo nei zhi er wai qu
成而上比	1	cheng er shang bi
与天为徒	1	yu tian wei tu
与天为徒者	1	yu tian wei tu zhe
知天子之与己	1	zhi tian zi zhi yu ji
皆天之所子	1	jie tian zhi suo zi
而独以己言蕲乎而人善之	1	er du yi ji yan qi hu er ren shan zhi
蕲乎而人不善之邪	1	qi hu er ren bu shan zhi xie
人谓之童子	1	ren wei zhi tong zi
是之谓与天为徒	1	shi zhi wei yu tian wei tu
与人之为徒也	1	yu ren zhi wei tu ye
擎跽曲拳	1	qing ji qu quan
人臣之礼也	1	ren chen zhi li ye
人皆为之	1	ren jie wei zhi
吾敢不为邪	1	wu gan bu wei xie
为人之所为者	1	wei ren zhi suo wei zhe
人亦无疵焉	1	ren yi wu ci yan
是之谓与人为徒	1	shi zhi wei yu ren wei tu
成而上比者	1	cheng er shang bi zhe
与古为徒	1	yu gu wei tu
其言虽教	1	qi yan sui jiao
谪之实也	1	zhe zhi shi ye
古之有也	1	gu zhi you ye
非吾有也	1	fei wu you ye
虽直而不病	1	sui zhi er bu bing
是之谓与古为徒	1	shi zhi wei yu gu wei tu
若是则可乎	1	ruo shi ze ke hu
大多政法而不谍	1	da duo zheng fa er bu die
止是耳矣	1	zhi shi er yi
夫胡可以及化	1	fu hu ke yi ji hua
犹师心者也	1	you shi xin zhe ye
吾无以进矣	1	wu wu yi jin yi
吾将语若	1	wu jiang yu ruo
有心而为之	1	you xin er wei zhi
回之家贫	1	hui zhi jia pin
唯不饮酒不茹荤者数月矣	1	wei bu yin jiu bu ru hun zhe shu yue yi
如此则可以为斋乎	1	ru ci ze ke yi wei zhai hu
是祭祀之斋	1	shi ji si zhi zhai
非心斋也	1	fei xin zhai ye
敢问心斋	1	gan wen xin zhai
无听之以耳而听之以心	1	wu ting zhi yi er er ting zhi yi xin
无听之以心而听之以气	1	wu ting zhi yi xin er ting zhi yi qi
听止于耳	1	ting zhi yu er
心止于符	1	xin zhi yu fu
虚而待物者也	1	xu er dai wu zhe ye
唯道集虚	1	wei dao ji xu
回之未始得使	1	hui zhi wei shi de shi
实自回也	1	shi zi hui ye
得使之也	1	de shi zhi ye
未始有回也	1	wei shi you hui ye
可谓虚乎	1	ke wei xu hu
若能入游其樊而无感其名	1	ruo neng ru you qi fan er wu gan qi ming
不入则止	1	bu ru ze zhi
无门无毒	1	wu men wu du
一宅而寓于不得已则几矣	1	yi zhai er yu yu bu de yi ze ji yi
无行地难	1	wu hang di nan
为人使易以伪	1	wei ren shi yi yi wei
为天使难以伪	1	wei tian shi nan yi wei
闻以有翼飞者矣	1	wen yi you yi fei zhe yi
未闻以无翼飞者也	1	wei wen yi wu yi fei zhe ye
闻以有知知者矣	1	wen yi you zhi zhi zhe yi
未闻以无知知者也	1	wei wen yi wu zhi zhi zhe ye
瞻彼阕者	1	zhan bi que zhe
虚室生白	1	xu shi sheng bai
吉祥止止	1	ji xiang zhi zhi
夫且不止	1	fu qie bu zhi
是之谓坐驰	1	shi zhi wei zuo chi
夫徇耳目内通而外于心知	1	fu xun er mu nei tong er wai yu xin zhi
鬼神将来舍	1	gui shen jiang lai she
而况人乎	1	er kuang ren hu
是万物之化也	1	shi wan wu zhi hua ye
舜之所纽也	1	shun zhi suo niu ye
几蘧之所行终	1	ji qu zhi suo hang zhong
而况散焉者乎	1	er kuang san yan zhe hu
叶公子高将使于齐	1	ye gong zi gao jiang shi yu qi
问于仲尼曰	1	wen yu zhong ni yue
王使诸梁也甚重	1	wang shi zhu liang ye shen zhong
齐之待使者	1	qi zhi dai shi zhe
盖将甚敬而不急	1	gai jiang shen jing er bu ji
匹夫犹未可动也	1	pi fu you wei ke dong ye
吾甚栗之	1	wu shen li zhi
子常语诸梁也曰	1	zi chang yu zhu liang ye yue
凡事若小若大	1	fan shi ruo xiao ruo da
寡不道以欢成	1	gua bu dao yi huan cheng
事若不成	1	shi ruo bu cheng
则必有人道之患	1	ze bi you ren dao zhi huan
则必有阴阳之患	1	ze bi you yin yang zhi huan
若成若不成而后无患者	1	ruo cheng ruo bu cheng er hou wu huan zhe
唯有德者能之	1	wei you de zhe neng zhi
吾食也执粗而不臧	1	wu shi ye zhi cu er bu zang
爨无欲清之人	1	cuan wu yu qing zhi ren
今吾朝受命而夕饮冰	1	jin wu chao shou ming er xi yin bing
我其内热与	1	wo qi nei re yu
吾未至乎事之情而既有阴阳之患矣	1	wu wei zhi hu shi zhi qing er ji you yin yang zhi huan yi
必有人道之患	1	bi you ren dao zhi huan
为人臣者不足以任之	1	wei ren chen zhe bu zu yi ren zhi
子其有以语我来	1	zi qi you yi yu wo lai
天下有大戒二	1	tian xia you da jie er
其一命也	1	qi yi ming ye
其一义也	1	qi yi yi ye
子之爱亲	1	zi zhi ai qin
不可解于心	1	bu ke jie yu xin
臣之事君	1	chen zhi shi jun
无适而非君也	1	wu shi er fei jun ye
无所逃于天地之间	1	wu suo tao yu tian di zhi jian
是之谓大戒	1	shi zhi wei da jie
是以夫事其亲者	1	shi yi fu shi qi qin zhe
不择地而安之	1	bu ze di er an zhi
孝之至也	1	xiao zhi zhi ye
夫事其君者	1	fu shi qi jun zhe
不择事而安之	1	bu ze shi er an zhi
忠之盛也	1	zhong zhi sheng ye
自事其心者	1	zi shi qi xin zhe
哀乐不易施乎前	1	ai le bu yi shi hu qian
知其不可奈何而安之若命	1	zhi qi bu ke nai he er an zhi ruo ming
德之至也	1	de zhi zhi ye
为人臣子者	1	wei ren chen zi zhe
固有所不得已	1	gu you suo bu de yi
行事之情而忘其身	1	xing shi zhi qing er wang qi shen
何暇至于悦生而恶死	1	he xia zhi yu yue sheng er e si
夫子其行可矣	1	fu zi qi hang ke yi
丘请复以所闻	1	qiu qing fu yi suo wen
凡交近则必相靡以信	1	fan jiao jin ze bi xiang mi yi xin
远则必忠之以言	1	yuan ze bi zhong zhi yi yan
言必或传之	1	yan bi huo chuan zhi
夫传两喜两怒之言	1	fu chuan liang xi liang nu zhi yan
天下之难者也	1	tian xia zhi nan zhe ye
夫两喜必多溢美之言	1	fu liang xi bi duo yi mei zhi yan
两怒必多溢恶之言	1	liang nu bi duo yi e zhi yan
凡溢之类妄	1	fan yi zhi lei wang
妄则其信之也莫	1	wang ze qi xin zhi ye mo
莫则传言者殃	1	mo ze chuan yan zhe yang
故法言曰	1	gu fa yan yue
传其常情	1	chuan qi chang qing
无传其溢言	1	wu chuan qi yi yan
则几乎全	1	ze ji hu quan
且以巧斗力者	1	qie yi qiao dou li zhe
常卒乎阴	1	chang zu hu yin
泰至则多奇巧	1	tai zhi ze duo qi qiao
以礼饮酒者	1	yi li yin jiu zhe
常卒乎乱	1	chang zu hu luan
泰至则多奇乐	1	tai zhi ze duo qi le
凡事亦然	1	fan shi yi ran
常卒乎鄙	1	chang zu hu bi
其作始也简	1	qi zuo shi ye jian
其将毕也必巨	1	qi jiang bi ye bi ju
夫风波易以动	1	fu feng bo yi yi dong
实丧易以危	1	shi sang yi yi wei
故忿设无由	1	gu fen she wu you
巧言偏辞	1	qiao yan pian ci
兽死不择音	1	shou si bu ze yin
气息勃然于是并生心厉	1	qi xi bo ran yu shi bing sheng xin li
则必有不肖之心应之而不知其然也	1	ze bi you bu xiao zhi xin ying zhi er bu zhi qi ran ye
苟为不知其然也	1	gou wei bu zhi qi ran ye
孰知其所终	1	shu zhi qi suo zhong
过度益也	1	guo du yi ye
迁令劝成殆事	1	qian ling quan cheng dai shi
美成在久	1	mei cheng zai jiu
恶成不及改	1	e cheng bu ji gai
且夫乘物以游心	1	qie fu cheng wu yi you xin
托不得已以养中	1	tuo bu de yi yi yang zhong
何作为报也	1	he zuo wei bao ye
莫若为致命	1	mo ruo wei zhi ming
此其难者	1	ci qi nan zhe
颜阖将傅卫灵公大子	1	yan he jiang fu wei ling gong da zi
而问于蘧伯玉曰	1	er wen yu qu bo yu yue
有人于此	1	you ren yu ci
其德天杀	1	qi de tian sha
与之为无方则危吾国	1	yu zhi wei wu fang ze wei wu guo
与之为有方则危吾身	1	yu zhi wei you fang ze wei wu shen
其知适足以知人之过	1	qi zhi shi zu yi zhi ren zhi guo
而不知其所以过	1	er bu zhi qi suo yi guo
吾奈之何	1	wu nai zhi he
蘧伯玉曰	1	qu bo yu yue
善哉问乎	1	shan zai wen hu
正女身哉	1	zheng nv shen zai
形莫若就	1	xing mo ruo jiu
心莫若和	1	xin mo ruo he
之二者有患	1	zhi er zhe you huan
就不欲入	1	jiu bu yu ru
和不欲出	1	he bu yu chu
形就而入	1	xing jiu er ru
且为颠为灭	1	qie wei dian wei mie
为崩为蹶	1	wei beng wei jue
心和而出	1	xin he er chu
且为声为名	1	qie wei sheng wei ming
为妖为孽	1	wei yao wei nie
彼且为婴儿	1	bi qie wei ying er
亦与之为婴儿	1	yi yu zhi wei ying er
彼且为无町畦	1	bi qie wei wu ding qi
亦与之为无町畦	1	yi yu zhi wei wu ding qi
彼且为无崖	1	bi qie wei wu ya
亦与之为无崖	1	yi yu zhi wei wu ya
入于无疵	1	ru yu wu ci
汝不知夫螳螂乎	1	ru bu zhi fu tang lang hu
怒其臂以当车辙	1	nu qi bi yi dang che zhe
不知其不胜任也	1	bu zhi qi bu sheng ren ye
是其才之美者也	1	shi qi cai zhi mei zhe ye
积伐而美者以犯之	1	ji fa er mei zhe yi fan zhi
汝不知夫养虎者乎	1	ru bu zhi fu yang hu zhe hu
不敢以生物与之	1	bu gan yi sheng wu yu zhi
为其杀之之怒也	1	wei qi sha zhi zhi nu ye
不敢以全物与之	1	bu gan yi quan wu yu zhi
为其决之之怒也	1	wei qi jue zhi zhi nu ye
时其饥饱	1	shi qi ji bao
达其怒心	1	da qi nu xin
虎之与人异类	1	hu zhi yu ren yi lei
而媚养己者	1	er mei yang ji zhe
故其杀者	1	gu qi sha zhe
夫爱马者	1	fu ai ma zhe
以筐盛矢	1	yi kuang sheng shi
以蜃盛溺	1	yi shen sheng ni
适有蚊虻仆缘	1	shi you wen meng pu yuan
而拊之不时	1	er fu zhi bu shi
则缺衔毁首碎胸	1	ze que xian hui shou sui xiong
意有所至而爱有所亡	1	yi you suo zhi er ai you suo wang
可不慎邪	1	ke bu shen xie
匠石之齐	1	jiang shi zhi qi
至于曲辕	1	zhi yu qu yuan
见栎社树	1	jian li she shu
其大蔽牛	1	qi da bi niu
其高临山十仞而后有枝	1	qi gao lin shan shi ren er hou you zhi
其可以舟者旁十数	1	qi ke yi zhou zhe pang shi shu
观者如市	1	guan zhe ru shi
匠伯不顾	1	jiang bo bu gu
遂行不辍	1	sui xing bu chuo
弟子厌观之	1	di zi yan guan zhi
走及匠石	1	zou ji jiang shi
自吾执斧斤以随夫子	1	zi wu zhi fu jin yi sui fu zi
未尝见材如此其美也	1	wei chang jian cai ru ci qi mei ye
先生不肯视	1	xian sheng bu ken shi
勿言之矣	1	wu yan zhi yi
以为舟则沉	1	yi wei zhou ze chen
以为棺椁则速腐	1	yi wei guan guo ze su fu
以为器则速毁	1	yi wei qi ze su hui
以为门户则液	1	yi wei men hu ze ye
以为柱则蠹	1	yi wei zhu ze du
是不材之木也	1	shi bu cai zhi mu ye
故能若是之寿	1	gu neng ruo shi zhi shou
栎社见梦曰	1	li she jian meng yue
女将恶乎比予哉	1	nv jiang e hu bi yu zai
若将比予于文木邪	1	ruo jiang bi yu yu wen mu xie
夫楂梨橘柚果	1	fu zha li ju you guo
实熟则剥	1	shi shu ze bo
此以其能苦其生者也	1	ci yi qi neng ku qi sheng zhe ye
故不终其天年而中道夭	1	gu bu zhong qi tian nian er zhong dao yao
自掊击于世俗者也	1	zi pou ji yu shi su zhe ye
物莫不若是	1	wu mo bu ruo shi
且予求无所可用久矣	1	qie yu qiu wu suo ke yong jiu yi
乃今得之	1	nai jin de zhi
为予大用	1	wei yu da yong
使予也而有用	1	shi yu ye er you yong
且得有此大也邪	1	qie dei you ci da ye xie
且也若与予也皆物也	1	qie ye ruo yu yu ye jie wu ye
奈何哉其相物也	1	nai he zai qi xiang wu ye
而几死之散人	1	er ji si zhi san ren
又恶知散木	1	you e zhi san mu
匠石觉而诊其梦	1	jiang shi jiao er zhen qi meng
趣取无用	1	qu qu wu yong
则为社何邪	1	ze wei she he xie
彼亦直寄焉	1	bi yi zhi ji yan
以为不知己者诟厉也	1	yi wei bu zhi ji zhe gou li ye
不为社者	1	bu wei she zhe
且几有翦乎	1	qie ji you jian hu
且也彼其所保与众异	1	qie ye bi qi suo bao yu zhong yi
而以义喻之	1	er yi yi yu zhi
南伯子綦游乎商之丘	1	nan bo zi qi you hu shang zhi qiu
见大木焉	1	jian da mu yan
结驷千乘	1	jie si qian cheng
将芘其所	1	jiang pi qi suo
此何木也哉	1	ci he mu ye zai
此必有异材夫	1	ci bi you yi cai fu
仰而视其细枝	1	yang er shi qi xi zhi
则拳曲而不可以为栋梁	1	ze quan qu er bu ke yi wei dong liang
俯而视其大根	1	fu er shi qi da gen
则轴解而不可以为棺椁	1	ze zhou jie er bu ke yi wei guan guo
则口烂而为伤	1	ze kou lan er wei shang
则使人狂醒三日而不已	1	ze shi ren kuang xing san ri er bu yi
此果不材之木也	1	ci guo bu cai zhi mu ye
以至于此其大也	1	yi zhi yu ci qi da ye
醒三日而不已	1	xing san ri er bu yi
神人以此不材	1	shen ren yi ci bu cai
宋有荆氏者	1	song you jing shi zhe
宜楸柏桑	1	yi qiu bai sang
其拱把而上者	1	qi gong ba er shang zhe
求狙猴之	1	qiu ju hou zhi
三围四围	1	san wei si wei
求高名之丽者斩之	1	qiu gao ming zhi li zhe zhan zhi
七围八围	1	qi wei ba wei
贵人富商之家求禅傍者斩之	1	gui ren fu shang zhi jia qiu chan bang zhe zhan zhi
故未终其天年而中道之夭于斧斤	1	gu wei zhong qi tian nian er zhong dao zhi yao yu fu jin
此材之患也	1	ci cai zhi huan ye
故解之以牛之白颡者	1	gu jie zhi yi niu zhi bai sang zhe
与豚之亢鼻者	1	yu tun zhi kang bi zhe
与人有痔病者	1	yu ren you zhi bing zhe
不可以适河	1	bu ke yi shi he
此皆巫祝以知之矣	1	ci jie wu zhu yi zhi zhi yi
所以为不祥也	1	suo yi wei bu xiang ye
此乃神人之所以为大祥也	1	ci nai shen ren zhi suo yi wei da xiang ye
支离疏者	1	zhi li shu zhe
颐隐于齐	1	yi yin yu qi
肩高于顶	1	jian gao yu ding
会撮指天	1	hui cuo zhi tian
五管在上	1	wu guan zai shang
两髀为胁	1	liang bi wei xie
鼓荚播精	1	gu jia bo jing
足以食十人	1	zu yi shi shi ren
上征武士	1	shang zheng wu shi
则支离攘臂于其间	1	ze zhi li rang bi yu qi jian
上有大役	1	shang you da yi
则支离以有常疾不受功	1	ze zhi li yi you chang ji bu shou gong
上与病者粟	1	shang yu bing zhe su
则受三锺与十束薪	1	ze shou san zhong yu shi shu xin
夫支离者其形者	1	fu zhi li zhe qi xing zhe
犹足以养其身	1	you zu yi yang qi shen
终其天年	1	zhong qi tian nian
又况支离其德者乎	1	you kuang zhi li qi de zhe hu
孔子适楚	1	kong zi shi chu
楚狂接舆游其门曰	1	chu kuang jie yu you qi men yue
何如德之衰也	1	he ru de zhi shuai ye
来世不可待	1	lai shi bu ke dai
往世不可追也	1	wang shi bu ke zhui ye
圣人成焉	1	sheng ren cheng yan
圣人生焉	1	sheng ren sheng yan
仅免刑焉	1	jin mian xing yan
福轻乎羽	1	fu qing hu yu
莫之知载	1	mo zhi zhi zai
祸重乎地	1	huo zhong hu di
莫之知避	1	mo zhi zhi bi
临人以德	1	lin ren yi de
画地而趋	1	hua di er qu
迷阳迷阳	1	mi yang mi yang
无伤吾行	1	wu shang wu hang
无伤吾足	1	wu shang wu zu
人皆知有用之用	1	ren jie zhi you yong zhi yong
而莫知无用之用也	1	er mo zhi wu yong zhi yong ye
庄子内篇德充符第五鲁有兀者王骀	1	zhuang zi nei pian de chong fu di wu lu you wu zhe wang tai
从之游者与仲尼相若	1	cong zhi you zhe yu zhong ni xiang ruo
常季问于仲尼曰	1	chang ji wen yu zhong ni yue
从之游者与夫子中分鲁	1	cong zhi you zhe yu fu zi zhong fen lu
固有不言之教	1	gu you bu yan zhi jiao
无形而心成者邪	1	wu xing er xin cheng zhe xie
丘也直后而未往耳	1	qiu ye zhi hou er wei wang er
丘将以为师	1	qiu jiang yi wei shi
而况不若丘者乎	1	er kuang bu ruo qiu zhe hu
奚假鲁国	1	xi jia lu guo
丘将引天下而与从之	1	qiu jiang yin tian xia er yu cong zhi
彼兀者也	1	bi wu zhe ye
而王先生	1	er wang xian sheng
其与庸亦远矣	1	qi yu yong yi yuan yi
其用心也	1	qi yong xin ye
独若之何	1	du ruo zhi he
死生亦大矣	1	si sheng yi da yi
而不得与之变	1	er bu de yu zhi bian
虽天地覆坠	1	sui tian di fu zhui
亦将不与之遗	1	yi jiang bu yu zhi yi
审乎无假而不与物迁	1	shen hu wu jia er bu yu wu qian
命物之化而守其宗也	1	ming wu zhi hua er shou qi zong ye
自其异者视之	1	zi qi yi zhe shi zhi
肝胆楚越也	1	gan dan chu yue ye
自其同者视之	1	zi qi tong zhe shi zhi
万物皆一也	1	wan wu jie yi ye
夫若然者	1	fu ruo ran zhe
且不知耳目之所宜	1	qie bu zhi er mu zhi suo yi
而游心乎德之和	1	er you xin hu de zhi he
物视其所一而不见其所丧	1	wu shi qi suo yi er bu jian qi suo sang
视丧其足犹遗土也	1	shi sang qi zu you yi tu ye
以其知得其心	1	yi qi zhi de qi xin
以其心得其常心	1	yi qi xin de qi chang xin
物何为最之哉	1	wu he wei zui zhi zai
人莫鉴于流水而鉴于止水	1	ren mo jian yu liu shui er jian yu zhi shui
唯止能止众止	1	wei zhi neng zhi zhong zhi
受命于地	1	shou ming yu di
唯松柏独也正	1	wei song bai du ye zheng
在冬夏青青	1	zai dong xia qing qing
受命于天	1	shou ming yu tian
舜独也正	1	shun du ye zheng
在万物之首	1	zai wan wu zhi shou
幸能正生	1	xing neng zheng sheng
以正众生	1	yi zheng zhong sheng
夫保始之徵	1	fu bao shi zhi zheng
不惧之实	1	bu ju zhi shi
勇士一人	1	yong shi yi ren
雄入于九军	1	xiong ru yu jiu jun
将求名而能自要者而犹若是	1	jiang qiu ming er neng zi yao zhe er you ruo shi
而况官天地	1	er kuang guan tian di
直寓六骸	1	zhi yu liu hai
一知之所知而心未尝死者乎	1	yi zhi zhi suo zhi er xin wei chang si zhe hu
彼且择日而登假	1	bi qie ze ri er deng jia
人则从是也	1	ren ze cong shi ye
彼且何肯以物为事乎	1	bi qie he ken yi wu wei shi hu
而与郑子产同师于伯昏无人	1	er yu zheng zi chan tong shi yu bo hun wu ren
子产谓申徒嘉曰	1	zi chan wei shen tu jia yue
我先出则子止	1	wo xian chu ze zi zhi
子先出则我止	1	zi xian chu ze wo zhi
又与合堂同席而坐	1	you yu he tang tong xi er zuo
今我将出	1	jin wo jiang chu
子可以止乎	1	zi ke yi zhi hu
且子见执政而不违	1	qie zi jian zhi zheng er bu wei
子齐执政乎	1	zi qi zhi zheng hu
申徒嘉曰	1	shen tu jia yue
先生之门固有执政焉如此哉	1	xian sheng zhi men gu you zhi zheng yan ru ci zai
子而说子之执政而后人者也	1	zi er shuo zi zhi zhi zheng er hou ren zhe ye
鉴明则尘垢不止	1	jian ming ze chen gou bu zhi
止则不明也	1	zhi ze bu ming ye
久与贤人处则无过	1	jiu yu xian ren chu ze wu guo
今子之所取大者	1	jin zi zhi suo qu da zhe
而犹出言若是	1	er you chu yan ruo shi
不亦过乎	1	bu yi guo hu
子既若是矣	1	zi ji ruo shi yi
犹与尧争善	1	you yu yao zheng shan
计子之德	1	ji zi zhi de
不足以自反邪	1	bu zu yi zi fan xie
自状其过以不当亡者众	1	zi zhuang qi guo yi bu dang wang zhe zhong
不状其过以不当存者寡	1	bu zhuang qi guo yi bu dang cun zhe gua
知不可奈何而安之若命	1	zhi bu ke nai he er an zhi ruo ming
游于羿之彀中	1	you yu yi zhi gou zhong
然而不中者	1	ran er bu zhong zhe
人以其全足笑吾不全足者众矣	1	ren yi qi quan zu xiao wu bu quan zu zhe zhong yi
我怫然而怒	1	wo fu ran er nu
而适先生之所	1	er shi xian sheng zhi suo
则废然而反	1	ze fei ran er fan
不知先生之洗我以善邪	1	bu zhi xian sheng zhi xi wo yi shan xie
吾之自寐邪	1	wu zhi zi mei xie
吾与夫子游十九年	1	wu yu fu zi you shi jiu nian
而未尝知吾兀者也	1	er wei chang zhi wu wu zhe ye
今子与我游于形骸之内	1	jin zi yu wo you yu xing hai zhi nei
而子索我于形骸之外	1	er zi suo wo yu xing hai zhi wai
子产蹴然改容更貌曰	1	zi chan cu ran gai rong geng mao yue
子无乃称	1	zi wu nai cheng
鲁有兀者叔山无趾	1	lu you wu zhe shu shan wu zhi
踵见仲尼	1	zhong jian zhong ni
前既犯患若是矣	1	qian ji fan huan ruo shi yi
吾唯不知务而轻用吾身	1	wu wei bu zhi wu er qing yong wu shen
吾是以亡足	1	wu shi yi wang zu
今吾来也	1	jin wu lai ye
犹有尊足者存	1	you you zun zu zhe cun
吾是以务全之也	1	wu shi yi wu quan zhi ye
夫天无不覆	1	fu tian wu bu fu
地无不载	1	di wu bu zai
吾以夫子为天地	1	wu yi fu zi wei tian di
安知夫子之犹若是也	1	an zhi fu zi zhi you ruo shi ye
丘则陋矣	1	qiu ze lou yi
夫子胡不入乎	1	fu zi hu bu ru hu
请讲以所闻	1	qing jiang yi suo wen
弟子勉之	1	di zi mian zhi
犹务学以复补前行之恶	1	you wu xue yi fu bu qian xing zhi e
而况全德之人乎	1	er kuang quan de zhi ren hu
无趾语老聃曰	1	wu zhi yu lao dan yue
孔丘之于至人	1	kong qiu zhi yu zhi ren
彼何宾宾以学子为	1	bi he bin bin yi xue zi wei
彼且以蕲以	1	bi qie yi qi yi
诡幻怪之名闻	1	gui huan guai zhi ming wen
不知至人之以是为己桎梏邪	1	bu zhi zhi ren zhi yi shi wei ji zhi gu xie
胡不直使彼以死生为一条	1	hu bu zhi shi bi yi si sheng wei yi tiao
以可不可为一贯者	1	yi ke bu ke wei yi guan zhe
解其桎梏	1	jie qi zhi gu
鲁哀公问于仲尼曰	1	lu ai gong wen yu zhong ni yue
卫有恶人焉	1	wei you e ren yan
曰哀骀它	1	yue ai tai ta
丈夫与之处者	1	zhang fu yu zhi chu zhe
思而不能去也	1	si er bu neng qu ye
妇人见之	1	fu ren jian zhi
请于父母曰	1	qing yu fu mu yue
与为人妻	1	yu wei ren qi
宁为夫子妾者	1	ning wei fu zi qie zhe
数十而未止也	1	shu shi er wei zhi ye
未尝有闻其唱者也	1	wei chang you wen qi chang zhe ye
常和人而已矣	1	chang he ren er yi yi
无君人之位以济乎人之死	1	wu jun ren zhi wei yi ji hu ren zhi si
无聚禄以望人之腹	1	wu ju lu yi wang ren zhi fu
又以恶骇天下	1	you yi e hai tian xia
和而不唱	1	he er bu chang
知不出乎四域	1	zhi bu chu hu si yu
且而雌雄合乎前	1	qie er ci xiong he hu qian
是必有异乎人者也	1	shi bi you yi hu ren zhe ye
寡人召而观之	1	gua ren zhao er guan zhi
果以恶骇天下	1	guo yi e hai tian xia
与寡人处	1	yu gua ren chu
不至以月数	1	bu zhi yi yue shu
而寡人有意乎其为人也	1	er gua ren you yi hu qi wei ren ye
不至乎期年	1	bu zhi hu qi nian
而寡人信之	1	er gua ren xin zhi
而寡人传国焉	1	er gua ren chuan guo yan
闷然而后应	1	men ran er hou ying
寡人丑乎	1	gua ren chou hu
卒授之国	1	zu shou zhi guo
无几何也	1	wu ji he ye
去寡人而行	1	qu gua ren er xing
寡人恤焉若有亡也	1	gua ren xu yan ruo you wang ye
若无与乐是国也	1	ruo wu yu le shi guo ye
是何人者也	1	shi he ren zhe ye
丘也尝使于楚矣	1	qiu ye chang shi yu chu yi
适见豚子食于其死母者	1	shi jian tun zi shi yu qi si mu zhe
皆弃之而走	1	jie qi zhi er zou
不见己焉尔	1	bu jian ji yan er
不得其类焉尔	1	bu de qi lei yan er
所爱其母者	1	suo ai qi mu zhe
非爱其形也	1	fei ai qi xing ye
爱使其形者也	1	ai shi qi xing zhe ye
战而死者	1	zhan er si zhe
其人之葬也不以	1	qi ren zhi zang ye bu yi
刖者之屡	1	yue zhe zhi lv
无为爱之	1	wu wei ai zhi
皆无其本矣	1	jie wu qi ben yi
为天子之诸御	1	wei tian zi zhi zhu yu
取妻者止于外	1	qu qi zhe zhi yu wai
不得复使	1	bu de fu shi
形全犹足以为尔	1	xing quan you zu yi wei er
今哀骀它未言而信	1	jin ai tai ta wei yan er xin
无功而亲	1	wu gong er qin
使人授己国	1	shi ren shou ji guo
唯恐其不受也	1	wei kong qi bu shou ye
是必才全而德不形者也	1	shi bi cai quan er de bu xing zhe ye
何谓才全	1	he wei cai quan
贤与不肖	1	xian yu bu xiao
是事之变	1	shi shi zhi bian
命之行也	1	ming zhi hang ye
日夜相代乎前	1	ri ye xiang dai hu qian
而知不能规乎其始者也	1	er zhi bu neng gui hu qi shi zhe ye
故不足以滑和	1	gu bu zu yi hua he
不可入于灵府	1	bu ke ru yu ling fu
使之和豫	1	shi zhi he yu
通而不失于兑	1	tong er bu shi yu dui
使日夜无隙	1	shi ri ye wu xi
而与物为春	1	er yu wu wei chun
是接而生时于心者也	1	shi jie er sheng shi yu xin zhe ye
是之谓才全	1	shi zhi wei cai quan
何谓德不形	1	he wei de bu xing
水停之盛也	1	shui ting zhi sheng ye
其可以为法也	1	qi ke yi wei fa ye
内保之而外不荡也	1	nei bao zhi er wai bu dang ye
成和之修也	1	cheng he zhi xiu ye
德不形者	1	de bu xing zhe
物不能离也	1	wu bu neng li ye
哀公异日以告闵子曰	1	ai gong yi ri yi gao min zi yue
始也吾以南面而君天下	1	shi ye wu yi nan mian er jun tian xia
执民之纪而忧其死	1	zhi min zhi ji er you qi si
吾自以为至通矣	1	wu zi yi wei zhi tong yi
今吾闻至人之言	1	jin wu wen zhi ren zhi yan
恐吾无其实	1	kong wu wu qi shi
轻用吾身而亡吾国	1	qing yong wu shen er wang wu guo
吾与孔丘非君臣也	1	wu yu kong qiu fei jun chen ye
德友而已矣	1	de you er yi yi
说卫灵公	1	shuo wei ling gong
灵公说之	1	ling gong shuo zhi
而视全人	1	er shi quan ren
大瘿说齐桓公	1	da ying shuo qi huan gong
桓公说之	1	huan gong shuo zhi
故德有所长而形有所忘	1	gu de you suo chang er xing you suo wang
人不忘其所忘而忘其所不忘	1	ren bu wang qi suo wang er wang qi suo bu wang
此谓诚忘	1	ci wei cheng wang
故圣人有所游	1	gu sheng ren you suo you
而知为孽	1	er zhi wei nie
圣人不谋	1	sheng ren bu mou
既受食于天	1	ji shou shi yu tian
又恶用人	1	you e yong ren
有人之形	1	you ren zhi xing
无人之情	1	wu ren zhi qing
故群于人	1	gu qun yu ren
故是非不得于身	1	gu shi fei bu de yu shen
眇乎小哉	1	miao hu xiao zai
所以属于人也	1	suo yi shu yu ren ye
独成其天	1	du cheng qi tian
人故无情乎	1	ren gu wu qing hu
人而无情	1	ren er wu qing
何以谓之人	1	he yi wei zhi ren
道与之貌	1	dao yu zhi mao
天与之形	1	tian yu zhi xing
恶得不谓之人	1	e de bu wei zhi ren
既谓之人	1	ji wei zhi ren
恶得无情	1	e de wu qing
是非吾所谓情也	1	shi fei wu suo wei qing ye
吾所谓无情者	1	wu suo wei wu qing zhe
言人之不以好恶内伤其身	1	yan ren zhi bu yi hao wu nei shang qi shen
常因自然而不益生也	1	chang yin zi ran er bu yi sheng ye
何以有其身	1	he yi you qi shen
无以好恶内伤其身	1	wu yi hao wu nei shang qi shen
今子外乎子之神	1	jin zi wai hu zi zhi shen
劳乎子之精	1	lao hu zi zhi jing
倚树而吟	1	yi shu er yin
据槁梧而瞑	1	ju gao wu er ming
天选子之形	1	tian xuan zi zhi xing
子以坚白鸣	1	zi yi jian bai ming
庄子内篇大宗师第六知天之所为	1	zhuang zi nei pian da zong shi di liu zhi tian zhi suo wei
知人之所为者	1	zhi ren zhi suo wei zhe
知天之所为者	1	zhi tian zhi suo wei zhe
天而生也	1	tian er sheng ye
以其知之所知以养其知之所不知	1	yi qi zhi zhi suo zhi yi yang qi zhi zhi suo bu zhi
终其天年而不中道夭者	1	zhong qi tian nian er bu zhong dao yao zhe
是知之盛也	1	shi zhi zhi sheng ye
夫知有所待而后当	1	fu zhi you suo dai er hou dang
其所待者特未定也	1	qi suo dai zhe te wei ding ye
庸讵知吾所谓天之非人乎	1	yong ju zhi wu suo wei tian zhi fei ren hu
所谓人之非天乎	1	suo wei ren zhi fei tian hu
且有真人而后有真知	1	qie you zhen ren er hou you zhen zhi
何谓真人	1	he wei zhen ren
古之真人	1	gu zhi zhen ren
过而弗悔	1	guo er fu hui
当而不自得也	1	dang er bu zi de ye
登高不栗	1	deng gao bu li
入水不濡	1	ru shui bu ru
入火不热	1	ru huo bu re
是知之能登假于道者也若此	1	shi zhi zhi neng deng jia yu dao zhe ye ruo ci
其寝不梦	1	qi qin bu meng
其觉无忧	1	qi jiao wu you
其食不甘	1	qi shi bu gan
其息深深	1	qi xi shen shen
真人之息以踵	1	zhen ren zhi xi yi zhong
众人之息以喉	1	zhong ren zhi xi yi hou
其嗌言若哇	1	qi ai yan ruo wa
其耆欲深者	1	qi qi yu shen zhe
其天机浅	1	qi tian ji qian
不知说生	1	bu zhi shuo sheng
不知恶死	1	bu zhi e si
其出不欣	1	qi chu bu xin
其入不距	1	qi ru bu ju
然而来而已矣	1	ran er lai er yi yi
不忘其所始	1	bu wang qi suo shi
不求其所终	1	bu qiu qi suo zhong
受而喜之	1	shou er xi zhi
忘而复之	1	wang er fu zhi
是之谓不以心捐道	1	shi zhi wei bu yi xin juan dao
不以人助天	1	bu yi ren zhu tian
是之谓真人	1	shi zhi wei zhen ren
凄然似秋	1	qi ran shi qiu
暖然似春	1	nuan ran shi chun
喜怒通四时	1	xi nu tong si shi
与物有宜而莫知其极	1	yu wu you yi er mo zhi qi ji
故圣人之用兵也	1	gu sheng ren zhi yong bing ye
亡国而不失人心	1	wang guo er bu shi ren xin
利泽施乎万世	1	li ze shi hu wan shi
不为爱人	1	bu wei ai ren
故乐通物	1	gu le tong wu
非圣人也	1	fei sheng ren ye
利害不通	1	li hai bu tong
非君子也	1	fei jun zi ye
行名失己	1	hang ming shi ji
亡身不真	1	wang shen bu zhen
非役人也	1	fei yi ren ye
若狐不偕	1	ruo hu bu xie
是役人之役	1	shi yi ren zhi yi
适人之适	1	shi ren zhi shi
而不自适其适者也	1	er bu zi shi qi shi zhe ye
其状义而不朋	1	qi zhuang yi er bu peng
若不足而不承	1	ruo bu zu er bu cheng
与乎其觚而不坚也	1	yu hu qi gu er bu jian ye
张乎其虚而不华也	1	zhang hu qi xu er bu hua ye
邴邴乎其似喜也	1	bing bing hu qi shi xi ye
崔崔乎其不得已也	1	cui cui hu qi bu de yi ye
乎进我色也	1	hu jin wo se ye
与乎止我德也	1	yu hu zhi wo de ye
广乎其似世也	1	guang hu qi shi shi ye
乎其未可制也	1	hu qi wei ke zhi ye
连乎其似好闭也	1	lian hu qi shi hao bi ye
乎忘其言也	1	hu wang qi yan ye
以刑为体	1	yi xing wei ti
以礼为翼	1	yi li wei yi
以知为时	1	yi zhi wei shi
以德为循	1	yi de wei xun
以刑为体者	1	yi xing wei ti zhe
绰乎其杀也	1	chao hu qi sha ye
以礼为翼者	1	yi li wei yi zhe
所以行于世也	1	suo yi hang yu shi ye
以知为时者	1	yi zhi wei shi zhe
不得已于事也	1	bu de yi yu shi ye
以德为循者	1	yi de wei xun zhe
言其与有足者至于丘也	1	yan qi yu you zu zhe zhi yu qiu ye
而人真以为勤行者也	1	er ren zhen yi wei qin xing zhe ye
故其好之也一	1	gu qi hao zhi ye yi
其弗好之也一	1	qi fu hao zhi ye yi
其一也一	1	qi yi ye yi
其不一也一	1	qi bu yi ye yi
其一与天为徒	1	qi yi yu tian wei tu
其不一与人为徒	1	qi bu yi yu ren wei tu
天与人不相胜也	1	tian yu ren bu xiang sheng ye
其有夜旦之常	1	qi you ye dan zhi chang
人之有所不得与	1	ren zhi you suo bu de yu
皆物之情也	1	jie wu zhi qing ye
彼特以天为父	1	bi te yi tian wei fu
而身犹爱之	1	er shen you ai zhi
而况其卓乎	1	er kuang qi zhuo hu
人特以有君为愈乎己	1	ren te yi you jun wei yu hu ji
而身犹死之	1	er shen you si zhi
而况其真乎	1	er kuang qi zhen hu
鱼相与处于陆	1	yu xiang yu chu yu lu
相濡以沫	1	xiang ru yi mo
不如相忘于江湖	1	bu ru xiang wang yu jiang hu
与其誉尧而非桀也	1	yu qi yu yao er fei jie ye
不如两忘而化其道	1	bu ru liang wang er hua qi dao
夫大块载我以形	1	fu da kuai zai wo yi xing
劳我以生	1	lao wo yi sheng
佚我以老	1	yi wo yi lao
息我以死	1	xi wo yi si
故善吾生者	1	gu shan wu sheng zhe
乃所以善吾死也	1	nai suo yi shan wu si ye
夫藏舟于壑	1	fu cang zhou yu he
藏山于泽	1	cang shan yu ze
谓之固矣	1	wei zhi gu yi
然而夜半有力者负之而走	1	ran er ye ban you li zhe fu zhi er zou
昧者不知也	1	mei zhe bu zhi ye
藏小大有宜	1	cang xiao da you yi
犹有所循	1	you you suo xun
若夫藏天下于天下而不得所循	1	ruo fu cang tian xia yu tian xia er bu de suo xun
是恒物之大情也	1	shi heng wu zhi da qing ye
特犯人之形而犹喜之	1	te fan ren zhi xing er you xi zhi
若人之形者	1	ruo ren zhi xing zhe
万化而未始有极也	1	wan hua er wei shi you ji ye
其为乐可胜计邪	1	qi wei le ke sheng ji xie
故圣人将游于物之所不得循而皆存	1	gu sheng ren jiang you yu wu zhi suo bu de xun er jie cun
善妖善老	1	shan yao shan lao
善始善终	1	shan shi shan zhong
人犹效之	1	ren you xiao zhi
而况万物之所系而一化之所待乎	1	er kuang wan wu zhi suo xi er yi hua zhi suo dai hu
夫道有情有信	1	fu dao you qing you xin
无为无形	1	wu wei wu xing
可传而不可受	1	ke chuan er bu ke shou
可得而不可见	1	ke dei er bu ke jian
自本自根	1	zi ben zi gen
未有天地	1	wei you tian di
自古以固存	1	zi gu yi gu cun
神鬼神帝	1	shen gui shen di
生天生地	1	sheng tian sheng di
在太极之先而不为高	1	zai tai ji zhi xian er bu wei gao
在六极之下而不为深	1	zai liu ji zhi xia er bu wei shen
先天地生而不为久	1	xian tian di sheng er bu wei jiu
长于上古而不为老	1	chang yu shang gu er bu wei lao
韦氏得之	1	wei shi de zhi
以挈天地	1	yi qie tian di

骑箕尾而比于列星	1	qi ji wei er bi yu lie xing

子之年长矣	1	zi zhi nian zhang yi
而色若孺子	1	er se ruo ru zi
吾闻道矣	1	wu wen dao yi
南伯子葵曰	1	nan bo zi kui yue
道可得学邪	1	dao ke dei xue xie
子非其人也	1	zi fei qi ren ye
夫卜梁倚有圣人之才而无圣人之道	1	fu bo liang yi you sheng ren zhi cai er wu sheng ren zhi dao
我有圣人之道而无圣人之才	1	wo you sheng ren zhi dao er wu sheng ren zhi cai
吾欲以教之	1	wu yu yi jiao zhi
庶几其果为圣人乎	1	shu ji qi guo wei sheng ren hu
以圣人之道告圣人之才	1	yi sheng ren zhi dao gao sheng ren zhi cai
吾犹守而告之	1	wu you shou er gao zhi
参日而后能外天下	1	can ri er hou neng wai tian xia
已外天下矣	1	yi wai tian xia yi
吾又守之	1	wu you shou zhi
七日而后能外物	1	qi ri er hou neng wai wu
已外物矣	1	yi wai wu yi
九日而后能外生	1	jiu ri er hou neng wai sheng
已外生矣	1	yi wai sheng yi
而后能朝彻	1	er hou neng chao che
朝彻而后能见独	1	chao che er hou neng jian du
见独而后能无古今	1	jian du er hou neng wu gu jin
无古今而后能入于不死不生	1	wu gu jin er hou neng ru yu bu si bu sheng
杀生者不死	1	sha sheng zhe bu si
生生者不生	1	sheng sheng zhe bu sheng
其为物无不将也	1	qi wei wu wu bu jiang ye
无不迎也	1	wu bu ying ye
无不毁也	1	wu bu hui ye
无不成也	1	wu bu cheng ye
其名为撄宁	1	qi ming wei ying ning
撄宁也者	1	ying ning ye zhe
撄而后成者也	1	ying er hou cheng zhe ye
子独恶乎闻之	1	zi du e hu wen zhi
闻诸副墨之子	1	wen zhu fu mo zhi zi
副墨之子闻诸洛诵之孙	1	fu mo zhi zi wen zhu luo song zhi sun
洛诵之孙闻之瞻明	1	luo song zhi sun wen zhi zhan ming
瞻明闻之聂许	1	zhan ming wen zhi nie xu
聂许闻之需役	1	nie xu wen zhi xu yi
需役闻之于讴	1	xu yi wen zhi yu ou

玄冥闻之参寥	1	xuan ming wen zhi can liao
参寥闻之疑始	1	can liao wen zhi yi shi
子来四人相与语曰	1	zi lai si ren xiang yu yu yue
孰能以无为首	1	shu neng yi wu wei shou
以生为脊	1	yi sheng wei ji
以死为尻	1	yi si wei kao
孰知死生存亡之一体者	1	shu zhi si sheng cun wang zhi yi ti zhe
吾与之友矣	1	wu yu zhi you yi
四人相视而笑	1	si ren xiang shi er xiao
莫逆于心	1	mo ni yu xin
遂相与为友	1	sui xiang yu wei you
俄而子舆有病	1	e er zi yu you bing
子祀往问之	1	zi si wang wen zhi
夫造物者将以予为此拘拘也	1	fu zao wu zhe jiang yi yu wei ci ju ju ye
曲偻发背	1	qu lou fa bei
上有五管	1	shang you wu guan
句赘指天	1	ju zhui zhi tian
阴阳之气有	1	yin yang zhi qi you
其心闲而无事	1	qi xin xian er wu shi
而鉴于井	1	er jian yu jing
夫造物者又将以予为此拘拘也	1	fu zao wu zhe you jiang yi yu wei ci ju ju ye
女恶之乎	1	nv e zhi hu
浸假而化予之左臂以为	1	jin jia er hua yu zhi zuo bi yi wei
予因以求时夜	1	yu yin yi qiu shi ye
浸假而化予之右臂以为弹	1	jin jia er hua yu zhi you bi yi wei dan
予因以求	1	yu yin yi qiu
浸假而化予之尻以为轮	1	jin jia er hua yu zhi kao yi wei lun
以神为马	1	yi shen wei ma
予因以乘之	1	yu yin yi cheng zhi
岂更驾哉	1	qi geng jia zai
且夫得者	1	qie fu de zhe
此古之所谓县解也	1	ci gu zhi suo wei xian jie ye
而不能自解者	1	er bu neng zi jie zhe
物有结之	1	wu you jie zhi
且夫物不胜天久矣	1	qie fu wu bu sheng tian jiu yi
吾又何恶焉	1	wu you he e yan
俄而子来有病	1	e er zi lai you bing
喘喘然将死	1	chuan chuan ran jiang si
其妻子环而泣之	1	qi qi zi huan er qi zhi
子犁往问之	1	zi li wang wen zhi
倚其户与之语曰	1	yi qi hu yu zhi yu yue
伟哉造化	1	wei zai zao hua
又将奚以汝为	1	you jiang xi yi ru wei
将奚以汝适	1	jiang xi yi ru shi
以汝为鼠肝乎	1	yi ru wei shu gan hu
以汝为虫臂乎	1	yi ru wei chong bi hu
父母于子	1	fu mu yu zi
东西南北	1	dong xi nan bei
唯命之从	1	wei ming zhi cong
阴阳于人	1	yin yang yu ren
不翅于父母	1	bu chi yu fu mu
彼近吾死而我不听	1	bi jin wu si er wo bu ting
我则悍矣	1	wo ze han yi
彼何罪焉	1	bi he zui yan
夫大块以载我以形	1	fu da kuai yi zai wo yi xing
今大冶铸金	1	jin da ye zhu jin
金踊跃曰	1	jin yong yue yue
我且必为镆铘	1	wo qie bi wei mo ye
大冶必以为不祥之金	1	da ye bi yi wei bu xiang zhi jin
今一犯人之形而曰	1	jin yi fan ren zhi xing er yue
夫造化者必以为不祥之人	1	fu zao hua zhe bi yi wei bu xiang zhi ren
今一以天地为大炉	1	jin yi yi tian di wei da lu
以造化为大冶	1	yi zao hua wei da ye
恶乎往而不可哉	1	e hu wang er bu ke zai
子琴张三人相与友曰	1	zi qin zhang san ren xiang yu you yue
孰能相与于无相与	1	shu neng xiang yu yu wu xiang yu
相为于无相为	1	xiang wei yu wu xiang wei
孰能登天游雾	1	shu neng deng tian you wu
挠挑无极	1	nao tiao wu ji
相忘以生	1	xiang wang yi sheng
无所穷终	1	wu suo qiong zhong
三人相视而笑	1	san ren xiang shi er xiao
遂相与友	1	sui xiang yu you
莫然有间	1	mo ran you jian
而子桑户死	1	er zi sang hu si
孔子闻之	1	kong zi wen zhi
使子贡往侍事焉	1	shi zi gong wang shi shi yan
相和而歌曰	1	xiang he er ge yue
嗟来桑户乎	1	jie lai sang hu hu
而已反其真	1	er yi fan qi zhen
而我犹为人猗	1	er wo you wei ren yi
子贡趋而进曰	1	zi gong qu er jin yue
敢问临尸而歌	1	gan wen lin shi er ge
二人相视而笑曰	1	er ren xiang shi er xiao yue
是恶知礼意	1	shi e zhi li yi
以告孔子曰	1	yi gao kong zi yue
彼何人者邪	1	bi he ren zhe xie
修行无有而外其形骸	1	xiu xing wu you er wai qi xing hai
临尸而歌	1	lin shi er ge
颜色不变	1	yan se bu bian
无以命之	1	wu yi ming zhi
彼游方之外者也	1	bi you fang zhi wai zhe ye
而丘游方之内者也	1	er qiu you fang zhi nei zhe ye
外内不相及	1	wai nei bu xiang ji
而丘使女往吊之	1	er qiu shi nv wang diao zhi
彼方且与造物者为人	1	bi fang qie yu zao wu zhe wei ren
而游乎天地之一气	1	er you hu tian di zhi yi qi
彼以生为附赘县疣	1	bi yi sheng wei fu zhui xian you
以死为决	1	yi si wei jue
又恶知死生先后之所在	1	you e zhi si sheng xian hou zhi suo zai
假于异物	1	jia yu yi wu
托于同体	1	tuo yu tong ti
忘其肝胆	1	wang qi gan dan
遗其耳目	1	yi qi er mu
反复终始	1	fan fu zhong shi
不知端倪	1	bu zhi duan ni
芒然仿徨乎尘垢之外	1	mang ran fang huang hu chen gou zhi wai
逍遥乎无为之业	1	xiao yao hu wu wei zhi ye
彼又恶能	1	bi you e neng
然为世俗之礼	1	ran wei shi su zhi li
以观众人之耳目哉	1	yi guan zhong ren zhi er mu zai
然则夫子何方之依	1	ran ze fu zi he fang zhi yi
天之戮民也	1	tian zhi lu min ye
吾与汝共之	1	wu yu ru gong zhi
鱼相造乎水	1	yu xiang zao hu shui
人相造乎道	1	ren xiang zao hu dao
相造乎水者	1	xiang zao hu shui zhe
穿池而养给	1	chuan chi er yang gei
相造乎道者	1	xiang zao hu dao zhe
无事而生定	1	wu shi er sheng ding
鱼相忘乎江湖	1	yu xiang wang hu jiang hu
人相忘乎道术	1	ren xiang wang hu dao shu
敢问畸人	1	gan wen ji ren
畸于人而侔于天	1	ji yu ren er mou yu tian
天之小人	1	tian zhi xiao ren
人之君子	1	ren zhi jun zi
天之小人也	1	tian zhi xiao ren ye
颜回问仲尼曰	1	yan hui wen zhong ni yue
哭泣无涕	1	ku qi wu ti
中心不戚	1	zhong xin bu qi
居丧不哀	1	ju sang bu ai
无是三者	1	wu shi san zhe
以善处丧盖鲁国	1	yi shan chu sang gai lu guo
固有无其实而得其名者乎	1	gu you wu qi shi er de qi ming zhe hu
回壹怪之	1	hui yi guai zhi
夫孟孙氏尽之矣	1	fu meng sun shi jin zhi yi
进于知矣	1	jin yu zhi yi
唯简之而不得	1	wei jian zhi er bu de
夫已有所简矣	1	fu yi you suo jian yi
孟孙氏不知所以生	1	meng sun shi bu zhi suo yi sheng
不知所以死	1	bu zhi suo yi si
不知就先	1	bu zhi jiu xian
不知就后	1	bu zhi jiu hou
若化为物	1	ruo hua wei wu
以待其所不知之化已乎	1	yi dai qi suo bu zhi zhi hua yi hu
且方将化	1	qie fang jiang hua
恶知不化哉	1	e zhi bu hua zai
方将不化	1	fang jiang bu hua
恶知已化哉	1	e zhi yi hua zai
吾特与汝	1	wu te yu ru
其梦未始觉者邪	1	qi meng wei shi jiao zhe xie
且彼有骇形而无损心	1	qie bi you hai xing er wu sun xin
有旦宅而无情死	1	you dan zhai er wu qing si
孟孙氏特觉	1	meng sun shi te jiao
人哭亦哭	1	ren ku yi ku
是自其所以乃	1	shi zi qi suo yi nai
且也相与吾之耳矣	1	qie ye xiang yu wu zhi er yi
庸讵知吾所谓吾之乎	1	yong ju zhi wu suo wei wu zhi hu
且汝梦为鸟而厉乎天	1	qie ru meng wei niao er li hu tian
梦为鱼而没于渊	1	meng wei yu er mei yu yuan
不识今之言者	1	bu shi jin zhi yan zhe
其觉者乎	1	qi jiao zhe hu
其梦者乎	1	qi meng zhe hu
造适不及笑	1	zao shi bu ji xiao
献笑不及排	1	xian xiao bu ji pai
安排而去化	1	an pai er qu hua
乃入于寥天一	1	nai ru yu liao tian yi
意而子见许由	1	yi er zi jian xu you
尧何以资汝	1	yao he yi zi ru
意而子曰	1	yi er zi yue
汝必躬服仁义而明言是非	1	ru bi gong fu ren yi er ming yan shi fei
而奚来为轵	1	er xi lai wei zhi
夫尧既已黥汝以仁义	1	fu yao ji yi qing ru yi ren yi
而劓汝以是非矣	1	er yi ru yi shi fei yi
汝将何以游夫遥荡恣睢转徙之涂乎	1	ru jiang he yi you fu yao dang zi sui zhuan xi zhi tu hu
吾愿游于其藩	1	wu yuan you yu qi fan
夫盲者无以与乎眉目颜色之好	1	fu mang zhe wu yi yu hu mei mu yan se zhi hao
瞽者无以与乎青黄黼黻之观	1	gu zhe wu yi yu hu qing huang fu fu zhi guan
夫无庄之失其美	1	fu wu zhuang zhi shi qi mei
据梁之失其力	1	ju liang zhi shi qi li
黄帝之亡其知	1	huang di zhi wang qi zhi
皆在炉捶之间耳	1	jie zai lu chui zhi jian er
庸讵知夫造物者之不息我黥而补我劓	1	yong ju zhi fu zao wu zhe zhi bu xi wo qing er bu wo yi
使我乘成以随先生邪	1	shi wo cheng cheng yi sui xian sheng xie
未可知也	1	wei ke zhi ye
我为汝言其大略	1	wo wei ru yan qi da lue
赍万物而不为义	1	ji wan wu er bu wei yi
泽及万世而不为仁	1	ze ji wan shi er bu wei ren
覆载天地	1	fu zai tian di
刻雕众形而不为巧	1	ke diao zhong xing er bu wei qiao
此所游已	1	ci suo you yi
回忘仁义矣	1	hui wang ren yi yi
他日复见	1	ta ri fu jian
回忘礼乐矣	1	hui wang li le yi
回坐忘矣	1	hui zuo wang yi
仲尼蹴然曰	1	zhong ni cu ran yue
何谓坐忘	1	he wei zuo wang
离形去知	1	li xing qu zhi
同于大通	1	tong yu da tong
此谓坐忘	1	ci wei zuo wang
同则无好也	1	tong ze wu hao ye
化则无常也	1	hua ze wu chang ye
而果其贤乎	1	er guo qi xian hu
丘也请从而后也	1	qiu ye qing cong er hou ye
子舆与子桑友	1	zi yu yu zi sang you
而霖雨十日	1	er lin yu shi ri
子桑殆病矣	1	zi sang dai bing yi
裹饭而往食之	1	guo fan er wang shi zhi
至子桑之门	1	zhi zi sang zhi men
则若歌若哭	1	ze ruo ge ruo ku
有不任其声而趋举其诗焉	1	you bu ren qi sheng er qu ju qi shi yan
子之歌诗	1	zi zhi ge shi
何故若是	1	he gu ruo shi
吾思夫使我至此极者而弗得也	1	wu si fu shi wo zhi ci ji zhe er fu de ye
父母岂欲吾贫哉	1	fu mu qi yu wu pin zai
天无私覆	1	tian wu si fu
地无私载	1	di wu si zai
天地岂私贫我哉	1	tian di qi si pin wo zai
求其为之者而不得也	1	qiu qi wei zhi zhe er bu de ye
然而至此极者	1	ran er zhi ci ji zhe
庄子内篇应帝王第七啮缺问于王倪	1	zhuang zi nei pian ying di wang di qi nie que wen yu wang ni
四问而四不知	1	si wen er si bu zhi
啮缺因跃而大喜	1	nie que yin yue er da xi
行以告蒲衣子	1	hang yi gao pu yi zi
蒲衣子曰	1	pu yi zi yue
而乃今知之乎	1	er nai jin zhi zhi hu
有虞氏不及泰氏	1	you yu shi bu ji tai shi
有虞氏其犹藏仁以要人	1	you yu shi qi you cang ren yi yao ren
亦得人矣	1	yi dei ren yi
而未始出于非人	1	er wei shi chu yu fei ren
泰氏其卧徐徐	1	tai shi qi wo xu xu
其觉于于	1	qi jiao yu yu
一以己为马	1	yi yi ji wei ma
一以己为牛	1	yi yi ji wei niu
其知情信	1	qi zhi qing xin
其德甚真	1	qi de shen zhen
而未始入于非人	1	er wei shi ru yu fei ren
肩吾见狂接舆	1	jian wu jian kuang jie yu
狂接舆曰	1	kuang jie yu yue
日中始何以语女	1	ri zhong shi he yi yu nv
君人者以己出经式义度	1	jun ren zhe yi ji chu jing shi yi du
人孰敢不听而化诸	1	ren shu gan bu ting er hua zhu
是欺德也	1	shi qi de ye
其于治天下也	1	qi yu zhi tian xia ye
犹涉海凿河而使蚊负山也	1	you she hai zao he er shi wen fu shan ye
夫圣人之治也	1	fu sheng ren zhi zhi ye
正而后行	1	zheng er hou hang
确乎能其事者而已矣	1	que hu neng qi shi zhe er yi yi
且鸟高飞以避	1	qie niao gao fei yi bi
鼷鼠深穴乎神丘之下以避熏凿之患	1	xi shu shen xue hu shen qiu zhi xia yi bi xun zao zhi huan
而曾二虫之无知	1	er ceng er chong zhi wu zhi
天根游于殷阳	1	tian gen you yu yin yang
至蓼水之上	1	zhi liao shui zhi shang
适遭无名人而问焉	1	shi zao wu ming ren er wen yan
请问为天下	1	qing wen wei tian xia
无名人曰	1	wu ming ren yue
汝鄙人也	1	ru bi ren ye
何问之不豫也	1	he wen zhi bu yu ye
予方将与造物者为人	1	yu fang jiang yu zao wu zhe wei ren
厌则又乘夫莽眇之鸟	1	yan ze you cheng fu mang miao zhi niao
以出六极之外	1	yi chu liu ji zhi wai
而游无何有之乡	1	er you wu he you zhi xiang
汝又何帛以治天下感予之心为	1	ru you he bo yi zhi tian xia gan yu zhi xin wei
汝游心于淡	1	ru you xin yu dan
合气于漠	1	he qi yu mo
顺物自然而无容私焉	1	shun wu zi ran er wu rong si yan
而天下治矣	1	er tian xia zhi yi
阳子居见老聃	1	yang zi ju jian lao dan
向疾强梁	1	xiang ji qiang liang
物彻疏明	1	wu che shu ming
学道不倦	1	xue dao bu juan
可比明王乎	1	ke bi ming wang hu
是於圣人也	1	shi yu sheng ren ye
胥易技系	1	xu yi ji xi
劳形怵心者也	1	lao xing chu xin zhe ye
且也虎豹之文来田	1	qie ye hu bao zhi wen lai tian
狙之便执嫠之狗来藉	1	ju zhi bian zhi li zhi gou lai ji
阳子居蹴然曰	1	yang zi ju cu ran yue
敢问明王之治	1	gan wen ming wang zhi zhi
明王之治	1	ming wang zhi zhi
功盖天下而似不自己	1	gong gai tian xia er shi bu zi ji
化贷万物而民弗恃	1	hua dai wan wu er min fu shi
有莫举名	1	you mo ju ming
使物自喜	1	shi wu zi xi
立乎不测	1	li hu bu ce
而游于无有者也	1	er you yu wu you zhe ye
郑有神巫曰季咸	1	zheng you shen wu yue ji xian
知人之死生	1	zhi ren zhi si sheng
期以岁月旬日若神	1	qi yi sui yue xun ri ruo shen
郑人见之	1	zheng ren jian zhi
皆弃而走	1	jie qi er zou
列子见之而心醉	1	lie zi jian zhi er xin zui
以告壶子	1	yi gao hu zi
始吾以夫子之道为至矣	1	shi wu yi fu zi zhi dao wei zhi yi
则又有至焉者矣	1	ze you you zhi yan zhe yi
吾与汝既其文	1	wu yu ru ji qi wen
未既其实	1	wei ji qi shi
而固得道与	1	er gu de dao yu
众雌而无雄	1	zhong ci er wu xiong
而又奚卵焉	1	er you xi luan yan
而以道与世亢	1	er yi dao yu shi kang
夫故使人得而相汝	1	fu gu shi ren de er xiang ru
尝试与来	1	chang shi yu lai
以予示之	1	yi yu shi zhi
列子与之见壶子	1	lie zi yu zhi jian hu zi
出而谓列子曰	1	chu er wei lie zi yue
子之先生死矣	1	zi zhi xian sheng si yi
不以旬数矣	1	bu yi xun shu yi
吾见怪焉	1	wu jian guai yan
见湿灰焉	1	jian shi hui yan
泣涕沾襟以告壶子	1	qi ti zhan jin yi gao hu zi
乡吾示之以地文	1	xiang wu shi zhi yi di wen
萌乎不震不正	1	meng hu bu zhen bu zheng
是殆见吾杜德机也	1	shi dai jian wu du de ji ye
尝又与来	1	chang you yu lai
又与之见壶子	1	you yu zhi jian hu zi
子之先生遇我也	1	zi zhi xian sheng yu wo ye
全然有生矣	1	quan ran you sheng yi
吾见其杜权矣	1	wu jian qi du quan yi
乡吾示之以天壤	1	xiang wu shi zhi yi tian rang
名实不入	1	ming shi bu ru
而机发于踵	1	er ji fa yu zhong
是殆见吾善者机也	1	shi dai jian wu shan zhe ji ye
子之先生不齐	1	zi zhi xian sheng bu qi
吾无得而相焉	1	wu wu de er xiang yan
且复相之	1	qie fu xiang zhi
吾乡示之以以太冲莫胜	1	wu xiang shi zhi yi yi tai chong mo sheng
是殆见吾衡气机也	1	shi dai jian wu heng qi ji ye
鲵桓之审为渊	1	ni huan zhi shen wei yuan
止水之审为渊	1	zhi shui zhi shen wei yuan
流水之审为渊	1	liu shui zhi shen wei yuan
渊有九名	1	yuan you jiu ming
此处三焉	1	ci chu san yan
自失而走	1	zi shi er zou
列子追之不及	1	lie zi zhui zhi bu ji
以报壶子曰	1	yi bao hu zi yue
吾弗及已	1	wu fu ji yi
乡吾示之以未始出吾宗	1	xiang wu shi zhi yi wei shi chu wu zong
吾与之虚而委蛇	1	wu yu zhi xu er wei she
不知其谁何	1	bu zhi qi shui he
因以为弟靡	1	yin yi wei di mi
因以为波流	1	yin yi wei bo liu
然后列子自以为未始学而归	1	ran hou lie zi zi yi wei wei shi xue er gui
三年不出	1	san nian bu chu
为其妻爨	1	wei qi qi cuan
食豕如食人	1	shi shi ru shi ren
于事无与亲	1	yu shi wu yu qin
雕琢复朴	1	diao zhuo fu pu
块然独以其形立	1	kuai ran du yi qi xing li
纷而封哉	1	fen er feng zai
一以是终	1	yi yi shi zhong
无为名尸	1	wu wei ming shi
无为谋府	1	wu wei mou fu
无为事任	1	wu wei shi ren
无为知主	1	wu wei zhi zhu
体尽无穷	1	ti jin wu qiong
而游无朕	1	er you wu zhen
尽其所受乎天而无见得	1	jin qi suo shou hu tian er wu jian de
亦虚而已	1	yi xu er yi
至人之用心若镜	1	zhi ren zhi yong xin ruo jing
不将不逆	1	bu jiang bu ni
应而不藏	1	ying er bu cang
故能胜物而不伤	1	gu neng sheng wu er bu shang
南海之帝为	1	nan hai zhi di wei
北海之帝为忽	1	bei hai zhi di wei hu
中央之帝为浑沌	1	zhong yang zhi di wei hun dun
与忽时相与遇于浑沌之地	1	yu hu shi xiang yu yu yu hun dun zhi di
浑沌待之甚善	1	hun dun dai zhi shen shan
与忽谋报浑沌之德	1	yu hu mou bao hun dun zhi de
人皆有七窍以视听食息此独无有	1	ren jie you qi qiao yi shi ting shi xi ci du wu you
尝试凿之	1	chang shi zao zhi
日凿一窍	1	ri zao yi qiao
七日而浑沌死	1	qi ri er hun dun si
庄子外篇骈拇第八骈拇枝指出乎性哉	1	zhuang zi wai pian pian mu di ba pian mu zhi zhi chu hu xing zai
而侈于德	1	er chi yu de
附赘县疣出乎形哉	1	fu zhui xian you chu hu xing zai
而侈于性	1	er chi yu xing
多方乎仁义而用之者	1	duo fang hu ren yi er yong zhi zhe
列于五藏哉	1	lie yu wu cang zai
而非道德之正也	1	er fei dao de zhi zheng ye
是故骈于足者	1	shi gu pian yu zu zhe
连无用之肉也	1	lian wu yong zhi rou ye
枝于手者	1	zhi yu shou zhe
树无用之指也	1	shu wu yong zhi zhi ye
多方骈枝于五藏之情者	1	duo fang pian zhi yu wu cang zhi qing zhe
淫僻于仁义之行	1	yin pi yu ren yi zhi hang
而多方于聪明之用也	1	er duo fang yu cong ming zhi yong ye
是故骈于明者	1	shi gu pian yu ming zhe
青黄黼黻之煌煌非乎	1	qing huang fu fu zhi huang huang fei hu
而离朱是已	1	er li zhu shi yi
多于聪者	1	duo yu cong zhe
金石丝竹黄钟大吕之声非乎	1	jin shi si zhu huang zhong da lv zhi sheng fei hu
而师旷是已	1	er shi kuang shi yi
枝于仁者	1	zhi yu ren zhe
擢德塞性以收名声	1	zhuo de sai xing yi shou ming sheng
使天下簧鼓以奉不及之法非乎	1	shi tian xia huang gu yi feng bu ji zhi fa fei hu
骈于辩者	1	pian yu bian zhe
累瓦结绳窜句	1	lei wa jie sheng cuan ju
游心于坚白同异之间	1	you xin yu jian bai tong yi zhi jian
而敝跬誉无用之言非乎	1	er bi kui yu wu yong zhi yan fei hu
故此皆多骈旁枝之道	1	gu ci jie duo pian pang zhi zhi dao
非天下之至正也	1	fei tian xia zhi zhi zheng ye
彼正正者	1	bi zheng zheng zhe
不失其性命之情	1	bu shi qi xing ming zhi qing
故合者不为骈	1	gu he zhe bu wei pian
而枝者不为	1	er zhi zhe bu wei
长者不为有余	1	zhang zhe bu wei you yu
短者不为不足	1	duan zhe bu wei bu zu
是故凫胫虽短	1	shi gu fu jing sui duan
续之则忧	1	xu zhi ze you
鹤胫虽长	1	he jing sui zhang
断之则悲	1	duan zhi ze bei
故性长非所断	1	gu xing zhang fei suo duan
性短非所续	1	xing duan fei suo xu
无所去忧也	1	wu suo qu you ye
意仁义其非人情乎	1	yi ren yi qi fei ren qing hu
彼仁人何其多忧也	1	bi ren ren he qi duo you ye
且夫骈于拇者	1	qie fu pian yu mu zhe
决之则泣	1	jue zhi ze qi
二者或有余于数	1	er zhe huo you yu yu shu
或不足于数	1	huo bu zu yu shu
其于忧一也	1	qi yu you yi ye
今世之仁人	1	jin shi zhi ren ren
蒿目而忧世之患	1	hao mu er you shi zhi huan
不仁之人	1	bu ren zhi ren
决性命之情而饕贵富	1	jue xing ming zhi qing er tao gui fu
故意仁义其非人情乎	1	gu yi ren yi qi fei ren qing hu
自三代以下者	1	zi san dai yi xia zhe
天下何其嚣嚣也	1	tian xia he qi xiao xiao ye
且夫待钩绳规矩而正者	1	qie fu dai gou sheng gui ju er zheng zhe
是削其性者也	1	shi xue qi xing zhe ye
待绳约胶漆而固者	1	dai sheng yue jiao qi er gu zhe
是侵其德者也	1	shi qin qi de zhe ye
屈折礼乐	1	qu zhe li le
以慰天下之心者	1	yi wei tian xia zhi xin zhe
此失其常然也	1	ci shi qi chang ran ye
天下有常然	1	tian xia you chang ran
曲者不以钩	1	qu zhe bu yi gou
直者不以绳	1	zhi zhe bu yi sheng
圆者不以规	1	yuan zhe bu yi gui
方者不以矩	1	fang zhe bu yi ju
附离不以胶漆	1	fu li bu yi jiao qi
约束不以	1	yue shu bu yi
故天下诱然皆生	1	gu tian xia you ran jie sheng
而不知其所以生	1	er bu zhi qi suo yi sheng
同焉皆得	1	tong yan jie de
而不知其所以得	1	er bu zhi qi suo yi de
故古今不二	1	gu gu jin bu er
不可亏也	1	bu ke kui ye
则仁义又奚连连如胶漆索而游乎道德之间为哉	1	ze ren yi you xi lian lian ru jiao qi suo er you hu dao de zhi jian wei zai
使天下惑也	1	shi tian xia huo ye
夫小惑易方	1	fu xiao huo yi fang
大惑易性	1	da huo yi xing
何以知其然邪	1	he yi zhi qi ran xie
自虞氏招仁义以挠天下也	1	zi yu shi zhao ren yi yi nao tian xia ye
天下莫不奔命于仁义	1	tian xia mo bu ben ming yu ren yi
是非以仁义易其性与	1	shi fei yi ren yi yi qi xing yu
故尝试论之	1	gu chang shi lun zhi
天下莫不以物易其性矣	1	tian xia mo bu yi wu yi qi xing yi
小人则以身殉利	1	xiao ren ze yi shen xun li
士则以身殉名	1	shi ze yi shen xun ming
大夫则以身殉家	1	da fu ze yi shen xun jia
圣人则以身殉天下	1	sheng ren ze yi shen xun tian xia
故此数子者	1	gu ci shu zi zhe
事业不同	1	shi ye bu tong
名声异号	1	ming sheng yi hao
其于伤性以身为殉	1	qi yu shang xing yi shen wei xun
二人相与牧羊而俱亡其羊	1	er ren xiang yu mu yang er ju wang qi yang
问臧奚事	1	wen zang xi shi
则挟策读书	1	ze jia ce du shu
问谷奚事	1	wen gu xi shi
则博塞以游	1	ze bo sai yi you
其于亡羊均也	1	qi yu wang yang jun ye
伯夷死名于首阳之下	1	bo yi si ming yu shou yang zhi xia
盗跖死利于东陵之上	1	dao zhi si li yu dong ling zhi shang
所死不同	1	suo si bu tong
其于残生伤性均也	1	qi yu can sheng shang xing jun ye
奚必伯夷之是而盗跖之非乎	1	xi bi bo yi zhi shi er dao zhi zhi fei hu
天下尽殉也	1	tian xia jin xun ye
彼其所殉仁义也	1	bi qi suo xun ren yi ye
则俗谓之君子	1	ze su wei zhi jun zi
其所殉货财也	1	qi suo xun huo cai ye
则俗谓之小人	1	ze su wei zhi xiao ren
其殉一也	1	qi xun yi ye
则有君子焉	1	ze you jun zi yan
有小人焉	1	you xiao ren yan
若其残生损性	1	ruo qi can sheng sun xing
则盗跖亦伯夷已	1	ze dao zhi yi bo yi yi
又恶取君子小人于其间哉	1	you e qu jun zi xiao ren yu qi jian zai
且夫属其性乎仁义者	1	qie fu shu qi xing hu ren yi zhe
虽通如曾	1	sui tong ru ceng
非吾所谓臧也	1	fei wu suo wei zang ye
属其性于五味	1	shu qi xing yu wu wei
虽通如俞儿	1	sui tong ru yu er
属其性乎五声	1	shu qi xing hu wu sheng
虽通如师旷	1	sui tong ru shi kuang
非吾所谓聪也	1	fei wu suo wei cong ye
属其性乎五色	1	shu qi xing hu wu se
虽通如离朱	1	sui tong ru li zhu
非吾所谓明也	1	fei wu suo wei ming ye
吾所谓臧者	1	wu suo wei zang zhe
非所谓仁义之谓也	1	fei suo wei ren yi zhi wei ye
臧于其德而已矣	1	zang yu qi de er yi yi
任其性命之情而已矣	1	ren qi xing ming zhi qing er yi yi
吾所谓聪者	1	wu suo wei cong zhe
非谓其闻彼也	1	fei wei qi wen bi ye
自闻而已矣	1	zi wen er yi yi
吾所谓明者	1	wu suo wei ming zhe
非谓其见彼也	1	fei wei qi jian bi ye
自见而已矣	1	zi jian er yi yi
夫不自见而见彼	1	fu bu zi jian er jian bi
不自得而得彼者	1	bu zi de er de bi zhe
是得人之得而不自得其得者也	1	shi dei ren zhi de er bu zi de qi de zhe ye
适人之适而不自适其适者也	1	shi ren zhi shi er bu zi shi qi shi zhe ye
夫适人之适而不自适其适	1	fu shi ren zhi shi er bu zi shi qi shi
虽盗跖与伯夷	1	sui dao zhi yu bo yi
是同为淫僻也	1	shi tong wei yin pi ye
余愧乎道德	1	yu kui hu dao de
是以上不敢为仁义之操	1	shi yi shang bu gan wei ren yi zhi cao
而下不敢为淫僻之行也	1	er xia bu gan wei yin pi zhi hang ye
庄子外篇马蹄第九马	1	zhuang zi wai pian ma ti di jiu ma
蹄可以践霜雪	1	ti ke yi jian shuang xue
毛可以御风寒	1	mao ke yi yu feng han
翘足而陆	1	qiao zu er lu
此马之真性也	1	ci ma zhi zhen xing ye
虽有义台路寝	1	sui you yi tai lu qin
及至伯乐	1	ji zhi bo le
我善治马	1	wo shan zhi ma
连之以羁絷	1	lian zhi yi ji zhi
编之以皂栈	1	bian zhi yi zao zhan
马之死者十二三矣	1	ma zhi si zhe shi er san yi
饥之渴之	1	ji zhi ke zhi
驰之骤之	1	chi zhi zhou zhi
整之齐之	1	zheng zhi qi zhi
前有橛饰之患	1	qian you jue shi zhi huan
而后有鞭	1	er hou you bian
而马之死者已过半矣	1	er ma zhi si zhe yi guo ban yi
我善治埴	1	wo shan zhi zhi
圆者中规	1	yuan zhe zhong gui
方者中矩	1	fang zhe zhong ju
我善治木	1	wo shan zhi mu
曲者中钩	1	qu zhe zhong gou
直者应绳	1	zhi zhe ying sheng
夫埴木之性	1	fu zhi mu zhi xing
岂欲中规矩钩绳哉	1	qi yu zhong gui ju gou sheng zai
然且世世称之曰	1	ran qie shi shi cheng zhi yue
伯乐善治马	1	bo le shan zhi ma
而陶匠善治埴木	1	er tao jiang shan zhi zhi mu
此亦治天下者之过也	1	ci yi zhi tian xia zhe zhi guo ye
吾意善治天下者不然	1	wu yi shan zhi tian xia zhe bu ran
彼民有常性	1	bi min you chang xing
是谓同德	1	shi wei tong de
一而不党	1	yi er bu dang
命曰天放	1	ming yue tian fang
故至德之世	1	gu zhi de zhi shi
其行填填	1	qi hang tian tian
其视颠颠	1	qi shi dian dian
山无蹊隧	1	shan wu qi sui
泽无舟梁	1	ze wu zhou liang
万物群生	1	wan wu qun sheng
连属其乡	1	lian shu qi xiang
禽兽成群	1	qin shou cheng qun
草木遂长	1	cao mu sui zhang
是故禽兽可系羁而游	1	shi gu qin shou ke xi ji er you
鸟鹊之巢可攀援而窥	1	niao que zhi chao ke pan yuan er kui
夫至德之世	1	fu zhi de zhi shi
同与禽兽居	1	tong yu qin shou ju
族与万物并	1	zu yu wan wu bing
恶乎知君子小人哉	1	e hu zhi jun zi xiao ren zai
同乎无知	1	tong hu wu zhi
其德不离	1	qi de bu li
同乎无欲	1	tong hu wu yu
是谓素朴	1	shi wei su pu
素朴而民性得矣	1	su pu er min xing de yi
及至圣人	1	ji zhi sheng ren
而天下始疑矣	1	er tian xia shi yi yi
澶漫为乐	1	chan man wei le
摘僻为礼	1	zhai pi wei li
而天下始分矣	1	er tian xia shi fen yi
故纯朴不残	1	gu chun pu bu can
孰为牺尊	1	shu wei xi zun
白玉不毁	1	bai yu bu hui
道德不废	1	dao de bu fei
安取仁义	1	an qu ren yi
性情不离	1	xing qing bu li
安用礼乐	1	an yong li le
五色不乱	1	wu se bu luan
孰为文采	1	shu wei wen cai
五声不乱	1	wu sheng bu luan
孰应六律	1	shu ying liu lv
夫残朴以为器	1	fu can pu yi wei qi
工匠之罪也	1	gong jiang zhi zui ye
毁道德以为仁义	1	hui dao de yi wei ren yi
圣人之过也	1	sheng ren zhi guo ye
夫马陆居则食草饮水	1	fu ma lu ju ze shi cao yin shui
喜则交颈相靡	1	xi ze jiao jing xiang mi
怒则分背相踢	1	nu ze fen bei xiang ti
马知已此矣	1	ma zhi yi ci yi
夫加之以衡扼	1	fu jia zhi yi heng e
齐之以月题	1	qi zhi yi yue ti
而马知介倪	1	er ma zhi jie ni
扼鸷曼诡衔窃辔	1	e zhi man gui xian qie pei
故马之知而能至盗者	1	gu ma zhi zhi er neng zhi dao zhe
伯乐之罪也	1	bo le zhi zui ye
夫赫胥氏之时	1	fu he xu shi zhi shi
民居不知所为	1	min ju bu zhi suo wei
行不知所之	1	xing bu zhi suo zhi
含哺而熙	1	han bu er xi
鼓腹而游	1	gu fu er you
民能已此矣	1	min neng yi ci yi
屈折礼乐以匡天下之形	1	qu zhe li le yi kuang tian xia zhi xing
仁义以慰天下之心	1	ren yi yi wei tian xia zhi xin
而民乃始	1	er min nai shi
争归于利	1	zheng gui yu li
不可止也	1	bu ke zhi ye
此亦圣人之过也	1	ci yi sheng ren zhi guo ye
庄子外篇箧第十将为	1	zhuang zi wai pian qie di shi jiang wei
箧探囊发匮之盗而为守备	1	qie tan nang fa kui zhi dao er wei shou bei
则必摄缄	1	ze bi she jian
此世俗之所谓知也	1	ci shi su zhi suo wei zhi ye
然而巨盗至	1	ran er ju dao zhi
则负匮揭箧担囊而趋	1	ze fu kui jie qie dan nang er qu
唯恐缄扃之不固也	1	wei kong jian jiong zhi bu gu ye
然则乡之所谓知者	1	ran ze xiang zhi suo wei zhi zhe
不乃为大盗积者也	1	bu nai wei da dao ji zhe ye
世俗之所谓知者	1	shi su zhi suo wei zhi zhe
有不为大盗积者乎	1	you bu wei da dao ji zhe hu
所谓圣者	1	suo wei sheng zhe
有不为大盗守者乎	1	you bu wei da dao shou zhe hu
昔者齐国邻邑相望	1	xi zhe qi guo lin yi xiang wang
狗之音相闻	1	gou zhi yin xiang wen
罔罟之所布	1	wang gu zhi suo bu
耒耨之所刺	1	lei nou zhi suo ci
方二千余里	1	fang er qian yu li
阖四竟之内	1	he si jing zhi nei
所以立宗庙社稷	1	suo yi li zong miao she ji
治邑屋州闾乡曲者	1	zhi yi wu zhou lv xiang qu zhe
曷尝不法圣人哉	1	he chang bu fa sheng ren zai
然而田成子一旦杀齐君而盗其国	1	ran er tian cheng zi yi dan sha qi jun er dao qi guo
所盗者岂独其国邪	1	suo dao zhe qi du qi guo xie
并与其圣知之法而盗之	1	bing yu qi sheng zhi zhi fa er dao zhi
故田成子有乎盗贼之名	1	gu tian cheng zi you hu dao zei zhi ming
而身处尧舜之安	1	er shen chu yao shun zhi an
小国不敢非	1	xiao guo bu gan fei
大国不敢诛	1	da guo bu gan zhu
十二世有齐国	1	shi er shi you qi guo
则是不乃窃齐国并与其圣知之法以守其盗贼之身乎	1	ze shi bu nai qie qi guo bing yu qi sheng zhi zhi fa yi shou qi dao zei zhi shen hu
尝试论之	1	chang shi lun zhi
世俗之所谓至知者	1	shi su zhi suo wei zhi zhi zhe
所谓至圣者	1	suo wei zhi sheng zhe
昔者龙逢斩	1	xi zhe long feng zhan
故四子之贤而身不免乎戮	1	gu si zi zhi xian er shen bu mian hu lu
故跖之徒问于跖曰	1	gu zhi zhi tu wen yu zhi yue
盗亦有道乎	1	dao yi you dao hu
何适而无有道邪	1	he shi er wu you dao xie
夫妄意室中之藏	1	fu wang yi shi zhong zhi cang
五者不备而能成大盗者	1	wu zhe bu bei er neng cheng da dao zhe
天下未之有也	1	tian xia wei zhi you ye
善人不得圣人之道不立	1	shan ren bu de sheng ren zhi dao bu li
跖不得圣人之道不行	1	zhi bu de sheng ren zhi dao bu xing
天下之善人少而不善人多	1	tian xia zhi shan ren shao er bu shan ren duo
则圣人之利天下也少而害天下也多	1	ze sheng ren zhi li tian xia ye shao er hai tian xia ye duo
唇竭则齿寒	1	chun jie ze chi han
鲁酒薄而邯郸围	1	lu jiu bao er han dan wei
圣人生而大盗起	1	sheng ren sheng er da dao qi
掊击圣人	1	pou ji sheng ren
纵舍盗贼	1	zong she dao zei
而天下始治矣	1	er tian xia shi zhi yi
夫川竭而谷虚	1	fu chuan jie er gu xu
丘夷而渊实	1	qiu yi er yuan shi
圣人已死	1	sheng ren yi si
则大盗不起	1	ze da dao bu qi
天下平而无故矣	1	tian xia ping er wu gu yi
圣人不死	1	sheng ren bu si
大盗不止	1	da dao bu zhi
虽重圣人而治天下	1	sui zhong sheng ren er zhi tian xia
则是重利盗跖也	1	ze shi zhong li dao zhi ye
为之斗斛以量之	1	wei zhi dou hu yi liang zhi
则并与斗斛而窃之	1	ze bing yu dou hu er qie zhi
为之权衡以称之	1	wei zhi quan heng yi cheng zhi
则并与权衡而窃之	1	ze bing yu quan heng er qie zhi
为之符玺以信之	1	wei zhi fu xi yi xin zhi
则并与符玺而窃之	1	ze bing yu fu xi er qie zhi
为之仁义以矫之	1	wei zhi ren yi yi jiao zhi
则并与仁义而窃之	1	ze bing yu ren yi er qie zhi
彼窃钩者诛	1	bi qie gou zhe zhu
窃国者为诸侯	1	qie guo zhe wei zhu hou
诸侯之门而仁义存焉	1	zhu hou zhi men er ren yi cun yan
则是非窃仁义圣知邪	1	ze shi fei qie ren yi sheng zhi xie
故逐于大盗	1	gu zhu yu da dao
窃仁义并斗斛权衡符玺之利者	1	qie ren yi bing dou hu quan heng fu xi zhi li zhe
虽有轩冕之赏弗能劝	1	sui you xuan mian zhi shang fu neng quan
斧钺之威弗能禁	1	fu yue zhi wei fu neng jin
此重利盗跖而使不可禁者	1	ci zhong li dao zhi er shi bu ke jin zhe
是乃圣人之过也	1	shi nai sheng ren zhi guo ye
彼圣人者	1	bi sheng ren zhe
天下之利器也	1	tian xia zhi li qi ye
非所以明天下也	1	fei suo yi ming tian xia ye
故绝圣弃知	1	gu jue sheng qi zhi
大盗乃止	1	da dao nai zhi
掷玉毁珠	1	zhi yu hui zhu
小盗不起	1	xiao dao bu qi
焚符破玺	1	fen fu po xi
而民朴鄙	1	er min pu bi
掊斗折衡	1	pou dou zhe heng
而民不争	1	er min bu zheng
殚残天下之圣法	1	dan can tian xia zhi sheng fa
而民始可与论议	1	er min shi ke yu lun yi
擢乱六律	1	zhuo luan liu lv
铄绝竽瑟	1	shuo jue yu se
塞瞽旷之耳	1	sai gu kuang zhi er
而天下始人含其聪矣	1	er tian xia shi ren han qi cong yi
胶离朱之目	1	jiao li zhu zhi mu
而天下始人含其明矣	1	er tian xia shi ren han qi ming yi
毁绝钩绳而弃规矩	1	hui jue gou sheng er qi gui ju
而天下始人有其巧矣	1	er tian xia shi ren you qi qiao yi
攘弃仁义	1	rang qi ren yi
而天下之德始玄同矣	1	er tian xia zhi de shi xuan tong yi
彼人含其明	1	bi ren han qi ming
则天下不铄矣	1	ze tian xia bu shuo yi
人含其聪	1	ren han qi cong
则天下不累矣	1	ze tian xia bu lei yi
人含其知	1	ren han qi zhi
则天下不惑矣	1	ze tian xia bu huo yi
人含其德	1	ren han qi de
则天下不僻矣	1	ze tian xia bu pi yi
皆外立其德而	1	jie wai li qi de er
乱天下者也	1	luan tian xia zhe ye
法之所无用也	1	fa zhi suo wu yong ye
子独不知至德之世乎	1	zi du bu zhi zhi de zhi shi hu
昔者容成氏	1	xi zhe rong cheng shi
民结绳而用之	1	min jie sheng er yong zhi
邻国相望	1	lin guo xiang wang
民至老死而不相往来	1	min zhi lao si er bu xiang wang lai
若此之时	1	ruo ci zhi shi
则至治已	1	ze zhi zhi yi
今遂至使民延颈举踵	1	jin sui zhi shi min yan jing ju zhong
某所有贤者	1	mou suo you xian zhe
赢粮而趣之	1	ying liang er qu zhi
则内弃其亲而外去其主之事	1	ze nei qi qi qin er wai qu qi zhu zhi shi
足迹接乎诸侯之境	1	zu ji jie hu zhu hou zhi jing
车轨结乎千里之外	1	che gui jie hu qian li zhi wai
则是上好知之过也	1	ze shi shang hao zhi zhi guo ye
上诚好知而无道	1	shang cheng hao zhi er wu dao
则天下大乱矣	1	ze tian xia da luan yi
夫弓弩毕弋机变之知多	1	fu gong nu bi yi ji bian zhi zhi duo
则鸟乱于上矣	1	ze niao luan yu shang yi
钩饵罔罟罾笱之知多	1	gou er wang gu zeng gou zhi zhi duo
则鱼乱于水矣	1	ze yu luan yu shui yi
削格罗落	1	xue ge luo luo
罘之知多	1	fu zhi zhi duo
则兽乱于泽矣	1	ze shou luan yu ze yi
知诈渐毒	1	zhi zha jian du
颉滑坚白	1	jie hua jian bai
解垢同异之变多	1	jie gou tong yi zhi bian duo
则俗惑于辩矣	1	ze su huo yu bian yi
故天下每每大乱	1	gu tian xia mei mei da luan
罪在于好知	1	zui zai yu hao zhi
故天下皆知求其所不知而莫知求其所已知者	1	gu tian xia jie zhi qiu qi suo bu zhi er mo zhi qiu qi suo yi zhi zhe
皆知非其所不善而莫知非其所已善者	1	jie zhi fei qi suo bu shan er mo zhi fei qi suo yi shan zhe
是以大乱	1	shi yi da luan
故上悖日月之明	1	gu shang bei ri yue zhi ming
下烁山川之精	1	xia shuo shan chuan zhi jing
中堕四时之施	1	zhong duo si shi zhi shi
肖翘之物	1	xiao qiao zhi wu
莫不失其性	1	mo bu shi qi xing
夫好知之乱天下也	1	fu hao zhi zhi luan tian xia ye
自三代以下者是已	1	zi san dai yi xia zhe shi yi
舍夫种种之机而悦夫役役之佞	1	she fu zhong zhong zhi ji er yue fu yi yi zhi ning
释夫恬淡无为而悦夫	1	shi fu tian dan wu wei er yue fu
已乱天下矣	1	yi luan tian xia yi
庄子外篇在宥第十一闻在宥天下	1	zhuang zi wai pian zai you di shi yi wen zai you tian xia
不闻治天下也	1	bu wen zhi tian xia ye
在之也者	1	zai zhi ye zhe
恐天下之淫其性也	1	kong tian xia zhi yin qi xing ye
宥之也者	1	you zhi ye zhe
恐天下之迁其德也	1	kong tian xia zhi qian qi de ye
天下不淫其性	1	tian xia bu yin qi xing
不迁其德	1	bu qian qi de
有治天下者哉	1	you zhi tian xia zhe zai
昔尧之治天下也	1	xi yao zhi zhi tian xia ye
使天下欣欣焉人乐其性	1	shi tian xia xin xin yan ren le qi xing
是不恬也	1	shi bu tian ye
桀之治天下也	1	jie zhi zhi tian xia ye
使天下瘁瘁焉人苦其性	1	shi tian xia cui cui yan ren ku qi xing
是不愉也	1	shi bu yu ye
夫不恬不愉	1	fu bu tian bu yu
非德也而可长久者	1	fei de ye er ke chang jiu zhe
天下无之	1	tian xia wu zhi
人大喜邪	1	ren da xi xie
阴阳并毗	1	yin yang bing pi
四时不至	1	si shi bu zhi
寒暑之和不成	1	han shu zhi he bu cheng
其反伤人之形乎	1	qi fan shang ren zhi xing hu
使人喜怒失位	1	shi ren xi nu shi wei
居处无常	1	ju chu wu chang
思虑不自得	1	si lv bu zi de
中道不成章	1	zhong dao bu cheng zhang
于是乎天下始乔诘卓鸷	1	yu shi hu tian xia shi qiao jie zhuo zhi
而后有盗跖	1	er hou you dao zhi
故举天下以赏其善者不足	1	gu ju tian xia yi shang qi shan zhe bu zu
举天下以罚其恶者不给	1	ju tian xia yi fa qi e zhe bu gei
故天下之大不足以赏罚	1	gu tian xia zhi da bu zu yi shang fa
匈匈焉终以赏罚为事	1	xiong xiong yan zhong yi shang fa wei shi
彼何暇安其性命之情哉	1	bi he xia an qi xing ming zhi qing zai
而且说明邪	1	er qie shuo ming xie
是淫于色也	1	shi yin yu se ye
是淫于声也	1	shi yin yu sheng ye
是乱于德也	1	shi luan yu de ye
是悖于理也	1	shi bei yu li ye
是相于技也	1	shi xiang yu ji ye
是相于淫也	1	shi xiang yu yin ye
是相于艺也	1	shi xiang yu yi ye
是相于疵也	1	shi xiang yu ci ye
天下将安其性命之情	1	tian xia jiang an qi xing ming zhi qing
天下将不安其性命之情	1	tian xia jiang bu an qi xing ming zhi qing
乃始脔卷	1	nai shi luan juan
囊而乱天下也	1	nang er luan tian xia ye
而天下乃始尊之惜之	1	er tian xia nai shi zun zhi xi zhi
天下之惑也	1	tian xia zhi huo ye
岂直过也而去之邪	1	qi zhi guo ye er qu zhi xie
乃齐戒以言之	1	nai qi jie yi yan zhi
跪坐以进之	1	gui zuo yi jin zhi
吾若是何哉	1	wu ruo shi he zai
故君子不得已而临莅天下	1	gu jun zi bu de yi er lin li tian xia
莫若无为	1	mo ruo wu wei
而后安其性命之情	1	er hou an qi xing ming zhi qing
故贵以身于为天下	1	gu gui yi shen yu wei tian xia
则可以托天下	1	ze ke yi tuo tian xia
爱以身于为天下	1	ai yi shen yu wei tian xia
则可以寄天下	1	ze ke yi ji tian xia
故君子苟能无解其五藏	1	gu jun zi gou neng wu jie qi wu cang
无擢其聪明	1	wu zhuo qi cong ming
尸居而龙见	1	shi ju er long jian
渊默而雷声	1	yuan mo er lei sheng
神动而天随	1	shen dong er tian sui
从容无为而万物炊累焉	1	cong rong wu wei er wan wu chui lei yan
吾又何暇治天下哉	1	wu you he xia zhi tian xia zai
崔瞿问于老聃曰	1	cui qu wen yu lao dan yue
不治天下	1	bu zhi tian xia
安藏人心	1	an cang ren xin
无撄人心	1	wu ying ren xin
人心排下而进上	1	ren xin pai xia er jin shang
上下囚杀	1	shang xia qiu sha
淖约柔乎刚强	1	nao yue rou hu gang qiang
廉刿雕琢	1	lian gui diao zhuo
其热焦火	1	qi re jiao huo
其寒凝冰	1	qi han ning bing
其疾俯仰之间而再抚四海之外	1	qi ji fu yang zhi jian er zai fu si hai zhi wai
偾骄而不可系者	1	fen jiao er bu ke xi zhe
其唯人心乎	1	qi wei ren xin hu
昔者黄帝始以仁义撄人之心	1	xi zhe huang di shi yi ren yi ying ren zhi xin
舜于是乎股无	1	shun yu shi hu gu wu
以养天下之形	1	yi yang tian xia zhi xing
愁其五藏以为仁义	1	chou qi wu cang yi wei ren yi
矜其血气以规法度	1	jin qi xue qi yi gui fa du
然犹有不胜也	1	ran you you bu sheng ye
尧于是放	1	yao yu shi fang
兜于崇山	1	dou yu chong shan
投三苗于三	1	tou san miao yu san
流共工于幽都	1	liu gong gong yu you dou
此不胜天下也	1	ci bu sheng tian xia ye
夫施及三王而天下大骇矣	1	fu shi ji san wang er tian xia da hai yi
而儒墨毕起	1	er ru mo bi qi
于是乎喜怒相疑	1	yu shi hu xi nu xiang yi
愚知相欺	1	yu zhi xiang qi
善否相非	1	shan fou xiang fei
诞信相讥	1	dan xin xiang ji
而天下衰矣	1	er tian xia shuai yi
大德不同	1	da de bu tong
而性命烂漫矣	1	er xing ming lan man yi
天下好知	1	tian xia hao zhi
而百姓求竭矣	1	er bai xing qiu jie yi
于是乎斤锯制焉	1	yu shi hu jin ju zhi yan
绳墨杀焉	1	sheng mo sha yan
椎凿决焉	1	zhui zao jue yan
天下脊脊大乱	1	tian xia ji ji da luan
罪在撄人心	1	zui zai ying ren xin
故贤者伏处大山	1	gu xian zhe fu chu da shan
而万乘之君忧栗乎庙堂之上	1	er wan cheng zhi jun you li hu miao tang zhi shang
今世殊死者相枕也	1	jin shi shu si zhe xiang zhen ye
桁杨者相推也	1	heng yang zhe xiang tui ye
形戮者相望也	1	xing lu zhe xiang wang ye
而儒墨乃始离	1	er ru mo nai shi li
攘臂乎桎梏之间	1	rang bi hu zhi gu zhi jian
其无愧而不知耻也甚矣	1	qi wu kui er bu zhi chi ye shen yi
吾未知圣知之不为桁杨	1	wu wei zhi sheng zhi zhi bu wei heng yang
仁义之不为桎梏凿枘也	1	ren yi zhi bu wei zhi gu zao rui ye
史之不为桀	1	shi zhi bu wei jie
跖嚆矢也	1	zhi hao shi ye
绝圣弃知	1	jue sheng qi zhi
而天下大治	1	er tian xia da zhi
黄帝立为天子十九年	1	huang di li wei tian zi shi jiu nian
令行天下	1	ling hang tian xia
闻广成子在于空同之上	1	wen guang cheng zi zai yu kong tong zhi shang
故往见之	1	gu wang jian zhi
我闻吾子达于至道	1	wo wen wu zi da yu zhi dao
敢问至道之精	1	gan wen zhi dao zhi jing
吾欲取天地之精	1	wu yu qu tian di zhi jing
以佐五谷	1	yi zuo wu gu
以养民人	1	yi yang min ren
吾又欲官阴阳以遂群生	1	wu you yu guan yin yang yi sui qun sheng
广成子曰	1	guang cheng zi yue
而所欲问者	1	er suo yu wen zhe
物之质也	1	wu zhi zhi ye
而所欲官者	1	er suo yu guan zhe
物之残也	1	wu zhi can ye
自而治天下	1	zi er zhi tian xia
云气不待族而雨	1	yun qi bu dai zu er yu
草木不待黄而落	1	cao mu bu dai huang er luo
日月之光益以荒矣	1	ri yue zhi guang yi yi huang yi
而佞人之心翦翦者	1	er ning ren zhi xin jian jian zhe
又奚足以语至道	1	you xi zu yi yu zhi dao
闲居三月	1	xian ju san yue
复往邀之	1	fu wang yao zhi
广成子南首而卧	1	guang cheng zi nan shou er wo
黄帝顺下风膝行而进	1	huang di shun xia feng xi hang er jin
再拜稽首而问曰	1	zai bai qi shou er wen yue
闻吾子达于至道	1	wen wu zi da yu zhi dao
治身奈何而可以长久	1	zhi shen nai he er ke yi chang jiu
广成子蹶然而起	1	guang cheng zi jue ran er qi
吾语女至道	1	wu yu nv zhi dao
至道之精	1	zhi dao zhi jing
窈窈冥冥	1	yao yao ming ming
至道之极	1	zhi dao zhi ji
昏昏默默	1	hun hun mo mo
无视无听	1	wu shi wu ting
抱神以静	1	bao shen yi jing
形将自正	1	xing jiang zi zheng
必静必清	1	bi jing bi qing
无劳女形	1	wu lao nv xing
无摇女精	1	wu yao nv jing
乃可以长生	1	nai ke yi chang sheng
目无所见	1	mu wu suo jian
耳无所闻	1	er wu suo wen
心无所知	1	xin wu suo zhi
女神将守形	1	nv shen jiang shou xing
形乃长生	1	xing nai chang sheng
多知为败	1	duo zhi wei bai
我为女遂于大明之上矣	1	wo wei nv sui yu da ming zhi shang yi
至彼至阳之原也	1	zhi bi zhi yang zhi yuan ye
为女入于窈冥之门矣	1	wei nv ru yu yao ming zhi men yi
至彼至阴之原也	1	zhi bi zhi yin zhi yuan ye
天地有官	1	tian di you guan
阴阳有藏	1	yin yang you cang
慎守女身	1	shen shou nv shen
物将自壮	1	wu jiang zi zhuang
我守其一以处其和	1	wo shou qi yi yi chu qi he
故我修身千二百岁矣	1	gu wo xiu shen qian er bai sui yi
吾形未常衰	1	wu xing wei chang shuai
黄帝再拜稽首曰	1	huang di zai bai qi shou yue
广成子之谓天矣	1	guang cheng zi zhi wei tian yi
彼其物无穷	1	bi qi wu wu qiong
而人皆以为有终	1	er ren jie yi wei you zhong
彼其物无测	1	bi qi wu wu ce
而人皆以为有极	1	er ren jie yi wei you ji
得吾道者	1	de wu dao zhe
上为皇而下为王	1	shang wei huang er xia wei wang
失吾道者	1	shi wu dao zhe
上见光而下为土	1	shang jian guang er xia wei tu
今夫百昌皆生于土而反于土	1	jin fu bai chang jie sheng yu tu er fan yu tu
故余将去女	1	gu yu jiang qu nv
入无穷之门	1	ru wu qiong zhi men
以游无极之野	1	yi you wu ji zhi ye
吾与日月参光	1	wu yu ri yue can guang
吾与天地为常	1	wu yu tian di wei chang
当我缗乎	1	dang wo min hu
远我昏乎	1	yuan wo hun hu
人其尽死	1	ren qi jin si
而我独存乎	1	er wo du cun hu
云将东游	1	yun jiang dong you
过扶摇之枝而适遭鸿蒙	1	guo fu yao zhi zhi er shi zao hong meng
鸿蒙方将拊脾雀跃而游	1	hong meng fang jiang fu pi que yue er you
云将见之	1	yun jiang jian zhi
叟何人邪	1	sou he ren xie
叟何为此	1	sou he wei ci
鸿蒙拊脾雀跃不辍	1	hong meng fu pi que yue bu chuo
对云将曰	1	dui yun jiang yue
朕愿有问也	1	zhen yuan you wen ye
鸿蒙仰而视云将曰	1	hong meng yang er shi yun jiang yue
天气不和	1	tian qi bu he
地气郁结	1	di qi yu jie
六气不调	1	liu qi bu tiao
四时不节	1	si shi bu jie
今我愿合六气之精以育群生	1	jin wo yuan he liu qi zhi jing yi yu qun sheng
鸿蒙拊脾雀跃掉头曰	1	hong meng fu pi que yue diao tou yue
云将不得问	1	yun jiang bu de wen
过有宋之野	1	guo you song zhi ye
而适遭鸿蒙	1	er shi zao hong meng
云将大喜	1	yun jiang da xi
行趋而进曰	1	hang qu er jin yue
天忘朕邪	1	tian wang zhen xie
再拜稽首	1	zai bai qi shou
愿闻于鸿蒙	1	yuan wen yu hong meng
浮游不知所求	1	fu you bu zhi suo qiu
猖狂不知所往	1	chang kuang bu zhi suo wang
游者鞅掌	1	you zhe yang zhang
以观无妄	1	yi guan wu wang
朕又何知	1	zhen you he zhi
朕也自以为猖狂	1	zhen ye zi yi wei chang kuang
而民随予所往	1	er min sui yu suo wang
朕也不得已于民	1	zhen ye bu de yi yu min
今则民之放也	1	jin ze min zhi fang ye
愿闻一言	1	yuan wen yi yan
乱天之经	1	luan tian zhi jing
逆物之情	1	ni wu zhi qing
玄天弗成	1	xuan tian fu cheng
解兽之群而鸟皆夜鸣	1	jie shou zhi qun er niao jie ye ming
灾及草木	1	zai ji cao mu
祸及止虫	1	huo ji zhi chong
治人之过也	1	zhi ren zhi guo ye
然则吾奈何	1	ran ze wu nai he
吾遇天难	1	wu yu tian nan
汝徒处无为	1	ru tu chu wu wei

各复其根	1	ge fu qi gen

浑浑沌沌	1	hun hun dun dun

若彼知之	1	ruo bi zhi zhi
乃是离之	1	nai shi li zhi
无问其名	1	wu wen qi ming
无窥其情	1	wu kui qi qing

起辞而行	1	qi ci er xing
世俗之人	1	shi su zhi ren

异于己而不欲者	1	yi yu ji er bu yu zhe

后重前轻	1	hou zhong qian qing

吾非不知	1	wu fei bu zhi

独弦哀歌以卖名声于天下者乎	1	du xian ai ge yi mai ming sheng yu tian xia zhe hu
汝方将忘汝神气	1	ru fang jiang wang ru shen qi
堕汝形骸	1	duo ru xing hai
而庶几乎	1	er shu ji hu
而身之不能治	1	er shen zhi bu neng zhi
而何暇治天下乎	1	er he xia zhi tian xia hu
无乏吾事	1	wu fa wu shi
子贡卑陬失色	1	zi gong bei zou shi se
顼顼然不自得	1	xu xu ran bu zi de
行三十里而后愈	1	hang san shi li er hou yu
其弟子曰	1	qi di zi yue
向之人何为者邪	1	xiang zhi ren he wei zhe xie
夫子何故见之变容失色	1	fu zi he gu jian zhi bian rong shi se
终日不自反邪	1	zhong ri bu zi fan xie
始吾以为天下一人耳	1	shi wu yi wei tian xia yi ren er
不知复有夫人也	1	bu zhi fu you fu ren ye
吾闻之夫子	1	wu wen zhi fu zi
见功多者	1	jian gong duo zhe
圣人之道	1	sheng ren zhi dao
今徒不然	1	jin tu bu ran
执道者德全	1	zhi dao zhe de quan
德全者形全	1	de quan zhe xing quan
形全者神全	1	xing quan zhe shen quan
圣人之道也	1	sheng ren zhi dao ye
托生与民并行而不知其所之	1	tuo sheng yu min bing xing er bu zhi qi suo zhi
乎淳备哉	1	hu chun bei zai
功利机巧必忘夫人之心	1	gong li ji qiao bi wang fu ren zhi xin
若夫人者	1	ruo fu ren zhe
非其志不之	1	fei qi zhi bu zhi
非其心不为	1	fei qi xin bu wei
虽以天下誉之	1	sui yi tian xia yu zhi
得其所谓	1	de qi suo wei
以天下非之	1	yi tian xia fei zhi
失其所谓	1	shi qi suo wei
傥然不受	1	tang ran bu shou
天下之非誉无益损焉	1	tian xia zhi fei yu wu yi sun yan
是谓全德之人哉	1	shi wei quan de zhi ren zai
我之谓风波之民	1	wo zhi wei feng bo zhi min
以告孔子	1	yi gao kong zi
彼假修浑沌氏之术者也	1	bi jia xiu hun dun shi zhi shu zhe ye
不识其二	1	bu shi qi er
治其内而不治其外	1	zhi qi nei er bu zhi qi wai
夫明白入素	1	fu ming bai ru su
无为复朴	1	wu wei fu pu
体性抱神	1	ti xing bao shen
以游世俗之间者	1	yi you shi su zhi jian zhe
汝将固惊邪	1	ru jiang gu jing xie
且浑沌氏之术	1	qie hun dun shi zhi shu

子将奚之	1	zi jiang xi zhi
将之大壑	1	jiang zhi da he
夫大壑之为物也	1	fu da he zhi wei wu ye
吾将游焉	1	wu jiang you yan
夫子无意于横目之民乎	1	fu zi wu yi yu heng mu zhi min hu
愿闻圣治	1	yuan wen sheng zhi
官施而不失其宜	1	guan shi er bu shi qi yi
拔举而不失其能	1	ba ju er bu shi qi neng
毕见其情事而行其所为	1	bi jian qi qing shi er xing qi suo wei
行言自为而天下化	1	hang yan zi wei er tian xia hua
手挠顾指	1	shou nao gu zhi
四方之民莫不俱至	1	si fang zhi min mo bu ju zhi
此之谓圣治	1	ci zhi wei sheng zhi
愿闻德人	1	yuan wen de ren
不藏是非美恶	1	bu cang shi fei mei e
四海之内共利之之谓悦	1	si hai zhi nei gong li zhi zhi wei yue

财用有余而不知其所自来	1	cai yong you yu er bu zhi qi suo zi lai
饮食取足而不知其所从	1	yin shi qu zu er bu zhi qi suo cong
此谓德人之容	1	ci wei de ren zhi rong
愿闻神人	1	yuan wen shen ren
上神乘光	1	shang shen cheng guang
与形灭亡	1	yu xing mie wang
是谓照旷	1	shi wei zhao kuang
致命尽情	1	zhi ming jin qing
天地乐而万事销亡	1	tian di le er wan shi xiao wang
万物复情	1	wan wu fu qing
此之谓混溟	1	ci zhi wei hun ming
门无鬼与赤张满稽观于武王之师	1	men wu gui yu chi zhang man ji guan yu wu wang zhi shi
赤张满稽曰	1	chi zhang man ji yue
不及有虞氏乎	1	bu ji you yu shi hu
故离此患也	1	gu li ci huan ye
门无鬼曰	1	men wu gui yue
天下均治而有虞氏治之邪	1	tian xia jun zhi er you yu shi zhi zhi xie
其乱而后治之与	1	qi luan er hou zhi zhi yu
天下均治之为愿	1	tian xia jun zhi zhi wei yuan
而何计以有虞氏为	1	er he ji yi you yu shi wei
有虞氏之药疡也	1	you yu shi zhi yao yang ye
病而求医	1	bing er qiu yi

至德之世	1	zhi de zhi shi

民如野鹿	1	min ru ye lu
端正而不知以为义	1	duan zheng er bu zhi yi wei yi
