蠢动而相使不以为赐	1	chun dong er xiang shi bu yi wei ci
是故行而无迹	1	shi gu hang er wu ji
事而无传	1	shi er wu chuan
孝子不谀其亲	1	xiao zi bu yu qi qin
忠臣不谄其君	1	zhong chen bu chan qi jun
子之盛也	1	zi zhi sheng ye
亲之所言而然	1	qin zhi suo yan er ran
所行而善	1	suo hang er shan
则世俗谓之不肖子	1	ze shi su wei zhi bu xiao zi
君之所言而然	1	jun zhi suo yan er ran
则世俗谓之不肖臣	1	ze shi su wei zhi bu xiao chen
而未知此其必然邪	1	er wei zhi ci qi bi ran xie
世俗之所谓然而然之	1	shi su zhi suo wei ran er ran zhi
所谓善而善之	1	suo wei shan er shan zhi
则不谓之道谀之人也	1	ze bu wei zhi dao yu zhi ren ye
然则俗故严于亲而尊于君邪	1	ran ze su gu yan yu qin er zun yu jun xie

合譬饰辞聚众也	1	he pi shi ci ju zhong ye

以媚一世	1	yi mei yi shi
而不自谓道谀	1	er bu zi wei dao yu

知其愚者	1	zhi qi yu zhe
非大愚也	1	fei da yu ye
知其惑者	1	zhi qi huo zhe
非不惑也	1	fei bu huo ye
终身不解	1	zhong shen bu jie

而今也以天下惑	1	er jin ye yi tian xia huo
予虽有祈向	1	yu sui you qi xiang
不可得也	1	bu ke dei ye
大声不入于里耳	1	da sheng bu ru yu li er
则嗑然而笑	1	ze ke ran er xiao
是故高言不止于众人之心	1	shi gu gao yan bu zhi yu zhong ren zhi xin
至言不出	1	zhi yan bu chu

以二缶钟惑	1	yi er fou zhong huo

然其失性均也	1	ran qi shi xing jun ye

使目不明	1	shi mu bu ming

墨乃始离	1	mo nai shi li
自以为得	1	zi yi wei de

以此事上	1	yi ci shi shang
以此畜下	1	yi ci chu xia
以此治物	1	yi ci zhi wu
以此修身	1	yi ci xiu shen
知谋不用	1	zhi mou bu yong
必归其天	1	bi gui qi tian
此之谓大平	1	ci zhi wei da ping
治之至也	1	zhi zhi zhi ye
有形有名	1	you xing you ming
古之语大道者	1	gu zhi yu da dao zhe
五变而形名可举	1	wu bian er xing ming ke ju
九变而赏罚可言也	1	jiu bian er shang fa ke yan ye
骤而语形名	1	zhou er yu xing ming
不知其本也	1	bu zhi qi ben ye
骤而语赏罚	1	zhou er yu shang fa
不知其始也	1	bu zhi qi shi ye
倒道而言	1	dao dao er yan
迕道而说者	1	wu dao er shuo zhe
人之所治也	1	ren zhi suo zhi ye
安能治人	1	an neng zhi ren
骤而语形名赏罚	1	zhou er yu xing ming shang fa
此有知治之具	1	ci you zhi zhi zhi ju
非知治之道	1	fei zhi zhi zhi dao
可用于天下	1	ke yong yu tian xia
不足以用天下	1	bu zu yi yong tian xia
此之谓辩士	1	ci zhi wei bian shi
一曲之人也	1	yi qu zhi ren ye
礼法数度	1	li fa shu du
形名比详	1	xing ming bi xiang
此下之所以事上	1	ci xia zhi suo yi shi shang
非上之所以畜下也	1	fei shang zhi suo yi chu xia ye
昔者舜问于尧曰	1	xi zhe shun wen yu yao yue
天王之用心何如	1	tian wang zhi yong xin he ru
吾不敖无告	1	wu bu ao wu gao
不废穷民	1	bu fei qiong min
嘉孺子而哀妇人	1	jia ru zi er ai fu ren
此吾所以用心已	1	ci wu suo yi yong xin yi
美则美矣	1	mei ze mei yi
而未大也	1	er wei da ye
然则何如	1	ran ze he ru
天德而出宁	1	tian de er chu ning
日月照而四时行	1	ri yue zhao er si shi hang
若昼夜之有经	1	ruo zhou ye zhi you jing

胶胶扰扰乎	1	jiao jiao rao rao hu
天之合也	1	tian zhi he ye
人之合也	1	ren zhi he ye
夫天地者	1	fu tian di zhe
古之所大也	1	gu zhi suo da ye
舜之所共美也	1	shun zhi suo gong mei ye
天地而已矣	1	tian di er yi yi
孔子西藏书于周室	1	kong zi xi zang shu yu zhou shi
子路谋曰	1	zi lu mou yue
由闻周之征藏史有老聃者	1	you wen zhou zhi zheng cang shi you lao dan zhe
免而归居	1	mian er gui ju
夫子欲藏书	1	fu zi yu cang shu
则试往因焉	1	ze shi wang yin yan
往见老聃	1	wang jian lao dan
而老聃不许	1	er lao dan bu xu
十二经以说	1	shi er jing yi shuo
老聃中其说	1	lao dan zhong qi shuo
愿闻其要	1	yuan wen qi yao
要在仁义	1	yao zai ren yi
人之性邪	1	ren zhi xing xie
君子不仁则不成	1	jun zi bu ren ze bu cheng
不义则不生	1	bu yi ze bu sheng
真人之性也	1	zhen ren zhi xing ye
又将奚为矣	1	you jiang xi wei yi
何谓仁义	1	he wei ren yi
中心物恺	1	zhong xin wu kai
兼爱无私	1	jian ai wu si
此仁义之情也	1	ci ren yi zhi qing ye
几乎后言	1	ji hu hou yan

夫子乱人之性也	1	fu zi luan ren zhi xing ye

吾闻夫子圣人也	1	wu wen fu zi sheng ren ye
吾固不辞远道而来愿见	1	wu gu bu ci yuan dao er lai yuan jian
百舍重趼而不敢息	1	bai she zhong jian er bu gan xi
今吾观子非圣人也	1	jin wu guan zi fei sheng ren ye
鼠壤有余蔬而弃妹	1	shu rang you yu shu er qi mei
生熟不尽于前	1	sheng shu bu jin yu qian

老子漠然不应	1	lao zi mo ran bu ying
士成绮明日复见	1	shi cheng qi ming ri fu jian
昔者吾有剌于子	1	xi zhe wu you la yu zi
今吾心正	1	jin wu xin zheng
夫巧知神圣之人	1	fu qiao zhi shen sheng zhi ren
吾自以为脱焉	1	wu zi yi wei tuo yan
昔者子呼我牛也而谓之牛	1	xi zhe zi hu wo niu ye er wei zhi niu
呼我马也而谓之马	1	hu wo ma ye er wei zhi ma
苟有其实	1	gou you qi shi

吾非以服有服	1	wu fei yi fu you fu

凡以为不信	1	fan yi wei bu xin
边竟有人焉	1	bian jing you ren yan
其名为窃	1	qi ming wei qie
于大不终	1	yu da bu zhong

故万物备	1	gu wan wu bei

能守其本	1	neng shou qi ben
故外天地	1	gu wai tian di

果不足以得彼之情	1	guo bu zu yi de bi zhi qing
则知者不言	1	ze zhi zhe bu yan
而世岂识之哉	1	er shi qi shi zhi zai

公之所读者	1	gong zhi suo du zhe
圣人之言也	1	sheng ren zhi yan ye

有说则可	1	you shuo ze ke
无说则死	1	wu shuo ze si
臣也以臣之事观之	1	chen ye yi chen zhi shi guan zhi

不徐不疾	1	bu xu bu ji
得之于手而应于心	1	de zhi yu shou er ying yu xin
口不能言	1	kou bu neng yan
有数存乎其间	1	you shu cun hu qi jian

是以行年七十而老斫轮	1	shi yi hang nian qi shi er lao zhuo lun

无言而心说	1	wu yan er xin shuo

视之不见其形	1	shi zhi bu jian qi xing
充满天地	1	chong man tian di
苞裹六极	1	bao guo liu ji
汝欲听之而无接焉	1	ru yu ting zhi er wu jie yan
而故惑也	1	er gu huo ye
吾又次之以怠	1	wu you ci zhi yi dai
卒之于惑	1	zu zhi yu huo
道可载而与之俱也	1	dao ke zai er yu zhi ju ye
孔子西游于卫	1	kong zi xi you yu wei
颜渊问师金曰	1	yan yuan wen shi jin yue
以夫子之行为奚如	1	yi fu zi zhi xing wei xi ru
而夫子其穷哉	1	er fu zi qi qiong zai
夫刍狗之未陈也	1	fu chu gou zhi wei chen ye
盛以箧衍	1	sheng yi qie yan
巾以文绣	1	jin yi wen xiu
尸祝齐戒以将之	1	shi zhu qi jie yi jiang zhi
及其已陈也	1	ji qi yi chen ye
行者践其首脊	1	xing zhe jian qi shou ji
苏者取而爨之而已	1	su zhe qu er cuan zhi er yi
将复取而盛以箧衍	1	jiang fu qu er sheng yi qie yan
游居寝卧其下	1	you ju qin wo qi xia
彼不得梦	1	bi bu de meng
必且数眯焉	1	bi qie shu mi yan
今而夫子亦取先王已陈刍狗	1	jin er fu zi yi qu xian wang yi chen chu gou
聚弟子游居寝卧其下	1	ju di zi you ju qin wo qi xia
故伐树于宋	1	gu fa shu yu song
削迹于卫	1	xue ji yu wei
穷于商周	1	qiong yu shang zhou
是非其梦邪	1	shi fei qi meng xie
围于陈蔡之间	1	wei yu chen cai zhi jian
七日不火食	1	qi ri bu huo shi
死生相与邻	1	si sheng xiang yu lin
是非其眯邪	1	shi fei qi mi xie
夫水行莫如用舟	1	fu shui hang mo ru yong zhou
而陆行莫如用车	1	er lu hang mo ru yong che
以舟之可行于水也	1	yi zhou zhi ke xing yu shui ye
而求推之于陆	1	er qiu tui zhi yu lu
则没世不行寻常	1	ze mei shi bu xing xun chang
古今非水陆与	1	gu jin fei shui lu yu
周鲁非舟车与	1	zhou lu fei zhou che yu
今蕲行周于鲁	1	jin qi hang zhou yu lu
是犹推舟于陆也	1	shi you tui zhou yu lu ye
劳而无功	1	lao er wu gong
身必有殃	1	shen bi you yang
彼未知夫无方之传	1	bi wei zhi fu wu fang zhi chuan

非藏其知而不发也	1	fei cang qi zhi er bu fa ye
时命大谬也	1	shi ming da miu ye
当时命而大行乎天下	1	dang shi ming er da hang hu tian xia
则反一无迹	1	ze fan yi wu ji
不当时命而大穷乎天下	1	bu dang shi ming er da qiong hu tian xia
则深根宁极而待	1	ze shen gen ning ji er dai
此存身之道也	1	ci cun shen zhi dao ye
古之存身者	1	gu zhi cun shen zhe
不以辩饰知	1	bu yi bian shi zhi
不以知穷天下	1	bu yi zhi qiong tian xia
不以知穷德	1	bu yi zhi qiong de
危然处其所而反其性	1	wei ran chu qi suo er fan qi xing
己又何为哉	1	ji you he wei zai
道固不小行	1	dao gu bu xiao hang
德固不小识	1	de gu bu xiao shi
小识伤德	1	xiao shi shang de
小行伤道	1	xiao hang shang dao
正己而已矣	1	zheng ji er yi yi
乐全之谓得志	1	le quan zhi wei de zhi
古之所谓得志者	1	gu zhi suo wei de zhi zhe
非轩冕之谓也	1	fei xuan mian zhi wei ye
谓其无以益其乐而已矣	1	wei qi wu yi yi qi le er yi yi
今之所谓得志者	1	jin zhi suo wei de zhi zhe
轩冕之谓也	1	xuan mian zhi wei ye
轩冕在身	1	xuan mian zai shen
非性命也	1	fei xing ming ye
物之傥来	1	wu zhi tang lai
其来不可圉	1	qi lai bu ke yu
其去不可止	1	qi qu bu ke zhi
故不为轩冕肆志	1	gu bu wei xuan mian si zhi
不为穷约趋俗	1	bu wei qiong yue qu su
其乐彼与此同	1	qi le bi yu ci tong
故无忧而已矣	1	gu wu you er yi yi
今寄去则不乐	1	jin ji qu ze bu le
未尝不荒也	1	wei chang bu huang ye
丧己于物	1	sang ji yu wu
失性于俗者	1	shi xing yu su zhe
谓之倒置之民	1	wei zhi dao zhi zhi min
庄子外篇秋水第十七秋水时至	1	zhuang zi wai pian qiu shui di shi qi qiu shui shi zhi
百川灌河	1	bai chuan guan he
泾流之大	1	jing liu zhi da
渚崖之间	1	zhu ya zhi jian
不辩牛马	1	bu bian niu ma
于是焉河伯欣然自喜	1	yu shi yan he bo xin ran zi xi
以天下之美为尽在己	1	yi tian xia zhi mei wei jin zai ji
顺流而东行	1	shun liu er dong hang
至于北海	1	zhi yu bei hai
东面而视	1	dong mian er shi
不见水端	1	bu jian shui duan
于是焉河伯始旋其面目	1	yu shi yan he bo shi xuan qi mian mu
望洋向若而叹曰	1	wang yang xiang ruo er tan yue
以为莫己若者	1	yi wei mo ji ruo zhe
我之谓也	1	wo zhi wei ye
且夫我尝闻少仲尼之闻而轻伯夷之义者	1	qie fu wo chang wen shao zhong ni zhi wen er qing bo yi zhi yi zhe
始吾弗信	1	shi wu fu xin
今我睹子之难穷也	1	jin wo du zi zhi nan qiong ye
吾非至于子之门则殆矣	1	wu fei zhi yu zi zhi men ze dai yi
吾长见笑于大方之家	1	wu zhang jian xiao yu da fang zhi jia
北海若曰	1	bei hai ruo yue
井蛙不可以语于海者	1	jing wa bu ke yi yu yu hai zhe

今尔出于崖	1	jin er chu yu ya
观于大海	1	guan yu da hai

莫大于海	1	mo da yu hai

不知何时已而不虚	1	bu zhi he shi yi er bu xu

仰天而笑曰	1	yang tian er xiao yue
子独不闻夫	1	zi du bu wen fu
井之蛙乎	1	jing zhi wa hu
谓东海之鳖曰	1	wei dong hai zhi bie yue
出跳梁乎井干之上	1	chu tiao liang hu jing gan zhi shang
入休乎缺	1	ru xiu hu que
赴水则接腋持颐	1	fu shui ze jie ye chi yi
蹶泥则没足灭跗	1	jue ni ze mei zu mie fu
蟹与科斗	1	xie yu ke dou
莫吾能若也	1	mo wu neng ruo ye
且夫擅一壑之水	1	qie fu shan yi he zhi shui
此亦至矣	1	ci yi zhi yi
夫子奚不时来入观乎	1	fu zi xi bu shi lai ru guan hu
东海之鳖左足未入	1	dong hai zhi bie zuo zu wei ru
而右膝已絷矣	1	er you xi yi zhi yi
于是逡巡而却	1	yu shi qun xun er que
告之海曰	1	gao zhi hai yue
夫千里之远	1	fu qian li zhi yuan
不足以举其大	1	bu zu yi ju qi da
千仞之高	1	qian ren zhi gao
不足以极其深	1	bu zu yi ji qi shen
十年九潦	1	shi nian jiu liao
而水弗为加益	1	er shui fu wei jia yi
八年七旱	1	ba nian qi han
而崖不为加损	1	er ya bu wei jia sun
夫不为顷久推移	1	fu bu wei qing jiu tui yi
不以多少进退者	1	bu yi duo shao jin tui zhe
此亦东海之大乐也	1	ci yi dong hai zhi da le ye
井之蛙闻之	1	jing zhi wa wen zhi
适适然惊	1	shi shi ran jing
规规然自失也	1	gui gui ran zi shi ye
且夫知不知是非之竟	1	qie fu zhi bu zhi shi fei zhi jing
而犹欲观于庄子之言	1	er you yu guan yu zhuang zi zhi yan
是犹使蚊负山	1	shi you shi wen fu shan
必不胜任矣	1	bi bu sheng ren yi
且夫知不知论极妙之言	1	qie fu zhi bu zhi lun ji miao zhi yan
而自适一时之利者	1	er zi shi yi shi zhi li zhe
井之蛙与	1	jing zhi wa yu
黄泉而登大皇	1	huang quan er deng da huang
无南无北	1	wu nan wu bei
爽然四解	1	shuang ran si jie
沦于不测	1	lun yu bu ce
无东无西	1	wu dong wu xi
始于玄冥	1	shi yu xuan ming
反于大通	1	fan yu da tong
子乃规规然而求之以察	1	zi nai gui gui ran er qiu zhi yi cha
索之以辩	1	suo zhi yi bian
是直用管窥天	1	shi zhi yong guan kui tian
用锥指地也	1	yong zhui zhi di ye
不亦小乎	1	bu yi xiao hu
且子独不闻夫寿陵余子之学于邯郸与	1	qie zi du bu wen fu shou ling yu zi zhi xue yu han dan yu
未得国能	1	wei de guo neng
又失其故行矣	1	you shi qi gu hang yi
直匍匐而归耳	1	zhi pu fu er gui er
今子不去	1	jin zi bu qu
将忘子之故	1	jiang wang zi zhi gu
失子之业	1	shi zi zhi ye
公孙龙口	1	gong sun long kou
舌举而不下	1	she ju er bu xia
乃逸而走	1	nai yi er zou
庄子钓于濮水	1	zhuang zi diao yu pu shui
楚王使大夫二人往先焉	1	chu wang shi da fu er ren wang xian yan
愿以境内累矣	1	yuan yi jing nei lei yi
庄子持竿不顾	1	zhuang zi chi gan bu gu
吾闻楚有神龟	1	wu wen chu you shen gui
死已三千岁矣	1	si yi san qian sui yi
王巾笥而藏之庙堂之上	1	wang jin si er cang zhi miao tang zhi shang
宁其死为留骨而贵乎	1	ning qi si wei liu gu er gui hu
宁其生而曳尾于涂中乎	1	ning qi sheng er ye wei yu tu zhong hu
二大夫曰	1	er da fu yue
宁生而曳尾涂中	1	ning sheng er ye wei tu zhong
吾将曳尾于涂中	1	wu jiang ye wei yu tu zhong
惠子相梁	1	hui zi xiang liang
庄子往见之	1	zhuang zi wang jian zhi
或谓惠子曰	1	huo wei hui zi yue
欲代子相	1	yu dai zi xiang
于是惠子恐	1	yu shi hui zi kong
搜于国中三日三夜	1	sou yu guo zhong san ri san ye
南方有鸟	1	nan fang you niao
子知之乎	1	zi zhi zhi hu
夫发于南海而飞于北海	1	fu fa yu nan hai er fei yu bei hai
非梧桐不止	1	fei wu tong bu zhi
非练实不食	1	fei lian shi bu shi
非醴泉不饮	1	fei li quan bu yin
于是鸱得腐鼠	1	yu shi chi de fu shu
仰而视之曰	1	yang er shi zhi yue
今子欲以子之梁国而吓我邪	1	jin zi yu yi zi zhi liang guo er xia wo xie
庄子与惠子游于濠梁之上	1	zhuang zi yu hui zi you yu hao liang zhi shang
鱼出游从容	1	yu chu you cong rong
是鱼之乐也	1	shi yu zhi le ye
安知鱼之乐	1	an zhi yu zhi le
安知我不知鱼之乐	1	an zhi wo bu zhi yu zhi le
固不知子矣	1	gu bu zhi zi yi
子固非鱼也	1	zi gu fei yu ye
子之不知鱼之乐	1	zi zhi bu zhi yu zhi le
请循其本	1	qing xun qi ben
子曰汝安知鱼乐云者	1	zi yue ru an zhi yu le yun zhe
既已知吾知之而问我	1	ji yi zhi wu zhi zhi er wen wo
我知之濠上也	1	wo zhi zhi hao shang ye
庄子外篇至乐第十八天下有至乐无有哉	1	zhuang zi wai pian zhi le di shi ba tian xia you zhi le wu you zai
有可以活身者无有哉	1	you ke yi huo shen zhe wu you zai
今奚为奚据	1	jin xi wei xi ju
奚避奚处	1	xi bi xi chu
奚就奚去	1	xi jiu xi qu
奚乐奚恶	1	xi le xi e
夫天下之所尊者	1	fu tian xia zhi suo zun zhe
富贵寿善也	1	fu gui shou shan ye
身安厚味美服好色音声也	1	shen an hou wei mei fu hao se yin sheng ye
贫贱夭恶也	1	pin jian yao e ye
身不得安逸	1	shen bu de an yi
口不得厚味	1	kou bu de hou wei
形不得美服	1	xing bu de mei fu
目不得好色	1	mu bu de hao se
耳不得音声	1	er bu de yin sheng
若不得者	1	ruo bu de zhe
则大忧以惧	1	ze da you yi ju
其为形也亦愚哉	1	qi wei xing ye yi yu zai
苦身疾作	1	ku shen ji zuo
多积财而不得尽用	1	duo ji cai er bu de jin yong
其为形也亦外矣	1	qi wei xing ye yi wai yi
思虑善否	1	si lv shan fou
其为形也亦疏矣	1	qi wei xing ye yi shu yi
与忧俱生	1	yu you ju sheng
久忧不死	1	jiu you bu si
何之苦也	1	he zhi ku ye
其为形也亦远矣	1	qi wei xing ye yi yuan yi
烈士为天下见善矣	1	lie shi wei tian xia jian shan yi
未足以活身	1	wei zu yi huo shen
吾未知善之诚善邪	1	wu wei zhi shan zhi cheng shan xie
诚不善邪	1	cheng bu shan xie
若以为善矣	1	ruo yi wei shan yi
不足活身	1	bu zu huo shen
以为不善矣	1	yi wei bu shan yi
足以活人	1	zu yi huo ren
忠谏不听	1	zhong jian bu ting
蹲循勿争	1	dun xun wu zheng
故夫子胥争之	1	gu fu zi xu zheng zhi
以残其形	1	yi can qi xing
名亦不成	1	ming yi bu cheng
诚有善无有哉	1	cheng you shan wu you zai
今俗之所为与其所乐	1	jin su zhi suo wei yu qi suo le
吾又未知乐之果乐邪	1	wu you wei zhi le zhi guo le xie
果不乐邪	1	guo bu le xie
吾观夫俗之所乐	1	wu guan fu su zhi suo le
举群趣者	1	ju qun qu zhe
然如将不得已	1	ran ru jiang bu de yi
而皆曰乐者	1	er jie yue le zhe
吾未之乐也	1	wu wei zhi le ye
亦未之不乐也	1	yi wei zhi bu le ye
果有乐无有哉	1	guo you le wu you zai
吾以无为诚乐矣	1	wu yi wu wei cheng le yi
又俗之所大苦也	1	you su zhi suo da ku ye
至乐无乐	1	zhi le wu le
至誉无誉	1	zhi yu wu yu
天下是非果未可定也	1	tian xia shi fei guo wei ke ding ye
无为可以定是非	1	wu wei ke yi ding shi fei
至乐活身	1	zhi le huo shen
唯无为几存	1	wei wu wei ji cun
请尝试言之	1	qing chang shi yan zhi
天无为以之清	1	tian wu wei yi zhi qing
地无为以之宁	1	di wu wei yi zhi ning
故两无为相合	1	gu liang wu wei xiang he
万物皆化生	1	wan wu jie hua sheng
芒乎芴乎	1	mang hu wu hu
而无从出乎	1	er wu cong chu hu
芴乎芒乎	1	wu hu mang hu
而无有象乎	1	er wu you xiang hu
万物职职	1	wan wu zhi zhi
皆从无为殖	1	jie cong wu wei zhi
天地无为也而无不为也	1	tian di wu wei ye er wu bu wei ye
人也孰能得无为哉	1	ren ye shu neng de wu wei zai
庄子妻死	1	zhuang zi qi si
惠子吊之	1	hui zi diao zhi
庄子则方箕踞鼓盆而歌	1	zhuang zi ze fang ji ju gu pen er ge
不哭亦足矣	1	bu ku yi zu yi
又鼓盆而歌	1	you gu pen er ge
不亦甚乎	1	bu yi shen hu
是其始死也	1	shi qi shi si ye
我独何能无概	1	wo du he neng wu gai
然察其始而本无生	1	ran cha qi shi er ben wu sheng
非徒无生也	1	fei tu wu sheng ye
而本无形	1	er ben wu xing
非徒无形也	1	fei tu wu xing ye
而本无气	1	er ben wu qi
杂乎芒芴之间	1	za hu mang wu zhi jian
变而有气	1	bian er you qi
气变而有形	1	qi bian er you xing
形变而有生	1	xing bian er you sheng
今又变而之死	1	jin you bian er zhi si
是相与为春秋冬夏四时行也	1	shi xiang yu wei chun qiu dong xia si shi hang ye
人且偃然寝于巨室	1	ren qie yan ran qin yu ju shi
然随而哭之	1	ran sui er ku zhi
自以为不通乎命	1	zi yi wei bu tong hu ming
支离叔与滑介叔观于冥伯之丘	1	zhi li shu yu hua jie shu guan yu ming bo zhi qiu
昆仑之虚	1	kun lun zhi xu
黄帝之所休	1	huang di zhi suo xiu
俄而柳生其左肘	1	e er liu sheng qi zuo zhou
其意蹶蹶然恶之	1	qi yi jue jue ran e zhi
支离叔曰	1	zhi li shu yue
子恶之乎	1	zi e zhi hu
滑介叔曰	1	hua jie shu yue
假之而生生者	1	jia zhi er sheng sheng zhe
死生为昼夜	1	si sheng wei zhou ye
且吾与子观化而化及我	1	qie wu yu zi guan hua er hua ji wo
我又何恶焉	1	wo you he e yan
庄子之楚	1	zhuang zi zhi chu
见空髑髅	1	jian kong du lou
因而问之	1	yin er wen zhi
夫子贪生失理而为此乎	1	fu zi tan sheng shi li er wei ci hu
将子有亡国之事	1	jiang zi you wang guo zhi shi
斧铖之诛而为此乎	1	fu cheng zhi zhu er wei ci hu
将子有不善之行	1	jiang zi you bu shan zhi hang
愧遗父母妻子之丑而为此乎	1	kui yi fu mu qi zi zhi chou er wei ci hu
将子有冻馁之患而为此乎	1	jiang zi you dong nei zhi huan er wei ci hu
将子之春秋故及此乎	1	jiang zi zhi chun qiu gu ji ci hu
于是语卒	1	yu shi yu zu
髑髅见梦曰	1	du lou jian meng yue
子之谈者似辩士	1	zi zhi tan zhe shi bian shi
诸子所言	1	zhu zi suo yan
皆生人之累也	1	jie sheng ren zhi lei ye
死则无此矣	1	si ze wu ci yi
子欲闻死之说乎	1	zi yu wen si zhi shuo hu
无君于上	1	wu jun yu shang
无臣于下	1	wu chen yu xia
亦无四时之事	1	yi wu si shi zhi shi
从然以天地为春秋	1	cong ran yi tian di wei chun qiu
虽南面王乐	1	sui nan mian wang le
不能过也	1	bu neng guo ye
庄子不信	1	zhuang zi bu xin
吾使司命复生子形	1	wu shi si ming fu sheng zi xing
为子骨肉肌肤	1	wei zi gu rou ji fu
反子父母	1	fan zi fu mu
子欲之乎	1	zi yu zhi hu
髑髅深颦蹙额曰	1	du lou shen pin cu e yue
吾安能弃南面王乐而复为人间之劳乎	1	wu an neng qi nan mian wang le er fu wei ren jian zhi lao hu
颜渊东之齐	1	yan yuan dong zhi qi
孔子有忧色	1	kong zi you you se
子贡下席而问曰	1	zi gong xia xi er wen yue
小子敢问	1	xiao zi gan wen
回东之齐	1	hui dong zhi qi
夫子有忧色	1	fu zi you you se
善哉汝问	1	shan zai ru wen
昔者管子有言	1	xi zhe guan zi you yan
丘甚善之	1	qiu shen shan zhi
曰褚小者不可以怀大	1	yue chu xiao zhe bu ke yi huai da
绠短者不可以汲深	1	geng duan zhe bu ke yi ji shen
夫若是者	1	fu ruo shi zhe
以为命有所成而形有所适也	1	yi wei ming you suo cheng er xing you suo shi ye
夫不可损益	1	fu bu ke sun yi
吾恐回与齐侯言尧	1	wu kong hui yu qi hou yan yao
黄帝之道	1	huang di zhi dao
而重以燧人	1	er zhong yi sui ren
神农之言	1	shen nong zhi yan
彼将内求于己而不得	1	bi jiang nei qiu yu ji er bu de
不得则惑	1	bu de ze huo
人惑则死	1	ren huo ze si
且女独不闻邪	1	qie nv du bu wen xie
昔者海鸟止于鲁郊	1	xi zhe hai niao zhi yu lu jiao
鲁侯御而觞之于庙	1	lu hou yu er shang zhi yu miao
奏九韶以为乐	1	zou jiu shao yi wei le
具太牢以为膳	1	ju tai lao yi wei shan
鸟乃眩视忧悲	1	niao nai xuan shi you bei
不敢食一脔	1	bu gan shi yi luan
不敢饮一杯	1	bu gan yin yi bei
三日而死	1	san ri er si
此以己养养鸟也	1	ci yi ji yang yang niao ye
非以鸟养养鸟也	1	fei yi niao yang yang niao ye
夫以鸟养养鸟者	1	fu yi niao yang yang niao zhe
宜栖之深林	1	yi qi zhi shen lin
游之坛陆	1	you zhi tan lu
浮之江湖	1	fu zhi jiang hu
食之鳅鲦	1	shi zhi qiu tiao
随行列而止	1	sui xing lie er zhi
逶迤而处	1	wei yi er chu
彼唯人言之恶闻	1	bi wei ren yan zhi e wen
咸池九韶之乐	1	xian chi jiu shao zhi le
张之洞庭之野	1	zhang zhi dong ting zhi ye
鸟闻之而飞	1	niao wen zhi er fei
兽闻之而走	1	shou wen zhi er zou
鱼闻之而下入	1	yu wen zhi er xia ru
人卒闻之	1	ren zu wen zhi
相与还而观之	1	xiang yu hai er guan zhi
鱼处水而生	1	yu chu shui er sheng
人处水而死	1	ren chu shui er si
彼必相与异	1	bi bi xiang yu yi
其好恶故异也	1	qi hao wu gu yi ye
故先圣不一其能	1	gu xian sheng bu yi qi neng
不同其事	1	bu tong qi shi
名止于实	1	ming zhi yu shi
义设于适	1	yi she yu shi
是之谓条达而福持	1	shi zhi wei tiao da er fu chi
从见百岁髑髅	1	cong jian bai sui du lou
蓬而指之曰	1	peng er zhi zhi yue
唯予与汝知而未尝死	1	wei yu yu ru zhi er wei chang si
未尝生也	1	wei chang sheng ye
若果养乎	1	ruo guo yang hu
予果欢乎	1	yu guo huan hu
得水则为继	1	de shui ze wei ji
得水土之际则为蛙	1	de shui tu zhi ji ze wei wa
生于陵屯则为陵舄	1	sheng yu ling tun ze wei ling xi
陵舄得郁栖则为乌足	1	ling xi de yu qi ze wei wu zu
乌足之根为蛴螬	1	wu zu zhi gen wei qi cao
其叶为胡蝶	1	qi ye wei hu die
胡蝶胥也化而为虫	1	hu die xu ye hua er wei chong
生于灶下	1	sheng yu zao xia
其状若脱	1	qi zhuang ruo tuo
其名为鸲掇	1	qi ming wei qu duo
鸲掇千日为鸟	1	qu duo qian ri wei niao
其名为干余骨	1	qi ming wei gan yu gu
干余骨之沫为斯弥	1	gan yu gu zhi mo wei si mi
斯弥为食醯	1	si mi wei shi xi
颐辂生乎食醯	1	yi lu sheng hu shi xi
音生乎九猷	1	yin sheng hu jiu you
瞀芮生乎腐	1	mao rui sheng hu fu
羊奚比乎不	1	yang xi bi hu bu
久竹生青宁	1	jiu zhu sheng qing ning
青宁生程	1	qing ning sheng cheng
人又反入于机	1	ren you fan ru yu ji
万物皆出于机	1	wan wu jie chu yu ji
皆入于机	1	jie ru yu ji
庄子外篇达生第十九达生之情者	1	zhuang zi wai pian da sheng di shi jiu da sheng zhi qing zhe
不务生之所无以为	1	bu wu sheng zhi suo wu yi wei
达命之情者	1	da ming zhi qing zhe
不务知之所无奈何	1	bu wu zhi zhi suo wu nai he
养形必先之以物	1	yang xing bi xian zhi yi wu
物有余而形不养者有之矣	1	wu you yu er xing bu yang zhe you zhi yi
有生必先无离形	1	you sheng bi xian wu li xing
形不离而生亡者有之矣	1	xing bu li er sheng wang zhe you zhi yi
生之来不能却	1	sheng zhi lai bu neng que
其去不能止	1	qi qu bu neng zhi
世之人以为养形足以存生	1	shi zhi ren yi wei yang xing zu yi cun sheng
而养形果不足以存生	1	er yang xing guo bu zu yi cun sheng
则世奚足为哉	1	ze shi xi zu wei zai
虽不足为而不可不为者	1	sui bu zu wei er bu ke bu wei zhe
其为不免矣	1	qi wei bu mian yi
夫欲免为形者	1	fu yu mian wei xing zhe
莫如弃世	1	mo ru qi shi
弃世则无累	1	qi shi ze wu lei
无累则正平	1	wu lei ze zheng ping
正平则与彼更生	1	zheng ping ze yu bi geng sheng
更生则几矣	1	geng sheng ze ji yi
事奚足遗弃而生奚足遗	1	shi xi zu yi qi er sheng xi zu yi
弃事则形不劳	1	qi shi ze xing bu lao
遗生则精不亏	1	yi sheng ze jing bu kui
夫形全精复	1	fu xing quan jing fu
与天为一	1	yu tian wei yi
万物之父母也	1	wan wu zhi fu mu ye
合则成体	1	he ze cheng ti
散则成始	1	san ze cheng shi
形精不亏	1	xing jing bu kui
是谓能移	1	shi wei neng yi
精而又精	1	jing er you jing
反以相天	1	fan yi xiang tian
子列子问关尹曰	1	zi lie zi wen guan yin yue
至人潜行不窒	1	zhi ren qian xing bu zhi
蹈火不热	1	dao huo bu re
行乎万物之上而不栗	1	hang hu wan wu zhi shang er bu li
请问何以至于此	1	qing wen he yi zhi yu ci
是纯气之守也	1	shi chun qi zhi shou ye
非知巧果敢之列	1	fei zhi qiao guo gan zhi lie
凡有貌象声色者	1	fan you mao xiang sheng se zhe
物与物何以相远	1	wu yu wu he yi xiang yuan
夫奚足以至乎先	1	fu xi zu yi zhi hu xian
是色而已	1	shi se er yi
则物之造乎不形	1	ze wu zhi zao hu bu xing
而止乎无所化	1	er zhi hu wu suo hua
夫得是而穷之者	1	fu de shi er qiong zhi zhe
物焉得而止焉	1	wu yan de er zhi yan
彼将处乎不淫之度	1	bi jiang chu hu bu yin zhi du
而藏乎无端之纪	1	er cang hu wu duan zhi ji
游乎万物之所终始	1	you hu wan wu zhi suo zhong shi
以通乎物之所造	1	yi tong hu wu zhi suo zao
其天守全	1	qi tian shou quan
其神无隙	1	qi shen wu xi
物奚自入焉	1	wu xi zi ru yan
夫醉者之坠车	1	fu zui zhe zhi zhui che
虽疾不死	1	sui ji bu si
骨节与人同而犯害与人异	1	gu jie yu ren tong er fan hai yu ren yi
其神全也	1	qi shen quan ye
乘亦不知也	1	cheng yi bu zhi ye
坠亦不知也	1	zhui yi bu zhi ye
死生惊惧不入乎其胸中	1	si sheng jing ju bu ru hu qi xiong zhong
字的右上加	1	zi de you shang jia
彼得全于酒而犹若是	1	bi de quan yu jiu er you ruo shi
而况得全于天乎	1	er kuang de quan yu tian hu
圣人藏于天	1	sheng ren cang yu tian
故莫之能伤也	1	gu mo zhi neng shang ye
不折镆干	1	bu zhe mo gan
虽有忮心者	1	sui you zhi xin zhe
不怨飘瓦	1	bu yuan piao wa
是以天下平均	1	shi yi tian xia ping jun
故无攻战之乱	1	gu wu gong zhan zhi luan
无杀戮之刑者	1	wu sha lu zhi xing zhe
由此道也	1	you ci dao ye
不开人之天	1	bu kai ren zhi tian
而开天之天	1	er kai tian zhi tian
开天者德生	1	kai tian zhe de sheng
开人者贼生	1	kai ren zhe zei sheng
不厌其天	1	bu yan qi tian
不忽于人	1	bu hu yu ren
民几乎以其真	1	min ji hu yi qi zhen
仲尼适楚	1	zhong ni shi chu
出于林中	1	chu yu lin zhong
见佝偻者承蜩	1	jian gou lou zhe cheng tiao
犹掇之也	1	you duo zhi ye
我有道也	1	wo you dao ye
五六月累丸二而不坠	1	wu liu yue lei wan er er bu zhui
则失者锱铢	1	ze shi zhe zi zhu
累三而不坠	1	lei san er bu zhui
则失者十一	1	ze shi zhe shi yi
累五而不坠	1	lei wu er bu zhui
吾处身也	1	wu chu shen ye
若蹶株拘	1	ruo jue zhu ju
吾执臂也	1	wu zhi bi ye
若槁木之枝	1	ruo gao mu zhi zhi
虽天地之大	1	sui tian di zhi da
万物之多	1	wan wu zhi duo
而唯蜩翼之知	1	er wei tiao yi zhi zhi
吾不反不侧	1	wu bu fan bu ce
不以万物易蜩之翼	1	bu yi wan wu yi tiao zhi yi
何为而不得	1	he wei er bu de
孔子顾谓弟子曰	1	kong zi gu wei di zi yue
用志不分	1	yong zhi bu fen
乃凝于神	1	nai ning yu shen
其佝偻丈人之谓乎	1	qi gou lou zhang ren zhi wei hu
颜渊问仲尼曰	1	yan yuan wen zhong ni yue
吾尝济乎觞深之渊	1	wu chang ji hu shang shen zhi yuan
津人操舟若神	1	jin ren cao zhou ruo shen
吾问焉曰	1	wu wen yan yue
操舟可学邪	1	cao zhou ke xue xie
善游者数能	1	shan you zhe shu neng
若乃夫没人	1	ruo nai fu mei ren
则未尝见舟而便操之也	1	ze wei chang jian zhou er bian cao zhi ye
吾问焉而不吾告	1	wu wen yan er bu wu gao
敢问何谓也	1	gan wen he wei ye
若乃夫没人之未尝见舟而便操之也	1	ruo nai fu mei ren zhi wei chang jian zhou er bian cao zhi ye
彼视渊若陵	1	bi shi yuan ruo ling
视舟若履	1	shi zhou ruo lv
犹其车却也	1	you qi che que ye
覆却万方陈乎前而不得入其舍	1	fu que wan fang chen hu qian er bu de ru qi she
恶往而不暇	1	e wang er bu xia
以瓦注者巧	1	yi wa zhu zhe qiao
以钩注者惮	1	yi gou zhu zhe dan
以黄金注者	1	yi huang jin zhu zhe
其巧一也	1	qi qiao yi ye
而有所矜	1	er you suo jin
则重外也	1	ze zhong wai ye
凡外重者内拙	1	fan wai zhong zhe nei zhuo
田开之见周威公	1	tian kai zhi jian zhou wei gong
吾闻祝肾学生	1	wu wen zhu shen xue sheng
吾子与祝肾游	1	wu zi yu zhu shen you
亦何闻焉	1	yi he wen yan
田开之曰	1	tian kai zhi yue
开之操拔	1	kai zhi cao ba
以侍门庭	1	yi shi men ting
亦何闻于夫子	1	yi he wen yu fu zi
田子无让	1	tian zi wu rang
寡人愿闻之	1	gua ren yuan wen zhi
闻之夫子曰	1	wen zhi fu zi yue
善养生者	1	shan yang sheng zhe
若牧羊然	1	ruo mu yang ran
视其后者而鞭之	1	shi qi hou zhe er bian zhi
鲁有单豹者	1	lu you dan bao zhe
岩居而水饮	1	yan ju er shui yin
不与民共利	1	bu yu min gong li
行年七十而犹有婴儿之色	1	hang nian qi shi er you you ying er zhi se
不幸遇饿虎	1	bu xing yu e hu
饿虎杀而食之	1	e hu sha er shi zhi
有张毅者	1	you zhang yi zhe
高门县薄	1	gao men xian bao
无不走也	1	wu bu zou ye
行年四十而有内热之病以死	1	hang nian si shi er you nei re zhi bing yi si
豹养其内而虎食其外	1	bao yang qi nei er hu shi qi wai
毅养其外而病攻其内	1	yi yang qi wai er bing gong qi nei
此二子者	1	ci er zi zhe
皆不鞭其后者也	1	jie bu bian qi hou zhe ye
无入而藏	1	wu ru er cang
无出而阳	1	wu chu er yang
柴立其中央	1	chai li qi zhong yang
三者若得	1	san zhe ruo de
其名必极	1	qi ming bi ji
夫畏涂者	1	fu wei tu zhe
十杀一人	1	shi sha yi ren
则父子兄弟相戒也	1	ze fu zi xiong di xiang jie ye
必盛卒徒而后敢出焉	1	bi sheng zu tu er hou gan chu yan
不亦知乎	1	bu yi zhi hu
人之所取畏者	1	ren zhi suo qu wei zhe
衽席之上	1	ren xi zhi shang
饮食之间	1	yin shi zhi jian
而不知为之戒者	1	er bu zhi wei zhi jie zhe
祝宗人玄端以临牢柙说彘	1	zhu zong ren xuan duan yi lin lao xia shuo zhi
汝奚恶死	1	ru xi e si
吾将三月	1	wu jiang san yue
加汝肩尻乎雕俎之上	1	jia ru jian kao hu diao zu zhi shang
则汝为之乎	1	ze ru wei zhi hu
为彘谋曰	1	wei zhi mou yue
不如食以糠糟而错之牢柙之中	1	bu ru shi yi kang zao er cuo zhi lao xia zhi zhong
则苟生有轩冕之尊	1	ze gou sheng you xuan mian zhi zun
聚偻之中则为之	1	ju lou zhi zhong ze wei zhi
为彘谋则去之	1	wei zhi mou ze qu zhi
自为谋则取之	1	zi wei mou ze qu zhi
所异彘者何也	1	suo yi zhi zhe he ye
桓公田于泽	1	huan gong tian yu ze
公抚管仲之手曰	1	gong fu guan zhong zhi shou yue
仲父何见	1	zhong fu he jian
臣无所见	1	chen wu suo jian
诶诒为病	1	ei yi wei bing
数日不出	1	shu ri bu chu
齐士有皇子告敖者	1	qi shi you huang zi gao ao zhe
公则自伤	1	gong ze zi shang
鬼恶能伤公	1	gui e neng shang gong
散而不反	1	san er bu fan
则为不足	1	ze wei bu zu
上而不下	1	shang er bu xia
则使人善怒	1	ze shi ren shan nu
下而不上	1	xia er bu shang
则使人善忘	1	ze shi ren shan wang
不上不下	1	bu shang bu xia
中身当心	1	zhong shen dang xin
然则有鬼乎	1	ran ze you gui hu
户内之烦壤	1	hu nei zhi fan rang
雷霆处之	1	lei ting chu zhi
东北方之下者倍阿	1	dong bei fang zhi xia zhe bei a
西北方之下者	1	xi bei fang zhi xia zhe
水有罔象	1	shui you wang xiang
野有彷徨	1	ye you pang huang
泽有委蛇	1	ze you wei she
请问委蛇之伏状何如	1	qing wen wei she zhi fu zhuang he ru
其大如毂	1	qi da ru gu
其长如辕	1	qi zhang ru yuan
紫衣而朱冠	1	zi yi er zhu guan
其为物也恶	1	qi wei wu ye e
闻雷车之声则捧其首而立	1	wen lei che zhi sheng ze peng qi shou er li
见之者殆乎霸	1	jian zhi zhe dai hu ba
然而笑曰	1	ran er xiao yue
此寡人之所见者也	1	ci gua ren zhi suo jian zhe ye
于是正衣冠与之坐	1	yu shi zheng yi guan yu zhi zuo
不终日而不知病之去也	1	bu zhong ri er bu zhi bing zhi qu ye
子为王养斗	1	zi wei wang yang dou
十日而问	1	shi ri er wen
方虚骄而恃气	1	fang xu jiao er shi qi

犹应向景	1	you ying xiang jing
犹疾视而盛气	1	you ji shi er sheng qi
虽有鸣者	1	sui you ming zhe
已无变矣	1	yi wu bian yi
望之似木	1	wang zhi shi mu
其德全矣	1	qi de quan yi
无敢应者	1	wu gan ying zhe
孔子观于吕梁	1	kong zi guan yu lv liang
县水三十仞	1	xian shui san shi ren
流沫四十里	1	liu mo si shi li
鼋鼍鱼鳖之所不能游也	1	yuan tuo yu bie zhi suo bu neng you ye
见一丈夫游之	1	jian yi zhang fu you zhi
以为有苦而欲死也	1	yi wei you ku er yu si ye
使弟子并流而拯之	1	shi di zi bing liu er zheng zhi
数百步而出	1	shu bai bu er chu
被发行歌而游于塘下	1	bei fa xing ge er you yu tang xia
孔子从而问焉	1	kong zi cong er wen yan
吾以子为鬼	1	wu yi zi wei gui
察子则人也	1	cha zi ze ren ye
蹈水有道乎	1	dao shui you dao hu

与齐俱入	1	yu qi ju ru
与汩偕出	1	yu gu xie chu
从水之道而不为私焉	1	cong shui zhi dao er bu wei si yan
此吾所以蹈之也	1	ci wu suo yi dao zhi ye
何谓始乎故	1	he wei shi hu gu
吾生于陵而安于陵	1	wu sheng yu ling er an yu ling
长于水而安于水	1	chang yu shui er an yu shui
不知吾所以然而然	1	bu zhi wu suo yi ran er ran
梓庆削木为	1	zi qing xue mu wei
见者惊犹鬼神	1	jian zhe jing you gui shen
鲁侯见而问焉	1	lu hou jian er wen yan
子何术以为焉	1	zi he shu yi wei yan
何术之有	1	he shu zhi you
未尝敢以耗气也	1	wei chang gan yi hao qi ye
必齐以静心	1	bi qi yi jing xin
而不敢怀庆赏爵禄	1	er bu gan huai qing shang jue lu
不敢怀非誉巧拙	1	bu gan huai fei yu qiao zhuo
辄然忘吾有四枝形体也	1	zhe ran wang wu you si zhi xing ti ye
其巧专而外骨消	1	qi qiao zhuan er wai gu xiao
然后入山林	1	ran hou ru shan lin
观天性形躯	1	guan tian xing xing qu
然后加手焉	1	ran hou jia shou yan
不然则已	1	bu ran ze yi
则以天合天	1	ze yi tian he tian
器之所以疑神者	1	qi zhi suo yi yi shen zhe
东野稷以御见庄公	1	dong ye ji yi yu jian zhuang gong
进退中绳	1	jin tui zhong sheng
左右旋中规	1	zuo you xuan zhong gui
庄公以为文弗过也	1	zhuang gong yi wei wen fu guo ye
使之钩百而反	1	shi zhi gou bai er fan
颜阖遇之	1	yan he yu zhi
稷之马将败	1	ji zhi ma jiang bai
公密而不应	1	gong mi er bu ying
果败而反	1	guo bai er fan
子何以知之	1	zi he yi zhi zhi
其马力竭矣而犹求焉	1	qi ma li jie yi er you qiu yan
旋而盖规矩	1	xuan er gai gui ju
指与物化而不以心稽	1	zhi yu wu hua er bu yi xin ji
故其灵台一而不桎	1	gu qi ling tai yi er bu zhi
履之适也	1	lv zhi shi ye
带之适也	1	dai zhi shi ye
知忘是非	1	zhi wang shi fei
心之适也	1	xin zhi shi ye

始乎适而未尝不适者	1	shi hu shi er wei chang bu shi zhe
忘适之适也	1	wang shi zhi shi ye
有孙休者	1	you sun xiu zhe
踵门而诧子扁庆子曰	1	zhong men er cha zi bian qing zi yue
休居乡不见谓不修	1	xiu ju xiang bu jian wei bu xiu
临难不见谓不勇	1	lin nan bu jian wei bu yong
然而田原不遇岁	1	ran er tian yuan bu yu sui
事君不遇世	1	shi jun bu yu shi
宾于乡里	1	bin yu xiang li
逐于州部	1	zhu yu zhou bu
则胡罪乎天哉	1	ze hu zui hu tian zai
休恶遇此命也	1	xiu e yu ci ming ye
子独不闻夫至人之自行邪	1	zi du bu wen fu zhi ren zhi zi xing xie
芒然彷徨乎尘垢之外	1	mang ran pang huang hu chen gou zhi wai
逍遥乎无事之业	1	xiao yao hu wu shi zhi ye
是谓为而不恃	1	shi wei wei er bu shi
今汝饰知以惊愚	1	jin ru shi zhi yi jing yu
修身以明	1	xiu shen yi ming
昭昭乎若揭日月而行也	1	zhao zhao hu ruo jie ri yue er xing ye
汝得全而形躯	1	ru de quan er xing qu
具而九窍	1	ju er jiu qiao
无中道夭于聋盲跛蹇而比于人数亦幸矣	1	wu zhong dao yao yu long mang bo jian er bi yu ren shu yi xing yi
又何暇乎天之怨哉	1	you he xia hu tian zhi yuan zai
仰天而叹	1	yang tian er tan
先生何为叹乎	1	xian sheng he wei tan hu
向者休来	1	xiang zhe xiu lai
吾告之以至人之德	1	wu gao zhi yi zhi ren zhi de
吾恐其惊而遂至于惑也	1	wu kong qi jing er sui zhi yu huo ye
孙子之所言是邪	1	sun zi zhi suo yan shi xie
先生之所言非邪	1	xian sheng zhi suo yan fei xie
非固不能惑是	1	fei gu bu neng huo shi
孙子所言非邪	1	sun zi suo yan fei xie
先生所言是邪	1	xian sheng suo yan shi xie
彼固惑而来矣	1	bi gu huo er lai yi
又奚罪焉	1	you xi zui yan
昔者有鸟止于鲁郊	1	xi zhe you niao zhi yu lu jiao
鲁君说之	1	lu jun shuo zhi
为具太牢以飨之	1	wei ju tai lao yi xiang zhi
奏九韶以乐之	1	zou jiu shao yi le zhi
鸟乃始忧悲眩视	1	niao nai shi you bei xuan shi
不敢饮食	1	bu gan yin shi
此之谓以己养养鸟也	1	ci zhi wei yi ji yang yang niao ye
若夫以鸟养养鸟者	1	ruo fu yi niao yang yang niao zhe
食之以委蛇	1	shi zhi yi wei she
则安平陆而已矣	1	ze an ping lu er yi yi
款启寡闻之民也	1	kuan qi gua wen zhi min ye
吾告以至人之德	1	wu gao yi zhi ren zhi de
譬之若载鼷以车马	1	pi zhi ruo zai xi yi che ma
以钟鼓也	1	yi zhong gu ye
彼又恶能无惊乎哉	1	bi you e neng wu jing hu zai
庄子外篇山木第二十庄子行于山中	1	zhuang zi wai pian shan mu di er shi zhuang zi hang yu shan zhong
枝叶盛茂	1	zhi ye sheng mao
伐木者止其旁而不取也	1	fa mu zhe zhi qi pang er bu qu ye
此木以不材得终其天年	1	ci mu yi bu cai de zhong qi tian nian
夫子出于山	1	fu zi chu yu shan
舍于故人之家	1	she yu gu ren zhi jia
命竖子杀雁而烹之	1	ming shu zi sha yan er peng zhi
竖子请曰	1	shu zi qing yue
其一能鸣	1	qi yi neng ming
其一不能鸣	1	qi yi bu neng ming
杀不能鸣者	1	sha bu neng ming zhe
弟子问于庄子曰	1	di zi wen yu zhuang zi yue
昨日山中之木	1	zuo ri shan zhong zhi mu
以不材得终其天年	1	yi bu cai de zhong qi tian nian
今主人之雁	1	jin zhu ren zhi yan
以不材死	1	yi bu cai si
先生将何处	1	xian sheng jiang he chu
庄子笑曰	1	zhuang zi xiao yue
周将处乎材与不材之间	1	zhou jiang chu hu cai yu bu cai zhi jian
材与不材之间	1	cai yu bu cai zhi jian
似之而非也	1	shi zhi er fei ye
故未免乎累	1	gu wei mian hu lei
若夫乘道德而浮游则不然	1	ruo fu cheng dao de er fu you ze bu ran
无誉无訾	1	wu yu wu zi
一龙一蛇	1	yi long yi she
与时俱化	1	yu shi ju hua
而无肯专为	1	er wu ken zhuan wei
一上一下	1	yi shang yi xia
以和为量	1	yi he wei liang
浮游乎万物之祖	1	fu you hu wan wu zhi zu
物物而不物于物	1	wu wu er bu wu yu wu
则胡可得而累邪	1	ze hu ke dei er lei xie
黄帝之法则也	1	huang di zhi fa ze ye
若夫万物之情	1	ruo fu wan wu zhi qing
人伦之传则不然	1	ren lun zhi chuan ze bu ran
有为则亏	1	you wei ze kui
不肖则欺	1	bu xiao ze qi
胡可得而必乎哉	1	hu ke dei er bi hu zai
弟子志之	1	di zi zhi zhi
其唯道德之乡乎	1	qi wei dao de zhi xiang hu
市南宜僚见鲁侯	1	shi nan yi liao jian lu hou
鲁侯有忧色	1	lu hou you you se
市南子曰	1	shi nan zi yue
君有忧色	1	jun you you se
吾学先王之道	1	wu xue xian wang zhi dao
修先君之业	1	xiu xian jun zhi ye
吾敬鬼尊贤	1	wu jing gui zun xian
亲而行之	1	qin er xing zhi
无须臾离居	1	wu xu yu li ju
然不免于患	1	ran bu mian yu huan
吾是以忧	1	wu shi yi you
君之除患之术浅矣	1	jun zhi chu huan zhi shu qian yi
夫丰狐文豹	1	fu feng hu wen bao
栖于山林	1	qi yu shan lin
伏于岩穴	1	fu yu yan xue
夜行昼居	1	ye xing zhou ju

是何罪之有哉	1	shi he zui zhi you zai
其皮为之灾也	1	qi pi wei zhi zai ye

少私而寡欲	1	shao si er gua yu

君自此远矣	1	jun zi ci yuan yi
故有人者累	1	gu you ren zhe lei
见有于人者忧	1	jian you yu ren zhe you
故尧非有人	1	gu yao fei you ren

吾愿去君之累	1	wu yuan qu jun zhi lei

有虚船来触舟	1	you xu chuan lai chu zhou
心之人不怒	1	xin zhi ren bu nu
有一人在其上	1	you yi ren zai qi shang

夫子趋亦趋	1	fu zi qu yi qu
夫子驰亦驰	1	fu zi chi yi chi
夫子奔逸绝尘	1	fu zi ben yi jue chen
而回瞠若乎后矣	1	er hui cheng ruo hu hou yi
夫子步亦步也	1	fu zi bu yi bu ye
夫子言亦言也	1	fu zi yan yi yan ye
夫子趋亦趋也	1	fu zi qu yi qu ye
夫子辩亦辩也	1	fu zi bian yi bian ye
夫子驰亦驰也	1	fu zi chi yi chi ye
夫子言道	1	fu zi yan dao
回亦言道也	1	hui yi yan dao ye
及奔逸绝尘而回瞠若乎后者	1	ji ben yi jue chen er hui cheng ruo hu hou zhe
夫子不言而信	1	fu zi bu yan er xin
不比而周	1	bu bi er zhou
无器而民滔乎前	1	wu qi er min tao hu qian
而不知所以然而已矣	1	er bu zhi suo yi ran er yi yi
可不察与	1	ke bu cha yu
夫哀莫大于心死	1	fu ai mo da yu xin si
而人死亦次之	1	er ren si yi ci zhi
日出东方而入于西极	1	ri chu dong fang er ru yu xi ji
万物莫不比方	1	wan wu mo bu bi fang
有目有趾者	1	you mu you zhi zhe
待是而后成功	1	dai shi er hou cheng gong
是出则存	1	shi chu ze cun
是入则亡	1	shi ru ze wang
万物亦然	1	wan wu yi ran
有待也而死	1	you dai ye er si
有待也而生	1	you dai ye er sheng
吾一受其成形	1	wu yi shou qi cheng xing
而不化以待尽	1	er bu hua yi dai jin
效物而动	1	xiao wu er dong
日夜无隙	1	ri ye wu xi
而不知其所终	1	er bu zhi qi suo zhong
薰然其成形	1	xun ran qi cheng xing
知命不能规乎其前	1	zhi ming bu neng gui hu qi qian
丘以是日	1	qiu yi shi ri
吾终身与汝交一臂而失之	1	wu zhong shen yu ru jiao yi bi er shi zhi
可不哀与	1	ke bu ai yu
女殆著乎吾所以著也	1	nv dai zhe hu wu suo yi zhe ye
彼已尽矣	1	bi yi jin yi
而女求之以为有	1	er nv qiu zhi yi wei you
是求马于唐肆也	1	shi qiu ma yu tang si ye
女也甚忘	1	nv ye shen wang
吾也甚忘	1	wu ye shen wang
女奚患焉	1	nv xi huan yan
虽忘乎故吾	1	sui wang hu gu wu
吾有不忘者存	1	wu you bu wang zhe cun
孔子见老聃	1	kong zi jian lao dan
老聃新沐	1	lao dan xin mu
方将被发而干	1	fang jiang bei fa er gan
蛰然似非人	1	zhe ran shi fei ren
孔子便而待之	1	kong zi bian er dai zhi
丘也眩与	1	qiu ye xuan yu
其信然与	1	qi xin ran yu
向者先生形体掘若槁木	1	xiang zhe xian sheng xing ti jue ruo gao mu
似遗物离人而立于独也	1	shi yi wu li ren er li yu du ye
吾游心于物之初	1	wu you xin yu wu zhi chu
心困焉而不能知	1	xin kun yan er bu neng zhi
口辟焉而不能言	1	kou pi yan er bu neng yan
尝为汝议乎其将	1	chang wei ru yi hu qi jiang
至阴肃肃	1	zhi yin su su
至阳赫赫	1	zhi yang he he
肃肃出乎天	1	su su chu hu tian
赫赫发乎地	1	he he fa hu di
两者交通成和而物生焉	1	liang zhe jiao tong cheng he er wu sheng yan
或为之纪而莫见其形	1	huo wei zhi ji er mo jian qi xing
消息满虚	1	xiao xi man xu
一晦一明	1	yi hui yi ming
日改月化	1	ri gai yue hua
日有所为而莫见其功	1	ri you suo wei er mo jian qi gong
生有所乎萌	1	sheng you suo hu meng
死有所乎归	1	si you suo hu gui
始终相反乎无端	1	shi zhong xiang fan hu wu duan
而莫知乎其所穷	1	er mo zhi hu qi suo qiong
且孰为之宗	1	qie shu wei zhi zong
请问游是	1	qing wen you shi
夫得是至美至乐也	1	fu de shi zhi mei zhi le ye
得至美而游乎至乐	1	de zhi mei er you hu zhi le
谓之至人	1	wei zhi zhi ren
愿闻其方	1	yuan wen qi fang
草食之兽	1	cao shi zhi shou
不疾易薮	1	bu ji yi sou
水生之虫	1	shui sheng zhi chong
不疾易水	1	bu ji yi shui
行小变而不失其大常也	1	hang xiao bian er bu shi qi da chang ye
喜怒哀乐不入于胸次	1	xi nu ai le bu ru yu xiong ci
夫天下也者	1	fu tian xia ye zhe
万物之所一也	1	wan wu zhi suo yi ye
得其所一而同焉	1	de qi suo yi er tong yan
则四支百体将为尘垢	1	ze si zhi bai ti jiang wei chen gou
而死生终始将为昼夜	1	er si sheng zhong shi jiang wei zhou ye
而莫之能滑	1	er mo zhi neng hua
而况得丧祸福之所介乎	1	er kuang de sang huo fu zhi suo jie hu
弃隶者若弃泥涂	1	qi li zhe ruo qi ni tu
知身贵于隶也	1	zhi shen gui yu li ye
贵在于我而不失于变	1	gui zai yu wo er bu shi yu bian
且万化而未始有极也	1	qie wan hua er wei shi you ji ye
夫孰足以患心	1	fu shu zu yi huan xin
已为道者解乎此	1	yi wei dao zhe jie hu ci
夫子德配天地	1	fu zi de pei tian di
而犹假至言以修心	1	er you jia zhi yan yi xiu xin
孰能脱焉	1	shu neng tuo yan
夫水之于	1	fu shui zhi yu
无为而才自然矣	1	wu wei er cai zi ran yi
至人之于德也	1	zhi ren zhi yu de ye
不修而物不能离焉	1	bu xiu er wu bu neng li yan
若天之自高	1	ruo tian zhi zi gao
地之自厚	1	di zhi zi hou
日月之自明	1	ri yue zhi zi ming
夫何修焉	1	fu he xiu yan
以告颜回曰	1	yi gao yan hui yue
丘之于道也	1	qiu zhi yu dao ye
微夫子之发吾覆也	1	wei fu zi zhi fa wu fu ye
吾不知天地之大全也	1	wu bu zhi tian di zhi da quan ye
庄子见鲁哀公	1	zhuang zi jian lu ai gong
鲁多儒士	1	lu duo ru shi
少为先生方者	1	shao wei xian sheng fang zhe
举鲁国而儒服	1	ju lu guo er ru fu
何谓少乎	1	he wei shao hu
儒者冠圜冠者知天时	1	ru zhe guan huan guan zhe zhi tian shi
履句履者知地形	1	lv ju lv zhe zhi di xing
者事至而断	1	zhe shi zhi er duan
君子有其道者	1	jun zi you qi dao zhe
未必为其服也	1	wei bi wei qi fu ye
为其服者	1	wei qi fu zhe
未必知其道也	1	wei bi zhi qi dao ye
公固以为不然	1	gong gu yi wei bu ran
何不号于国中曰	1	he bu hao yu guo zhong yue
无此道而为此服者	1	wu ci dao er wei ci fu zhe
于是哀公号之五日	1	yu shi ai gong hao zhi wu ri
而鲁国无敢儒服者	1	er lu guo wu gan ru fu zhe
独有一丈夫	1	du you yi zhang fu
儒服而立乎公门	1	ru fu er li hu gong men
公即召而问以国事	1	gong ji zhao er wen yi guo shi
千转万变而不穷	1	qian zhuan wan bian er bu qiong
以鲁国而儒者一人耳	1	yi lu guo er ru zhe yi ren er
可谓多乎	1	ke wei duo hu
百里奚爵禄不入于心	1	bai li xi jue lu bu ru yu xin
故饭牛而牛肥	1	gu fan niu er niu fei
使秦穆公忘其贱	1	shi qin mu gong wang qi jian
与之政也	1	yu zhi zheng ye
有虞氏死生不入于心	1	you yu shi si sheng bu ru yu xin
故足以动人	1	gu zu yi dong ren
宋元君将画图	1	song yuan jun jiang hua tu
众史皆至	1	zhong shi jie zhi
受揖而立	1	shou yi er li
舐笔和墨	1	shi bi he mo
在外者半	1	zai wai zhe ban
有一史后至者	1	you yi shi hou zhi zhe
受揖不立	1	shou yi bu li
公使人视之	1	gong shi ren shi zhi
则解衣般礴裸	1	ze jie yi ban bo luo
是真画者也	1	shi zhen hua zhe ye
文王观于臧	1	wen wang guan yu zang
见一丈夫钓	1	jian yi zhang fu diao
而其钓莫钓	1	er qi diao mo diao
非持其钓有钓者也	1	fei chi qi diao you diao zhe ye
文王欲举而授之政	1	wen wang yu ju er shou zhi zheng
而恐大臣父兄之弗安也	1	er kong da chen fu xiong zhi fu an ye
欲终而释之	1	yu zhong er shi zhi
而不忍百姓之无天也	1	er bu ren bai xing zhi wu tian ye
于是旦而属之大夫曰	1	yu shi dan er shu zhi da fu yue
昔者寡人梦见良人	1	xi zhe gua ren meng jian liang ren
黑色而髯	1	hei se er ran
乘驳马而偏朱蹄	1	cheng bo ma er pian zhu ti
寓而政于臧丈人	1	yu er zheng yu zang zhang ren
庶几乎民有瘳乎	1	shu ji hu min you chou hu
诸大夫蹴然曰	1	zhu da fu cu ran yue
先君王也	1	xian jun wang ye
然则卜之	1	ran ze bo zhi
诸大夫曰	1	zhu da fu yue
先君之命	1	xian jun zhi ming
王其无它	1	wang qi wu ta
又何卜焉	1	you he bo yan
遂迎臧丈人而授之政	1	sui ying zang zhang ren er shou zhi zheng
典法无更	1	dian fa wu geng
偏令无出	1	pian ling wu chu
文王观于国	1	wen wang guan yu guo
则列士坏植散群	1	ze lie shi huai zhi san qun
长官者不成德	1	zhang guan zhe bu cheng de
斛不敢入于四竟	1	hu bu gan ru yu si jing
列士坏植散群	1	lie shi huai zhi san qun
则尚同也	1	ze shang tong ye
则同务也	1	ze tong wu ye
则诸侯无二心也	1	ze zhu hou wu er xin ye
文王于是焉以为大师	1	wen wang yu shi yan yi wei da shi
北面而问曰	1	bei mian er wen yue
政可以及天下乎	1	zheng ke yi ji tian xia hu
臧丈人昧然而不应	1	zang zhang ren mei ran er bu ying
泛然而辞	1	fan ran er ci
朝令而夜循	1	chao ling er ye xun
终身无闻	1	zhong shen wu wen
文王其犹未邪	1	wen wang qi you wei xie
又何以梦为乎	1	you he yi meng wei hu
夫文王尽之也	1	fu wen wang jin zhi ye
而又何论剌焉	1	er you he lun la yan
彼直以循斯须也	1	bi zhi yi xun si xu ye
列御寇为伯昏无人射	1	lie yu kou wei bo hun wu ren she
引之盈贯	1	yin zhi ying guan
措杯水其肘上	1	cuo bei shui qi zhou shang
适矢复沓	1	shi shi fu ta
方矢复寓	1	fang shi fu yu
犹象人也	1	you xiang ren ye
伯昏无人曰	1	bo hun wu ren yue
是射之射	1	shi she zhi she
非不射之射也	1	fei bu she zhi she ye
尝与汝登高山	1	chang yu ru deng gao shan
临百仞之渊	1	lin bai ren zhi yuan
若能射乎	1	ruo neng she hu
于是无人遂登高山	1	yu shi wu ren sui deng gao shan
足二分垂在外	1	zu er fen chui zai wai
揖御寇而进之	1	yi yu kou er jin zhi
御寇伏地	1	yu kou fu di
汗流至踵	1	han liu zhi zhong
夫至人者	1	fu zhi ren zhe
上窥青天	1	shang kui qing tian
下潜黄泉	1	xia qian huang quan
挥斥八极	1	hui chi ba ji
神气不变	1	shen qi bu bian
今汝怵然有恂目之志	1	jin ru chu ran you xun mu zhi zhi
尔于中也殆矣夫	1	er yu zhong ye dai yi fu
肩吾问于孙叔敖曰	1	jian wu wen yu sun shu ao yue
子三为令尹而不荣华	1	zi san wei ling yin er bu rong hua
三去之而无忧色	1	san qu zhi er wu you se
吾始也疑子	1	wu shi ye yi zi
今视子之鼻间栩栩然	1	jin shi zi zhi bi jian xu xu ran
子之用心独奈何	1	zi zhi yong xin du nai he
孙叔敖曰	1	sun shu ao yue
吾何以过人哉	1	wu he yi guo ren zai
吾以其来不可却也	1	wu yi qi lai bu ke que ye
其去不可止也	1	qi qu bu ke zhi ye
吾以为得失之非我也	1	wu yi wei de shi zhi fei wo ye
而无忧色而已矣	1	er wu you se er yi yi
我何以过人哉	1	wo he yi guo ren zai
且不知其在彼乎	1	qie bu zhi qi zai bi hu
其在我乎	1	qi zai wo hu
其在彼邪亡乎我	1	qi zai bi xie wang hu wo
在我邪亡乎彼	1	zai wo xie wang hu bi
方将踌躇	1	fang jiang chou chu
方将四顾	1	fang jiang si gu
何暇至乎人贵人贱哉	1	he xia zhi hu ren gui ren jian zai
仲尼闻之曰	1	zhong ni wen zhi yue
知者不得说	1	zhi zhe bu de shuo
美人不得滥	1	mei ren bu de lan
盗人不得劫	1	dao ren bu de jie
黄帝不得友	1	huang di bu de you
而无变乎己	1	er wu bian hu ji
况爵禄乎	1	kuang jue lu hu
其神经乎大山而无介	1	qi shen jing hu da shan er wu jie
入乎渊泉而不濡	1	ru hu yuan quan er bu ru
处卑细而不惫	1	chu bei xi er bu bei
既以与人己愈有	1	ji yi yu ren ji yu you
楚王与凡君坐	1	chu wang yu fan jun zuo
楚王左右曰	1	chu wang zuo you yue
凡之亡也	1	fan zhi wang ye
不足以丧吾存	1	bu zu yi sang wu cun
夫凡之亡不足以丧吾存	1	fu fan zhi wang bu zu yi sang wu cun
则楚之存不足以存存	1	ze chu zhi cun bu zu yi cun cun
则凡未始亡而楚未始存也	1	ze fan wei shi wang er chu wei shi cun ye
庄子外篇知北游第二十二知北游于玄水之上	1	zhuang zi wai pian zhi bei you di er shi er zhi bei you yu xuan shui zhi shang
而适遭无为谓焉	1	er shi zao wu wei wei yan
知谓无为谓曰	1	zhi wei wu wei wei yue
予欲有问乎若	1	yu yu you wen hu ruo
何思何虑则知道	1	he si he lv ze zhi dao
何处何服则安道	1	he chu he fu ze an dao
何从何道则得道	1	he cong he dao ze de dao
三问而无为谓不答也	1	san wen er wu wei wei bu da ye
不知答也	1	bu zhi da ye
知不得问	1	zhi bu de wen
反于白水之南	1	fan yu bai shui zhi nan
登狐阕之上	1	deng hu que zhi shang
而睹狂屈焉	1	er du kuang qu yan
知以之言也问乎狂屈	1	zhi yi zhi yan ye wen hu kuang qu
中欲言而忘其所欲言	1	zhong yu yan er wang qi suo yu yan
反于帝宫	1	fan yu di gong
见黄帝而问焉	1	jian huang di er wen yan
无思无虑始知道	1	wu si wu lv shi zhi dao
无处无服始安道	1	wu chu wu fu shi an dao
无从无道始得道	1	wu cong wu dao shi de dao
知问黄帝曰	1	zhi wen huang di yue
我与若知之	1	wo yu ruo zhi zhi
彼与彼不知也	1	bi yu bi bu zhi ye
其孰是邪	1	qi shu shi xie
彼无为谓真是也	1	bi wu wei wei zhen shi ye
狂屈似之	1	kuang qu shi zhi
我与汝终不近也	1	wo yu ru zhong bu jin ye
夫知者不言	1	fu zhi zhe bu yan
故圣人行不言之教	1	gu sheng ren xing bu yan zhi jiao
道不可致	1	dao bu ke zhi
德不可至	1	de bu ke zhi
仁可为也	1	ren ke wei ye
义可亏也	1	yi ke kui ye
礼相伪也	1	li xiang wei ye
失道而后德	1	shi dao er hou de
道之华而乱之首也	1	dao zhi hua er luan zhi shou ye
为道者日损	1	wei dao zhe ri sun
损之又损之	1	sun zhi you sun zhi
无为而无不为也	1	wu wei er wu bu wei ye
今已为物也	1	jin yi wei wu ye
欲复归根	1	yu fu gui gen
其易也其唯大人乎	1	qi yi ye qi wei da ren hu
生也死之徒	1	sheng ye si zhi tu
死也生之始	1	si ye sheng zhi shi
孰知其纪	1	shu zhi qi ji
气之聚也	1	qi zhi ju ye
聚则为生	1	ju ze wei sheng
散则为死	1	san ze wei si
若死生为徒	1	ruo si sheng wei tu
吾又何患	1	wu you he huan
故万物一也	1	gu wan wu yi ye
是其所美者为神奇	1	shi qi suo mei zhe wei shen qi
其所恶者为臭腐	1	qi suo wu zhe wei chou fu
臭腐复化为神奇	1	chou fu fu hua wei shen qi
神奇复化为臭腐	1	shen qi fu hua wei chou fu
通天下一气耳	1	tong tian xia yi qi er
圣人故贵一	1	sheng ren gu gui yi
知谓黄帝曰	1	zhi wei huang di yue
吾问无为谓	1	wu wen wu wei wei
无为谓不应我	1	wu wei wei bu ying wo
非不我应	1	fei bu wo ying
不知应我也	1	bu zhi ying wo ye
吾问狂屈	1	wu wen kuang qu
狂屈中欲告我而不我告	1	kuang qu zhong yu gao wo er bu wo gao
非不我告	1	fei bu wo gao
中欲告而忘之也	1	zhong yu gao er wang zhi ye
今予问乎若	1	jin yu wen hu ruo
奚故不近	1	xi gu bu jin
彼其真是也	1	bi qi zhen shi ye
以其不知也	1	yi qi bu zhi ye
此其似之也	1	ci qi shi zhi ye
以其忘之也	1	yi qi wang zhi ye
予与若终不近也	1	yu yu ruo zhong bu jin ye
以其知之也	1	yi qi zhi zhi ye
狂屈闻之	1	kuang qu wen zhi
以黄帝为知言	1	yi huang di wei zhi yan
天地有大美而不言	1	tian di you da mei er bu yan
四时有明法而不议	1	si shi you ming fa er bu yi
万物有成理而不说	1	wan wu you cheng li er bu shuo
原天地之美而达万物之理	1	yuan tian di zhi mei er da wan wu zhi li
是故至人无为	1	shi gu zhi ren wu wei
大圣不作	1	da sheng bu zuo
观于天地之谓也	1	guan yu tian di zhi wei ye
今彼神明至精	1	jin bi shen ming zhi jing
与彼百化	1	yu bi bai hua
物已死生方圆	1	wu yi si sheng fang yuan
莫知其根也	1	mo zhi qi gen ye
扁然而万物	1	bian ran er wan wu
未离其内	1	wei li qi nei
秋豪为小	1	qiu hao wei xiao
待之成体	1	dai zhi cheng ti
天下莫不沈浮	1	tian xia mo bu shen fu
终身不故	1	zhong shen bu gu
阴阳四时运行	1	yin yang si shi yun xing
各得其序	1	ge de qi xu
然若亡而存	1	ran ruo wang er cun
油然不形而神	1	you ran bu xing er shen
万物畜而不知	1	wan wu chu er bu zhi
此之谓本根	1	ci zhi wei ben gen
可以观于天矣	1	ke yi guan yu tian yi
啮缺问道乎被衣	1	nie que wen dao hu bei yi
若正汝形	1	ruo zheng ru xing
天和将至	1	tian he jiang zhi
神将来舍	1	shen jiang lai she
德将为汝美	1	de jiang wei ru mei
道将为汝居	1	dao jiang wei ru ju
汝瞳焉如新生之犊而无求其故	1	ru tong yan ru xin sheng zhi du er wu qiu qi gu
啮缺睡寐	1	nie que shui mei
被衣大说	1	bei yi da shuo
行歌而去之	1	hang ge er qu zhi
形若槁骸	1	xing ruo gao hai
心若死灰	1	xin ruo si hui
真其实知	1	zhen qi shi zhi
不以故自持	1	bu yi gu zi chi
媒媒晦晦	1	mei mei hui hui
无心而不可与谋	1	wu xin er bu ke yu mou
彼何人哉	1	bi he ren zai
舜问乎丞	1	shun wen hu cheng
道可得而有乎	1	dao ke dei er you hu
汝身非汝有也	1	ru shen fei ru you ye
汝何得有夫道	1	ru he dei you fu dao
吾身非吾有也	1	wu shen fei wu you ye
孰有之哉	1	shu you zhi zai
是天地之委形也	1	shi tian di zhi wei xing ye
生非汝有	1	sheng fei ru you
是天地之委和也	1	shi tian di zhi wei he ye
性命非汝有	1	xing ming fei ru you
是天地之委顺也	1	shi tian di zhi wei shun ye
子孙非汝有	1	zi sun fei ru you
是天地之委蜕也	1	shi tian di zhi wei tui ye
故行不知所往	1	gu xing bu zhi suo wang
处不知所持	1	chu bu zhi suo chi
食不知所味	1	shi bu zhi suo wei
天地之强阳气也	1	tian di zhi qiang yang qi ye
又胡可得而有邪	1	you hu ke dei er you xie
孔子问于老聃曰	1	kong zi wen yu lao dan yue
今日晏闲	1	jin ri yan xian
敢问至道	1	gan wen zhi dao
疏瀹而心	1	shu yue er xin
澡雪而精神	1	zao xue er jing shen
掊击而知	1	pou ji er zhi
然难言哉	1	ran nan yan zai
将为汝言其崖略	1	jiang wei ru yan qi ya lue
夫昭昭生于冥冥	1	fu zhao zhao sheng yu ming ming
有伦生于无形	1	you lun sheng yu wu xing
精神生于道	1	jing shen sheng yu dao
形本生于精	1	xing ben sheng yu jing
而万物以形相生	1	er wan wu yi xing xiang sheng
故九窍者胎生	1	gu jiu qiao zhe tai sheng
八窍者卵生	1	ba qiao zhe luan sheng
其来无迹	1	qi lai wu ji
其往无崖	1	qi wang wu ya
无门无房	1	wu men wu fang
四达之皇皇也	1	si da zhi huang huang ye
邀于此者	1	yao yu ci zhe
思虑恂达	1	si lv xun da
耳目聪明	1	er mu cong ming
其用心不劳	1	qi yong xin bu lao
其应物无方	1	qi ying wu wu fang
天不得不高	1	tian bu de bu gao
地不得不广	1	di bu de bu guang
日月不得不行	1	ri yue bu de bu xing
万物不得不昌	1	wan wu bu de bu chang
此其道与	1	ci qi dao yu
且夫博之不必知	1	qie fu bo zhi bu bi zhi
辩之不必慧	1	bian zhi bu bi hui
圣人以断之矣	1	sheng ren yi duan zhi yi
若夫益之而不加益	1	ruo fu yi zhi er bu jia yi
损之而不加损者	1	sun zhi er bu jia sun zhe
圣人之所保也	1	sheng ren zhi suo bao ye
渊渊乎其若海	1	yuan yuan hu qi ruo hai
魏魏乎其终则复始也	1	wei wei hu qi zhong ze fu shi ye
运量万物而不匮	1	yun liang wan wu er bu kui
则君子之道	1	ze jun zi zhi dao
彼其外与	1	bi qi wai yu
万物皆往资焉而不匮	1	wan wu jie wang zi yan er bu kui
中国有人焉	1	zhong guo you ren yan
非阴非阳	1	fei yin fei yang
处于天地之间	1	chu yu tian di zhi jian
直且为人	1	zhi qie wei ren
将反于宗	1	jiang fan yu zong
自本观之	1	zi ben guan zhi
喑噫物也	1	yin yi wu ye
虽有寿夭	1	sui you shou yao
须臾之说也	1	xu yu zhi shuo ye
奚足以为尧	1	xi zu yi wei yao
桀之是非	1	jie zhi shi fei
人伦虽难	1	ren lun sui nan
所以相齿	1	suo yi xiang chi
圣人遭之而不违	1	sheng ren zao zhi er bu wei
过之而不守	1	guo zhi er bu shou
调而应之	1	tiao er ying zhi
偶而应之	1	ou er ying zhi
帝之所兴	1	di zhi suo xing
王之所起也	1	wang zhi suo qi ye
人生天地之间	1	ren sheng tian di zhi jian
若白驹之过隙	1	ruo bai ju zhi guo xi
忽然而已	1	hu ran er yi
注然勃然	1	zhu ran bo ran
莫不出焉	1	mo bu chu yan
油然寥然	1	you ran liao ran
莫不入焉	1	mo bu ru yan
已化而生	1	yi hua er sheng
又化而死	1	you hua er si
生物哀之	1	sheng wu ai zhi
人类悲之	1	ren lei bei zhi
解其天韬	1	jie qi tian tao
堕其天帙	1	duo qi tian zhi
纷乎宛乎	1	fen hu wan hu
魂魄将往	1	hun po jiang wang
乃身从之	1	nai shen cong zhi
乃大归乎	1	nai da gui hu
不形之形	1	bu xing zhi xing
形之不形	1	xing zhi bu xing
是人之所同知也	1	shi ren zhi suo tong zhi ye
非将至之所务也	1	fei jiang zhi zhi suo wu ye
此众人之所同论也	1	ci zhong ren zhi suo tong lun ye
彼至则不论	1	bi zhi ze bu lun
论则不至	1	lun ze bu zhi
明见无值	1	ming jian wu zhi
辩不若默	1	bian bu ruo mo
道不可闻	1	dao bu ke wen
闻不若塞	1	wen bu ruo sai
此之谓大得	1	ci zhi wei da de
东郭子问于庄子曰	1	dong guo zi wen yu zhuang zi yue
无所不在	1	wu suo bu zai
东郭子曰	1	dong guo zi yue
期而后可	1	qi er hou ke
何其下邪	1	he qi xia xie
何其愈下邪	1	he qi yu xia xie
何其愈甚邪	1	he qi yu shen xie
东郭子不应	1	dong guo zi bu ying
夫子之问也	1	fu zi zhi wen ye
固不及质	1	gu bu ji zhi
获之问于监市履	1	huo zhi wen yu jian shi lv
每下愈况	1	mei xia yu kuang
汝唯莫必	1	ru wei mo bi
无乎逃物	1	wu hu tao wu
至道若是	1	zhi dao ruo shi
大言亦然	1	da yan yi ran
周遍咸三者	1	zhou bian xian san zhe
异名同实	1	yi ming tong shi
其指一也	1	qi zhi yi ye
尝相与游乎无有之宫	1	chang xiang yu you hu wu you zhi gong
同合而论	1	tong he er lun
无所终穷乎	1	wu suo zhong qiong hu
尝相与无为乎	1	chang xiang yu wu wei hu
澹澹而静乎	1	dan dan er jing hu
漠而清乎	1	mo er qing hu
调而闲乎	1	tiao er xian hu
寥已吾志	1	liao yi wu zhi
无往焉而不知其所至	1	wu wang yan er bu zhi qi suo zhi
去而来不知其所止	1	qu er lai bu zhi qi suo zhi
吾往来焉而不知其所终	1	wu wang lai yan er bu zhi qi suo zhong
彷徨乎冯闳	1	pang huang hu feng hong
大知入焉而不知其所穷	1	da zhi ru yan er bu zhi qi suo qiong
物物者与物无际	1	wu wu zhe yu wu wu ji
而物有际者	1	er wu you ji zhe
所谓物际者也	1	suo wei wu ji zhe ye
不际之际	1	bu ji zhi ji
际之不际者也	1	ji zhi bu ji zhe ye
谓盈虚衰杀	1	wei ying xu shuai sha
彼为盈虚非盈虚	1	bi wei ying xu fei ying xu
彼为衰杀非衰杀	1	bi wei shuai sha fei shuai sha
彼为本末非本末	1	bi wei ben mo fei ben mo
彼为积散非积散也	1	bi wei ji san fei ji san ye
荷甘与神农学于老龙吉	1	he gan yu shen nong xue yu lao long ji
神农隐几	1	shen nong yin ji
阖户昼瞑	1	he hu zhou ming
荷甘日中	1	he gan ri zhong
老龙死矣	1	lao long si yi
神农隐几拥杖而起	1	shen nong yin ji yong zhang er qi
然放杖而笑	1	ran fang zhang er xiao
天知予僻陋谩诞	1	tian zhi yu pi lou man dan
故弃予而死	1	gu qi yu er si
夫子无所发予之狂言而死矣夫	1	fu zi wu suo fa yu zhi kuang yan er si yi fu
夫体道者	1	fu ti dao zhe
天下之君子所系焉	1	tian xia zhi jun zi suo xi yan
秋豪之端万分未得处一焉	1	qiu hao zhi duan wan fen wei de chu yi yan
而犹知藏其狂言而死	1	er you zhi cang qi kuang yan er si
又况夫体道者乎	1	you kuang fu ti dao zhe hu
视之无形	1	shi zhi wu xing
听之无声	1	ting zhi wu sheng
于人之论者	1	yu ren zhi lun zhe
谓之冥冥	1	wei zhi ming ming
所以论道而非道也	1	suo yi lun dao er fei dao ye
荷甘与神农同学于老龙吉	1	he gan yu shen nong tong xue yu lao long ji
于是泰清问乎无穷	1	yu shi tai qing wen hu wu qiong
子知道乎	1	zi zhi dao hu
又问乎无为	1	you wen hu wu wei
子之知道	1	zi zhi zhi dao
亦有数乎	1	yi you shu hu
其数若何	1	qi shu ruo he
吾知道之可以贵	1	wu zhi dao zhi ke yi gui
此吾所以知道之数也	1	ci wu suo yi zhi dao zhi shu ye
泰清以之言也问乎无始	1	tai qing yi zhi yan ye wen hu wu shi
则无穷之弗知与无为之知	1	ze wu qiong zhi fu zhi yu wu wei zhi zhi
孰是而孰非乎	1	shu shi er shu fei hu
不知深矣	1	bu zhi shen yi
知之浅矣	1	zhi zhi qian yi
弗知内矣	1	fu zhi nei yi
知之外矣	1	zhi zhi wai yi
于是泰清仰而叹曰	1	yu shi tai qing yang er tan yue
弗知乃知乎	1	fu zhi nai zhi hu
知乃不知乎	1	zhi nai bu zhi hu
孰知不知之知	1	shu zhi bu zhi zhi zhi
闻而非也	1	wen er fei ye
道不可见	1	dao bu ke jian
见而非也	1	jian er fei ye
道不可言	1	dao bu ke yan
言而非也	1	yan er fei ye
知形形之不形乎	1	zhi xing xing zhi bu xing hu
道不当名	1	dao bu dang ming
有问道而应之者	1	you wen dao er ying zhi zhe
不知道也	1	bu zhi dao ye
虽问道者	1	sui wen dao zhe
亦未闻道	1	yi wei wen dao
无问问之	1	wu wen wen zhi
是问穷也	1	shi wen qiong ye
无应应之	1	wu ying ying zhi
是无内也	1	shi wu nei ye
以无内待问穷	1	yi wu nei dai wen qiong
外不观乎宇宙	1	wai bu guan hu yu zhou
内不知乎大初	1	nei bu zhi hu da chu
是以不过乎昆仑	1	shi yi bu guo hu kun lun
不游乎太虚	1	bu you hu tai xu
光曜问乎无有曰	1	guang yao wen hu wu you yue
夫子有乎	1	fu zi you hu
其无有乎	1	qi wu you hu
光曜不得问而孰视其状貌	1	guang yao bu de wen er shu shi qi zhuang mao
终日视之而不见	1	zhong ri shi zhi er bu jian
听之而不闻	1	ting zhi er bu wen
搏之而不得也	1	bo zhi er bu de ye
其孰能至此乎	1	qi shu neng zhi ci hu
予能有无矣	1	yu neng you wu yi
而未能无无也	1	er wei neng wu wu ye
及为无有矣	1	ji wei wu you yi
何从至此哉	1	he cong zhi ci zai
大马之捶钩者	1	da ma zhi chui gou zhe
年八十矣	1	nian ba shi yi
而不失豪芒	1	er bu shi hao mang
臣有守也	1	chen you shou ye
臣之年二十而好捶钩	1	chen zhi nian er shi er hao chui gou
于物无视也	1	yu wu wu shi ye
非钩无察也	1	fei gou wu cha ye
是用之者假不用者也	1	shi yong zhi zhe jia bu yong zhe ye
以长得其用	1	yi zhang de qi yong
而况乎无不用者乎	1	er kuang hu wu bu yong zhe hu
物孰不资焉	1	wu shu bu zi yan
冉求问于仲尼曰	1	ran qiu wen yu zhong ni yue
未有天地可知邪	1	wei you tian di ke zhi xie
古犹今也	1	gu you jin ye
冉求失问而退	1	ran qiu shi wen er tui
明日复见	1	ming ri fu jian
昔者吾问未有天地可知乎	1	xi zhe wu wen wei you tian di ke zhi hu
昔日吾昭然	1	xi ri wu zhao ran
今日吾昧然	1	jin ri wu mei ran
昔之昭然也	1	xi zhi zhao ran ye
神者先受之	1	shen zhe xian shou zhi
今之昧然也	1	jin zhi mei ran ye
且又为不神者求邪	1	qie you wei bu shen zhe qiu xie
无古无今	1	wu gu wu jin
无始无终	1	wu shi wu zhong
未有子孙而有孙子可乎	1	wei you zi sun er you sun zi ke hu
冉求未对	1	ran qiu wei dui
不以生生死	1	bu yi sheng sheng si
不以死死生	1	bu yi si si sheng
死生有待邪	1	si sheng you dai xie
皆有所一体	1	jie you suo yi ti
有先天地生者物邪	1	you xian tian di sheng zhe wu xie
物物者非物	1	wu wu zhe fei wu
物出不得先物也	1	wu chu bu de xian wu ye
犹其有物也	1	you qi you wu ye
犹其有物也无已	1	you qi you wu ye wu yi
圣人之爱人也终无已者	1	sheng ren zhi ai ren ye zhong wu yi zhe
亦乃取于是者也	1	yi nai qu yu shi zhe ye
颜渊问乎仲尼曰	1	yan yuan wen hu zhong ni yue
回尝闻诸夫子曰	1	hui chang wen zhu fu zi yue
无有所将	1	wu you suo jiang
无有所迎	1	wu you suo ying
回敢问其游	1	hui gan wen qi you
古之人外化而内不化	1	gu zhi ren wai hua er nei bu hua
今之人内化而外不化	1	jin zhi ren nei hua er wai bu hua
与物化者	1	yu wu hua zhe
一不化者也	1	yi bu hua zhe ye
安化安不化	1	an hua an bu hua
安与之相靡	1	an yu zhi xiang mi
必与之莫多	1	bi yu zhi mo duo
韦氏之囿	1	wei shi zhi you
黄帝之圃	1	huang di zhi pu
有虞氏之宫	1	you yu shi zhi gong
汤武之室	1	tang wu zhi shi
君子之人	1	jun zi zhi ren
若儒墨者师	1	ruo ru mo zhe shi
故以是非相赍也	1	gu yi shi fei xiang ji ye
而况今之人乎	1	er kuang jin zhi ren hu
圣人处物不伤物	1	sheng ren chu wu bu shang wu
不伤物者	1	bu shang wu zhe
物亦不能伤也	1	wu yi bu neng shang ye
唯无所伤者	1	wei wu suo shang zhe
为能与人相将迎	1	wei neng yu ren xiang jiang ying
使我欣欣然而乐与	1	shi wo xin xin ran er le yu
乐未毕也	1	le wei bi ye
哀又继之	1	ai you ji zhi
哀乐之来	1	ai le zhi lai
吾不能御	1	wu bu neng yu
其去弗能止	1	qi qu fu neng zhi
世人直为物逆旅耳	1	shi ren zhi wei wu ni lv er
夫知遇而不知所不遇	1	fu zhi yu er bu zhi suo bu yu
知能能而不能所不能	1	zhi neng neng er bu neng suo bu neng
无知无能者	1	wu zhi wu neng zhe
固人之所不免也	1	gu ren zhi suo bu mian ye
夫务免乎人之所不免者	1	fu wu mian hu ren zhi suo bu mian zhe
岂不亦悲哉	1	qi bu yi bei zai
至言去言	1	zhi yan qu yan
至为去为	1	zhi wei qu wei
所知则浅矣	1	suo zhi ze qian yi
庄子杂篇庚桑楚第二十三老聃之役有庚桑楚者	1	zhuang zi za pian geng sang chu di er shi san lao dan zhi yi you geng sang chu zhe
偏得老聃之道	1	pian de lao dan zhi dao
以北居畏垒之山	1	yi bei ju wei lei zhi shan
其臣之画然知者去之	1	qi chen zhi hua ran zhi zhe qu zhi
其妾之挈然仁者远之	1	qi qie zhi qie ran ren zhe yuan zhi
拥肿之与居	1	yong zhong zhi yu ju
鞅掌之为使	1	yang zhang zhi wei shi
畏垒大壤	1	wei lei da rang
畏垒之民相与言曰	1	wei lei zhi min xiang yu yan yue
庚桑子之始来	1	geng sang zi zhi shi lai
吾洒然异之	1	wu sa ran yi zhi
今吾日计之而不足	1	jin wu ri ji zhi er bu zu
岁计之而有余	1	sui ji zhi er you yu
庶几其圣人乎	1	shu ji qi sheng ren hu
子胡不相与尸而祝之	1	zi hu bu xiang yu shi er zhu zhi
社而稷之乎	1	she er ji zhi hu
庚桑子闻之	1	geng sang zi wen zhi
弟子异之	1	di zi yi zhi
庚桑子曰	1	geng sang zi yue
弟子何异于予	1	di zi he yi yu yu
夫春气发而百草生	1	fu chun qi fa er bai cao sheng
正得秋而万宝成	1	zheng de qiu er wan bao cheng
夫春与秋	1	fu chun yu qiu
岂无得而然哉	1	qi wu de er ran zai
天道已行矣	1	tian dao yi hang yi
吾闻至人	1	wu wen zhi ren
尸居环堵之室	1	shi ju huan du zhi shi
而百姓猖狂	1	er bai xing chang kuang
不知所如往	1	bu zhi suo ru wang
今以畏垒之细民	1	jin yi wei lei zhi xi min
而窃窃焉欲俎豆予于贤人之间	1	er qie qie yan yu zu dou yu yu xian ren zhi jian
我其杓之人邪	1	wo qi shao zhi ren xie
吾是以不释于老聃之言	1	wu shi yi bu shi yu lao dan zhi yan
夫寻常之沟	1	fu xun chang zhi gou
巨鱼无所还其体	1	ju yu wu suo hai qi ti
而鲵鳅为之制	1	er ni qiu wei zhi zhi
步仞之丘陵	1	bu ren zhi qiu ling
巨兽无所隐其躯	1	ju shou wu suo yin qi qu
而孽狐为之祥	1	er nie hu wei zhi xiang
且夫尊贤授能	1	qie fu zun xian shou neng
先善与利	1	xian shan yu li
而况畏垒之民乎	1	er kuang wei lei zhi min hu
夫子亦听矣	1	fu zi yi ting yi
夫函车之兽	1	fu han che zhi shou
介而离山	1	jie er li shan
则不免于网罟之患	1	ze bu mian yu wang gu zhi huan
吞舟之鱼	1	tun zhou zhi yu
荡而失水	1	dang er shi shui
则蚁能苦之	1	ze yi neng ku zhi
故鸟兽不厌高	1	gu niao shou bu yan gao
鱼鳖不厌深	1	yu bie bu yan shen
夫全其形生之人	1	fu quan qi xing sheng zhi ren
藏其身也	1	cang qi shen ye
不厌深眇而已矣	1	bu yan shen miao er yi yi
且夫二子者	1	qie fu er zi zhe
又何足以称扬哉	1	you he zu yi cheng yang zai
是其于辩也	1	shi qi yu bian ye
将妄凿垣墙而殖蓬蒿也	1	jiang wang zao yuan qiang er zhi peng hao ye
简发而栉	1	jian fa er zhi
数米而炊	1	shu mi er chui
窃窃乎又何足以济世哉	1	qie qie hu you he zu yi ji shi zai
举贤则民相轧	1	ju xian ze min xiang zha
任知则民相盗	1	ren zhi ze min xiang dao
之数物者	1	zhi shu wu zhe
不足以厚民	1	bu zu yi hou min
民之于利甚勤	1	min zhi yu li shen qin
子有杀父	1	zi you sha fu
臣有杀君	1	chen you sha jun
正昼为盗	1	zheng zhou wei dao
大乱之本	1	da luan zhi ben
必生于尧	1	bi sheng yu yao
其末存乎千世之后	1	qi mo cun hu qian shi zhi hou
千世之后	1	qian shi zhi hou
其必有人与人相食者也	1	qi bi you ren yu ren xiang shi zhe ye
蹴然正坐曰	1	cu ran zheng zuo yue
之年者已长矣	1	zhi nian zhe yi zhang yi
将恶乎托业以及此言邪	1	jiang e hu tuo ye yi ji ci yan xie
无使汝思虑营营	1	wu shi ru si lv ying ying
若此三年	1	ruo ci san nian
则可以及此言矣	1	ze ke yi ji ci yan yi
目之与形	1	mu zhi yu xing
吾不知其异也	1	wu bu zhi qi yi ye
而盲者不能自见	1	er mang zhe bu neng zi jian
耳之与形	1	er zhi yu xing
而聋者不能自闻	1	er long zhe bu neng zi wen
心之与形	1	xin zhi yu xing
而狂者不能自得	1	er kuang zhe bu neng zi de
形之与形亦辟矣	1	xing zhi yu xing yi pi yi
而物或间之邪	1	er wu huo jian zhi xie
欲相求而不能相得	1	yu xiang qiu er bu neng xiang de
勉闻道达耳矣	1	mian wen dao da er yi
奔蜂不能化藿	1	ben feng bu neng hua huo
不能伏鹄卵	1	bu neng fu hu luan
其德非不同也	1	qi de fei bu tong ye
有能与不能者	1	you neng yu bu neng zhe
其才固有巨小也	1	qi cai gu you ju xiao ye
今吾才小	1	jin wu cai xiao
小足以化子	1	xiao zu yi hua zi
子胡不南见老子	1	zi hu bu nan jian lao zi
南荣赢粮	1	nan rong ying liang
七日七夜至老子之所	1	qi ri qi ye zhi lao zi zhi suo
子自楚之所来乎	1	zi zi chu zhi suo lai hu
子何与人偕来之众也	1	zi he yu ren xie lai zhi zhong ye
南荣惧然顾其后	1	nan rong ju ran gu qi hou
子不知吾所谓乎	1	zi bu zhi wu suo wei hu
南荣俯而惭	1	nan rong fu er can
今者吾忘吾答	1	jin zhe wu wang wu da
因失吾问	1	yin shi wu wen
不知乎人谓我朱愚	1	bu zhi hu ren wei wo zhu yu
知乎反愁我躯	1	zhi hu fan chou wo qu
不仁则害人	1	bu ren ze hai ren
仁则反愁我身	1	ren ze fan chou wo shen
不义则伤彼	1	bu yi ze shang bi
义则反愁我己	1	yi ze fan chou wo ji
我安逃此而可	1	wo an tao ci er ke
此三言者	1	ci san yan zhe
之所患也	1	zhi suo huan ye
愿因楚而问之	1	yuan yin chu er wen zhi
向吾见若眉睫之间	1	xiang wu jian ruo mei jie zhi jian
吾因以得汝矣	1	wu yin yi de ru yi
今汝又言而信之	1	jin ru you yan er xin zhi
若规规然若丧父母	1	ruo gui gui ran ruo sang fu mu
揭竿而求诸海也	1	jie gan er qiu zhu hai ye
女亡人哉	1	nv wang ren zai
汝欲反汝情性而无由入	1	ru yu fan ru qing xing er wu you ru
南荣请入就舍	1	nan rong qing ru jiu she
召其所好	1	zhao qi suo hao
去其所恶	1	qu qi suo wu
十日自愁	1	shi ri zi chou
复见老子	1	fu jian lao zi
汝自洒濯	1	ru zi sa zhuo
孰哉郁郁乎	1	shu zai yu yu hu
然而其中津津乎犹有恶也	1	ran er qi zhong jin jin hu you you e ye
者不可繁而捉	1	zhe bu ke fan er zhuo
内者不可缪而捉	1	nei zhe bu ke miu er zhuo
道德不能持	1	dao de bu neng chi
而况放道而行者乎	1	er kuang fang dao er xing zhe hu
里人有病	1	li ren you bing
里人问之	1	li ren wen zhi
病者能言其病	1	bing zhe neng yan qi bing
然其病病者犹未病也	1	ran qi bing bing zhe you wei bing ye
之闻大道	1	zhi wen da dao
譬犹饮药以加病也	1	pi you yin yao yi jia bing ye
愿闻卫生之经而已矣	1	yuan wen wei sheng zhi jing er yi yi
卫生之经	1	wei sheng zhi jing
能抱一乎	1	neng bao yi hu
能勿失乎	1	neng wu shi hu
能无卜筮而知吉凶乎	1	neng wu bo shi er zhi ji xiong hu
能舍诸人而求诸己乎	1	neng she zhu ren er qiu zhu ji hu
能侗然乎	1	neng dong ran hu
能儿子乎	1	neng er zi hu
儿子终日嗥而嗌不嗄	1	er zi zhong ri hao er ai bu a
终日握而手不	1	zhong ri wo er shou bu
共其德也	1	gong qi de ye
终日视而目不瞬	1	zhong ri shi er mu bu shun
偏不在外也	1	pian bu zai wai ye
居不知所为	1	ju bu zhi suo wei
与物委蛇而同其波	1	yu wu wei she er tong qi bo
是卫生之经已	1	shi wei sheng zhi jing yi
然则是至人之德已乎	1	ran ze shi zhi ren zhi de yi hu
是乃所谓冰解冻释者	1	shi nai suo wei bing jie dong shi zhe
相与交食乎地而交乐乎天	1	xiang yu jiao shi hu di er jiao le hu tian
不以人物利害相撄	1	bu yi ren wu li hai xiang ying
不相与为怪	1	bu xiang yu wei guai
不相与为谋	1	bu xiang yu wei mou
不相与为事	1	bu xiang yu wei shi
侗然而来	1	dong ran er lai
是谓卫生之经已	1	shi wei wei sheng zhi jing yi
然则是至乎	1	ran ze shi zhi hu
吾固告汝曰	1	wu gu gao ru yue
儿子动不知所为	1	er zi dong bu zhi suo wei
身若槁木之枝而心若死灰	1	shen ruo gao mu zhi zhi er xin ruo si hui
祸亦不至	1	huo yi bu zhi
福亦不来	1	fu yi bu lai
祸福无有	1	huo fu wu you
恶有人灾也	1	e you ren zai ye
宇泰定者	1	yu tai ding zhe
发乎天光	1	fa hu tian guang
发乎天光者	1	fa hu tian guang zhe
人见其人	1	ren jian qi ren
物见其物	1	wu jian qi wu
人有修者	1	ren you xiu zhe
乃今有恒	1	nai jin you heng
人之所舍	1	ren zhi suo she
谓之天民	1	wei zhi tian min
天之所助	1	tian zhi suo zhu
谓之天子	1	wei zhi tian zi
学其所不能学也	1	xue qi suo bu neng xue ye
行其所不能行也	1	hang qi suo bu neng xing ye
辩其所不能辩也	1	bian qi suo bu neng bian ye
知止乎其所不能知	1	zhi zhi hu qi suo bu neng zhi
若有不即是者	1	ruo you bu ji shi zhe
天钧败之	1	tian jun bai zhi
备物将以形	1	bei wu jiang yi xing
藏不虞以生心	1	cang bu yu yi sheng xin
敬中以达彼	1	jing zhong yi da bi
若是而万恶至者	1	ruo shi er wan e zhi zhe
而非人也	1	er fei ren ye
不足以滑成	1	bu zu yi hua cheng
不可内于灵台	1	bu ke nei yu ling tai
灵台者有持	1	ling tai zhe you chi
而不知其所持而不可持者也	1	er bu zhi qi suo chi er bu ke chi zhe ye
不见其诚己而发	1	bu jian qi cheng ji er fa
每发而不当	1	mei fa er bu dang
业入而不舍	1	ye ru er bu she
每更为失	1	mei geng wei shi
为不善乎显明之中者	1	wei bu shan hu xian ming zhi zhong zhe
人得而诛之	1	ren de er zhu zhi
为不善乎幽间之中者	1	wei bu shan hu you jian zhi zhong zhe
鬼得而诛之	1	gui de er zhu zhi
明乎鬼者	1	ming hu gui zhe
然后能独行	1	ran hou neng du xing
行乎无名	1	hang hu wu ming
志乎期费	1	zhi hu qi fei
行乎无名者	1	hang hu wu ming zhe
唯庸有光	1	wei yong you guang
志乎期费者	1	zhi hu qi fei zhe
唯贾人也	1	wei jia ren ye
犹之魁然	1	you zhi kui ran
与物穷者	1	yu wu qiong zhe
与物且者	1	yu wu qie zhe
其身之不能容	1	qi shen zhi bu neng rong
焉能容人	1	yan neng rong ren
不能容人者无亲	1	bu neng rong ren zhe wu qin
无亲者尽人	1	wu qin zhe jin ren
兵莫惨于志	1	bing mo can yu zhi
镆铘为下	1	mo ye wei xia
寇莫大于阴阳	1	kou mo da yu yin yang
非阴阳贼之	1	fei yin yang zei zhi
心则使之也	1	xin ze shi zhi ye
道通其分也	1	dao tong qi fen ye
其成也毁也	1	qi cheng ye hui ye
所恶乎分者	1	suo wu hu fen zhe
其分也以备	1	qi fen ye yi bei
所以恶乎备者	1	suo yi e hu bei zhe
其有以备	1	qi you yi bei
故出而不反	1	gu chu er bu fan
是谓得死	1	shi wei de si
灭而有实	1	mie er you shi
鬼之一也	1	gui zhi yi ye
以有形者象无形者而定矣	1	yi you xing zhe xiang wu xing zhe er ding yi
有实而无乎处	1	you shi er wu hu chu
有长而无乎本剽	1	you zhang er wu hu ben piao
有所出而无窍者有实	1	you suo chu er wu qiao zhe you shi
有实而无乎处者	1	you shi er wu hu chu zhe
有长而无本剽者	1	you zhang er wu ben piao zhe
入出而无见其形	1	ru chu er wu jian qi xing
是谓天门	1	shi wei tian men
万物出乎无有	1	wan wu chu hu wu you
有不能以有为有	1	you bu neng yi you wei you
必出乎无有	1	bi chu hu wu you
而无有一无有	1	er wu you yi wu you
圣人藏乎是	1	sheng ren cang hu shi
弗可以加矣	1	fu ke yi jia yi
将以生为丧也	1	jiang yi sheng wei sang ye
以死为反也	1	yi si wei fan ye
是以分已	1	shi yi fen yi
其次曰始无有	1	qi ci yue shi wu you
既而有生	1	ji er you sheng
生俄而死	1	sheng e er si
以无有为首	1	yi wu you wei shou
以生为体	1	yi sheng wei ti
孰知有无死生之一守者	1	shu zhi you wu si sheng zhi yi shou zhe
吾与之为友	1	wu yu zhi wei you
是三者虽异	1	shi san zhe sui yi
非所言也	1	fei suo yan ye
不可知者也	1	bu ke zhi zhe ye
腊者之有	1	la zhe zhi you
可散而不可散也	1	ke san er bu ke san ye
观室者周于寝庙	1	guan shi zhe zhou yu qin miao
又适其偃焉	1	you shi qi yan yan
是以生为本	1	shi yi sheng wei ben
以知为师	1	yi zhi wei shi
因以乘是非	1	yin yi cheng shi fei
果有名实	1	guo you ming shi

因以死偿节	1	yin yi si chang jie
以用为知	1	yi yong wei zhi
以不用为愚	1	yi bu yong wei yu
以彻为名	1	yi che wei ming
以穷为辱	1	yi qiong wei ru
今之人也	1	jin zhi ren ye
是蜩与学鸠同于同也	1	shi tiao yu xue jiu tong yu tong ye
市人之足	1	shi ren zhi zu
则辞以放骜	1	ze ci yi fang ao
兄则以妪	1	xiong ze yi yu

至礼有不人	1	zhi li you bu ren
至义不物	1	zhi yi bu wu
至知不谋	1	zhi zhi bu mou

解心之谬	1	jie xin zhi miu

贵富显严名利六者	1	gui fu xian yan ming li liu zhe
容动色理气意六者	1	rong dong se li qi yi liu zhe

此四六者不荡胸中则正	1	ci si liu zhe bu dang xiong zhong ze zheng
虚则无为而无不为也	1	xu ze wu wei er wu bu wei ye
德之钦也	1	de zhi qin ye
德之光也	1	de zhi guang ye
生之质也	1	sheng zhi zhi ye
性之动谓之为	1	xing zhi dong wei zhi wei
为之伪谓之失	1	wei zhi wei wei zhi shi
知者之所不知	1	zhi zhe zhi suo bu zhi
动以不得已之谓德	1	dong yi bu de yi zhi wei de
动无非我之谓治	1	dong wu fei wo zhi wei zhi
名相反而实相顺也	1	ming xiang fan er shi xiang shun ye
羿工乎中微而拙乎使人无己誉	1	yi gong hu zhong wei er zhuo hu shi ren wu ji yu
圣人工乎天而拙乎人	1	sheng ren gong hu tian er zhuo hu ren
夫工乎天而	1	fu gong hu tian er
唯全人能之	1	wei quan ren neng zhi
虽虫能虫	1	sui chong neng chong
虽虫能天	1	sui chong neng tian
全人恶天	1	quan ren e tian
恶人之天	1	e ren zhi tian
而况吾天乎人乎	1	er kuang wu tian hu ren hu
一雀适羿	1	yi que shi yi
羿必得之	1	yi bi de zhi
以天下为之笼	1	yi tian xia wei zhi long
则雀无所逃	1	ze que wu suo tao
是故汤以胞人笼伊尹	1	shi gu tang yi bao ren long yi yin
秦穆公以五羊之皮笼百里奚	1	qin mu gong yi wu yang zhi pi long bai li xi
是故非以其所好笼之而可得者	1	shi gu fei yi qi suo hao long zhi er ke dei zhe
外非誉也	1	wai fei yu ye
胥靡登高而不惧	1	xu mi deng gao er bu ju
遗死生也	1	yi si sheng ye
不馈而忘人	1	bu kui er wang ren
因以为天人矣	1	yin yi wei tian ren yi
故敬之而不喜	1	gu jing zhi er bu xi
侮之而不怒者	1	wu zhi er bu nu zhe
唯同乎天和者为然	1	wei tong hu tian he zhe wei ran
出怒不怒	1	chu nu bu nu
则怒出于不怒矣	1	ze nu chu yu bu nu yi
出为无为	1	chu wei wu wei
则为出于无为矣	1	ze wei chu yu wu wei yi
欲静则平气	1	yu jing ze ping qi
欲神则顺心	1	yu shen ze shun xin
有为也欲当	1	you wei ye yu dang
则缘于不得已	1	ze yuan yu bu de yi
不得已之类	1	bu de yi zhi lei
庄子杂篇徐无鬼第二十四徐无鬼因女商见魏武侯	1	zhuang zi za pian xu wu gui di er shi si xu wu gui yin nv shang jian wei wu hou
武侯劳之曰	1	wu hou lao zhi yue
先生病矣	1	xian sheng bing yi
苦于山林之劳	1	ku yu shan lin zhi lao
故乃肯见于寡人	1	gu nai ken jian yu gua ren
徐无鬼曰	1	xu wu gui yue
我则劳于君	1	wo ze lao yu jun
君有何劳于我	1	jun you he lao yu wo
君将盈耆欲	1	jun jiang ying qi yu
则性命之情病矣	1	ze xing ming zhi qing bing yi
君将黜耆欲	1	jun jiang chu qi yu
则耳目病矣	1	ze er mu bing yi
我将劳君	1	wo jiang lao jun
武侯超然不对	1	wu hou chao ran bu dui
尝语君吾相狗也	1	chang yu jun wu xiang gou ye
执饱而止	1	zhi bao er zhi
是狸德也	1	shi li de ye
若亡其一	1	ruo wang qi yi
吾相狗又不若吾相马也	1	wu xiang gou you bu ruo wu xiang ma ye
直者中绳	1	zhi zhe zhong sheng
是国马也	1	shi guo ma ye
而未若天下马也	1	er wei ruo tian xia ma ye
天下马有成材	1	tian xia ma you cheng cai
若丧其一	1	ruo sang qi yi
超轶绝尘	1	chao yi jue chen
不知其所	1	bu zhi qi suo
武侯大悦而笑	1	wu hou da yue er xiao
徐无鬼出	1	xu wu gui chu
先生独何以说吾君乎	1	xian sheng du he yi shuo wu jun hu
吾所以说吾君者	1	wu suo yi shuo wu jun zhe
横说之则以诗	1	heng shuo zhi ze yi shi
从说则以金板	1	cong shuo ze yi jin ban
奉事而大有功者不可为数	1	feng shi er da you gong zhe bu ke wei shu
而吾君未尝启齿	1	er wu jun wei chang qi chi
今先生何以说吾君	1	jin xian sheng he yi shuo wu jun
使吾君说若此乎	1	shi wu jun shuo ruo ci hu
吾直告之吾相狗马耳	1	wu zhi gao zhi wu xiang gou ma er
子不闻夫越之流人乎	1	zi bu wen fu yue zhi liu ren hu
去国数日	1	qu guo shu ri
见其所知而喜	1	jian qi suo zhi er xi
去国旬月	1	qu guo xun yue
见所尝见于国中者喜	1	jian suo chang jian yu guo zhong zhe xi
及期年也	1	ji qi nian ye
见似人者而喜矣	1	jian shi ren zhe er xi yi
不亦去人滋久	1	bu yi qu ren zi jiu
思人滋深乎	1	si ren zi shen hu
夫逃虚空者	1	fu tao xu kong zhe
良位其空	1	liang wei qi kong
闻人足音跫然而喜矣	1	wen ren zu yin qiong ran er xi yi
又况乎昆弟亲戚之謦	1	you kuang hu kun di qin qi zhi qing
其侧者乎	1	qi ce zhe hu
莫以真人之言謦吾君之侧乎	1	mo yi zhen ren zhi yan qing wu jun zhi ce hu
徐无鬼见武侯	1	xu wu gui jian wu hou
先生居山林	1	xian sheng ju shan lin
以宾寡人	1	yi bin gua ren
其欲干酒肉之味邪	1	qi yu gan jiu rou zhi wei xie
其寡人亦有社稷之福邪	1	qi gua ren yi you she ji zhi fu xie
无鬼生于贫贱	1	wu gui sheng yu pin jian
未尝敢饮食君之酒肉	1	wei chang gan yin shi jun zhi jiu rou
将来劳君也	1	jiang lai lao jun ye
奚劳寡人	1	xi lao gua ren
劳君之神与形	1	lao jun zhi shen yu xing
天地之养也一	1	tian di zhi yang ye yi
登高不可以为长	1	deng gao bu ke yi wei zhang
居下不可以为短	1	ju xia bu ke yi wei duan
君独为万乘之主	1	jun du wei wan cheng zhi zhu
以苦一国之民	1	yi ku yi guo zhi min
以养耳目鼻口	1	yi yang er mu bi kou
夫神者不自许也	1	fu shen zhe bu zi xu ye
好和而恶奸	1	hao he er e jian
唯君所病之何也	1	wei jun suo bing zhi he ye
欲见先生久矣	1	yu jian xian sheng jiu yi
吾欲爱民而为义偃兵	1	wu yu ai min er wei yi yan bing
害民之始也	1	hai min zhi shi ye
为义偃兵	1	wei yi yan bing
造兵之本也	1	zao bing zhi ben ye
君自此为之	1	jun zi ci wei zhi
则殆不成	1	ze dai bu cheng
君虽为仁义	1	jun sui wei ren yi
几且伪哉	1	ji qie wei zai
形固造形	1	xing gu zao xing
成固有伐	1	cheng gu you fa
变固外战	1	bian gu wai zhan
君亦必无盛鹤列于丽谯之间	1	jun yi bi wu sheng he lie yu li qiao zhi jian
无徒骥于锱坛之宫	1	wu tu ji yu zi tan zhi gong
无藏逆于得	1	wu cang ni yu de
无以巧胜人	1	wu yi qiao sheng ren
无以谋胜人	1	wu yi mou sheng ren
无以战胜人	1	wu yi zhan sheng ren

兼人之土地	1	jian ren zhi tu di
以养吾私与吾神者	1	yi yang wu si yu wu shen zhe
其战不知孰善	1	qi zhan bu zhi shu shan
胜之恶乎在	1	sheng zhi e hu zai
君若勿已矣	1	jun ruo wu yi yi
修胸中之诚以应天地之情而勿撄	1	xiu xiong zhong zhi cheng yi ying tian di zhi qing er wu ying
夫民死已脱矣	1	fu min si yi tuo yi
君将恶乎用夫偃兵哉	1	jun jiang e hu yong fu yan bing zai
黄帝将见大隗乎具茨之山	1	huang di jiang jian da wei hu ju ci zhi shan
方明为御	1	fang ming wei yu
昌寓骖乘	1	chang yu can cheng
滑稽后车	1	hua ji hou che
至于襄城之野	1	zhi yu xiang cheng zhi ye
七圣皆迷	1	qi sheng jie mi
无所问涂	1	wu suo wen tu
适遇牧马童子	1	shi yu mu ma tong zi
若知具茨之山乎	1	ruo zhi ju ci zhi shan hu
若知大隗之所存乎	1	ruo zhi da wei zhi suo cun hu
异哉小童	1	yi zai xiao tong
非徒知具茨之山	1	fei tu zhi ju ci zhi shan
又知大隗之所存	1	you zhi da wei zhi suo cun
夫为天下者	1	fu wei tian xia zhe
亦若此而已矣	1	yi ruo ci er yi yi
又奚事焉	1	you xi shi yan
予少而自游于六之内	1	yu shao er zi you yu liu zhi nei
予适有瞀病	1	yu shi you mao bing
有长者教予曰	1	you zhang zhe jiao yu yue
若乘日之车而游于襄城之野	1	ruo cheng ri zhi che er you yu xiang cheng zhi ye
今予病少痊	1	jin yu bing shao quan
予又且复游于六之外	1	yu you qie fu you yu liu zhi wai
夫为天下亦若此而已	1	fu wei tian xia yi ruo ci er yi
予又奚事焉	1	yu you xi shi yan
则诚非吾子之事	1	ze cheng fei wu zi zhi shi
黄帝又问	1	huang di you wen
亦奚以异乎牧马者哉	1	yi xi yi yi hu mu ma zhe zai
亦去其害马者而已矣	1	yi qu qi hai ma zhe er yi yi
黄帝再拜稽首	1	huang di zai bai qi shou
称天师而退	1	cheng tian shi er tui
知士无思虑之变则不乐	1	zhi shi wu si lv zhi bian ze bu le
辩士无谈说之序则不乐	1	bian shi wu tan shuo zhi xu ze bu le
察士无凌谇之事则不乐	1	cha shi wu ling sui zhi shi ze bu le
皆囿于物者也	1	jie you yu wu zhe ye
招世之士兴朝	1	zhao shi zhi shi xing chao
中民之士荣官	1	zhong min zhi shi rong guan

商贾无市井之事则不比	1	shang jia wu shi jing zhi shi ze bu bi
庶人有旦暮之业则劝	1	shu ren you dan mu zhi ye ze quan
百工有器械之巧则壮	1	bai gong you qi xie zhi qiao ze zhuang

势物之徒乐变	1	shi wu zhi tu le bian
遭时有所用	1	zao shi you suo yong
不能无为也	1	bu neng wu wei ye
此皆顺比于岁	1	ci jie shun bi yu sui
不物于易者也	1	bu wu yu yi zhe ye
驰其形性	1	chi qi xing xing
潜之万物	1	qian zhi wan wu
终身不反	1	zhong shen bu fan
射者非前期而中谓之善射	1	she zhe fei qian qi er zhong wei zhi shan she
天下皆羿也	1	tian xia jie yi ye
天下非有公是也	1	tian xia fei you gong shi ye
而各是其所是	1	er ge shi qi suo shi
天下皆尧也	1	tian xia jie yao ye
然则儒墨杨秉四	1	ran ze ru mo yang bing si
与夫子为五	1	yu fu zi wei wu
果孰是邪	1	guo shu shi xie
或者若鲁遽者邪	1	huo zhe ruo lu ju zhe xie
我得夫子之道矣	1	wo dei fu zi zhi dao yi
吾能冬爨鼎而夏造冰矣	1	wu neng dong cuan ding er xia zao bing yi
是直以阳召阳	1	shi zhi yi yang zhao yang
以阴召阴	1	yi yin zhao yin
非吾所谓道也	1	fei wu suo wei dao ye
吾示子乎吾道	1	wu shi zi hu wu dao
于是乎为之调瑟	1	yu shi hu wei zhi tiao se
废一于堂	1	fei yi yu tang
废一于室	1	fei yi yu shi
鼓宫宫动	1	gu gong gong dong
鼓角角动	1	gu jiao jiao dong
音律同矣	1	yin lv tong yi
夫或改调一弦	1	fu huo gai tiao yi xian

未始异于声而音之君已	1	wei shi yi yu sheng er yin zhi jun yi
且若是者邪	1	qie ruo shi zhe xie
今乎儒墨杨秉	1	jin hu ru mo yang bing

相拂以辞	1	xiang fu yi ci

而未始吾非也	1	er wei shi wu fei ye
则奚若矣	1	ze xi ruo yi
子于宋者	1	zi yu song zhe

公谁欲与	1	gong shui yu yu

上忘而下畔	1	shang wang er xia pan
愧不若黄帝	1	kui bu ruo huang di
而哀不己若者	1	er ai bu ji ruo zhe

我必先之	1	wo bi xian zhi
彼故知之	1	bi gu zhi zhi

楚王觞之	1	chu wang shang zhi
孙叔敖执爵而立	1	sun shu ao zhi jue er li
市南宜僚受酒而祭	1	shi nan yi liao shou jiu er ji
古之人乎	1	gu zhi ren hu
于此言已	1	yu ci yan yi
丘也闻不言之言矣	1	qiu ye wen bu yan zhi yan yi
未之尝言	1	wei zhi chang yan
于此乎言之	1	yu ci hu yan zhi
市南宜僚弄丸而两家之难解	1	shi nan yi liao nong wan er liang jia zhi nan jie
孙叔敖甘寝秉羽而郢人投兵	1	sun shu ao gan qin bing yu er ying ren tou bing
丘愿有喙三尺	1	qiu yuan you hui san chi
彼之谓不道之道	1	bi zhi wei bu dao zhi dao
此之谓不言之辩	1	ci zhi wei bu yan zhi bian
故德总乎道之所一	1	gu de zong hu dao zhi suo yi
而言休乎知之所不知	1	er yan xiu hu zhi zhi suo bu zhi
道之所一者	1	dao zhi suo yi zhe
德不能同也	1	de bu neng tong ye
知之所不能知者	1	zhi zhi suo bu neng zhi zhe
辩不能举也	1	bian bu neng ju ye
名若儒墨而凶矣	1	ming ruo ru mo er xiong yi
故海不辞东流	1	gu hai bu ci dong liu
大之至也	1	da zhi zhi ye
圣人并包天地	1	sheng ren bing bao tian di
泽及天下	1	ze ji tian xia
而不知其谁氏	1	er bu zhi qi shui shi
是故生无爵	1	shi gu sheng wu jue
此之谓大人	1	ci zhi wei da ren
狗不以善吠为良	1	gou bu yi shan fei wei liang
人不以善言为贤	1	ren bu yi shan yan wei xian
而况为大乎	1	er kuang wei da hu
夫为大不足以为大	1	fu wei da bu zu yi wei da
而况为德乎	1	er kuang wei de hu
夫大备矣	1	fu da bei yi
莫若天地	1	mo ruo tian di
然奚求焉	1	ran xi qiu yan

知大备者	1	zhi da bei zhe
不以物易己也	1	bu yi wu yi ji ye
反己而不穷	1	fan ji er bu qiong
循古而不摩	1	xun gu er bu mo
大人之诚	1	da ren zhi cheng
子綦有八子	1	zi qi you ba zi
为我相吾子	1	wei wo xiang wu zi
子綦瞿然喜曰	1	zi qi qu ran xi yue
