子綦索然出涕曰	1	zi qi suo ran chu ti yue
吾子何为以至于是极也	1	wu zi he wei yi zhi yu shi ji ye
夫与国君同食	1	fu yu guo jun tong shi
泽及三族	1	ze ji san zu
而况父母乎	1	er kuang fu mu hu
今夫子闻之而泣	1	jin fu zi wen zhi er qi
是御福也	1	shi yu fu ye
子则祥矣	1	zi ze xiang yi
父则不祥	1	fu ze bu xiang
汝何足以识之	1	ru he zu yi shi zhi
尽于酒肉	1	jin yu jiu rou
入于鼻口矣	1	ru yu bi kou yi
而何足以知其所自来	1	er he zu yi zhi qi suo zi lai
吾未尝为牧而	1	wu wei chang wei mu er
未尝好田而鹑生于	1	wei chang hao tian er chun sheng yu
吾所与吾子游者	1	wu suo yu wu zi you zhe
游于天地	1	you yu tian di
吾与之邀乐于天	1	wu yu zhi yao le yu tian
吾与之邀食于地	1	wu yu zhi yao shi yu di
吾不与之为事	1	wu bu yu zhi wei shi
不与之为谋	1	bu yu zhi wei mou
不与之为怪	1	bu yu zhi wei guai
吾与之乘天地之诚而不以物与之相撄	1	wu yu zhi cheng tian di zhi cheng er bu yi wu yu zhi xiang ying
吾与之一委蛇而不与之为事所宜	1	wu yu zhi yi wei she er bu yu zhi wei shi suo yi
今也然有世俗之偿焉	1	jin ye ran you shi su zhi chang yan
凡有怪征者必有怪行	1	fan you guai zheng zhe bi you guai hang
非我与吾子之罪	1	fei wo yu wu zi zhi zui
几天与之也	1	ji tian yu zhi ye
吾是以泣也	1	wu shi yi qi ye
无几何而使之于燕	1	wu ji he er shi zhi yu yan
盗得之于道	1	dao de zhi yu dao
全而鬻之则难	1	quan er yu zhi ze nan
不若刖之则易	1	bu ruo yue zhi ze yi
于是乎刖而鬻之于齐	1	yu shi hu yue er yu zhi yu qi
适当渠公之街	1	shi dang qu gong zhi jie
然身食肉而终	1	ran shen shi rou er zhong
啮缺遇许由曰	1	nie que yu xu you yue
夫尧畜畜然仁	1	fu yao chu chu ran ren
吾恐其为天下笑	1	wu kong qi wei tian xia xiao
后世其人与人相食与	1	hou shi qi ren yu ren xiang shi yu
夫民不难聚也	1	fu min bu nan ju ye
爱之则亲	1	ai zhi ze qin
利之则至	1	li zhi ze zhi
誉之则劝	1	yu zhi ze quan
致其所恶则散	1	zhi qi suo wu ze san
爱利出乎仁义	1	ai li chu hu ren yi
捐仁义者寡	1	juan ren yi zhe gua
利仁义者众	1	li ren yi zhe zhong
夫仁义之行	1	fu ren yi zhi hang
唯且无诚	1	wei qie wu cheng
且假乎禽贪者器	1	qie jia hu qin tan zhe qi
是以一人之断制天下	1	shi yi yi ren zhi duan zhi tian xia
譬之犹一	1	pi zhi you yi
夫尧知贤人之利天下也	1	fu yao zhi xian ren zhi li tian xia ye
而不知其贼天下也	1	er bu zhi qi zei tian xia ye
夫唯外乎贤者知之矣	1	fu wei wai hu xian zhe zhi zhi yi
有暖姝者	1	you nuan shu zhe
有濡需者	1	you ru xu zhe
有卷娄者	1	you juan lou zhe
所谓暖姝者	1	suo wei nuan shu zhe
学一先生之言	1	xue yi xian sheng zhi yan
则暖暖姝姝而私自说也	1	ze nuan nuan shu shu er si zi shuo ye
自以为足矣	1	zi yi wei zu yi
而未知未始有物也	1	er wei zhi wei shi you wu ye
是以谓暖姝者也	1	shi yi wei nuan shu zhe ye
豕虱是也	1	shi shi shi ye
择疏鬣长毛	1	ze shu lie chang mao
自以为广宫大囿	1	zi yi wei guang gong da you
奎蹄曲隈	1	kui ti qu wei
乳间股脚	1	ru jian gu jiao
自以为安室利处	1	zi yi wei an shi li chu
不知屠者之一旦鼓臂布草操烟火	1	bu zhi tu zhe zhi yi dan gu bi bu cao cao yan huo
而己与豕俱焦也	1	er ji yu shi ju jiao ye
此以域进	1	ci yi yu jin
此以域退	1	ci yi yu tui
此其所谓濡需者也	1	ci qi suo wei ru xu zhe ye
羊肉不慕蚁	1	yang rou bu mu yi
蚁慕羊肉	1	yi mu yang rou
百姓悦之	1	bai xing yue zhi
故三徙成都	1	gu san xi cheng dou
至邓之虚而十有万家	1	zhi deng zhi xu er shi you wan jia
尧闻舜之贤	1	yao wen shun zhi xian
举之童土之地	1	ju zhi tong tu zhi di
冀得其来之泽	1	ji de qi lai zhi ze
舜举乎童土之地	1	shun ju hu tong tu zhi di
年齿长矣	1	nian chi zhang yi
聪明衰矣	1	cong ming shuai yi
而不得休归	1	er bu de xiu gui
所谓卷娄者也	1	suo wei juan lou zhe ye
是以神人恶众至	1	shi yi shen ren e zhong zhi
众至则不比	1	zhong zhi ze bu bi
不比则不利也	1	bu bi ze bu li ye
故无所甚亲	1	gu wu suo shen qin
无所甚疏	1	wu suo shen shu
抱德炀和	1	bao de yang he
以顺天下	1	yi shun tian xia
此谓真人	1	ci wei zhen ren
于蚁弃知	1	yu yi qi zhi
于鱼得计	1	yu yu de ji
于羊弃意	1	yu yang qi yi
以目视目	1	yi mu shi mu
以耳听耳	1	yi er ting er
以心复心	1	yi xin fu xin
其平也绳	1	qi ping ye sheng
其变也循	1	qi bian ye xun
以天待之	1	yi tian dai zhi
不以人入天	1	bu yi ren ru tian
得之也生	1	de zhi ye sheng
失之也死	1	shi zhi ye si
得之也死	1	de zhi ye si
失之也生	1	shi zhi ye sheng
其实堇也	1	qi shi jin ye
是时为帝者也	1	shi shi wei di zhe ye
何可胜言	1	he ke sheng yan
句践也以甲	1	ju jian ye yi jia
三千栖于会稽	1	san qian qi yu hui ji
唯种也能知亡之所以存	1	wei zhong ye neng zhi wang zhi suo yi cun
唯种也不知其身之所以愁	1	wei zhong ye bu zhi qi shen zhi suo yi chou
鸱目有所适	1	chi mu you suo shi
鹤胫有所节	1	he jing you suo jie
解之也悲	1	jie zhi ye bei
河也有损焉	1	he ye you sun yan
请只风与日相与守河	1	qing zhi feng yu ri xiang yu shou he
而河以为未始其撄也	1	er he yi wei wei shi qi ying ye
恃源而往者也	1	shi yuan er wang zhe ye
故水之守土也审	1	gu shui zhi shou tu ye shen
影之守人也审	1	ying zhi shou ren ye shen
物之守物也审	1	wu zhi shou wu ye shen
故目之于明也殆	1	gu mu zhi yu ming ye dai
耳之于聪也殆	1	er zhi yu cong ye dai
心之于殉也殆	1	xin zhi yu xun ye dai
凡能其于府也殆	1	fan neng qi yu fu ye dai
殆之成也不给改	1	dai zhi cheng ye bu gei gai
祸之长也兹萃	1	huo zhi zhang ye zi cui
其反也缘功	1	qi fan ye yuan gong
其果也待久	1	qi guo ye dai jiu
而人以为己宝	1	er ren yi wei ji bao
故有亡国戮民无已	1	gu you wang guo lu min wu yi
不知问是也	1	bu zhi wen shi ye
故足之于地也践	1	gu zu zhi yu di ye jian
恃其所不	1	shi qi suo bu
而后善博也	1	er hou shan bo ye
人之知也少	1	ren zhi zhi ye shao
恃其所不知而后知天之所谓也	1	shi qi suo bu zhi er hou zhi tian zhi suo wei ye
大一通之	1	da yi tong zhi
大阴解之	1	da yin jie zhi
大目视之	1	da mu shi zhi
大均缘之	1	da jun yuan zhi
大方体之	1	da fang ti zhi
大信稽之	1	da xin ji zhi
大定持之	1	da ding chi zhi
则其解之也似不解之者	1	ze qi jie zhi ye shi bu jie zhi zhe
其知之也似不知之也	1	qi zhi zhi ye shi bu zhi zhi ye
不知而后知之	1	bu zhi er hou zhi zhi
其问之也	1	qi wen zhi ye
不可以有崖	1	bu ke yi you ya
而不可以无崖	1	er bu ke yi wu ya
颉滑有实	1	jie hua you shi
古今不代	1	gu jin bu dai
而不可以亏	1	er bu ke yi kui
则可不谓有大扬	1	ze ke bu wei you da yang
阖不亦问是已	1	he bu yi wen shi yi
奚惑然为	1	xi huo ran wei
以不惑解惑	1	yi bu huo jie huo
复于不惑	1	fu yu bu huo
是尚大不惑	1	shi shang da bu huo
庄子杂篇则阳第二十五则阳游于楚	1	zhuang zi za pian ze yang di er shi wu ze yang you yu chu
夷节言之于王	1	yi jie yan zhi yu wang
王未之见	1	wang wei zhi jian
彭阳见王果曰	1	peng yang jian wang guo yue
夫子何不谭我于王	1	fu zi he bu tan wo yu wang
我不若公阅休	1	wo bu ruo gong yue xiu
公阅休奚为者邪	1	gong yue xiu xi wei zhe xie
冬则戳鳖于江	1	dong ze chuo bie yu jiang
夏则休乎山樊	1	xia ze xiu hu shan fan
有过而问者	1	you guo er wen zhe
此予宅也	1	ci yu zhai ye
夫夷节已不能	1	fu yi jie yi bu neng
而况我乎	1	er kuang wo hu
吾又不若夷节	1	wu you bu ruo yi jie
夫夷节之为人也	1	fu yi jie zhi wei ren ye
无德而有知	1	wu de er you zhi
以之神其交	1	yi zhi shen qi jiao
固颠冥乎富贵之地	1	gu dian ming hu fu gui zhi di
非相助以德	1	fei xiang zhu yi de
相助消也	1	xiang zhu xiao ye
夫冻者假衣于春	1	fu dong zhe jia yi yu chun
者反冬乎冷风	1	zhe fan dong hu leng feng
夫楚王之为人也	1	fu chu wang zhi wei ren ye
形尊而严	1	xing zun er yan
其于罪也	1	qi yu zui ye
无赦如虎	1	wu she ru hu
非夫佞人正德	1	fei fu ning ren zheng de
其孰能桡焉	1	qi shu neng rao yan
故圣人其穷也	1	gu sheng ren qi qiong ye
使家人忘其贫	1	shi jia ren wang qi pin
使王公忘爵禄而化卑	1	shi wang gong wang jue lu er hua bei
其于物也	1	qi yu wu ye
与之为娱矣	1	yu zhi wei yu yi
其于人也	1	qi yu ren ye
乐物之通而保己焉	1	le wu zhi tong er bao ji yan
故或不言而饮人以和	1	gu huo bu yan er yin ren yi he
与人并立而使人化	1	yu ren bing li er shi ren hua
父子之宜	1	fu zi zhi yi
彼其乎归居	1	bi qi hu gui ju
而一闲其所施	1	er yi xian qi suo shi
其于人心者	1	qi yu ren xin zhe
若是其远也	1	ruo shi qi yuan ye
故曰待公阅休	1	gu yue dai gong yue xiu
圣人达绸缪	1	sheng ren da chou miu
周尽一体矣	1	zhou jin yi ti yi
而不知其然	1	er bu zhi qi ran
复命摇作而以天为师	1	fu ming yao zuo er yi tian wei shi
人则从而命之也	1	ren ze cong er ming zhi ye
而所行恒无几时	1	er suo hang heng wu ji shi
其有止也	1	qi you zhi ye
生而美者	1	sheng er mei zhe
人与之鉴	1	ren yu zhi jian
不告则不知其美于人也	1	bu gao ze bu zhi qi mei yu ren ye
若不知之	1	ruo bu zhi zhi
若不闻之	1	ruo bu wen zhi
其可喜也终无已	1	qi ke xi ye zhong wu yi
人之好之亦无已	1	ren zhi hao zhi yi wu yi
圣人之爱人也	1	sheng ren zhi ai ren ye
人与之名	1	ren yu zhi ming
不告则不知其爱人也	1	bu gao ze bu zhi qi ai ren ye
其爱人也终无已	1	qi ai ren ye zhong wu yi
人之安之亦无已	1	ren zhi an zhi yi wu yi
旧国旧都	1	jiu guo jiu dou
望之畅然	1	wang zhi chang ran
虽使丘陵草木之缗入之者十九	1	sui shi qiu ling cao mu zhi min ru zhi zhe shi jiu
犹之畅然	1	you zhi chang ran
况见见闻闻者也	1	kuang jian jian wen wen zhe ye
以十仞之台县众间者也	1	yi shi ren zhi tai xian zhong jian zhe ye
冉相氏得其环中以随成	1	ran xiang shi de qi huan zhong yi sui cheng
与物无终无始	1	yu wu wu zhong wu shi
无几无时	1	wu ji wu shi
日与物化者	1	ri yu wu hua zhe
阖尝舍之	1	he chang she zhi
夫师天而不得师天	1	fu shi tian er bu de shi tian
与物皆殉	1	yu wu jie xun
其以为事也	1	qi yi wei shi ye
夫圣人未始有天	1	fu sheng ren wei shi you tian
未始有人	1	wei shi you ren
未始有始	1	wei shi you shi
未始有物	1	wei shi you wu
与世偕行而不替	1	yu shi xie hang er bu ti
所行之备而不洫	1	suo hang zhi bei er bu xu
其合之也	1	qi he zhi ye
汤得其司御	1	tang de qi si yu
门尹登恒为之傅之	1	men yin deng heng wei zhi fu zhi
从师而不囿	1	cong shi er bu you
得其随成	1	de qi sui cheng
为之司其名之名嬴法得其两见	1	wei zhi si qi ming zhi ming ying fa de qi liang jian
仲尼之尽虑	1	zhong ni zhi jin lv
为之傅之	1	wei zhi fu zhi
容成氏曰	1	rong cheng shi yue
除日无岁	1	chu ri wu sui
无内无外	1	wu nei wu wai
魏莹与田侯牟约	1	wei ying yu tian hou mou yue
田侯牟背之	1	tian hou mou bei zhi
将使人剌之	1	jiang shi ren la zhi
犀首公孙衍闻而耻之	1	xi shou gong sun yan wen er chi zhi
君为万乘之君也	1	jun wei wan cheng zhi jun ye
而以匹夫从仇	1	er yi pi fu cong chou
衍请受甲二十万	1	yan qing shou jia er shi wan
为君攻之	1	wei jun gong zhi
虏其人民	1	lu qi ren min
系其牛马	1	xi qi niu ma
使其君内热发于背	1	shi qi jun nei re fa yu bei
然后拔其国	1	ran hou ba qi guo
忌也出走	1	ji ye chu zou
季子闻而耻之	1	ji zi wen er chi zhi
筑十仞之城	1	zhu shi ren zhi cheng
城者既十仞矣	1	cheng zhe ji shi ren yi
则又坏之	1	ze you huai zhi
此胥靡之所苦也	1	ci xu mi zhi suo ku ye
今兵不起七年矣	1	jin bing bu qi qi nian yi
此王之基也	1	ci wang zhi ji ye
不可听也	1	bu ke ting ye
华子闻而丑之	1	hua zi wen er chou zhi
善言伐齐者	1	shan yan fa qi zhe
善言勿伐者	1	shan yan wu fa zhe
亦乱人也	1	yi luan ren ye
谓伐之与不伐乱人也者	1	wei fa zhi yu bu fa luan ren ye zhe
又乱人也	1	you luan ren ye
然则若何	1	ran ze ruo he
君求其道而已矣	1	jun qiu qi dao er yi yi
惠之闻之	1	hui zhi wen zhi
而见戴晋人	1	er jian dai jin ren
戴晋人曰	1	dai jin ren yue
有所谓蜗者	1	you suo wei wo zhe
君知之乎	1	jun zhi zhi hu
有国于蜗之左角者	1	you guo yu wo zhi zuo jiao zhe
有国于蜗之右角者	1	you guo yu wo zhi you jiao zhe
时相与争地而战	1	shi xiang yu zheng di er zhan
伏尸数万	1	fu shi shu wan
逐北旬有五日而后反	1	zhu bei xun you wu ri er hou fan
其虚言与	1	qi xu yan yu
臣请为君实之	1	chen qing wei jun shi zhi
君以意在四方上下有穷乎	1	jun yi yi zai si fang shang xia you qiong hu
知游心于无穷	1	zhi you xin yu wu qiong
而反在通达之国	1	er fan zai tong da zhi guo
若存若亡乎	1	ruo cun ruo wang hu
通达之中有魏	1	tong da zhi zhong you wei
于魏中有梁	1	yu wei zhong you liang
于梁中有王	1	yu liang zhong you wang
王与蛮氏有辩乎	1	wang yu man shi you bian hu
客出而君惝然若有亡也	1	ke chu er jun chang ran ruo you wang ye
圣人不足以当之	1	sheng ren bu zu yi dang zhi
夫吹管也	1	fu chui guan ye
吹剑首者	1	chui jian shou zhe
人之所誉也	1	ren zhi suo yu ye
舜于戴晋人之前	1	shun yu dai jin ren zhi qian
譬犹一也	1	pi you yi ye
孔子之楚	1	kong zi zhi chu
舍于蚁丘之浆	1	she yu yi qiu zhi jiang
其邻有夫妻臣妾登极者	1	qi lin you fu qi chen qie deng ji zhe
何为者邪	1	he wei zhe xie
是圣人仆也	1	shi sheng ren pu ye
是自埋于民	1	shi zi mai yu min
自藏于畔	1	zi cang yu pan
其志无穷	1	qi zhi wu qiong
其口虽言	1	qi kou sui yan
其心未尝言	1	qi xin wei chang yan
方且与世违	1	fang qie yu shi wei
而心不屑与之俱	1	er xin bu xie yu zhi ju
是陆沉者也	1	shi lu chen zhe ye
是其市南宜僚邪	1	shi qi shi nan yi liao xie
子路请往召之	1	zi lu qing wang zhao zhi
彼知丘之著于己也	1	bi zhi qiu zhi zhe yu ji ye
知丘之适楚也	1	zhi qiu zhi shi chu ye
以丘为必使楚王之召己也	1	yi qiu wei bi shi chu wang zhi zhao ji ye
彼且以丘为佞人也	1	bi qie yi qiu wei ning ren ye
其于佞人也	1	qi yu ning ren ye
羞闻其言	1	xiu wen qi yan
而况亲见其身乎	1	er kuang qin jian qi shen hu
而何以为存	1	er he yi wei cun
子路往视之	1	zi lu wang shi zhi
其室虚矣	1	qi shi xu yi
长梧封人问子牢曰	1	zhang wu feng ren wen zi lao yue
君为政焉勿卤莽	1	jun wei zheng yan wu lu mang
治民焉勿灭裂	1	zhi min yan wu mie lie
昔予为禾	1	xi yu wei he
耕而卤莽之	1	geng er lu mang zhi
则其实亦卤莽而报予	1	ze qi shi yi lu mang er bao yu
芸而灭裂之	1	yun er mie lie zhi
其实亦灭裂而报予	1	qi shi yi mie lie er bao yu
予来年变齐	1	yu lai nian bian qi
深其耕而熟	1	shen qi geng er shu
右繁体字	1	you fan ti zi
其禾蘩以滋	1	qi he fan yi zi
予终年厌飧	1	yu zhong nian yan sun
庄子闻之曰	1	zhuang zi wen zhi yue
今人之治其形	1	jin ren zhi zhi qi xing
多有似封人之所谓	1	duo you shi feng ren zhi suo wei
故卤莽其性者	1	gu lu mang qi xing zhe
欲恶之孽为性	1	yu e zhi nie wei xing
萑苇蒹葭始萌	1	huan wei jian jia shi meng
以扶吾形	1	yi fu wu xing
寻擢吾性	1	xun zhuo wu xing
并溃漏发	1	bing kui lou fa
不择所出	1	bu ze suo chu
内热溲膏是也	1	nei re sou gao shi ye
柏矩学于老聃	1	bai ju xue yu lao dan
请之天下游	1	qing zhi tian xia you
天下犹是也	1	tian xia you shi ye
汝将何始	1	ru jiang he shi
见辜人焉	1	jian gu ren yan
推而强之	1	tui er qiang zhi
解朝服而幕之	1	jie chao fu er mu zhi
号天而哭之	1	hao tian er ku zhi
天下有大灾	1	tian xia you da zai
子独先离之	1	zi du xian li zhi
曰莫为盗	1	yue mo wei dao
莫为杀人	1	mo wei sha ren
荣辱立然后睹所病	1	rong ru li ran hou du suo bing
货财聚然后睹所争	1	huo cai ju ran hou du suo zheng
今立人之所病	1	jin li ren zhi suo bing
聚人之所争	1	ju ren zhi suo zheng
穷困人之身	1	qiong kun ren zhi shen
使无休时	1	shi wu xiu shi
欲无至此得乎	1	yu wu zhi ci de hu
古之君人者	1	gu zhi jun ren zhe
以得为在民	1	yi de wei zai min
以失为在己	1	yi shi wei zai ji
以正为在民	1	yi zheng wei zai min
以枉为在己	1	yi wang wei zai ji
故一形有失其形者	1	gu yi xing you shi qi xing zhe
退而自责	1	tui er zi ze
今则不然	1	jin ze bu ran
匿为物而愚不识	1	ni wei wu er yu bu shi
大为难而罪不敢	1	da wei nan er zui bu gan
重为任而罚不胜	1	zhong wei ren er fa bu sheng
远其涂而诛不至	1	yuan qi tu er zhu bu zhi
民知力竭	1	min zhi li jie
则以伪继之	1	ze yi wei ji zhi
日出多伪	1	ri chu duo wei
士民安取不伪	1	shi min an qu bu wei
夫力不足则伪	1	fu li bu zu ze wei
知不足则欺	1	zhi bu zu ze qi
财不足则盗	1	cai bu zu ze dao
盗窃之行	1	dao qie zhi hang
于谁责而可乎	1	yu shui ze er ke hu
蘧伯玉行年六十而六十化	1	qu bo yu hang nian liu shi er liu shi hua
未尝不始于是之	1	wei chang bu shi yu shi zhi
而卒诎之以非也	1	er zu qu zhi yi fei ye
未知今之所谓是之非五十九非也	1	wei zhi jin zhi suo wei shi zhi fei wu shi jiu fei ye
万物有乎生而莫见其根	1	wan wu you hu sheng er mo jian qi gen
有乎出而莫见其门	1	you hu chu er mo jian qi men
人皆尊其知之所知	1	ren jie zun qi zhi zhi suo zhi
而莫知恃其知之所不知而后知	1	er mo zhi shi qi zhi zhi suo bu zhi er hou zhi
可不谓大疑乎	1	ke bu wei da yi hu
且无所逃	1	qie wu suo tao
此所谓然与然乎	1	ci suo wei ran yu ran hu
仲尼问于大史大	1	zhong ni wen yu da shi da
夫卫灵公饮酒湛乐	1	fu wei ling gong yin jiu zhan le
不听国家之政	1	bu ting guo jia zhi zheng
田猎毕弋	1	tian lie bi yi
不应诸侯之际	1	bu ying zhu hou zhi ji
其所以为灵公者何邪	1	qi suo yi wei ling gong zhe he xie
是因是也	1	shi yin shi ye
伯常骞曰	1	bo chang qian yue
夫灵公有妻三人	1	fu ling gong you qi san ren
同滥而浴	1	tong lan er yu
史鳅奉御而进所	1	shi qiu feng yu er jin suo
搏币而扶翼	1	bo bi er fu yi
其慢若彼之甚也	1	qi man ruo bi zhi shen ye
见贤人若此其肃也	1	jian xian ren ruo ci qi su ye
是其所以为灵公也	1	shi qi suo yi wei ling gong ye
夫灵公也	1	fu ling gong ye
卜葬于故墓	1	bo zang yu gu mu
卜葬于沙丘而吉	1	bo zang yu sha qiu er ji
掘之数仞	1	jue zhi shu ren
洗而视之	1	xi er shi zhi
不冯其子	1	bu feng qi zi
灵公夺而里之	1	ling gong duo er li zhi
夫灵公之为灵也久矣	1	fu ling gong zhi wei ling ye jiu yi
之二人何足以识之	1	zhi er ren he zu yi shi zhi
少知问于大公调曰	1	shao zhi wen yu da gong tiao yue
何谓丘里之言	1	he wei qiu li zhi yan
大公调曰	1	da gong tiao yue
合十姓百名而为风俗也	1	he shi xing bai ming er wei feng su ye
合异以为同	1	he yi yi wei tong
散同以为异	1	san tong yi wei yi
今指马之百体而不得马	1	jin zhi ma zhi bai ti er bu de ma
而马系于前者	1	er ma xi yu qian zhe
立其百体而谓之马也	1	li qi bai ti er wei zhi ma ye
是故丘山积卑而为高	1	shi gu qiu shan ji bei er wei gao
江河合水而为大	1	jiang he he shui er wei da
大人合并而为公	1	da ren he bing er wei gong
是以自外入者	1	shi yi zi wai ru zhe
有主而不执	1	you zhu er bu zhi
有正而不距	1	you zheng er bu ju
四时殊气	1	si shi shu qi
五官殊职	1	wu guan shu zhi
文武殊材	1	wen wu shu cai
大人不赐	1	da ren bu ci
万物殊理	1	wan wu shu li
无名故无为	1	wu ming gu wu wei
时有终始	1	shi you zhong shi
世有变化	1	shi you bian hua
祸福淳淳	1	huo fu chun chun
至有所拂者而有所宜	1	zhi you suo fu zhe er you suo yi
自殉殊面	1	zi xun shu mian
有所正者有所差	1	you suo zheng zhe you suo cha
比于大泽	1	bi yu da ze
百材皆度	1	bai cai jie du
观于大山	1	guan yu da shan
木石同坛	1	mu shi tong tan
此之谓丘里之言	1	ci zhi wei qiu li zhi yan
然则谓之道足乎	1	ran ze wei zhi dao zu hu
今计物之数	1	jin ji wu zhi shu
不止于万	1	bu zhi yu wan
而期曰万物者	1	er qi yue wan wu zhe
以数之多者号而读之也	1	yi shu zhi duo zhe hao er du zhi ye
是故天地者	1	shi gu tian di zhe
形之大者也	1	xing zhi da zhe ye
气之大者也	1	qi zhi da zhe ye
道者为之公	1	dao zhe wei zhi gong
因其大以号而读之则可也	1	yin qi da yi hao er du zhi ze ke ye
已有之矣	1	yi you zhi yi
乃将得比哉	1	nai jiang de bi zai
则若以斯辩	1	ze ruo yi si bian
譬犹狗马	1	pi you gou ma
其不及远矣	1	qi bu ji yuan yi
四方之内	1	si fang zhi nei
万物之所生恶起	1	wan wu zhi suo sheng e qi
阴阳相照相盖相治	1	yin yang xiang zhao xiang gai xiang zhi
四时相代相生相杀	1	si shi xiang dai xiang sheng xiang sha
欲恶去就	1	yu e qu jiu
于是桥起	1	yu shi qiao qi
雌雄片合	1	ci xiong pian he
于是庸有	1	yu shi yong you
安危相易	1	an wei xiang yi
祸福相生	1	huo fu xiang sheng
缓急相摩	1	huan ji xiang mo
聚散以成	1	ju san yi cheng
此名实之可纪	1	ci ming shi zhi ke ji
精之可志也	1	jing zhi ke zhi ye
随序之相理	1	sui xu zhi xiang li
桥运之相使	1	qiao yun zhi xiang shi
此物之所有	1	ci wu zhi suo you
言之所尽	1	yan zhi suo jin
知之所至	1	zhi zhi suo zhi
极物而已	1	ji wu er yi
睹道之人	1	du dao zhi ren
不随其所废	1	bu sui qi suo fei
不原其所起	1	bu yuan qi suo qi
此议之所止	1	ci yi zhi suo zhi
季真之莫为	1	ji zhen zhi mo wei
接子之或使	1	jie zi zhi huo shi
二家之议	1	er jia zhi yi
孰正于其情	1	shu zheng yu qi qing
孰偏于其理	1	shu pian yu qi li
是人之所知	1	shi ren zhi suo zhi
虽有大知	1	sui you da zhi
不能以言读其所自化	1	bu neng yi yan du qi suo zi hua
又不能以意其所将为	1	you bu neng yi yi qi suo jiang wei
斯而析之	1	si er xi zhi
精至于无伦	1	jing zhi yu wu lun
大至于不可围	1	da zhi yu bu ke wei
未免于物而终以为过	1	wei mian yu wu er zhong yi wei guo
或使则实	1	huo shi ze shi
莫为则虚	1	mo wei ze xu
有名有实	1	you ming you shi
是物之居	1	shi wu zhi ju
无名无实	1	wu ming wu shi
在物之虚	1	zai wu zhi xu
可言可意	1	ke yan ke yi
言而愈疏	1	yan er yu shu
未生不可忌	1	wei sheng bu ke ji
已死不可阻	1	yi si bu ke zu
死生非远也	1	si sheng fei yuan ye
理不可睹	1	li bu ke du
疑之所假	1	yi zhi suo jia
吾观之本	1	wu guan zhi ben
其往无穷	1	qi wang wu qiong
吾求之末	1	wu qiu zhi mo
其来无止	1	qi lai wu zhi
无穷无止	1	wu qiong wu zhi
言之无也	1	yan zhi wu ye
与物同理	1	yu wu tong li
或使莫为	1	huo shi mo wei
言之本也	1	yan zhi ben ye
与物终始	1	yu wu zhong shi
道不可有	1	dao bu ke you
有不可无	1	you bu ke wu
道之为名	1	dao zhi wei ming
所假而行	1	suo jia er xing
在物一曲	1	zai wu yi qu
夫胡为于大方	1	fu hu wei yu da fang
则终日言而尽道	1	ze zhong ri yan er jin dao
言而不足	1	yan er bu zu
则终日言而尽物	1	ze zhong ri yan er jin wu
言默不足以载	1	yan mo bu zu yi zai
非言非默	1	fei yan fei mo
议有所极	1	yi you suo ji
庄子杂篇外物第二十六外物不可必	1	zhuang zi za pian wai wu di er shi liu wai wu bu ke bi
故龙逢诛	1	gu long feng zhu
人主莫不欲其臣之忠	1	ren zhu mo bu yu qi chen zhi zhong
而忠未必信	1	er zhong wei bi xin
故伍员流于江	1	gu wu yuan liu yu jiang
苌弘死于蜀	1	chang hong si yu shu
三年而化为碧	1	san nian er hua wei bi
人亲莫不欲其子之孝	1	ren qin mo bu yu qi zi zhi xiao
而孝未必爱	1	er xiao wei bi ai
故孝己忧而曾参悲	1	gu xiao ji you er ceng can bei
木与木相摩则然	1	mu yu mu xiang mo ze ran
金与火相守则流	1	jin yu huo xiang shou ze liu
阴阳错行	1	yin yang cuo hang
则天地大骇	1	ze tian di da hai
于是乎有雷有霆	1	yu shi hu you lei you ting
水中有火	1	shui zhong you huo
乃焚大槐	1	nai fen da huai
有甚忧两陷而无所逃	1	you shen you liang xian er wu suo tao
心若县于天地之间	1	xin ruo xian yu tian di zhi jian
利害相摩	1	li hai xiang mo
生火甚多	1	sheng huo shen duo
众人焚和	1	zhong ren fen he
月固不胜火	1	yue gu bu sheng huo
于是乎有	1	yu shi hu you
然而道尽	1	ran er dao jin
庄周家贫	1	zhuang zhou jia pin
故往贷粟于监河侯	1	gu wang dai su yu jian he hou
监河侯曰	1	jian he hou yue
我将得邑金	1	wo jiang de yi jin
将贷子三百金	1	jiang dai zi san bai jin
庄周忿然作色曰	1	zhuang zhou fen ran zuo se yue
有中道而呼者	1	you zhong dao er hu zhe
周顾视车辙	1	zhou gu shi che zhe
中有鲋鱼焉	1	zhong you fu yu yan
周问之曰	1	zhou wen zhi yue
子何为者耶	1	zi he wei zhe ye
东海之波臣也	1	dong hai zhi bo chen ye
君岂有斗升之水而活我哉	1	jun qi you dou sheng zhi shui er huo wo zai
我且南游吴越之王	1	wo qie nan you wu yue zhi wang
激西江之水而迎子	1	ji xi jiang zhi shui er ying zi
鲋鱼忿然作色曰	1	fu yu fen ran zuo se yue
吾失我常与	1	wu shi wo chang yu
我无所处	1	wo wu suo chu
我得斗升之水然活耳	1	wo dei dou sheng zhi shui ran huo er
君乃言此	1	jun nai yan ci
曾不如早索我于枯鱼之肆	1	ceng bu ru zao suo wo yu ku yu zhi si
任公子为大钩巨缁	1	ren gong zi wei da gou ju zi
蹲乎会稽	1	dun hu hui ji
投竿东海	1	tou gan dong hai
旦旦而钓	1	dan dan er diao
期年不得鱼	1	qi nian bu de yu
已而大鱼食之	1	yi er da yu shi zhi
陷没而下骛	1	xian mo er xia wu
白波若山	1	bai bo ruo shan
海水震荡	1	hai shui zhen dang
声侔鬼神	1	sheng mou gui shen
惮赫千里	1	dan he qian li
任公子得若鱼	1	ren gong zi de ruo yu
离而腊之	1	li er la zhi
自制河以东	1	zi zhi he yi dong
苍梧已北	1	cang wu yi bei
莫不厌若鱼者	1	mo bu yan ruo yu zhe
已而后世辁才讽说之徒	1	yi er hou shi quan cai feng shuo zhi tu
皆惊而相告也	1	jie jing er xiang gao ye
夫揭竿累	1	fu jie gan lei
其于得大鱼难矣	1	qi yu de da yu nan yi
饰小说以干县令	1	shi xiao shuo yi gan xian ling
其于大达亦远矣	1	qi yu da da yi yuan yi
是以未尝闻任氏之风俗	1	shi yi wei chang wen ren shi zhi feng su
其不可与经于世亦远矣	1	qi bu ke yu jing yu shi yi yuan yi
大儒胪传曰	1	da ru lu chuan yue
东方作矣	1	dong fang zuo yi
事之何若	1	shi zhi he ruo
未解裙襦	1	wei jie qun ru
口中有珠	1	kou zhong you zhu
诗固有之曰	1	shi gu you zhi yue
青青之麦	1	qing qing zhi mai
生于陵陂	1	sheng yu ling bei
生不布施	1	sheng bu bu shi
死何含珠为	1	si he han zhu wei
儒以金椎控其颐	1	ru yi jin zhui kong qi yi
徐别其颊	1	xu bie qi jia
无伤口中珠	1	wu shang kou zhong zhu
老莱子之弟子出薪	1	lao lai zi zhi di zi chu xin
有人于彼	1	you ren yu bi
修上而趋下	1	xiu shang er qu xia
末偻而后耳	1	mo lou er hou er
视若营四海	1	shi ruo ying si hai
不知其谁氏之子	1	bu zhi qi shui shi zhi zi
老莱子曰	1	lao lai zi yue
去汝躬矜与汝容知	1	qu ru gong jin yu ru rong zhi
斯为君子矣	1	si wei jun zi yi
仲尼揖而退	1	zhong ni yi er tui
蹙然改容而问曰	1	cu ran gai rong er wen yue
业可得进乎	1	ye ke dei jin hu
夫不忍一世之伤	1	fu bu ren yi shi zhi shang
而骜万世之患	1	er ao wan shi zhi huan
抑固窭邪	1	yi gu ju xie
亡其略弗及邪	1	wang qi lue fu ji xie
惠以欢为	1	hui yi huan wei
骜终身之丑	1	ao zhong shen zhi chou
中民之行易进焉耳	1	zhong min zhi hang yi jin yan er
相引以名	1	xiang yin yi ming
相结以隐	1	xiang jie yi yin
与其誉尧而非桀	1	yu qi yu yao er fei jie
不如两忘而闭其所誉	1	bu ru liang wang er bi qi suo yu
反无非伤也	1	fan wu fei shang ye
动无非邪也	1	dong wu fei xie ye
圣人踌躇以兴事	1	sheng ren chou chu yi xing shi
以每成功	1	yi mei cheng gong
其载焉终矜尔	1	qi zai yan zhong jin er
宋元君夜半而梦人被发窥阿门	1	song yuan jun ye ban er meng ren bei fa kui a men
予自宰路之渊	1	yu zi zai lu zhi yuan
予为清江使河伯之所	1	yu wei qing jiang shi he bo zhi suo
渔者余且得予	1	yu zhe yu qie de yu
使人占之	1	shi ren zhan zhi
此神龟也	1	ci shen gui ye
渔者有余且乎	1	yu zhe you yu qie hu
令余且会朝	1	ling yu qie hui chao
且之网得白龟焉	1	qie zhi wang de bai gui yan
箕圆五尺	1	ji yuan wu chi
献若之龟	1	xian ruo zhi gui
君再欲杀之	1	jun zai yu sha zhi
再欲活之	1	zai yu huo zhi
杀龟以卜吉	1	sha gui yi bo ji
七十二钻而无遗	1	qi shi er zuan er wu yi
神龟能见梦于元君	1	shen gui neng jian meng yu yuan jun
而不能避余且之网	1	er bu neng bi yu qie zhi wang
知能七十二钻而无遗	1	zhi neng qi shi er zuan er wu yi
不能避刳肠之患	1	bu neng bi ku chang zhi huan
如是则知有所困	1	ru shi ze zhi you suo kun
神有所不及也	1	shen you suo bu ji ye
虽有至知	1	sui you zhi zhi
万人谋之	1	wan ren mou zhi
鱼不畏网而畏鹈鹕	1	yu bu wei wang er wei ti hu
去小知而大知明	1	qu xiao zhi er da zhi ming
去善而自善矣	1	qu shan er zi shan yi
无硕师而能言	1	wu shuo shi er neng yan
与能言者处也	1	yu neng yan zhe chu ye
子言无用	1	zi yan wu yong
知无用而始可与言用矣	1	zhi wu yong er shi ke yu yan yong yi
夫地非不广且大也	1	fu di fei bu guang qie da ye
人之所用容足耳	1	ren zhi suo yong rong zu er
然则厕足而垫之致黄泉	1	ran ze ce zu er dian zhi zhi huang quan
人尚有用乎	1	ren shang you yong hu
然则无用之为用也亦明矣	1	ran ze wu yong zhi wei yong ye yi ming yi
人有能游	1	ren you neng you
且得不游乎	1	qie de bu you hu
人而不能游	1	ren er bu neng you
且得游乎	1	qie de you hu
夫流遁之志	1	fu liu dun zhi zhi
决绝之行	1	jue jue zhi hang
其非至知厚德之任与	1	qi fei zhi zhi hou de zhi ren yu
覆坠而不反	1	fu zhui er bu fan
火驰而不顾	1	huo chi er bu gu
虽相与为君臣	1	sui xiang yu wei jun chen
易世而无以相贱	1	yi shi er wu yi xiang jian
至人不留行焉	1	zhi ren bu liu hang yan
夫尊古而卑今	1	fu zun gu er bei jin
学者之流也	1	xue zhe zhi liu ye
韦氏之流观今之世	1	wei shi zhi liu guan jin zhi shi
夫孰能不波	1	fu shu neng bu bo
唯至人乃能游于世而不僻	1	wei zhi ren nai neng you yu shi er bu pi
顺人而不失己	1	shun ren er bu shi ji
彼教不学	1	bi jiao bu xue
承意不彼	1	cheng yi bu bi
目彻为明	1	mu che wei ming
耳彻为聪	1	er che wei cong
鼻彻为颤	1	bi che wei chan
口彻为甘	1	kou che wei gan
心彻为知	1	xin che wei zhi
知彻为德	1	zhi che wei de
凡道不欲壅	1	fan dao bu yu yong
哽而不止则	1	geng er bu zhi ze
则众害生	1	ze zhong hai sheng
物之有知者恃息	1	wu zhi you zhi zhe shi xi
非天之罪	1	fei tian zhi zui
天之穿之	1	tian zhi chuan zhi
日夜无降	1	ri ye wu jiang
人则顾塞其窦	1	ren ze gu sai qi dou
胞有重阆	1	bao you zhong lang
心有天游	1	xin you tian you
室无空虚	1	shi wu kong xu
则妇姑勃	1	ze fu gu bo
心无天游	1	xin wu tian you
则六凿相攘	1	ze liu zao xiang rang
大林丘山之善于人也	1	da lin qiu shan zhi shan yu ren ye
亦神者不胜	1	yi shen zhe bu sheng
德溢乎名	1	de yi hu ming
名溢乎暴	1	ming yi hu bao
柴生乎守	1	chai sheng hu shou
官事果乎众宜	1	guan shi guo hu zhong yi
春雨日时	1	chun yu ri shi
草木怒生	1	cao mu nu sheng
于是乎始修	1	yu shi hu shi xiu
草木之倒植者过半而不知其然	1	cao mu zhi dao zhi zhe guo ban er bu zhi qi ran
静默可以补病	1	jing mo ke yi bu bing
可以休老	1	ke yi xiu lao
宁可以止遽	1	ning ke yi zhi ju
若是劳者之务也	1	ruo shi lao zhe zhi wu ye
非佚者之所未尝过而问焉	1	fei yi zhe zhi suo wei chang guo er wen yan
圣人之所以骇天下	1	sheng ren zhi suo yi hai tian xia
神人未尝过而问焉	1	shen ren wei chang guo er wen yan
贤人所以骇世	1	xian ren suo yi hai shi
圣人未尝过而问焉	1	sheng ren wei chang guo er wen yan
君子所以骇国	1	jun zi suo yi hai guo
贤人未尝过而问焉	1	xian ren wei chang guo er wen yan
小人所以合时	1	xiao ren suo yi he shi
君子未尝过而问焉	1	jun zi wei chang guo er wen yan
演门有亲死者	1	yan men you qin si zhe
以善毁爵为官师	1	yi shan hui jue wei guan shi
其党人毁而死者半	1	qi dang ren hui er si zhe ban
尧与许由天下	1	yao yu xu you tian xia
许由逃之	1	xu you tao zhi
汤与务光	1	tang yu wu guang
务光怒之	1	wu guang nu zhi
纪他闻之	1	ji ta wen zhi
帅弟子而蹲于	1	shuai di zi er dun yu
诸侯吊之	1	zhu hou diao zhi
申徒狄因以	1	shen tu di yin yi
荃者所以在鱼	1	quan zhe suo yi zai yu
得鱼而忘荃	1	de yu er wang quan
蹄者所以在兔	1	ti zhe suo yi zai tu
得兔而忘蹄	1	de tu er wang ti
言者所以在意	1	yan zhe suo yi zai yi
得意而忘言	1	de yi er wang yan
吾安得夫忘言之人而与之言哉	1	wu an de fu wang yan zhi ren er yu zhi yan zai
庄子杂篇寓言第二十七寓言十九	1	zhuang zi za pian yu yan di er shi qi yu yan shi jiu
重言十七	1	zhong yan shi qi
卮言日出	1	zhi yan ri chu
和以天倪	1	he yi tian ni
寓言十九	1	yu yan shi jiu
藉外论之	1	ji wai lun zhi
亲父不为其子媒	1	qin fu bu wei qi zi mei
亲父誉之	1	qin fu yu zhi
不若非其父者也	1	bu ruo fei qi fu zhe ye
非吾罪也	1	fei wu zui ye
人之罪也	1	ren zhi zui ye
与己同则应	1	yu ji tong ze ying
不与己同则反	1	bu yu ji tong ze fan
同于己为是之	1	tong yu ji wei shi zhi
异于己为非之	1	yi yu ji wei fei zhi
所以己言也	1	suo yi ji yan ye
是为耆艾	1	shi wei qi ai
而无经纬本末以期年耆者	1	er wu jing wei ben mo yi qi nian qi zhe
是非先也	1	shi fei xian ye
人而无以先人	1	ren er wu yi xian ren
无人道也	1	wu ren dao ye
人而无人道	1	ren er wu ren dao
是之谓陈人	1	shi zhi wei chen ren
因以曼衍	1	yin yi man yan
所以穷年	1	suo yi qiong nian
